engTitle: Praise God, from Whom All Blessings Flow
verse1:
Thupha khempeuh hong pia Pasian
Phat un, leitung mi khempeuh aw
Phat un vantung mi honpi'n zong
Phat un Pa, Ta leh Kha Siangtho

engTitle: The King of Love My Shepherd Is (Dominus Regit Me)
verse1:
Itna Kumpi, ka tuucingpa
Ama hoihna sia ngeilo
A mi suak leng sapna omlo
Tawntung Ama mi hita
verse2:
Nuntakna tui a luanna ah
Tat khiatsa ka kha tonpih
Lono na ah hong paipih hi
Vantung an tawh hong vaak hi
verse3:
Khuamial sihna kuam sung laulo
Kei kiang Topa Na om hi
Ka lung nuamsak, Na ciangkhut in
Lam hong hilh singlamteh in
verse4:
Nisim tawntung kizom suak in
Na hoihna kipelh ngeilo
Tuucing siampa, Nang kong phat hi
Tawntung Nangma innpi sung Amen

verse1:
Vantung zahtak huai Kumpipa bia un
A vaanglian leh hong itna la sa un
A hong liah hong keem hong uk tawntung maangpi
A vaanglian hi, ci in phat huai Topa hi
verse2:
Hong it hong hehpihna van pan taang aa
A vaang liatnathu la in sa unla
A heh ciangin kekkia tawh kibang ding hi
A thu khenna in haksa mahmah ding hi
verse3:
Na lamdang tawh a dim leitung inah
Vaanglian tawntung tawh Pasian a hong piang
Pel ngeilo na hanciamna tawh a kip hi
Puan bangin a kiimkot tuipi hisak hi
verse4:
Naupang bangin thanem leivui tate
Nang sungah muan'na bukna kong mu diam
Nong hehpihna kicing a tawp dongin ah
Hong bawlpa, hong dalpa, hong gumpa i Lawm

zoTitle: Pa Tung Min Than'na Om Hen
verse1:
Pa tung minthanna om hen
Tapa tung leh Kha Siangtho tungah zong
Piancil lai leh tuhun bangin
A tawntung in hih leitung om den ding hi
Amen Amen

engTitle: Now Thank We All Our God
verse1:
Lungsim khut leh kam tawh Pasian tung i lungdam hi
A bawl lamdangte tawh leitung khempeuh lungdam hi
Nute' ang pan kipan tuni ciang dong takin
Kigen theilo itna'n hong keem thupha takin
verse2:
A cingh, migi Pasian i khan tawntung hong nai hen
Lungdam lungnopna siang hong ompihsak tawntung hen
A hehpihna sungah lungman' ciang lamlak hen
Lei pan vantung dongah a sia hong peelsak hen
verse3:
Pa Pasian leh Tapa, Amau tawh maang Kha Siangtho
Tu'n phatna lungdamna van sangbel ah i puak to
Leitung, vantung, tawntung Amah bek biakna pia'n
Tuma, tulai, tunung Amah khat bek Pasian

zoTitle: Pasian’ Vaang Liatna Ka Phat Nuam Hi!
engTitle: Oh Could I Speak the Matchless Wotth!
verse1:
Hong gum Topa tungah a taang
A lian tawntung mahmah a vaang
Phat ding kah to thei leng,
Vantung leeng to in gawsem tawh
A lamdang la ka sa ding ta
Gabela dem nuam ing
Gabela dem nuam ing
verse2:
Mawhna pan hong tatkhiat na'ng in
Zeisu’n a si hong bua zo hi
Pasian lungdam na’ng in
Ama vaanglian a siangthona
A dem zo om kei, a siamna
Lapha sa tawntung ni
Lapha sa tawntung ni
verse3:
A saang vantung tokhom tungah
Tu in a om hong uk Topa
Zeisu a hong itna
A ngaih mahmah la awte tawh
A vaanglian phatna la sakna
Keimah ka hilh ding hi
Keimah ka hilh ding hi
verse4:
Lungdam huai Ama maitangpi
Hong mu in ci’n a hong sap ni
A hong tung lai ding hi
Hong it manin zawhna ngah aa
Hong gum Zeisu ka U kiangah
Ka om tawntung ding hi
Ka om tawntung ding hi

engTitle: How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds
verse1:
Zeisu A min bangzah ngaih hiam
A um ta dingin ah
Gimna, natna damsak aa nuam
Launa a hawlkhia ta
verse2:
A zangawp lungsim damsak hi
Dahna lungsim nuamsak
Kha Siangtho kial vahna pia hi
A gim mi tawl damsak
verse3:
A to suangpi it huai minpha
Gal panna belhna hi
A tam bel itna hehpihna
A kikholna lian hi
verse4:
Zeisu ka lawmpa, tuucingpa
Ka siampi, ka kumpi
Ka Topa hin’na lam a pha na
Phat tawntung ngah pah hi

zoTitle: Hong Pai In, Thupha Nam Kim Nak
engTitle: Come, Thou Fount of Every Blessing
verse1:
Hong pai in, thupha namkim naak
Ka lungsim hong puahsak in
Kang ngeilo Nong hehpihna naak
Nakpi’n hong phat theisak in
Vantung mite phatna la ngaih
Kei zong hong sa theinuam ing
Nong itna tung kip ka lungngaih
Tua itna mual ka phat ding
verse2:
Nong huhna tawh hih ciang kong tung
Huhna mualsuang hiah phut ing
Nong deihsakna hangin tu nung
Lung muangin inn hong tung ning
Lam khial aa Pasian ka nusia
Ahih hang Zeisu’n hong zong
A si manpha tawh hong tankhia
Gimna lauhuai pan hong hon
verse3:
A nisim in hong hehpihna
A tampi hong basak den
Na hehpih na’n hong khih inla
Na kiang pan hong pialsak ke’n
Topa kong vaksan dek zeel hi
Ka it Pasian, hong keem in
Hiah! Ka lungsim, Nang sung seel ni
Nang aa ding na ciamteh in

verse1:
Leitung ah om mihingte aw
Pasian phatna la sa unla
A vaangliatna thu gen unla
A mai pai in sa un nopna
verse2:
Amah bek Pasian takpi hi
Mi khempeuh bawl Topa hi aa
Ka tuute hong suak un, hong ci
Kong keem, kong cing nuam ci in ah
verse3:
Hong itna in beithei ngei kei
Hong hehpihna om tawntung hi
A thuciamna siasak ngei kei
Amin i phat tawntung ding hi
verse4:
Pasian bang hang migi bel hiam
A hong itna maan taktak hi
A thumaan a cil in om ta
A thumaan a cil in om ta

verse1:
Hong gum Topa hong it lamdang
Lungdam sindam la ka sa
Kiciamna hong pelsak nuam hi
Singlamteh tung sizo ta
verse2:
Vantung inn nuampi luah nading
A lamdang thupha gen hi
Hong hehpih hong it luat manin
Ka mawh hong phelsak zo hi
verse3:
Hong gum Topa A minthang hi
Nisim la sa in phat ning
Sih ciang mawh tanna meikuang sung
Hong tungsak nuamlo ding hi
verse4:
Hong gum Topa hong itna pha
Lapha kasak ding ngai hi
Sihna, hin’ tawntungna lam ah
Amah tawh ka om ding hi
chorus:
Topa phatna sak ding lapha
A sipha tawh hong sawp hi
Singlamteh tung sihna thuak aa
Ka mawh hong phelsak zo hi

verse1:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
A lianpen To Pasian!
Zingsang tungin phatnala kong sakto ding uh hi
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
Hehpih thei a vaanglian!
Thum kigawmna siangtho thupha Pasian!
verse2:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
Na misiang khempeuh in
Kham lukhute suahkhia in Nangmah hong bia uh hi
Vantung mihingte in
Nangma mai ah kun in
Tawntung Pasian Nangmah hong bia uh hi
verse3:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
Khuamial hong liah hangin
Mawhna mit in Na vaanglian hong muthei lo hangin
Nangmah bek Na siangtho
Kua mah’n hong ban zolo
Na Vaangliatna, Itna, leh Sian’ thona
verse4:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
A lianpen To Pasian!
Leitung, tuitung, vantung ah Na min kiphat ding hi
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho!
Hehpih thei a vaanglian!
Thum kigawmna siangtho thupha Pasian!

verse1:
Ngai in, ka kha aw, vantung mi lasakna
Leitung lungdam tuipi tung zong thang hi
Lapha sakna a aw zaknop huai bel hi
Hing kikheel mawh kiphelna thu gen hi
verse2:
La aw zak ciang mailam nawtin i pai hi
Lungkham a gimte aw hong pai un ci
Khuamial sungah Topa Zeisu kiko hi
Vantung inn lam hilhna thupha aw hi
verse3:
Gamlapi ah nitak siklong ging bangin
Leitung, tuitung ah Zeisu aw ging hi
Tul, then thamlo a vanlel mi tampi in
Tuucing Topa aw Na kiang kong pai hi
verse4:
Tu laitak i lungkham a sawt hangin ah
Khuamial kheng leng nuam na’ng khuavaak ding hi
A gimte zuihna lam a bei ciangin ah
Kha Siangtho maang ding khamgam tung ding hi
chorus:
Thu ciamna cing kham vantung mihingte in
A aw zaknop huai-in la sa uh hi
Nitak kap aa zingsang lungdamsak hi
Sawtvei khuamial itna khua vaaksak in

verse1:
Leitung mihingte aw en un
Dahna thuak Zeisu a hi
A gal khempeuhte zogawp zo
Mi khempeuh in bia uh hi
verse2:
Vantung aa mihing khempeuh in
Topa Zeisu minphat hi
Thukhen tokhom tung tusak aa
Vantung mite’n phatsak hi
verse3:
Migilo te’n ling tawh kigan
Lukhu Zeisu khusak hi
Mi siangtho leh vantung mite’n
Tu’n Zeisu Amin phat hi
verse4:
Amin phatin ah kiko un
Galzo pawi khaamna ngai un
Topa Zeisu in maan' ngah hi
Lungdam huai bel hi, en un
chorus:
Kumpi lukhu, Kumpi lukhu
Topa Zeisu khusak un
Kumpi lukhu, Kumpi lukhu
Topa Zeisu khusak un

verse1:
Pa aw, ka kikhen uh ciang
Ko lungsim Nang deih bang hita hen
Thungetna (Prayer):
Eite khat leh khat, i kikhen ciangin,
Topa Pasian in, i omna ciat ah,
Hong kem tawntung ta hen, Amen!

engTitle: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
verse1:
Topa phat un, na khempeuh a piangsak
Kumpipa hi! Aw, ka kha aw
Amah phat in damna gupna hong pia!
Tua thu zate’n a biakinn sung zuan dingin
Amah va biakhawm ciat ve ni
verse2:
Topa phat un, na khempeuh a vekpi
Ama uk hi A kha nuai-ah tawldam
Lungmuan' nopsakna a hong pia
Na deih nai hiam, A hoihna na muh ciangin
Ama hong piak khempeuh thei ni
verse3:
Topa phat un, na sepna bawlna khempeuh
Hong huh hi a maan takin
Hehpihna leh nopna tawh hong khuh dia
Lung ngaingai in, Amah thahatna thei in
Amah tawh va kipawl thei ni

zoTitle: Topa Thupha Sang Nuam I Kikhawm Hi
engTitle: We Gather Together to Ask the Lord’s Blessing
verse1:
Topa thupha sangnuam ngen in i kikhawm hi
Ama deihna theih nading manlang hong puak
Dawi netcip thuaknate tu’n bei-in lungnuam ta
Amin phatna la sa, A mi mangngilh lo hi
verse2:
Eite lam hong lak ding, Pasian i kiang hong om
A vantung gam puahin a siangthosak hi
Tua ahih man in, a kipat pan gal i zo
Ko lam aa hong pang Topa, Na minthang ta hen
verse3:
Na min kong phat uh hi, Galzo makai Pipa
Kote hong dal hong keem ding kong ngen uh hi
Ze-etna tawh mite hong kipelh sak in
Na min kiphat den hen! Topa hong gum in

zoTitle: Pasian Naseemte Aw, Na Topa’n Gen Khia
engTitle: Ye sercants of God, Your Master Proclaim
verse1:
Pa' nasemte aw, gamlapi zeel un
Topa’n thangsak hi, lamdang Ama min
Na khempeuh a zo min Zeisu ahi hi
Ama gam in zai aa na khempeuh uk hi
verse2:
Thahat Pasian in gum ding van pan uk
Amah’n hong zuan hi, A kiang i om hi
Mihon tampi’n zong zawhna la sa uh hi
Ei hong gum Kumpipa Zeisu hi, ci hi
verse3:
Kumpi tokhom tung hong Gumpa Pasian
Vekpi in phat hi, A Tapa phat hi
Vantung mite’n zong Zeisu a phat uh hi
Tuuno mai bok in, Amah a bia uh hi
verse4:
Ei zong phattek ni, A vangliatna thu
A min than’na thu, A pilna, hatna
Phatna leh thupha tawh i phattek ding hi
Van pan vantung mi’n tawntung itna phat hi

verse1:
Zing ni suak sensan ta
Ka lungsim khanglo lo
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Na sem ding, thungen ding
Zeisu kiang vazuan ning
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
verse2:
Lungsung dahna om hiam
Hih ah ka dahna kiam
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Leitung nuamna bei leh
Hehnepna om veve
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
verse3:
Vantung lungdamna ah
La a ngaih pen hih mah!
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Khuamial vaang te’n kihta
A zaak uh ciang hih la
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
verse4:
Leitung ka hin’lai teng
Sa ning ka sih mateng
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!
Sih ciang vantung tung leng
Ka la hih mah hi leng
Zeisu Khazih phat huai!

zoTitle: Zeisu! Na Min Ngaih Ka It Hi
engTitle: Jesus! I Love Thy Charming Name
verse1:
Zeisu! Na min ngaih ka it hi
Bil in tua la ka za
Nakpi pi in ging khiasak in
Vantung leitung thawn in
verse2:
Ka kha aa ding Nang Na manpha
Ka lampi leh ka muan’
Nangma mai ah suang manphate,
Milimno zep bang hi
verse3:
Ka deih teng leh ka ut khempeuh
Nang sungah kimtak om
Kei mit in kiman lo sakeng
Lawm taklo bang sakeng
verse4:
Na hehpihna ka lungsung teeng
A namtuina hong bua
Liamma khempeuh a damsak thei
Itna tawh hong keem hi

verse1:
Kong phat uh hi, Topa tuzan
Na thupha khuavaak hong pia in
Hong keem in aw, kei hong keem in
Na vanglian Kumpi khanuai ah
verse2:
Zeisu min in hong maisak in
Tuni dong ka mawhna sa te
Hih leitung ah Nang leh kei bek
Nuam takin hong ihmusak in
verse3:
Nuntaakna lam kei hong hilh in
Tua hikei leh kei ka si ding
Sihna ding thu kei hong hilh in
Thukhen ni ciang thawhkikna thu
verse4:
Ka kha Nang kiang hong la inla
Nuam tak kei hong ihmusak in
Tua in kei hong thahatsak in
Ka thawh kik ciang Topa phat ning

zoTitle: Hong Khihna In A Pha Hi
engTitle: Blest be the Tie That Binds (Tune: Denis)
verse1:
Ei lung hong khih nading,
Zeisu itna pha hi
Lung kituakna in vantung khua
Kituakna bang om hi
verse2:
Ei Pa tokhom mai ah
Nakpi thu i ngen hi
Ei lawpna upna deihna teng
A kibang in om hi
verse3:
Eite’n dahna thuak khawm
Van puakna ki pua hi
Khat veivei i lawmte aa ding
Khitui a luangthei hi
verse4:
Eite kikhen ciangin
Lungsim dahna piang hi
Hih hang i lungsim tawh om khawm
Nung ciang kimu ding hi

engTitle: Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessing (Tune: Sicitian Mariners)
verse1:
Topa aw, Nangma thupha tawh
Dim in hong kikhensak in
Nangma itna bang neihna tawh
Hehpihna hong phawksak in
Tha hong guan' aw, tha hong guan’ aw
Hih gammang sung zin lai in
verse2:
Nangma lungdam thu hangin ah
Nang kong phat uh Topa aw
Ko lungsung leh gamtatna ah
Na hotna gah langh leh maw
Nang thumaan ah, Nang thumaan ah
Hong kip tawntung le ung maw
verse3:
Leitung pan in Nong sap peuh ciang
Sihna kihta hetlo in
Vantung mite’n hong lenpih ciang
Hong mang ning lungdam takin
Tawntung Na kiang tawntung Na kiang
Nangmah tawh hong maangsak in

zoTitle: Topa Aw It Huai Na Min Phat Na'ng La!
engTitle: Saviour, Again to Thy Dear Name (Tune: Ellers)
verse1:
Topa aw, it huai Na min phat na’ng la
Lungsim kikhat in kong salai uh aa
Ko kikhen ma in kong phatkhawm uh hi
Nangma thupha kun in kong ngak uh hi
verse2:
Nangma thupha tawh hong ciahsak inla
Na min tawh tuni hong khinsak inla
Ka kam, ka muk uh leh ko mau lungsim
Khial lo nading in Nangmah’n hong cing kim
verse3:
Tuzan khuavaak lungnopna hong guan in
Khuamial, ko aa ding, khuavaak suaksak in
Nang aa ding sun le zan danglo man in
Na tate launa pan hong keem ta in
verse4:
Leitung nuntaak lai lungnop hong pia in
Dah hong neem in, hong kipsak tawntung in
Ko galdona Nong tawlngaksak tak ciang
Hong sam in tawntung nopna Nangma kiang

zoTitle: Topa A Inn Siangtho Sung Om Hi
engTitle: The Lord Is In His Holy Temple
verse1:
Topa A inn siangtho sung om hi
Topa A inn siangtho sung om hi
Dai dide in om ta un
Dai dide in om ta un
Amai ah, Dai dide’n om ta un
Amai ah, Amen...

zoTitle: Nangmah Tawh Pasian Om Khawm Ta Hen
verse1:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
A hong pi, a hong len dingin
A tuute hong keembit dingin
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
verse2:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
A khanuai hong liah hong dal in
Nisim "Manna" hong vaak dingin
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
verse3:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
Launa’n hong lung amsak ciangin
Ang sung hong pom bikbek dingin
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
verse4:
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
Itna nuai-ah hong cing dingin
Sihna tuihual saatpaai dingin
Nangma tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen
chorus:
I kimuh kik mateng
Zeisu kiang kimuh mateng
I kimuh kik mateng
Nangmah tawh Pasian om khawm ta hen

verse1:
Kei tawh om khawm in, ni a tumzo aa
Khua mial semsem in, kei kiangah om ta
Hong gum ding a dang omlo laitak in
Hong gum Topa aw kei kiang ah om in
verse2:
Leitung nuntaakna mengmeng’n bei thei
Leitung ah nuamna om tawntung thei kei
Leitung ah siatna ngentang ka muta
Kei tawh om khawm in siathei kei Topa
verse3:
Kei tawh om khawm, keima tha a pha kei
Nangmah bek in ze-etna na zo thei
Nangmah bangin kua’n hong paipih thei maw?
Lungdam loh laitak kei tawh om khawm aw
verse4:
Thupha na hong piak leh kei ka lau lo
Dahna khitui’n zong hong siasak zolo
Sihna leh han in hong zo thei lopi
Kei tawh na om khawm leh ka zo thei hi
verse5:
Keima ka mitsi ka sih laitak in
Na singlamteh ka mai-ah hong lak in
Vantung khuavaak leitung khuamial bei aa
Sih laitak kei tawh om khawm in Topa

zoTitle: A Vaanglian Pa Aw, Ko Thumna Hong Ngai In
verse1:
A vaanglian Pa aw, kong thum hong ngai in
Na ma hong ngak ko thupha hong pia’n
Amen

zoTitle: Tung Sun Ni A Tumta Aa
engTitle: Day is Dying in the West
verse1:
Tung sun ni a tumta aa
Tawl ngakna hun hong tungta
Zan aksi hong suak lai aa
Thangvan paak bang palh lai aa Pasian bia ni
verse2:
Nuntakna a uk Topa
Van nuai teng Nangma omna
Nangma mai hong zong kote
Na angsung ah hong khawm ve
Kinai takin.
verse3:
Khua hong mial semsem hangin
A taang aksite khengin
Ko lungsim hong khato ta'n
Nangma mai munuam in ah
Vannuai itpa
verse4:
Aksite le zan le sun
Mu ngei nawnlo ding a hun
Hong tun’ ciang, vantung Topa’n
Tawntung zing khua vaaksak ta’n
Kote’ mai ah.
chorus:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho, Topa Pasian'
Leitung, vantung ah Na vaang
Nangmah phatna hong kilangh
Sangbel Pasian!

engTitle: God That Madest Earth and Heaven (Tune: Ar, Hyd Y Nos)
verse1:
Leitung, vantung, khuamial, khuavaak piangsak Pasian
Sun nasep hun leh zan tawlngak hong pia Pasian
Na vantung mi hong cingsak in
Ihmut nuam tawh hong hehpih in
Ngaihsut, lamet siangtho hong guan in
Tuzan khuavaak.
verse2:
Nuntaak lam mainawt nading zing khuavaak ciang aa
Ko hong mang keeikaai zo nading Nangma deihna
Siatna' vaang panin hong dal in
Lam kawcik ah hong paipih in
Sun niloh hong mukhialsak kei in,
Nangma maipha

zoTitle: Tu In Sun’ Ni Tum Ta
engTitle: Now the Day is Over (Tune: Merial)
verse1:
Tu-in sun ni tumta, zan hong naita hi
Nitaak khuamui mialna, damdam hong tung hi
verse2:
Zeisu aw a gimte, tawldam hong pia in
Na thupha tawh kote, hong ihmusak in
verse3:
Ko Nangma tanote, Nang hong musak in
Tuipi tung khualzinte, Nangmah’n Na keem in.
verse4:
Tuzan khua vaak in ah, Na vantung mite’n
Ko tung kha zaak in ah, Ko hong cing uh hen

engTitle: Saviour, Breather an Evening Blessing (Tune: Evening Prayer)
verse1:
Topa aw, ko ihmut maa in
Nitaak thupha hong pia in
Mawhna leh kisapna ko nei
Nong hon thei, Nong damsak thei
verse2:
Siatna in hong kiimvel hangin
Thaltang tawh hong kaap hangin
Na vantung mite’n hong cing aa
Nong nai ciang lau nawnlo ta
verse3:
Zankhua a mial phat hangin
Nang hong liah lo khuamial in
Na mihingte’ omna peuh ah
Nang, gim ngeilo a cing Pa
verse4:
Tuzan ciangin ko lupna tung
Theih kholh loh ka si zong un
A vul ngeilo paakpalh bangin
Vantungah zing khanglo ding

verse1:
Hong gum Topa nitaang bang hi
Ama kiang khua mial ngeilo hi
Topa aw, Na mai kong muh na’ng
Meiilum kaite na thengsak in
verse2:
Topa, ka lungkham ciangin ah,
Mitgui in a kham luat lai ah
Topa aw, Nangma ang sungah
Ka tawl ka hong damsak nuam ta
verse3:
Topa aw, Nang na om lai ah
Sih ding ka kihta keimah in
Keimah tawh a om khawm dingin
Nisim in Topa hong pai in
verse4:
Tu lai aa Na thu hong sel aa
Thupha bel hong nialte in ah
Nung ciangin a khialh loh na’ngin
Lam a khialte na hehpih in
verse5:
Nitak aa a thum a taute
Cidam lo aa a zawngkhalte
Na thupha kong na hon’ in la
A lung na damsak in, Topa

engTitle: Softly Now the Light of Day (Tune: Seymour)
verse1:
Tu in sunni tum diaidiai
Ka mit khua hong mui hiaihiai
Lungsim, pumpi tawlnga in
Topa, hong omkhawm nuam ing
verse2:
Ka sung ka pua Na mu khin
Hong maisak in a vekpi’n
Kilang aa ka khialhna leh
Simtham aa ka mawhnate
verse3:
Kei aa ding a sawtlo in
Sun khuavaak hong bei ciangin
Mawhna dahna peng in ah
Hong la in Nangma kiangah
verse4:
Nang Na neihloh hang mawhna
Na thei ka gitnat lohna
Tua hi aa To Zeisu aw
Hehpihna tawh hong en aw

zoTitle: Topa, Ni Nong Piak Ni, Bei Khin Ta
engTitle: The Day Thou Gavest, Lord, Is Ended (Tune: St. Clement)
verse1:
Topa ni Nong piak ni beikhin ta
Na thupiak bangin khua hong mial
Zing simin phatna la hong sak ung
Tawlnga lo in Nang hong phat nung
verse2:
Hih leitung khuavaak hong taan’ lai in
Na pawlpite ihmu ngeilo
Gam khempeuh ah Nangbek hong ki en
Sun le zan tawlnga ngei kei nung
verse3:
Leitung tuitung tuikulh mun tengah
A hun sialsial in khua hong vaak
Tawlnga ngeilo in thu hong ngen ung
Na min phatna bei ngeilo ding
verse4:
Hih leitung kumpi gamte bangin
Na ukna gam beingei kei hen
Na bawlsa leitung na khempeuh in
Na ukna gam beingei lo ding

zoTitle: Ka Kha Aw, Topa Phat In
verse1:
Minthang Kumpi phat un, Amah bek Pasian
Phat un, ei hong lak zo hi, na lamdang lian
Khualzin mi tonpih den ding, hong ciam phat un
Meikhuam leh sun aa meiipi hangin phat un
verse2:
Mi khempeuh tatkhiatna hong piakhong phat un
A siangsak thei tuikhuk hong piak man phat un
Migi hong it, hong kepna hangin phat un
I thunget nate hong dawn’ manin phat un
verse3:
Hong it man hong ze-etna hangin phat un
Eite hong kipsak in, hong lak hi, van mun
Galzo muan’na, mit lo lawp’na hang phat un
It teng kituah khawm na’ng mun hangin phat un
chorus:
Phat un, a taang van mi’n
Kham gawsem tum in, A mi khempeuh in phat
A mai en sa in, A gam lianpi sungah
Kum tawn kha tawn in, A bawlsa te’n phat ding
Ka it kha aw phat in, A bawlsa te’n phat ding
Ka kha aw phat in

zoTitle: Na Khempeuh A Uk Topa’n Kumpi
verse1:
Na khempeuh Topa, Kumpi suak
Na min thanna Ni, aksi’n taang
Leitung buppi hin’na laizang
Itna lungsim neite kiang nai
verse2:
Nuntak na Ni, eite aa ding
I lampi ah hong taang suk hi
Lametna aksi na vot sak
Zan sawt vil a om mi nuamsak
verse3:
Zan khuamial in Na nuih mai liah
Sun ni taang Nong hehpihna hi
Sakhi tuihup hehpihna lim
Mawhna meii bang a thengsak ta
verse4:
Suahtakna thumaan hong pia in
Nang aa ding lungsim tawh kuan in
A nungta Na biakinn suah dong
Siangtho khuavaak, vantung khuavaak. Amen

zoTitle: Lungdam In Kong Bia Uh Hi
engTitle: Joyful, Joyful We Adore Thee (Tune: Hymn to Joy)
verse1:
Min than’na leh itna Topa
Lungdam in kong bia uh hi
Lungsim paak bang palh Na mai ah
Na vaangtaang sung hong malh hi
Mawhna dahna meii thengsak in
Hawlkhia in lung muan’ lahna
Sun nitaang ko sung hong dim in
Tul lo nuamna hong guan’ Pa
verse2:
Lei leh van in na vaang langhsak
Hong pahtawina bawlsa te’n
Aksi leh van mite’n hong sak
Tatsat lo in hong phat den
Lo leh tu lak mual leh kuam te’n,
Lo dumna kham leh tuipi
Ciktui phul leh vasa ham te’n
Nang sung nuam din’ hong zawn’ hi
verse3:
Mawh maisak Pa, thupha pia Pa
Cing tawntung thupha Na hi
Tuinaak bang nun’na sung nuamna
Tawlngakna nuam pen Na hi
Itna nei peuh Nang aa hi khin
Kote’ Pa leh Honpa aw
Ko ki-it tek na’ng hong hilh in
Na nuamna sung dom to aw

verse1:
Zeisu’n i thumna hong za
A migi i tuucing Pa’n
Na hehpihna tawh kote
Lungsim bittak hong keem in
Amen
verse2:
Nang sung ka thahat nangun
Natna khempeuh nuamsak in
Na deih bang hong hisak in
Lungdam hiah kimuh kik na'ng
Amen

zoTitle: I Pasian Muan Huai Kulhpi Hi
engTitle: A Mightly Fortress is Our God (Tune: Ein’ Feste Burg)
verse1:
I Pasian muan huai kulhpi hi
A sia ngeilo kidalna, Mawhna tui bang a let mite
Puan bang sawp siang Huhpa hi, Tanglai pu le pa gal
Ei tung gal bang hong zong, A siamna vaang a lian
Gitloh muhdahna dim, Leitung leh a gam teh lo
verse2:
Eite’n ei tha bek i suang hiam?
Ei tha bekin zolo ding, Ei lam a pang mi maan omlo
Pasian teel khiat mipa in, Kua pen a hi ding hiam?
Zeisu Khazih a hi, A min Topa Pasian
Tanglai, tulai kibang, Gal a zo tawntung ding hi
verse3:
Dawi tawh kidim hih leitung in
Eite hong bawlsia dingin, Pasian deih kei, i lam kei ding
Amah’n hong zawhpih ding hi, Khua mialna kumpipa
Aa ding i liing kei hi, Amah i do zo ding
En un, sia dekta hi, Kammal khat tawh puk ding hi
verse4:
Leitung vangliatnate tungah
Lungdamna piak kul lo hi, Kha Siangtho hehpihna ei aa
Ei lam Amah hong pang khawm, Leitung nuntakna leh
Nate sia khin ding aa, Pumpi a that ding hi
Pasian thumaan kip in, A gam kip tawntung ding hi

zoTitle: A Hing Tawntung Kha Siangtho Piang Sak Den Hi
verse1:
A hing tawntung Kha Siangtho in piangsak hi
Hih leitung aa, nuntakna nei khempeuh
Nuntakna sih ni tawlnga ngei lo-in pai
Na minthan’na zingsol la in kisa
Hih leitung mite in siatna ngak in om
Mite lungsim siatna bek tawh dim hi
verse2:
Aw, Topa Nang sung sian’thona a dim hi
Nang sungah nuntakna ciktui luang hi
Na Kha Siangtho in manlaang takin khauhsak
Mawhna, sihnate tungah gual zo hi
Ko kha dimsak in la, hong siangtho sakin
Ka gal uh ka zawh nading hong huh in!
verse3:
Lungnop nading pan, haksatna sungah mang
Nat theihna, sih theihna khuamial sungah
Nong itna khuavaak hong taansak tawntung in
Lungkham gimna a thuak mi hong keem in
Lungsim kha hangte Nang deih bang hi hen
Tho aa a dang tawh kibat kik nading!
verse4:
Aw, Nang sung bek ah ko hoihna ding kimuang
Tanglai pek aa Na mite hong omna
Na hehpihna guah bang aa a zusak den
Zingdaai bang nisial a thak a suak
Kote lamet bang lungsim tha hong guan in
Tha khauhna ngah in lam ka pai na'ng un! A man.

verse1:
Topa Pasian Nangma khut aa na bawlsa
Leitung khempeuh ka ngaihsut ciangin ah
Aksite mu in, vangingte ka za hi
Leitung khempeuh ah Na vaang kilangh hi
verse2:
Sing lakah zong ka vak kawikawi ciangin ah
Singkung tungah vasa ham ngaih ka za
Mualsang dawn pan khuam thuk sung ka et suk ciang
Lui ging za in huihdam hong nung hiauhiau
verse3:
Pasian in ah A Tapa haza lo in
Hong puak ka ngaihsut ciang um kei phial ing
Singlamteh tung kei' van lungdam tak pua in
Sisan luangin, ka mawhna hong paihsak
verse4:
Kikona tawh, Khazih hong paikik ciangin
Hong ciahpih ding, Bangzah ka nuam ding hiam?
Tua ciang kiniam khiatna tawh ka bia ding aa
"Ka Pasian lian hi," ci’n ka kiko ding
chorus:
Tua ahih ciang, la kong sa hong Honpa
Bangzah Na lian, Bangzah Na lian
Tua ahih ciang, kong phat hi, Topa aw
Nang Na lian hi, Nang Na lian hi

zoTitle: Na Thumaanna Lian Hi, Ka Pa Pasian Aw
verse1:
"Na thumaanna lian hi," ka Pa Pasian aw
Kihei kikheelna liim Na nei kei hi
Nangma hehpihna kikheel in bei ngeilo
Tanglai bangmah Na hi tawntung ding hi
verse2:
Ni, kha, leh aksite, ngeina bang ciat in
Khuakhal leh tuuk hunte, phalbi, nipi
Ngeina bang zui a hunhun aa piangte in
Na thumaan, hehpih, itna hong lak hi
verse3:
Mawhna mai sakna leh a kip lung nopna
Nong ompih lung damna, lam Nong hilhna
A nisim Nong kepna, mailam lung muanna
A pha tampite zong, Nangma thupha
chorus:
"Na thumaanna lian hi, Na thumaanna lian hi"
Zingsang simin hehpihna thak ka mu
Ka sapna teng Na khut in hong guan tawntung
"Na thumaanna lian hi," Topa kei’ tung

verse1:
A hong kumsuk Topa
Na min phatna ding la ko hong pia in
Vanglian minthang Topa 
Leitung khempeuh zo aa
Hong pai hong uk inla, Beisa ni tawh
verse2:
Biakna nuamna hong pia
Kote’ thu hong ngetna Na hong ngai in
Lam khial nei mite in 
Thumuh kik nading in
Lam hilh ding hong pai in Kha Siangtho aw
verse3:
Thuhilh Kha Siangtho aw
Hilh ding hong pai inla tu’n hong pai aw
Siamna a om khempeuh 
Kha Siangtho om khempeuh
Ko tungah hong pia’n la hong uk ta aw
verse4:
Nam thum pawl khat Pasian
Topa Nangmah a lian, Na minthang hen
Vantung gam sung Nangmah
Na vanglian mi dingin
Nangmah a tawntung in ka it ding hi

verse1:
Kiimkot khuamialna a taang Zeisu aw
Hong masuan in, ka inn panin gamlapi ah ka om
Lam hong hilh in, Keima khe hong kepsak in
Gamlapi muh ding ngen lo
Kal khat bek pha zo ta
verse2:
Tua bangin thungetna nidang lai in
Om ngeilo hi, Ka teelsa lam ka zuih hangin tu ni
Nong kha ding hi, kisak theihna dingin ka deih
Keimah’n ka kiphasak,
Ka mawhna ngaihsun ke’n
verse3:
Sawtpi Nangmah’n thupha nong piak manin
Hong pia lai in, gam kuam, mual kal, tuipi kheng Topa in
Lam hong hilh ta, khuavaak ciangin sau veipi ka it mi
Lungdam inah keimah’n ka um ding hi

engTitle: A Shelter in the Time of Storm
verse1:
I bukna Suangpi Topa hi
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
A sia namkim aa ding bit hi
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
verse2:
Sun in ni liim, zan in kulhpi
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
Galte bangmah patau lo hi
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
verse3:
Huihpi’n i kiimkot nuai hangin
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
Nusia lo ding cikmah hunin
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
verse4:
Pasian, Suangpi, belh ding it huai
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
Tawntung hong nai, hong keem, hong huai
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna
chorus:
Gimna gam sungah Zeisu Suangpi a hi
Belh ding Suangpi, Belh ding Suangpi
Gimna gam sungah Zeisu Suangpi a hi
Huihpi nun ciang aa kidalna

verse1:
Amah’n hong kha hih thu mahmah
Hehnepna dim thupha a hi
Ka sepna, ka paina teng ah
Pasian' khut in kei hong kha hi
verse2:
Khatvei leh Eden bang nuamna
Khatvei leh khuamialna thuukpi
Bang ka tuak hang muanna launa
Ama khut in kei hong kha hi
verse3:
Phun lo, puam lo, lungkim takin,
Topa, Na khut ka len nuam hi,
Bangbang tuak zong bang lung khamna,
Ka Pasian in kei hong kha hi
verse4:
Na hehpihna tawh galzo aa
Nasep ka khit ciang a vekpi
Sih ding lau lo, Pasian in ah
Zawdan gun gal ah hong kha hi
chorus:
Amah’n hong kha, Amah’n hong kha
Ama khut tawh Amah’n hong kha
A’ nung maantak ka zui ding hi
Ama khut in kei hong kha hi

verse1:
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho
I Topa, Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho
Vantung i zin Pa, Amen

Kitam aa om a kip suangpi
Hong liah in gimna leh tawlna a tampi
Hong liah in, Topa itna ka lungsim ah
Mihing khenthei loh na mun ah
A kip tawntung suangpi pha aw, hong liah in
verse2:
Mawhna kuam sung tun loh na’ng in
Hong liah in Topa ka lung sungah suangpi
Hong liah in, hih leitung minthan’ liat lai in
Ka mawh na’ng in hong zol lai in
A kip tawntung suangpi pha aw, hong liah in
verse3:
Dahna khua a mial laitakin
Hong liah in, minthan’ ni zingsang mateng in
Hong liah in, Zawden gun gei a nai ciangin
Na ang sungah hong tumsak in
A kip tawntung suangpi pha aw, hong liah in

zoTitle: Kei Sang A Saang Zaw Suangpi
engTitle: The Rock That is Higher Than I
verse1:
Khat veivei ciang i nuntakna
Haksat mahmah hun hong tun’ ciang
Lungkham sinkham dah leh kah in
Huihpi seem bangin hong seem thei
verse2:
Khat veivei ni tum thei lo bang
Khat veivei i gim diakdiak bang
Leitung nuntak gimna sung pan
Thupha Suangpi beel leng nuam ding
verse3:
Tua Suangpi ke’n ka beel nuam hi
Dahna nopna ka thuak zongin
Mualsang guamthuuk sung ka pai zong
A suk a to-ah ka pai zong
chorus:
A lian Suangpi ka beel nuam hi
Keimah sang aa a saang zaw Suangpi
A lian Suangpi ka beel nuam hi
Keimah sang' a sangzaw Suangpi

engTitle: O God, Our Help in Ages Past (Tune: St. Anne)
verse1:
Tanglai-a a lian bel Topa
Nung ciang-a lawpna hi
Tui kilok ciang na omna sung
Hehpih in hong liah hi
verse2:
Topa Pasian tokhom nuai ah
Mi siangthote’n nuamsa
Na khut tawh Na liahna, kepna
Bit bel ding hi Topa
verse3:
Lei le vanpi a kip kei zong
Lei pumpi Nang tang hi
Topa a kip Pasian na hi
Na om pello ding hi
verse4:
Kumtul kumthen Topa mai ah
Nitaak om ngeilo hi
Khuamialna in a leeng mang aa
Zingsang khuavaak bang hi
verse5:
Tuikhu bang hinna bei thei hi
Manlang in top thei hi
Zan, nitaak, zingsang ciang mang hi
I mang tawh kibang hi
verse6:
Tanglai-a a lian bel Topa
Nung ciang-a lawpna hi
Gimna thuak ciang hong keem pha in
Na inn ah hong koih in

verse1:
Lungmang mi aw, nang kihta kei in
Nangma Topa Pasian na muang ta in
Thu ngen in, na singlamteh gik hangin
Amah'n hong huh ding hi
verse2:
Lungmang mi aw, gal tam hangin ah
Gal nan'na leh thu upna liansak ta'n
Topa vangliatna tawh na do ding aa
Gal zo na hi ding hi
verse3:
Lungmang mi aw, lam haksat ciangin
Topa'n kihtakna a paih khiatsak ding
Huhna na deih leh,
Amah'n nei lai ding
A min phasak ta in
chorus:
Amah in nang a honggum thei lai hi
Ama khut in gal liahna hi ding hi
Amah in nang hong gumthei lai ding hi
Tua hi aa lau kei in

zoTitle: Topa In Hong Keem Ding Hi
engTitle: God Will Take Care of You
verse1:
Gimna thuak hang lungmang kei in
Pasian in hong keem hi
Ama itna nuai ah om in
Pasian in hong keem hi
verse2:
Nasep nakpi na bawl laitak
Pasian in hong keem hi
Na paina lam launa om leh
Pasian in hong keem hi
verse3:
Ama'h na deih teng hong pia ding
Pasian in hong keem hi
Piak loh bangmah om kei ding hi
verse4:
Ze-et gitlohna thuak hangin
Pasian in hong keem hi
Ama angsung na om ding hi
Pasian in hong keem hi
chorus:
Pasian in hong keem hi
Nisim in ah, tawntung in ah
Amah in hong keem hi
Pasian in hong keem hi

verse1:
Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen
Amen, Amen, Amen

Hih ka Pa' leitung hi
Ke'n ka ngaih ciangin ah
Na khempeuh in, ka bil sungah
La ngaih sa bang ka za
Hih ka Pa' leitung hi
Ka ngaihsut ciang nuam hi
Singkung, suangtum, vanpi, tuipi
Ama bawl lamdang pha
verse2:
Hih ka Pa' leitung hi
A min phat ding kipaak
Vasa ham ngaih zingsang khuavaak
A kilawm unok paak
Hih ka Pa' leitung hi, A hoih khempeuh sungah
Amah om a hong pau pihna
Ka paina teng ka za
verse3:
Hih ka Pa' leitung hi
Ke'n mangngilh ngeikei ning
A sia lamsang a hat hangin
Uk lai Pasian mah in
Hih ka Pa' leitung hi, Gal kizo nailo hi
Zeisu lungkim nailo ding hi
Lei le van kikhat ma'n

zoTitle: Hong Gum Topa Hong Liah In
verse1:
Na Siangthona mun ah Topa
Kei hong liah ta in
Tawl damna na kiang ka ngah lai
Na maitang hong lak in
verse2:
Nuntaakna huihpi a nun lai
Kei hong liah ta in
Tuipi tungah vakhu bangin
Nang kiang hong lutsak in
verse3:
Dahna tawh ka lung, kitam lai
Lungdamna hong pia'n
Khitui tawh nuamna ka zon lai
Keimah hong liah ta in
chorus:
Hong liah ta in
Hong gum Topa hong liah in
Lau lohna na kiang
Keimah hong omsak in

zoTitle: Pasian Khut Sung Muan Huai Hi
verse1:
Lam honglak Gumpa ka kiang hong nai ciang
Bangbang hong kiimvel hang lau om nawn lo
Huihpi guahpite hong daisak ding aa
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi
verse2:
Itna tawh a angsung kei hong pom ciang
Kilemna thu Kha Siangtho hong hilh aa
Pasian khut in kei hong kiplet zawh ciang
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi
verse3:
Ka kha kem kei hong nusia nawnlo ding
Hong itna khau tatsat zo om nawnlo
Ka thei hi, Amah in hong kem den ding
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi
chorus:
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi
Bangbang hong kiimvel hang lau om nawnlo
A khutkuak sung muan huai hi

zoTitle: Zingsang Mateng Ka Om Ding Hi
engTitle: I'll Stand By Until the Morning
verse1:
A tumdek teembaw kiimkot ah
Huihpi in sem hi
Huih in len aa kisia dek hi
Tuipi thuuk sungah
verse2:
Lametna bei a teembaw mi
Lung thaneem ta hi
Topa sapna aw za uh aa
Lungdam khin uh hi
verse3:
Tuipi tung huih nun phat lai ah
Teembaw tumdek hi
A gum ding Zeisu va pai aa
Lungman' dam thei hi
verse4:
No hong it manin hong kum aa
Nang tang ding' si hi
Siatna paai in a thu um in
Inn na tung ding hi
chorus:
Hong gum Topa ko in
Hong thupiak ngai in
Zingsang mateng kong ompih ding
Lau ke'n hong gum ding kong pai hi
Hi hi, zingsang mateng ompih ding
Lau ke'n hong gum ding kong pai hi

zoTitle: Topa In Hong Liah Ding Hi
verse1:
Leitung tuitung haksa lua aa
Launa huih hong nun ciangah
Topa aw, Nangma khaliim ah
Bu ding aa kong tai ding ta
verse2:
Gimna tawntung hong ze-et hang
Inn nuam kong tut nop man hi
Heh het lo-in hong it man in
Gimna hong thuaksak thei hi
verse3:
Dawi mangpa pawl i galte in
Hong bawlsia nuam semsem hi
Ahih hangin ah Pasian in
Lungdam na'ng hong pia ding hi
verse4:
Leitung singlamteh puak lai-in
Dahna huih bang nungthei hi
Ka kha Topa Zeisu cing in
Ka gal tuaksak lo ding hi
chorus:
Gal hong tun zawh loh na'ng in ah
Topa in kei hong keem ding ta
Topa in a kha liim nuai ah
Tawntung kei hong keem ding hi

zoTitle: Sung Lawh Taang Bang Pha Lai Lungah Om Hi
engTitle: How Firm a Foundation (Tune: Portuguese Hymn)
verse1:
Tung Pasian tawldam, taangbang aa pha bel in
Lailung sung khuambang kip na dingin, suan in
Zeisu mamawh aa, lumbang beelte siangtho
Sung lawh taangbang pha, lailung ah omzo hi
Sung lawh taangbang pha, lai lungah omzo hi
verse2:
Nangtawh omkhawm zo, lailung muangmawh nawn ke'n
Kei in na tung Pasian ka hi, nang kong sam
Pian dang bel tawh, tuibang a dim ka baanzaal
Na zaitha leh na lailung, kipsak ding hi'ng
Na zaitha leh na lailung, kipsak ding hi'ng
verse3:
Damtui kul thuksung aa, nang na kum ding pawh
Tang khuangbang kong kho hambang vai, kong bawl lo
Phamna tawh, zingdai bang na kipelh na'ng in
Damtui bang na sian nading, kei ka om hi
Damtui bang na sian nading, kei ka om hi
verse4:
Tatsa sialbang et na'ng, kaangmei sung tung ding
Hehnepna tuibang kicing, kong langhsak ding
Kaangmei thulguah bang thuakloh na'ng, hong keem ning
Vaaivut a suaksa khambang, kong piangsak ding
Vaaivut a suaksa khambang, kong piangsak ding
verse5:
Kumkhua sawt aa, tumbang vuai dong ka mite
Tuibang kiam lo mu bang ngah, kum khua om ding
Na Pa ang leh, sum leh sam a kang zongin
Ka ang lai ah kip takin, von bang sia ning
Ka ang lai ah kip takin, von bang sia ning

verse1:
Leitung ah launa tampi a om hang
Bangmah kihtaak ka nei kei
Kilang lo Pasian tawh ka om ciang in
Koimah peuh pai ding ka lau lo
verse2:
Hak satna namkim a hong tun hangin
Bangmah kihtaak ka nei kei
Pasian ka kiang ah a hong om peuh leh
Koimah peuh pai ding ka lau lo
verse3:
Sihna guam thuk sung dong ka tung zongin
Bangmah kihtaak ka nei kei
Gam nuam ah om ding Topa gam sungah
Koimah peuh pai ding ka lau lo
verse4:
Mi namkim in kei hong do hang in ah
Bangmah kihtaak ka nei kei
Pasian vangliatna a om ka sungah
Koimah peuh pai ding ka lau lo
chorus:
Tua bangin u le nau
Pasian lam ah na lungkip hen
Cikmah hun lungkia lo in
Pasian kiang i tun ciangin
Lungnopna bangzah takin a om diam

verse1:
A siangtho tui luanna mualkuam zui dingin
Zeisu in lam hong pi leh, lungdam zui ning
A khut zan in tuipi hual tung hong sawl zong
A mangte gupna ding A thu va puak ning
verse2:
Bangmah om lo, mualsang tung ahi zongin
A lawmte tawh kikhen a mangthang tuuno
Huih le guahpi a zu zong, va zong ning
Gumpa hong lah bang mailam nawt va pai ning
verse3:
Ka zui ding hi, Gumpa hong lah mah bangin
Dah ta leng, nuam ta leng, lungdam in zui ning
Gumpa'n thei hi, tha muanhuai thumaan lampi
A taang kham khuapi sungah hong tunpih ding
chorus:
Lam hong hilh bang zui ning
Lungdam takin zui ning
Gumpa hong hilh bang lam zui ning
Lungdam tak zui ning

zoTitle: Keimah Topa Zeisu Lamdang Honpa Hi
verse1:
Keima Topa Zeisu lamdang Honpa hi
Kei aa ding lamdang Honpa hi
Suangpi kitam sungah ka kha hong liahsak
Nuamna gunpi bang hong musak
verse2:
Keima Topa Zeisu lamdang Honpa hi
Amah'n puakhia keima vanpi
Amah'n hong len aa kei ka liing kei ding hi
Ka ni bangin tha hong pia hi
verse3:
Kisim zolo thupha hong pia kimat in
Ama hoihna tawh kidim in
Lungdam in la kasa Pasian minthang hen
Hih bang Tanpa ka nei hi ke'n
verse4:
Ama dikna puanpaak silh aa ka thawh ciang
Amah dawnin ka leen' toh ciang
Ama hong itna le hong hotna kicing
Van ah awn tampi tawh sa ning
chorus:
Suangpi kitam sung, keima kha hong liahsak
Tua suangpi'n gam gawtak liapsak
A itna sungah ka nuntaakna phum ta
Ama khutin kei hong hum ta
Ama khut in kei hong hum ta

verse1:
A' kha nuai ah lungmuang takin ka om aa
Khuamial pha aa huihpi nak nun hangin
Ka muang thei hi, hong kem ding hi, ka thei hi
Hong tan zo hi, Ama ta ka hi hi
verse2:
A' kha nuai ah dah ciang belh dingin pha hi
Ama kiang a tawldam nuam lunggulh ing
Leitung in hong damsak zolo ciangin ah
Tua lai ah hehnep, lungdamna ka ngah
verse3:
A' kha nuai ah nopna bangzah tak manpha
Nuntaak haksatna bei mateng beel ning
Hong hah, hong dal, siatna'n hong suthei lo ding
Zeisu sung khawl leng lungmuang tawntung hi'ng
chorus:
A' kha nuai ah hong itna pan
Kua mah'n hong khen zolo ding
A' kha nuai ah keima kha teeng ding
Lungmuang tak om tawntung ding

verse1:
Tuu khumna inn sungah gal muang takin
Tuu sawm kua leh kua te om hi
Gamlak mual tungah khat mangthang aa tua tuu
Tuubuk tawh kigamla mahmah hi
Gam simtham gam daihna tulak muallak ah
Tuucing, migi pa keploh in om hi
Tuucing migi pa keplo in om hi
verse2:
Topa tuu sawm kua leh kua te om lai
Tua teng phazo salo na maw?
Tuucing migi pa lungkim dek nailo hi
Gamlapi ka man'suah hangin ah
Lam haksat na muallak, keenlak hita leh
Ka man'suahsa ka tuu va zong ding ci
Ka man'suahsa ka tuu va zong ding ci
verse3:
Tua thupha kua mah in theikim nai kei
A haksatna kithei lo hi
A muh kik mateng a zon' kawikawi na in
Khuazin' khuamial a zawtzawt na thu
Gamlak gamlapi ah, a ham aw za aa
A cimawh a si ding a om mu hi
A cimawh a si ding a om mu hi
verse4:
Mual tung khuadam huihpi guahpi lak ah
Kenlak kawllak ahih hangin
Vantung kongpi pan in hong kiko khia aa
A mangsa ka tuu mukik ing ci
Vantung mite in zong, tokhom kiim vel ah
Nuam un, Topa'n tuu mang muzo ci hi
Nuam un, Topa'n tuu mang muzo ci hi
verse5:
Topa a si, lam tawntung ah kia in
Tua si in mualtung lam hong lak
A gammang tua tuuno aa ding hong luang hi
Tuucingpa in hong ciahpih kik ding
Ka Topa aw, na khutte liam gawp zo aa
Amaute tuzan ling in sun gawp zo
Amaute tuzan ling in sun gawp zo

zoTitle: A Sawt Loin Lung Khamna Bei-in
verse1:
Sawt lo-in lung khamna bei-in inn i tung ding!
Sawt lo-in huih meiipi bei-in, inn i tung ding!
Tawmvei sung singlamteh pua in
Zeisu tawh kham lukhu khu ding
Sawt lo-in lung khamna bei-in inn i tung ding!
verse2:
Sawt lo-in kahna zan bei-in inn i tung ding!
Sawt lo-in eite hong cingin, inn i tung ding!
Sawt lo-in mawhnate zo-in
Sawt lo-in i om khawm den ding
Sawt lo-in lung khamna bei-in inn i tung ding!
verse3:
Sawt lo-in nuntakna bei-in inn i tung ding!
Sawt lo-in kamkhum pen genin inn i tung ding!
Sawt lo-in khau bang kihuai in
Khanan gam lam zui i pai ding
Sawt lo-in lung khamna bei-in inn i tung ding!
chorus:
Hunte manlang in bei-in i tawlnga den ding
Lung khamna om nawnlo ding
Inn i tun' ciang

verse1:
Lungsim galdona le dahna sung panin
Kei sang a sangzaw suangpi ka delh nuam hi
Mawh lua, gim lua zo, Nang aa hong hi ta ning
A kip Suangpi aw, Nangmah kong beel ta hi
verse2:
Sun in gamdai aa, dahin lungleng laitak
Ze-etna in a vaang tawh hong tuam ciangin
Nuntaak huihpi nung, tuipi kihual laitak
Thupha Suangpi aw, hong liah in bit takin
verse3:
Gal do laitakin gal in hong neh ciangin
Tai in kong ko zeel hi, ka belh Suangpi aw
Tuihual bang ze-et gimna hong tun ciangin
Na sung kong bu hi, keima kha' Suangpi aw
chorus:
Nang kong beel hi, Nang kong beel hi
Nangmah kong beel hi, a kip thupha Suangpi

zoTitle: Ni Khat Ni Ciang Lungdam Ni
verse1:
A zaknop huai langaih ka za
Tua la ka sathei nai kei hi
A zaknop huai la aw ngaihpi
Khatvei ni ciang ka sathei ding
verse2:
Ni khat ni ciang ka tawldam ding
Leitung bei ding vantung om ding
Lam haksa teng ka khin khin ding
Ka Topa maitang ka mu ding
verse3:
Ni khat ni ciang lungnop om ding
Vantung kongkhakpi kihong ding
Ni khat ni peuhpeuh ciang lut ning
A tawntung in ka tawldam ding
chorus:
Ni khat ni ciang, lungdamna ni
Tua la ngaihpi kasa thei ding
Tua la noptakin kasak ciang
Zeisu kiang vantung ka tun ciang

verse1:
I lungngaih tawntung dingin ah
Topa Pasian itna
Mawhna a lian i neih napi "Tate aw," hong ci hi
verse2:
Topa tawh kinai theih nading
Zeisu a si luang sak
"Ka ta itte aw," ci'n hongsam
A angsung i khawl ding
verse3:
Nung ciang i min bangci than' ding
Tu'n kithei nailo hi
Topa Zeisu hong kumkik ciang
Amah i sun ding hi
verse4:
Tua thu a lawpte khempeuh in
I Topa bang ding hi
Sihna a zo minthang Topa
Mai mu dingin a pha
chorus:
En un Topa Pasian in
"Tate aw," hong cihna Pasian tate i tang ding hi
En un, Topa Pasian in
Ei hong it thupha phatna

verse1:
Mawhna thuuk ah tumsuk in
Suahtaak nading gamla
Ka sung mawhna nin dim in
Tumcip ding ka hi ta
Ahih hangin Topa in, Ka kikona hong za
Tuisung pan hong domto in, tu'n ka suakta
verse2:
Amah bek ke'n ka muang ta
Amah beel tawntung ning
A mai nuam ah ka khawl ta
Amah phat tawntung ning
Hi zah ta aa hong itna
Ka siam tawpin phat ning
Itna tawh Ama deihna, seem tawntung ning
verse3:
Kha nuntakna tan' dekte
Zeisu'n hong hon thei hi
Tuipi hual sung tum dekte
A hong dom to ding hi
Ama uk hi tuihual te
Ama thu mang uh hi
Hong hon nuam hi, na ut leh, tu ni, tu ni
chorus:
Kei hong phong hi! kei hong phong hi!
Itna in a cimawh, kei hong phong hi
Kei hong phong hi! kei hong phong hi!
Itna in a cimawh, kei hong phong hi

zoTitle: Lampi Khial Lo Dingin Hong Hilh In
engTitle: Lead Me, Savior, Lest I Stray
verse1:
Lampi khial lo dingin ah
Lampi hong hilh in Topa
Nang kiangah ka om lai ah
Gal hong bawlsia theilo ta
verse2:
Tuipi in kilok lai in
Ka kha gal liah nading in
Kei kiangah na om lai in
Na hehpihna ka muang ding
verse3:
Nuntakna huih nung ta aa
Khitui kinul, Na khua ah
Keimah ka tun' mateng in
Hong gum Topa lam hilh in
chorus:
Lam hong hilh in, Topa lampi hong hilh in
Huan gun gei ah lampi ah
Hong gum Topa hong hilh in

zoTitle: Pasian In Leitung Hong It Hi
verse1:
A mawh khinsa leitung mite
Pasian in hong it hi
A phabel a vaang lianpite
Man neilo hong pia hi
verse2:
I up leh i Topa ding hi
A hing kik Pasian Ta
Sihna tawh ei hong gum zo hi
A si'n hong sawp zo ta
verse3:
Itna in hong kicing sak aa
Mi siangtho te'n gen hi
Zeisu thupha bel um leteh
Nuamna na ngah ding ci
verse4:
A umte aw nuam in pai un
Vantungah nopnapi
Na upna bang un leitung ah
No na ngah ding uh hi
chorus:
A lamdang bel dipkuat huai
Zeisu hong itna hi
Eimah hong gup nading amah'n
Kalvari mual si hi

verse1: A-men,  A-men,  A - - - men

zoTitle: A Tawntung Ang Sungah Om Ning
verse1:
Aw, kipawlna nuamna kei aa hizo
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
Aw, nopsakna lian, aw, nopna siangtho
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
verse2:
Hih khualzinna ah lungmuang taktak ing
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
A ni ni'n ka lam nuamsa semsem ing
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
verse3:
Ke'n bang kihta ding, kei bang lau nawn ding
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
Honpa tawh om khawm nopna lian ngah ing
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!
chorus:
Khawl ing, khawl ing,
Launa pan lungmuang khin zo ing
Khawl ing, khawl ing
Tawntung angsung ah kei khawl ta ing!

zoTitle: Topa Nangmah Ka It Ka Thei
engTitle: I know I Love Thee, Better, Lord
verse1:
Leitung ah sum khempeuh sangin
Topa kong it zaw hi
Kisia ngeilo nopsak na'ng in
Topa in hong pia hi
verse2:
Leitung ka zawl khempeuh sangin
Topa nai nuam zaw ing
Leitung ah la ngaih khempeuh sang
Thu ngaihna pha zaw hi
verse3:
Ka lung hong damsak zo ta hi
Cik mah'n bei lo ding hi
Hong itna thupha om kei leh
Lungsim kisia ding hi
verse4:
Hong omkhawm pih kithei lopi
Hihzah lungdamna lian
Topa mai mu ding takpi
Bangzah a nuam ding hiam
chorus:
Hong it hong ngaihna a thupha
Kimkhat beek gen nai kei
Hong sawp siangthona a thupha
Kimkhat beek gen nai kei

zoTitle: Kote Hong Thumna Hong Ngai In, Topa
verse1:
Kote hong thumna
Hong ngai in, Topa
Ko lam hong nga inla
Hong pia'n lungnopna... Amen

engTitle: O Little Town of Bethlehem (Tune: St. Loiuis)
verse1:
Betlehem khuaneu mite aw
No lah ihsip keei maw
Aksi te'n zong hong khengkheng veh
Khua phawk kei si uh teh
En un, no khua kongzing lak
Taang hi, tawntung Khuavaak!
Kum khua a kingaak no khua ah
Tuzan hong tung petmah!
verse2:
Bang hiam na hong cih leh, Mazih
Sung pan suak hi Khazih
Vantung mite'n na cing
Amah mi ihmut kaal in ah
No zingsol te'n na vek un nau suahna tangko un
Pasian Kumpi A min thang hen
Mitung nopna tung hen
verse3:
Lamdang lungdam huaina lianpi
Hong kidai piakkhian hi
Pasian in thupha hong piak zia
tua bang ngeingei a hi
Bil in kiza lo hangin
Mawhna a dim hangin
Lungneem in saang nuamte sungah
It huai Khazih lut pah
verse4:
Betlehem Naungek siangtho aw
Ko kiangah hong kum aw
Kote mawhna hawlkhia inla
Hong suak in ko sungah
Nang suah tangko van mite'n
Lungdamna thu hong gen
Hong pai in hong om in ko tawh
Imanuel Topa aw

verse1:
Hong luang zuazua, zankim laitak
Vantung la ngaihpi hong gingsuk hi
A la dawng lah, la ngaih mahmah
A sate lah, vantung mi honpi
verse2:
Tuucing mite'n tua thupi mu
Tua a taang mite' thu pulak za
Bawngkuang sung aa Pa na kibia
Huih lak khempeuh thawn in la kisa
verse3:
Khazih Honpa, Pa' sathau nilh
Leibat lauhuai loh ding hong pai zo
Dahna mite nialsa mite
I mawhna puakhia Pasian Tuuno
chorus:
A sang belah minthang hen aw
Lei ah mite tung nopna om hen
Khangsawm te'n tu bang ciing hen aw
Lei in pahtawi kikkik hen

zoTitle: Ong Pai Un Thu Um Teng
engTitle: Oh Come, All Ye Faithful (Tune: Adeste Fideles)
verse1:
Hong pai un, thu um teng
Lungdam in kipak un
Hong pai un va en ni Betlen khua ah
Vantung Kumpipa bawngkuang sung hong suak, ci
verse2:
Sa un, kipahna la
Vantung mi honte aw
Vantung a sang belna khempeuh thawn un
Van sang belna ah Pasian' minthang tahen
verse3:
Hi hi, hong hon ding Pa
Tu ni'n kong dawn uh hi
Zeisu Topa, Na min thang tawntung hen
Pa Pasian' deih thu, mi bangin hong piang ta
chorus:
Va bia ni, hong pai ta un
Va bia ni, hong pai ta un
Hong pai un, va bia ni Khazih Topa

verse1:
Leitung lungdam Topa hong pai
Kumpi za ngah ding hi
Lungsim khempeuh bawl phatsak hi
Van leh lei lasak ngai
Van leh lei lasak ngai
Van leh, Van leh lei lasak ngai
verse2:
Leitung nuam na'ng Zeisu maang hi
Mihing te'n la sa hen
Lo lai, tuipi, suangpi, mualpi'n
Kidem in ham uh hen
Kidem in ham uh hen
Kidem kidem in ham uh hen
verse3:
Nung ciang mawhna a khan loh na'ng
Ling in bawlsia lo ding
A pha lo na a pha bel in
Bawlpha ding hong pai ding
Bawlpha ding hong pai ding
Bawlpha, bawlpha ding hong pai ding
verse4:
Hong hehpihna thupha bel in
Leitung hong uk ding hi
A minthang siangtho hong itna
Mi khempeuh theisak hi
Mi khempeuh theisak hi
Mi khem, mi khempeuh theisak hi

engTitle: O Come, O Come, Emmanuel (Tune: Veni, Emmanuel)
verse1:
Hong pai hong pai, Immanuaila
Hon in sal suak Itazila
Hi lai lungzuang nilkhiat thuak mi
Pasian Tapa kilat mateng
Itazila te aw nuam un
No kiang Immanuaila hong pai
verse2:
Hong pai hong pai Zise suan aw
Satan khut sung pan hong hon in
Hong hon in hell khua sung pan in
Sihna han pan zawhna hong pia'n
Itazila te aw nuam un
No kiang Immanuaila hong pai.
verse3:
Hong pai Davuih Tapa hong pai
Ka vantung kong hong za hon'in
Muangtak vantung tun' na'ng bawl in
Siatna lampi bingsak ta in
Itazila te aw nuam un
No kiang Immanuaila hong pai
verse4:
Hong tung Topa lungdamna ni
I lungsim a hong lawpsak ding
Zan khuamialna hong beisak in
Meiite khengin khuavaak hong pia!
Itazilla te aw nuam un
No kiang Immanuaila hong pai

verse1:
Eite aa ding Khazih Topa
Hong suak tu nitaak in
Leitung mi leh vantung mi in
A thu ngai ding uh hi
Leitung mi leh vantung mi in
A thu ngai ding uh hi
verse2:
A min ding "Kilemna Kumpi"
A tawntung kiphat ding
Amah in a lamdang a lian
A vaang lian Topa hi
Amah in a lamdang a lian
A vaang lian Topa hi
verse3:
A mong nei lo ukna kicing
A khang semsem ding hi
Van aa tokhom tung thumanna
A nuai ah kilemna
Van aa tokhom tung thumaanna
A nuai ah kilemna

engTitle: The First Noel, the Angels Did Say
verse1:
Noel masa vantung mite sak
Tuucing zawng pawlkhat tuu cin' laitak hi
Gampa lakah tuu vil om laitak
Phalbi khuadam lai, zan khuamial laitak
verse2:
A khuadak ciang ni suahna lam ah
Gamlapi pan, aksi taang khat kilak
Leitung tengah nakpi in taang hi
A sun, a zan ci lo in taang tawntung hi
verse3:
Tua aksi taang zui kawm in ah
Gamlapi pan mipil thumte in ah
Kumpi zong dingin hong pai uh hi
Aksi paina khempeuh hong zui uh hi
verse4:
Mipil thumte zong buuk sung lut aa
Zahtakna tawh khuk din' uh hi
Kham, paaknamtui, paaknamtui kha
A khe kiangah sua'n a pia uh hi
chorus:
Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel
Itazila Kumpipa suak

engTitle: If Coine Upon the Midnight Clear (Tune: Carol)
verse1:
Zankim gamdaih kim laitakin
Hong ging vanglian la pi
Vantung mite hong kum sukin
Kham gawsem tawh sa hi
"Vantung Kumpipa kiang panin
Nopna leitung dim hen"
Ci'n hong sak laitak leitung mi'n
Dai khipkhep in ngai hi
verse2:
Van kong pan hong pai lailai mah
Kilemna kha zakin
Gimna dimna hih leitung ah
Van la ngaih kiza lai
Dahna lungkhamna kuam tungah
Hong leeng diaidiai uh aa
Pau nam tampi gamlum lak ah
Vantung la pha hong sa
verse3:
Leitung nuntaak vangik nuai ah
Vangik lel a omte
Nuntaak haksa lamto-a kah
Pheiphung suan kha mi aw
En un, lungdam nuamna ding hun
Manlang va bang hong leeng
Gimna lam gei ah na khawl un
Vantung la ngai dih un
verse4:
Thei un, hong tung petmah ding ta
Tang kamsangte gensa
A kum a kha hong vei ding aa
Hong tung ding kham hunpha
Leitungah nopna lemna pha
A vaang hong taang ding ta
Vantung mite hong sak la pha
Leitung mi'n dawng ding ta

zoTitle: Vantung Mite'n La Sa, Ngai Un
engTitle: Hark, the Herold Angels Sing (Tune: Mendelssohn)
verse1:
Ngai un, vantung mi'n la sa
A suak Topa min than'na
Leitung nuamna hong khangsak hi
Mawhna khempeuh phel ding ci
Leitung mi khempeuhte in
Lungdamna tawh tho unla
Zeisu Betlen-ah suak hi
Vanpi dongah minthang hi
Vantung mite'n la sa hi
"A suak Topa minthang," ci
verse2:
Zeisu Topa Pasian Ta
A om tawntung Kumpipa
Nungak sung pan hongsuak hi
Mi bangin ah hong piang hi
Pasian in mi bang piang aa
Pasian itna mi sungah
Ka hong khawlkhawm sak nuam ci
Emanuela Zeisu hi
Vantung mite'n la sa hi
"A suak Topa minthang," ci
verse3:
Zeisu lungdamna pia hi
Mi siangtho a min kici
Natna gimna a omlo
A taang vantung a mial lo
Vangliatna a paai Maangpa
Sih kikna a pelsak Pa
Misi hingkik sak ding aa
Zeisu in leitung hong suak
Vantung mite'n la sa hi
"A suak Topa minthang," ci

zoTitle: Zeisu In A Omna A Nusia Hi
verse1:
Zeisu in van-ah tokhom nusia aa
Mi aa ding leitung hong pai zo
A hong suak dingin Betlen khua sungah
A hong suah nading inn om lo
verse2:
Zeisu in a hong kum suk laitakin
Vantung mite'n peengkul tum hi
Hih hang gina lo bek tawh hong suak aa
Leitung hong kiniam sak ta hi
verse3:
Ngia in zong kua nei aa vasa in zong
Sing dawnah bu a nei uh hi
Hih hang Galile gam Zeisu om lai
A lupna leitung bek a hi
verse4:
Zeisu in zawhna tawh hong paisuk ciang
Peengkul aw tawh hong pai ding hi
Amah'n a aw tawh keimah hong sam ding
"Ka kiang om in" hong ci ding hi
chorus:
Keima lungsim sung hong om in!
Nang aa ding omna a om hi
Keima lungsim sung hong om ta in!
Nang aa ding omna a om hi

engTitle: There's A Song In the Air (Tune: Christmas Song)
verse1:
Huih lakah la kisa, aksipi hong kilang
Nu migi'n thu ngen aa, naungek khat a kap bang
Bang hang aksi hong kilang
Bang hang la kisa
Betlen khua sungah hong suah hang hi, Kumpipa
verse2:
Lungdamna gamlum pha
Naungek lamdang suah hang
Naungek siangtho Tapa
Leitung khempeuhte maang
Aksipi hong taang suk hi, Vantung mi'n la sa
Betlen khua sungah hong suah hang hi, Kumpipa
verse3:
Khang tawntung lametna, tua aksi'n tangko hi
Van pan gamla kiza, leitung teng kizeel hi
Bang hang hiam hih innkuan sungah om lungdamna
Zeisu hong suakzo hi, innkuan sung Kumpipa
verse4:
I khuavaak hong tung ta, eite i lungdam hi
Vantung mite' sak la, eite'n i sasawn hi
Sa un vantung mite'n hong puak lungdamna thu
Ei hong honpa Kumpipa hi, Zeisu

verse1:
Tapidawte nuam un, lungdam in kipaak un
Kong thugen teng na ngai un
Ngai un tuni'n Zeisu hong suak hi
Bawngte sakol te'n bia hi
Tu in bawngkuang sungah om hi
Khazih hong suak hi, Khazih hong suak hi
verse2:
Tapidawte nuam un, lungdam in kipaak un
Ngai un bei ngeilo nuamna
Nuamna nuam nading Zeisu suak hi
Vantung kongpi hongzo hi
Mihing nuamsa tawntung ding hi
A hong suah man in, A hong suah man in
verse3:
Tapidawte nuam un, lungdam in kipaak un
Sih ding tu in lau nawnlo
Lau lo hong hon ding Zeisu suakzo
Eite saploh hong neilo
Ama innpi sung kua utlo
Hong hon ding suakzo, Hong hon ding suakzo

verse1:
Lupna luai omlo a Bawng ankuang sungah
I Topa ngeek Zeisu hong kisial ciuciau
Van pan aksite in hong ensuk kiukiau
I Topa ngeek Zeisu lopa tung ihmu
verse2:
Bawngte ham papa a Naungek khanglo ta
I Topa ngeek Zeisu lah kap selo hi
Topa ngeek Zeisu aw, ken nang kong ngai hi
Ka luai kiangah hong cingin zingsang mateng
verse3:
Ka kiangah naitakin hong ompih inla
Ka Topa Zeisu aw kei hong ngai inla
Naupangnote khempeuh hong keem ciat inla
Nang kiang omthei nangin a pha'n hong bawl in

verse1:
Dai dide, Zan siangtho!
Mial khikhe tawm simloh
Gal aa Naungeek lupna kiim
Nu siangtho leh ama kiim
Naungeek limtak ihmu
Naungeek limtak ihmu
verse2:
Dai dide, Zan siangtho!
Thakhatin theihkholh loh
Tuucingte' kiim taang pempam!
Vantung pan phatna puakkham!
Khazih hong suakzo hi
Khazih hong suakzo hi
verse3:
Dai dide, Zan siangtho!
Mipil te'n van en to
Lamhilh Aksi taang zui-in
Lut uh hi biakna luui-in
I Kumpi hong suakzo
I Kumpi hong suakzo
verse4:
Dai dide, Zan siangpen!
Aksi pi'n hong taan hen
Vantung mite bangin ah
Sa un Kumpi phatna la
Hong Honpa hong suak hi
Hong Honpa hong suak hi

zoTitle: Tuu Cingte'n Tuute A Cin Laitak'
engTitle: While Shepards Watched Their Flock (Tune: Winchester Old)
verse1:
Tuucing te'n zanlai gam lakah
Tuu vil a om laitak
Vantung mite hong paisuk aa
A vaang lianpi hong lak
verse2:
Tuucing te'n lau man vantung mi'n
"Lau kei un, thuphapi
Note le leitung mi aa ding
Tu in kong paipih hi"
verse3:
Davuih' khua Betlen khuapi sung
Hong gum dingin Khazih
Davuih' suan mihing pawl sung pan
Tuni in hong suak hi
verse4:
Bawngkuang sung puan tawh kitun aa
Naupang in a om hi
No tu in pai un zong unla
No na mu ding uh hi
verse5:
Vantung mi'n a cih laitakin
Van maangte hong pai aa
Pasian vaanglian mahmah ci
Sa uh hih phatna la
verse6:
Van ah Pasian min lian hen la
Leitung nuamna om hen
Hong hehpihna leh hong itna
Mi tung om tawntung hen

engTitle: Angels We Have Hourd on High
verse1:
Vantung mite la sakna
Zang leitung ah kiza hi
Mualsang te'n zong sangsawn aa
Lungdamna la kithawn hi
verse2:
Tuucingte no lungdamna
Nuamna late bang thu hiam?
Vantung langaih no sakna
Lungdamna thu bang hang hiam?
verse3:
Betlen khua ah hong pai in
Note'n zong hong en vevua
Khazih Kumpi khuk din in
Note'n zong hong phatpih un
chorus:
Thang...ta hen
Pasian minthang ta hen
Thang...ta hen
Van aa sang bel Pasian

verse1:
Nidang lai in, Davuih khua ah
Bawngbuk neu khat a om hi
Tua bawngbuk sung, bawngkuang sungah
Nu khat in ta a sial hi
Tuanu min Mazih hi aa
A ta min Zeisu Khazih
verse2:
Zeisu pen Pasian leh Topa
Van pan hong kumsuk a hi
Bawngbuk sungah hong giaksuk aa
Bawngkuang sungah hong lum hi
Mizawngte tawh leitung ah
Amah hong kikhawl suk hi
verse3:
A neulai lamdang mahmah aa
A nu zahtaak in mang hi
A nu in phatak in keem aa
A nu a it mahmah hi
Tapidaw naupangte zong
Tua bangmah ding i hihi
verse4:
Amah'n hong it, hong tat manin
Nung ciang a meel mu ding hi
Vantungah Pasian taklam ah
Tokhom tungah tu ding hi
A tate'n puanpaak silh in
A kiim ah a uum ding hi

zoTitle: Ko Teng Thum Ni Suahna Pan In
engTitle: We Three Kings of Orient Are
verse1:
Ko teng thum ni suahna pan in
Mual leh guam gamlapi kaan in
Letsong pua in kong pai uh hi
Hih aksipi zui in
verse2:
Kumpi khat suakzo ngel hi aa
A kumpi lukhu dingin ah
Ei tung hong maang den ta hen ci'n
Kong puak hi, Kham manpha
verse3:
Ken zong paaknamtui kong keng hi
Pasian tawh kinaina lim hi
Thungetna leh phatna, biakna
Van aa Pasian puak ni
verse4:
Kei aa pawh paaknamtui kha hi
Lungkhamna leh thuakna lim hi
Dah in, kap in, sisan luangin
Han vot sung lum ding hi
chorus:
Aw, lamdang mahmah zan aksi
Kumpi vaang a taang aksi
Hong masuan in, lam hong hilh in
Khuavaak tak phual hong tun in

engTitle: Angels From the Realms of Glory (Regent Square)
verse1:
Vantung gam pan vantung mite
Vannuai piancil lasate
Leitung khempeuh ah hong leeng un
Tu'n Mesia' suah thangsak un
Hong pai ta un, Hong bia ta un
Suak thak Khazih hong bia un
verse2:
Gampa lakah tuu honte tawh
Zan giak, no, tuucingte aw
Pasian leh mi omkhawm zo hi
En un khuavaak ngeek taang hi
Hong pai ta un, Hong bia ta un
Suak thak Khazih hong bia un
verse3:
Mipilte aw, lunggeel nawn ke'n
A taang zaw khuavaak en ve'n
Mi namkim deih lian pen zong un
A aksi no muzo tu'n
Hong pai ta un, Hong bia ta un
Suak thak Khazih hong bia un
verse4:
Topa thakhat Ama innah
Hong kilang ding, ci-in ah
Ngak aa, lawp aa, lametna tawh
Bia aa om misiangte aw
Hong pai ta un, Hong bia ta un
Suak thak Khazih hong bia un

verse1:
Zeisu hoihna keima sung kilangh sak in
A lamdang hong itna leh A siangthona
Aw Pasian Kha Siangtho
Kei pumpi hong sawpsiang
Zeisu hoihna keima sung kilangh sak in

Topa tung lungdam ngah nuamte
Kisak theihna paii in
Um in Ama thu a phate
Hong piak ding ngaihsun in
verse2:
A thu leh hong itna pha aa
A si tawh hong sawp hi
I mawhna khempeuh hong sawp aa
Nopna pha kingah hi
verse3:
Mawhna vanglian sugawp nading
Siamna pha hong pia hi
Lungsim sung a sian'tho nading
Kha pha hong bawlsak hi
verse4:
A dang lungsim zawhna dingin
Kha Siangtho hong pia hi
A pha bel Khazih Topa in
I lung sungah om hi
chorus:
Mawh phelna nuam vanglianpi
Lung damsak ning, A min phatna
Sian'thona pha, Vantung om hi
Kei ta'ng si hi, Zeisu Khazih Topa

verse1:
Topa Zeisu aw, kei ka siangtho nuam hi
Keima lungsim sungah hong om tawntung in
Gal khempeuh nawtkhia in, hoih lote paai in
Nong sawp leh ka ngozaw ding hi, vuuk sangin
verse2:
Topa Zeisu aw, A siang lo beisak in
Na sipha tawh Nong sawp ciang mawhna bei hi
Mawhna khempeuh paisan siangtho ngah nading
Nong sawp leh ka ngozaw ding hi, vuuk sangin
verse3:
Topa Zeisu aw, Na kiang kong thuum nuam hi
Na khutnuai panin ka na ngakngak ding hi
Upna tawh Na si buakna ka muzo hi
Nong sawp leh ka ngozaw ding hi, vuuk sangin
verse4:
Ngak aa thuaknate Topa in Na mu hi
Lungsim thak ka sungah nong guansak zo hi
Topa kiang hong pai khempeuh na nial kei hi
Nong sawp leh ka ngozaw ding hi, vuuk sangin
chorus:
Vuuk sang ka ngozaw tham nading in
Topa aw Nangma sipha tawh hong sawp in

zoTitle: A Lamdang Tangthu La Sa Ning
engTitle: I Am Sing the Wondrous Story
verse1:
A lamdang tangthu la sa ning
Zeisu kei taang ding si hi
Vantung minthanna nusia aa
Singlamteh sihna thuak hi
verse2:
A gammangte Zeisu'n zong hi
Lam a khial tuute zong hi
A khut tawh keimah hong pom hi
Lampi ah hong khakik hi
verse3:
Cinate Zeisu'n damsak aa
A kipuukte zong phong hi
Mittaw in a launa tam aa
Ahih hang hong gum ding hi
verse4:
Khuamial kei tungah hong tungta
Dahna lampi ka zuita
Kei hong ompih in Topa aw
Hong keem in lam hong hilh ta
verse5:
Sihna gungaal kah mateng in
Topa in hong cing ding hi
I itte tawh kimu ding in
Gungaal ah hong kha ding hi
chorus:
A lamdang tangthu la sa ning
Zeisu si hi kei taang ding
Liimlangh tuithuuk gei kikhop ciang
Mi siangthote tawh sa ning

verse1:
Topa Pasian longal van ah
Muan ding dang omlo hi
Nuntaak laiteng kasak ding la
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Topa'n kei taang gimna thuak hi
A sipha tawh hong sawpzo hi
Lungsim siangtho hong guanzo hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
verse2:
Mi a haute ka eng kei hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Leitung sum ke'n ka deih kei hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Leitung hauhna kiplo ding hi
Na khempeuh kisia gawp ding hi
Kei nuamna bei theilo ding hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
verse3:
Zawng aa gimna ka thuak hangin
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Ka thuum noploh Topa'n thei hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Ka sum khempeuh ka zang zongin
Leitung sum a siakhin zongin
Ganhing teng a sikhin zongin
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
verse4:
Galte khutsung ka tung zongin
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Kisiatna in hong uum hangin
Zeisu kei aa ding hi
Leitung gal a kido hangin
Ka kha in a kap hangin ah
Topa min tawh ka zo ding hi
Zeisu kei aa ding hi

zoTitle: Zeisu Ah Deihna Teng Cing Hi
engTitle: Jesus Is All the World To Me
verse1:
Zeisu ah deihna teng cing hi
Hinna nuamna vannuai
Nisim in Ama tha loin
Ka puuk ding a lauhuai
Ka dah ciang Ama kiang ka pai
Mun dang bang lo ka mai a taii
Ka dah ciang hong nuamsak, Amah keima Lawm
verse2:
Zeisu ah deihna teng cing hi
Lungkham laitak ka Lawm
Thupha deihin Amah zuan leng
Amah'n hong pia nawnnawn
Nitaang leh guahtui hong pia hi
Tuuk ciangin an hong lasak hi
Nitaang, guahtui, leh an hong pia keima Lawm
verse3:
Zeisu ah deihna teng cing hi
A tung ka thumaan ding
Kei tungah hong thumaan ka Lawm
Bang ci ka nialzo ding
Amah zui leng ka khial ngei kei
Sun leh zan hong cingkhial ngei kei
Sun leh zan in zui ning Amah, keima Lawm
verse4:
Zeisu ah deihna teng cing hi
Lawmpha zaw deih tuan keng
Amah tu in ke'n ka muang aa
Muang lai ding sih mateng
Hihbang Lawm tawh nuntaak a nuam
Bei ngeilo ding hinna a nuam
Bei ngeilo nuntaakna, nuamna keima Lawm

engTitle: Jesus, the Very Thought of Thee (Tune: St. Agnes)
verse1:
Zeisu thu ngaihsut lai takin
Lungdam huai mahmah hi
Hih sang a mai ka muh ciangin
Lungdam zawlai ding hi
verse2:
Zeisu a kici min sangin
Min ngaih zaw omlo pi
Vantung leitung ahi zongin
Kimu zo ngeilo hi
verse3:
Dahna a thuakte a muanna
Lungniam khiatte nuamna
Thungen a zong mite aa ding
Itna lian bel hita
verse4:
Na muh mite kilak thei kei
Thupha a ngah uh hi
A kisim khin zolo itna
Topa Zeisu thu hi
verse5:
Topa Zeisu Nangmah sim lo
Nuamna dang om nawnlo
Tu leh nung ciang a tawntungin
Komau phat ding om in

verse1:
Mual tung khuadam lak ah, migi tuucing in
A tuu mang a zong hi, ciahpih dingin
verse2:
Citak in a zong hi, sum mansuah nu in
Leivui lak khuamial lak, lungkia lo in
verse3:
It tawntung a pa in, nuamna tangko hi
"A mangthang sa ka ta hong tung zo hi"
chorus:
Hon ding zong hi, Hon ding zong hi
A mangte Zeisu’n, Hon ding zong hi
Hon ding zong hi, Hon ding zong hi
A mangte Zeisu’n, Hon ding zong hi

engTitle: Once I Was Dead in Sin
verse1:
Si ngei ing mawhna ah
Lawpna ding omlo hi
Topa kei taang si aa
Ka nungta kik zo hi
verse2:
Bat zawh loh ding sang hi
Lamdang hi, hong itna
Hong gum Topa bekin
Tua bang itna nei hi
verse3:
Thupha theilo ka kha
Zeisu in nial ding hiam?
Ki itna bek pha sa
Biakna sang deihzaw hi
verse4:
Zeisu hang keimah in
Hinna ka ngah kik hi
Mawhna sung sihna pan
Kei hong lakhia zo hi
chorus:
Hizo ding hiam, Topa Zeisu
Kei hong it man’n si hi

verse1:
Nungta kik Na thupha
Mi siangte kiang tungta
Mi dangte kiang minthanna tawh
Na gen ciang ngai nuamsak
verse2:
Nungta kik Na thupha
Na minpha thangsak ni
Mihing khempeuh lungsim sungah
Na itna guangsak in
verse3:
Nungta kik Na thupha
Thu hilh a pha pia aa
A siangthona thupha zak ciang
Upna na piangsak ta’n
verse4:
Nungta kik Na thupha
Kha Siangtho hong guang in
Na minthanna kilangh sak in
Ko aa ding in a pha
chorus:
Nungta kik Na thupha
Na mai khukdin’ ciangin
Topa aw, hong kumsuk inla
Thupha bel hong pia in

verse1:
Topa Zeisu hong hehpihna
Lungdam in la sa un
Leitung khempeuh a zelh na’ng in
Lungdam nading kum hi
verse2:
Mittawte aw Zeisu en un
A dahte lungdam un
Zeisu in hong suahtak zo hi
Thong sung omte’n sa un
verse3:
Hong it man in Zeisu si aa
Phathuai lamdang bel hi
Topa minthang leitung mawhna
Mi teng hong itna hi
chorus:
Hong gupna, hong gupna
Thupha bel hong tung hi
Hong gum ta, hong gum ta
Topa Zeisu Kumpi

zoTitle: Zeisu’ Min Manpha Na La in
engTitle: Take the Name of Jesus With You
verse1:
Zeisu' min manpha na la in
Dahna gimna' tate aw
Hehnep nuamna hong pia dingin
Na paina peuh ah keng aw
verse2:
Zeisu' min na keem tawntung in
Gal namkim kidalna lum
Ze-et na’n hong kimkot ciangin
A’ min siangtho suangin thuum
verse3:
Zeisu' min a manpha mahmah
Bangzah i lung hong damsak
Hong saan’ ciang Ama angsung ah
Ama la i sak laitak
verse4:
Lam tawp vantung i tun ciangin
Zeisu’ khe ah i bok ding
Kumpi khempeuh tung Kumpi, ci’n
Ama mai ah i bia ding
chorus:
Min manpha, ngaih mahmah!
Leitung mite' lametna
Min manpha, ngaih mahmah
Vantungah lungdam nuamna

zoTitle: Mawh Neite Aw Hong Pai Un
verse1:
Zeisu in vantung om napi, leitung ah hong paisuk hi
Mihingte taang ding hong om aa, cinate cii damsak hi
Lai Siangtho sungah kithei ta, a hoih a lian pha bel hi
verse2:
Khua khempeuh ah a kawivak aa, mi khempeuh a hehpih hi
Mihing zawngkhal khempeuhte leh, mittaw, khelbai, misite
A thu in hong damkik sak aa, lamdang kisa mahmah hi
verse3:
Zeisu in leitung omlai in, thupha vive a gen hi
Keimah zong Zeisu ka um hi, ka lungdamna piang ding hi
Ka uplohna Pa Pasian in, phatak in hong bawl pha in
verse4:
Pasian in thupha hong piakna, Zeisu’n mi kiang ah gen hi
Mihing kimkhat in a um aa, kimkhat in a um lo hi
A um lote in lung khamna, Zeisu cih bang piang ding hi
verse5:
Ka sih taang ding Topa Zeisu, singlamteh tungah si hi
Ama lawmte in a vui aa, ni thum ciang a thokik hi
Tu’n vantung khua ah a om aa, mi khempeuh a hehpih hi

verse1:
Zeisu in mawhna hong phelzo
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
Hong tatsa a man a piazo
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
verse2:
Pasian tawh hong kilem sak hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
Hong silsiang si ka phat ding hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
verse3:
Lungsim sung mawhna a phel hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
I lung sungah om a uk hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
verse4:
Keimah tawh lampi a pai hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
Nism in hong keemsak ding hi
Hong gum Topa lamdang hi
chorus:
Zeisu in hong Gumpa hi. A lamdang ka sa hi
Keima Topa Zeisu in, Hong Gumpa a hi

verse1:
Aw! Ngai un, A lamdang bel tangthu
Mangthang milak a simsa
Vantung pan a hong tuaksuk Zeisu
Haksapi’n hong honkhia hi
verse2:
Van aa a sang mahmah vantung mi
Hong gumzo ding omlo aa
Singlamteh tung a thuakpa bek hi
Pasian thum lak a khat Pa
verse3:
Hih lamdang tangthu in zui lai aa
Lungsim leh kam lawpsak hi
Van ah hong thuumsak Siampi Lianpa
A min Zeisu Khazih hi
chorus:
Kua’n a si ding honkhia a hiam?
Amah’n bang hih? Koi ah om tu’n?
Vantung ah hong thuumsak hi

verse1:
A siam bel hong damsak thei Pa
Hong it Topa Zeisu hi
Dahna hong nopsak na’ng in ah
A hong sapna aw ngai in
verse2:
Na mawhna a hong phel Topa
A hong sapna aw ngai in
Vantung lam nuamtak zui inla
Zeisu tawh kham lu khu in
verse3:
A hingkik Tuuno vaanglian
Pa Zeisu ke’n ka hong um hi
Hong gum Topa Na min a pha
A lian bel ka ci ding hi
verse4:
Zeisu maitang mu ding in ah
Vantung ka paitoh ciangin
A hong itna tokhom kiangah
Phatna la sa tawntung ning
chorus:
Vantung mi a la sakna
Leitung mi phabel cihna
Sa ni a ngaih mahmah la
Zeisu phabel min hi

verse1:
A mangte hong zongin hong zol ngeungeu
Mual sang tung aa lam a khial mite
"Keimah hong zuan un," hong cikik leuleu
Topa’n tuni in hong sam eite
verse2:
A mangte zong in, Zeisu lamlak in
Tha hatlo kha leh a na lungsim
Hot khiatna lampi sungah makaih in
Nuntak tawntungna lampi lak in
verse3:
Tua bangin pai ni thupha naseem mi
Khazih zui den ni a ni sial in
A bah mi lawpsak in, puuk mi phong ni
A mang mi, lampi Zeisu lak ni
chorus:
Mual sang tung a gamla ah pai ni
A vaak mite lakik in
Mawhnei mi ta'ng ding a si Tuuno
I honpa' tuubuuk ah khum in

verse1:
Hong gum Topa Betlen khua hong suak aa
Bawng neekna ankuang sung kisial zota
Aw a lamdang nuam a minpha mahmah
Keimah a hong zong hi
verse2:
Topa Zeisu in singlamteh tungah
Kei mawhna taang dingin hong sizo ta
Maw a lamdang keima lung a dam ta
Keitaang ding hong si hi
verse3:
Topa Zeisu nidang bangmah in ah
Huan sung pan lamkhial tuute a zong ta
Sau veipi dam takin a hong sam hi
Keimah a hong sam hi
verse4:
Zeisu vantung pan hong paikik ding hi
Kum tampi kheng zo, hi thu ka um hi
Vantung hong kumsuk lai ka mu ding hi
Kei aa ding hong kum hi
chorus:
Keimah a hong zong hi, zong hi
Keimah a hong zong hi
Maw lamdang nuamna a minpha mahmah
Keimah a hong zong hi

verse1:
Gupkhiatna thu thangsak nuam si'ng!
Tuuno si tawh gupkhiat ka hih
A it beilo tawh gupkhiat hi’ng
A tawntung Ama ta ka hi
verse2:
Gupkhiat hi aa, Zeisu nuamsa
Ka lawpna genzo kam omkei
Ama ompihna khuavaak pha
Kei sung hong tungden ding ka thei
verse3:
Thupha Gumpa ka ngaihsun aa
Ngaih sunsun ing sun ni loh in
Om mawk theilo in la ka sa
Hong itna sa ing, la pi in
chorus:
Gupkhiat, gupkhiat
Gupkhiat, gupkhiat
Tuuno si tawh gupkhiat ka hi
Gupkhiat, gupkhiat
Gupkhiat, gupkhiat
A tawntung Ama ta ka hi

verse1:
Leitung nopnate lunggulh nawnkei ing
Sisan hangin launa pan suakta ta’ng
Singlamteh phungah ka lungsim nga ing
Zeisu si in vuuk bangin hong ngosak zo hi
verse2:
Mawhna sungah khatvei ka mangthang hi
Khatvei mawhna sila ka hizo hi
Pasian ka hehsak ding ka laungei hi
Ahih hang Khazih si in nitna teng sil hi
verse3:
Kol bulhna thuak ngei hang tu’n suakta ing
Khuamial sung omngei hang tu’n khuavaak mu’ng
Si ngeizo hih hang tu’n Khazih sung hing
Hong piakkhiat kilemna leitung teng ka gen ding
chorus:
Ka it hi, ka it hi. Amah’n hong it masa
Kalani khuam tung gupna hong leisak hi

zoTitle: Zeisu Tangthu Kei Hong Gen In
engTitle: Tell Me the Story of Jesus
verse1:
Zeisu tangthu kei hong hilh in
A thu ka lungsung gelh in
A manpha tangthu hong gen in
Zaakngei nailoh thukhum pen
A suah lai vantung mite sak,
La ngaihte hongsak dih in
Sang belna ah Pasian thang hen
Leitung kilemna om hen
verse2:
Sehnel gam an ngawl in om aa
A hih teng hong gengen in
Ei mawhna hang ze-etna a thuak
Thuak hang a zawh teiteina
A thuak kum sung hong gen dih in
Dahna gimna a puak teng
Bawlsiat, cilphih a thuak nate
Simmawh nilkhiat a thuakna
verse3:
Singlamteh in kilh a thuakna
Na sa’n lunggim a omna
Han sung guang aa, a kicin'na
Sihna pan a hin kikna
Hong gengen in a tangthute
Ka muh ngeiloh a siang zaw’n
Khitui luangin hong kapsak hi
Kei hong tan tua itna in
chorus:
Zeisu tangthu kei hong hilh in
A thu ka lungsung gelh in
A manpha pen Zeisu tangthu
Kei hong ciamteh theisak in

verse1:
Zeisu' min bangzah in ngaih hiam
Ama' late sasa nuam ing
Ka lung hong kimsak mahmah hi
Tua a min manpha Zeisu!
verse2:
Ka lungsim leh ka dahna teng
A thei khin pa’ min ngaih kasa
Launa lung mannate beisak
Tua Zeisu min ka it hi
verse3:
Tua min ngaih ka zaza nuam hi
Ka lungsim hong nopsak khial kei
Ama late’n khitui nulsak
Tua Zeisu min thangsak un!
verse4:
Kua mah’n gen theingei hetlo hi
Tua ka it min, bangzah’n ngaih hiam
Aw, tua min phatna bek ging hi
Aw, Zeisu min phat ve un
chorus:
"Zeisu," Aw! bangzah a ngaih min!
"Zeisu" nisim in tua mah
"Zeisu" kici tua min manpha
Phat tek ni, a a tawntung

verse1:
Hong hehpihna thupha, lungsim khauhzo thei hi
Leitung a it man aa, A Tapa hong pia hi
verse2:
Gamlakah gul kikhai, a noptuam mah bangin
Topa Zeisu kikhai, nuntaak tawntung na’ng hi
verse3:
Mawh neite sihkik ding, thu khenna i thei hi
Na thu bang zuilo leng, kisia takpi ding hi
verse4:
Leitung mawhsak ding aa, Zeisu hong pailo hi
A minthan' mah bangah, Leitung hong gum ding hi
verse5:
A um lote hehpih, um na’ng lungsim guan hi
Thupha bel hong tun' ve’n, hong um phasak ta hen
chorus:
Kuamah peuhmah in thu um leh
Hin' tawntungna pha ngah ding hi
Hin' tawntungna pha ngah ding hi

zoTitle: Kei Hong Honpa A' Si Luangin
engTitle: Alas! and Did My Saviour Bleed? (Tune: Martyrdom)
verse1:
Kei hong Honpa A' si luangin
Ka Kumpi hong si maw
Tangteel bang bek keimah aa ding
A lutang hong zang maw
verse2:
Keima gitloh nate hangin
Singlamteh tung tau maw
Lamdang hehpihna leh itna
Bang tawh tehthei ding maw
verse3:
Kei zong singlamteh ka muh ciang
Zum in ka kiseel diam
Lungdamna tawh lung nehno in
Ka khi ka luangsak diam
verse4:
Ahih hang khitui taakna in
Itna loh khinzo kei
Topa, ka pumpi kong pia hi
Hih kan' ka hih thei kei

verse1:
Hong hon Topa Zeisu tal ah
Mi gitna nuam pha tuang
A lutung vaangliatna khu aa
A muuk pan itna luang
A muuk pan itna luang
verse2:
Leitung mi tehpih ding omlo
Amah a phabel hi
Vantung mi lakah zong omlo
Amah kilawm bel hi
Amah kilawm bel hi
verse3:
Gimna sung ka kia hong mu aa
Hon ding hong delhpah hi
Kei aa ding singlamteh pua aa
Kei dahna kisuan hi
Kei dahna kisuan hi
verse4:
Ama hangin kei ka nungta
Nuamna zong a hong pia
Hong gualzo sak sihna tungah
Han sung pan hong honkhia
Hansung pan hong honkhia
verse5:
Ama omna vantung khua ah
Kei hong tunpih ding hi
Pasian phatna honglak ding aa
Ka nuamna kim ding hi
Ka nuamna kim ding hi
verse6:
Pasian citna leh hong itna
Hi bang ka theih nungsang
Lungsim tuul nei leng zong, Topa
Kong pia khin ding hi Nang
Kong pia khin ding hi Nang

verse1:
Singlamteh kiangah omna
Kalani mual tungah
Nuamna hong pia ciktui in
Mi teng aa ding luang ta
verse2:
Singlamteh kiang ka ding aa
Hehpihna’n hong mu aa
A taang zingsol aksi in
Ka kiimkot a taang ta
verse3:
Zeisu singlamteh kiangah
Ngak aa kong om ciangah
Singlamteh a liim nuai ah
Hong gum hong omsak in
verse4:
Singlamteh kiangah ka om
A thu um tawntung ning
Gun gal khat aa kham khua inn
Ka tun mateng ngak ning
chorus:
Singlamteh, singlamteh
Ka kisak theihna hi
Vantung khua ka tun ciangin
A nuam ka ngah na’ng hi

engTitle: Beneath the Cross of Jesus (1st Tune)
verse1:
Zeisu singlamteh nuai ah
Kei mah’n ka beel nuam hi
Ni satphatna gam sung panin
Suangpi liim bang a hi
Gampa lakah om laitakin
Nisa liahna a hi
Vangik mite’n van khia ding aa
A gimte khawl na’ng hi
verse2:
Zeisu’n singlamteh tungah
Kei tang gimna thuak hi
A pumpi a siat laitakin
Keimah’n ka muthei hi
Ka et lai ka khitui luang aa
Dah inah ka liing hi
Tua itna bang dang omlo aa
Gilo mihi'ng ka ci
verse3:
Zeisu singlamteh liim sung
Keima omna a hi
Zeisu maitang vaang sim lohin
Ni taang dang omlo hi
Leitungah sum bangin
Tuate a met zangthei lopi
Ka mawhna zumhuaina a hi
Singlamteh thahna hi

engTitle: Beneath the Cross of Jesus (2nd Tune)
verse1:
Zeisu singlamteh nuai ah
Kei mah’n ka beel nuam hi
Ni satphatna gam sung panin
Suangpi liim bang a hi
Gampa lakah om laitakin
Nisa liahna a hi
Vangik mite’n van khia ding aa
A gimte khawl na’ng hi
verse2:
Zeisu’n singlamteh tungah
Kei tang gimna thuak hi
A pumpi a siat laitakin
Keimah’n ka mu thei hi
Ka et lai ka khitui luang aa
Dah inah ka liing hi
Tua itna bang dang omlo aa
Gilo mihi'ng ka ci
verse3:
Zeisu singlamteh liim sung
Keima omna a hi
Zeisu maitang vaang sim lohin
Ni taang dang omlo hi
Leitungah sum bangin
Tuate a met zang thei lopi
Ka mawhna zumhuaina a hi
Singlamteh thahna hi

engTitle: There is a Green Hill Far Away
verse1:
Keima aa ding sihna a thuak
Khuapi pualam om aa
Zeisu singlamteh na om hi
Gamla mualpi tungah
verse2:
Amah in gimna a thuakna 
I theizo kei ding hi
Ahih hang komau taang ding in
Amah in a thuak hi
verse3:
Eite kiphelna ngah dingin
Amah in a si hi
A sipha tawh sawpsiang man in
Vantung i tung ding hi
verse4:
Khialhna manpiak nading in ah
Mi dang siangtho kei hi
Amah bek in vantung khua ah
A hong lutsak thei hi
chorus:
Amah’n pha takpi hong it hi
Amah i itkik hi
A hong gum thei a si um in
Ama na i seem ding

verse1:
Sihkhuuk a dimin kihong aa, sisan tuibang luang hi
Tua si tawh kiphum mawh neite, mawhna tawh kipelh hi
Mawhna tawh kipelh hi, mawhna tawh kipelh hi
Tua si tawh kiphum mawh neite, mawhna tawh kipelh hi
verse2:
A si mi mawh pa’n tua sihkhuuk a muh ciang a nuam aa
Hih mi bang ka gitloh hangin, mawhna kiphel thei ta
Mawhna kiphel thei ta, mawhna kiphel thei ta
Hih mi bang ka gitloh hangin, mawhna kiphel thei ta
verse3:
A liamma ah hong luang sipha, upna ka muh manin
Hong phelna ding itna a pha, ka sih mateng sa ning
Ka sih mateng sa ning, ka sih mateng sa ning
Hong phelna ding itna la pha, ka sih mateng sa ning
verse4:
Nung ciang hih a gik i pum teng, sih han sung om lai in
Topa hong phel lungdamna teng, vantungah la sa ning
Vantungah la sa ning, vantungah la sa ning
Topa hong phel lungdamna teng, vantungah la sa ning
verse5:
It huai Tuuno Na si manpha, bei hun nei ngeilo ding
Gupna ngah miteng kikhawm ding, mawh ngei nawnlo ding hi
Mawh ngei nawnlo ding hi, mawh ngei nawnlo ding hi
Gupna ngah miteng kikhawm ding, mawh ngei nawnlo ding hi

engTitle: When I Survey the Wondrous Cross (1st & 2nd Tune: Rockingham)
verse1:
Vaanglian Kumpipa hong sihna
A singlamteh ke’n velvel leng
Kei hauhna kei kiphatsakna
Ke’n tu’n bangmah in simnawn keng
verse2:
Khazih ka Pasian sihna lo
Kisialh pih ding bangmah om kei
Ka deih bel teng khat zong siit lo
Ama' si khekna in ka nei
verse3:
En ven, A' lu, A' khut, A' khe!
Dahna, itna, hong luangsuk khawm
Na mu ngei maw ling lukhu leh
Itna, dahna gawm kilawm khawm
verse4:
Leitung khempeuh piathei hileng
Tam lua kaci ngeikei ding hi
A hong itna ke’n ngaihsun leng
Ka pum ka tak ka pia nuam hi

zoTitle: Ka Kumpi Na Hi Ta, Tu’n, Nang
verse1:
Ka Kumpi Na hi ta tu’n, Nang
Vangliatna teng tang in
Ling Na khu ka mangngilh loh na’ng
Kalvari'a hong paipih in
verse2:
Na kisialna han honglak in
Nangmah hong kikahna
Vantung mite’n puanpaak silh in
Nangmah a hong cin'na
verse3:
Mazih bangin khuamui sungah
Nangmah hong dawnsak in
Hong paipih in Kalvari ah
Na hanhawm honglak in
verse4:
Nangma aa ding ke’n pua nuam ing
Singlamteh ni simin
Dahna na haai hong dawn pih ning
Kei aa ding Nang thuak khin
chorus:
Getsemani mangngih loh na’ng
Na thuakna ka mangnglih loh na’ng
Nong itna ka mangngilh loh na’ng
Kalvari’n hong paipih’n

verse1:
Leitung mawhna pulak dingin
A sipha minthang mahmah hi
Pasian Tapa pha bel Zeisu
A liam manin i damta hi
Tuu khum tawh i gamlat hangin
Lam khial a gimna thuak hangin
Vuuk sang ka ngo zawk nading in
Tuuno si tawh hong sawpsiang in
verse2:
Ling tawh kigaan lukhu khu aa
Singlamteh gik Topa’n pua hi
Gimna dahnate thuakzo ta
Ahih hang mawkna hilo hi
Leitung i mawh hong sawpsak ding
A si phual ah ei hongla in
Vuuk sang ka ngo zawk nading in
Tuuno si tawh hong sawpsiang in
verse3:
Pa aw, ke’n lam ka khial zo hi
Ka lungsim tamvei mawhzo hi
Ka mawhna in si bang san aa
Tui in kisawp siang zolo hi
Keimah in Na thuciam um leng
Na si buakna mun ah pai ning
Vuuk sang ka ngo zawk nading in
Tuuno si tawh hong sawpsiang in
chorus:
Vuuk sang ngo zaw hi
Vuuk sang ngo zaw hi
Tuuno si tawh hong sawpsiang leh
Vuuk sangin ka ngo zawk nading hi

verse1:
A lian a neu kua cilo
Mawh, mawhlo ci lo
Zeisu’n vekpi aa ding khin
Sawtpi pek in
verse2:
Saang pen A tokhom tung pan
Kum in hong sih ciang
Na khempeuh a vekin zo
A aw ngai dih un
verse3:
Lunggim van pua naseem te’n
Koi ah seem na hiam?
Khawl dih in Amah’n zo zo
Sawtpi pek in
verse4:
Na vangik pi teng khia in
Zeisu khe kiang khia’n
Amah bekbek kiang ding in
Na khempeuh cin' khin
verse5:
Zeisu nasepsa muangin
Na uptheih mateng
Han ciamna in kimang lo
Sihna hong tun’ zaw
chorus:
A zo zo hi! Takpi hi
Vekpi’n zo khin hi
Hih hi, mawh neite i sap
Mawhna pulak ding

verse1:
Kalani ah Zeisu a si
Hong gum Topa tua kithat hi
Tua khuam tungah a si bua hi
Mawh phel na’ng in a hong lei hi
verse2:
Suangpi kitam khua hong mial hi
Hong gum Topa lusu, si hi
A kiliahna puan kikeek aa
Hon’sak lam sung nuam tawhtung ta
verse3:
Topa Zeisu aw, bangci hiam
Topa nang in hinna hong pia
Singlamteh pua haksa thuak hi
Launa sungah Kalani ah
chorus:
Aw Kalani, Aw Kalani
Topa Zeisu sihna thuak hi
Aw Kalani, Aw Kalani
Hong gum Topa, kei aa ding si

zoTitle: Muh Khopna Ah Hin’na Om Hi
engTitle: There is A Life For A Look
verse1:
Singlamteh tung kikhai mi na muh ciangin
Thakhatthu’n hinna ngah ta un, ci
Tua ahih ciang mawhnei te’n en un zong un
Singlamteh a kithatpa en ni
verse2:
