Mawhna phel ding hikei leh Amah in ah
Bang ding singlamteh thuak nuam ding hiam
Mawhna pan sihna tawh hong tan nuam ding hiam
A pang pan si bang ding a luang diam
verse3:
Kisiikna bekin mawhna kiphel zolo
A si bek in a hong phel zo hi
A si a hong bua Topa Zeisu kiangah
Na khialhna khempeuh hong puak in ci
verse4:
Hong sapna lung hian’ nading omlo ding hi
Kicing zo hi, ci in hong sam hi
Lei a bei ciang khatvei hong pailai ding aa
Thu ka hong khen ding hi, a ci hi
chorus:
En un, hing ta un
A kikhai mipa en in hin na ngah ta un
Thakhat in hinna pha ngah ta un

verse1:
Itna siangtho, itna kicing
Vantung nuamna, hong tuaksuk
Nong hehpihna tung khup nading
Ko sung hong lam in Na buuk
Zeisu aw, hehpihna Na dim
Itna siang kicing Na hi
Lawp aa liing ko khempeuh lungsim
Hotna tawh Nong veh ding hi
verse2:
Lunghimawh mi lungsim sungah
Itna Nangma Kha guan in
Note khempeuh Nangma sungah
Tawldamna hong luahsak in
Ko mawh nopna lungsim pai khia’n
Alpha leh Omega in
Upna pan a cingsak Pasian
Ko lungsim hong khahkhia in
verse3:
Hong pai in, a honzo pen Pa
Nang' nuntakna hong guan in
Na inn ah hong taam mengin la
Paikhia nawn peuhmah kei in
Thupha kong piapia ding uh aa
Na na ka seem ding uh hi
Na itna sungah kipaak ta
Tawlnga lo kong phat ding hi

verse1:
Zeisu in keimah hong itna
Keimah hong tat nading in ah
Singlamteh gilo hong thuakna
Kam aa gen zawh hilo
verse2:
Ka nuntaak tawntung na’ng in ah
Nakpi dahna a hong thuakna
Ling kiphan lukhu hong khukna
Kam aa gen zawh hilo
verse3:
Pasian kiang hong thuumsak Topa
Ama sung ka ngah lung nopna
Ama si hang hong piang thupha
Kam aa gen zawh hilo
verse4:
Hong nai ciang ka ngah lungdamna
Launa kihel lo tawldamnna
Ama hang lametna a pha
Kam aa gen zawh hilo
chorus:
Hong itna kam' gen zawh hilo
Hong itna kam' gen zawh hilo
Zeisu in keimah hong itna
Kam aa gen zawh hilo

engTitle: In the Cross of Christ I Glory (Tune: Rargbun)
verse1:
Singlamteh ka kipaakna hi
Ahun tawh kisia lo hi
Siangtho tangthu khempeuhte' vaang
Zeisu' singlamteh kiim taang
verse2:
Nuntaak dahna’n hong phaak ciangin
Lawmpa’n hong khem, lau ciangin
Singlamteh’n hong khem ngeilo hi
Lungnop, nuamna hong pia hi
verse3:
Lungdamna ni hong taan’ ciangin
Itna khuavaak taan' ciangin
Singlamteh vaang taang in ka ni
Hong taang phasak tuan lai hi
verse4:
Lungdamna thupha na zaak ciang
Hong pai in, ci’n hong sam
Upna tawh A si sung bual leeng
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding

zoTitle: Ganhing Khempeuh In Gum Zo Kei
engTitle: Not All the Blood of Beasts (Tune: Boylston)
verse1:
Zudah mite biakna
Ganhing pawlpawl a hi
Mawhna hong phel i lungdamna
Neu kha beek piangsak kei
verse2:
Tuuno Khazih in ah,
Tua biakna sang phazaw
A si a manpha a hi aa
Mawhna phel thei ta hi
verse3:
Keimah'n ka um zo hi
Ka lu, ka khut, ka ngah
Mawhna khempeuh ka kisiik hi
Ka hong thuum hi Topa
verse4:
Singlamteh na tungah
Nangmah'n na thuak gimna
Kei in ka lungngaih ciang in ah
Na hong it ka thei ta
verse5:
Biakna vantung Tuuno
A umte nopsakna
Ke’n um aa ka biak ka nuam zo
Ka phat ding a itna

verse1:
En in, thuuk in a zai tuikhuuk
A luang tawntung tuikhuuk
Vang nih pan in hong luangkhia aa
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
verse2:
Kalani khuam tungah
Lungkham, natna thuakin hong si
Lamdang sisan guntui, hong luang
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
verse3:
Mi khempeuh dam nading hong luang
Tua thupha tuikhuuk pan!
Upna tawh A si sung bual leeng
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
verse4:
Lungdamna thupha na zaak ciang/nHong pai in, ci’n hong sam
Upna tawh a si sung bual leeng
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
Vuuk bang hong ngosak ding
chorus:
Hong pai hih tuikhuuk
Hong luang hi, tuni’n
Hong pai khempeuh man ngen lo-in
Na mawh hong sawpsak ding

verse1:
Manpha si, tawntung manpha si
Tu’n kei aa ding manpha
Tua si hang bek ka kha tawldam
Dahna teng beisak hi
verse2:
Mangngilh ngei nawn peuhmah kei ni
Zuau lo Pasian in ci
"Note mawhna khialhna taang in
Ka Ta' sisan ka bua"
verse3:
Mawhna ka bawl tampi ka thei
Maai zo diam tuazah pi
Ahih hang manpha si’n sawp hi
Mawhna teng puakhia hi
verse4:
A cimawh lungsim leh pumpi
Si ding a lum zongin
Lungnuam tak in kei ka si ding
Tua manpha sisan hang
chorus:
Aw! Lamdang hi tua sisan luang
Gumpa’ pang pan phulkhia
Vantung dongah la in sa ning
"A manpha bel sisan"

engTitle: There is Power in the Blood
verse1:
Na mawh vangik pan na suakta ding hiam?
Si sung, si sung vangliatna om hi
Siatna tungah nang na gualzo ding hiam?
Si sung vaanglian lamdang om hi
verse2:
Na kiphatsak pan na suakta ding hiam?
Si sung, si sung vangliatna om hi
Siangtho ngah ding, Kalani tui zuanin
Si sung vaanglian lamdang om hi
verse3:
Vuuk sangin na paak zaw mahmah ding hiam?
Si sung, si sung vangliatna om hi
Nuntaakna tui sung mawhna nin siangta
Sisung vaanglian lamdang om hi
verse4:
Na Kumpi Zeisu' na naseem ding hiam?
Si sung, si sung vangliatna om hi
Nisim Amah phatna na sa ding hiam?
Si sung vaanglian lamdang om hi
chorus:
Si sung vaanglian, vaanglian lamdang om
Tuuno sisan sungah
Si sung vaanglian, vaanglian lamdang om
A manpha Tuuno si sungah

verse1:
Gamlapi mual tungah singlamteh tul gemgam
Gentheihna, maizumna lim a hi
Tua khuampi ka it hi, leitung buppi tan ding
A it huai pen Pa hong sihna hi
verse2:
Mi in tua singlamteh a thusim loh hangin
Ke’n ka phawk tawntungna a thu in
Pasian' Tuuno in vantung nopna nusia hi
Kalani mual ah tua pua ding in
verse3:
Ka mawhna hong maisak, hong siangtho sak dingin
Sisan luangin Zeisu hong si hi
Pasian Tapa' sisan siangtho a hong baanna
Tua singlamteh ka velvel nuam hi
verse4:
Tua singlamteh khuampi ke’n nusia ngeikei ning
Taina, zumna ka thuakpih hangin
Tua hi leh khatvei ciang hong sam ding A inn ah
Amah tawh a minthang khawm dingin
chorus:
Tua singlamteh ke’n ngilh ngeikei ning
Zawhna minpha ka tut zawh mateng
Tua singlamteh khah lo lenlen ning
Kham lukhu ka khekna ni mateng

verse1:
En un, mawhna khempeuh a puakhia Pa
Sihna Kalvary mual tungah
Singlamteh tung gimna sihna thuak in
Kei aa ding in a sisan hong luang
verse2:
Mawh sawpsiang na'ng tui, a hong luangzo hi
Hong Gum Topa sihna mun pan
A tawntung in tua tui ah kisil ni
Hong Gum Topa kiang zuan in pai ni
verse3:
Tua si sung aa a kisil khempeuhte
A mawhna teng vuuk bang ngo ding
"Na mawhna khempeuh uh hong maisak ding
Ka kiang hong pai un" Topa’n hong ci
verse4:
Mawhna sungah ka paikik nawnkei ding
Zeisu'n kei hong suakta sak ding
A Kha Siangtho in kei hong pi ding aa
A gam sungah hong lutpih ding hi
chorus:
Hong Gumpa Topa naak sungah
Sisan leh tui hong luangkhia hi
Ka lung sungah om tawntung hi
Mawhna kisawp siang zo

engTitle: The Son of God Goes Forth To War
verse1:
Kumpipa lukhu ngah nading
Pasian Tapan’n do ding.
A dial khaina kilak ding hi
A nung kua in zui hiam?
Dahna a thuak hang thuum lo-in
Gimna a zothei mi.
Leitung singlamteh puate in
A nung a zui uh hi.
verse2:
Bawlsiat thuak pen nungzui khat in
Han galkhat muthei hi.
Topa vantung khua ah mu aa
"Hong gum in" ci’n ngen hi
Topa sih laitak a galte
A mawhna a phel bang
A thatte' aa ding thu ngen ta
Ama nung kua’n zui hiam?
verse3:
A teelsa sawmlehnih tung ah
Kha Siangtho hong tum hi.
Amau upna a liat man in 
Pasian in a gum hi.
Bawl siatna tampi thuak ta leh
Sahang kihta lo hi.
Sihna thuak ding lu a su hi
Amau nung kua’n zui hiam?
verse4:
Mi siangthote tampi, tangval
Nungak leh, nu leh pa
Puanpaak silh in Zeisu mai ah
Lungdamna la hong sa.
Launa, nasepna, gimna in
Vantung lam kahto hi.
Topa amau nung zuih nading
Ko mau Nong huh ding hi.

engTitle: Lift up, Lift up, Your Voices Now
verse1:
Awngun, Awngun la, kiko un
Leitung khempeuh lungdam khin uh
Topa’n vanglianpi tawh zozo
Zawhna tawh nang ding hi, i To
verse2:
Hankhuuk suang tawh kikhak zolo
Galkapte in zong cing zolo
Vanglianpi tawh han phukham aa
Zawhna vaanglian tawh hong tho ta
verse3:
Ama zawhsa, a thuaksa teng, Ei hong pia aa
Hawmsawn thei leeng
Lawpna, nuamna, lungnop nading
Ama zawh bang ei zong zo ding
verse4:
Gal zopa aw, hong do pih in
Sihna pan khuavaak hong tun in
Nang' nung tawn leeng lung himawh lo
Nang' sung si leeng Pasian kiang tho

verse1:
Kei Topa a hing ei ve
Tu’n zong leitungah om
A hinkik ke’n thei gige
Mite'n bang gen ta leh
Amah’n hong hehpih thei aa
Hong hopihna ka za
Amah ka sap laitakin hong nai gige
verse2:
Ka kiim leitung mun khempeuh ah
Hong itna ka mu
Lungkhamna ka thuak zeel hang
Ka lungkia ngeikei ding
Huihpi nun'na teng ah
Amah’n hong kha ke’n ka thei
Amah hong kilat ding ni hong tung ding hi
verse3:
Nuam un, nuam un, Zeisu mi
Lungdam in la sa un
Hin' tawntung Haleluiah 
Zeisu Khazih Kumpi!
Muanna tawh a zong mite’n
Amah muthei ding uh
Tua bang itna a nei midang om ngeikei
chorus:
Hing ee, hing ee, hong hon Khazih Topa
Hong tonpih aa, hong hopih hi
Ka paina khempeuh ah
Hing ee, hing ee, mihing honkhia Topa
Bang ka ci theih hiam
Nong cih leh, Ka lungsung ah hing hi

verse1:
Ih Topa hong thawhkik ni!
Mun khempeuh ah gen un
A lungdam huai paisanna
Topa hong paisanna
Sihna pan tawntung nopna
Leitung pan vantung dong
Khazih in hong suakta sak
Gual zawhna la sa un
verse2:
Lungsim khempeuh sian’tho ni
Thumaan i muh thei ni
Tawntung Topa meel phat ni
Thawhkik khua hong vaak ni
Topa kam sung zaak kik ni
Ama aw neem zaakna,
Mite aw phatna la sa
Gualzo Topa phat un
verse3:
Vantung khempeuh zong nuam ni
Leitung in zong phat hen
Leitung khempeuh gualzawh ni
Na khempeuh a kim ni
Muhtheih muhmawh khempeuh in
Lungdamna la sa un
A bei ngeilo lungdamna
Ih Topa hong thawh ni

engTitle: Christ the Lord Risen Today (Tune: Worgan)
verse1:
Zeisu hingkik hi tuni, Hallelujah
Nuamna pua hi lungdam un, Hallelujah
Singlamteh tung sizo hi, Hallelujah
A mite hong teel zo hi, Hallelujah
verse2:
Van ah i Topa Kumpi, Hallelujah
A min phatin la sa ni, Hallelujah
Mawhneite a phel na’ng in, Hallelujah
Si in han ah kivui hi, Hallelujah
verse3:
Gimna a na thuak manin, Hallelujah
Eimah hong gumkhin zo hi, Hallelujah
Van pan hong uk tawntung hi, Hallelujah
La sa tawntung vantung mi’n, Hallelujah
verse4:
Minthang Kumpi hingkik zo, Hallelujah
Sihna gu koi ah om? Hallelujah
Khatvei si in hong gum zo, Hallelujah
Hankhuk na zawhna koi om? Hallelujah.

verse1:
Han thuuk sungah lum hi, Kei Honpa Zeisu
A ni tun' ding ngak hi, Kei To Zeisu’n
verse2:
Cin’ hangin mawkna hi, Hong Hon Zeisu’ han
Ciamteh hang mawkna hi, Kei To Zeisu’n
verse3:
Sihna’n len zolo hi, Hong Honpa Zeisu
Dalnate sugawp hi, Kei To Zeisu’n
chorus:
Hansung pan hong thoto zo
Vanglianpi tawh galte zogawp zo
Khuamial gam pan galzo in hong thoto hi
A mi siangte maan’ pih ding hingkik zo hi
Hingkik zo, hingkik zo, Hallelujah hingkik zo

zoTitle: Ka Thei Hi, Kei Hong Tanpa Hing Hi
engTitle: I Know That My Redeemer Liveth
verse1:
Ka thei hi, kei hong Tanpa hing hi
Leitungah hong paikik ding hi
Ka thei hi, nuntaakna thak hong pia
Hehpihna Vaang A khut sung om
verse2:
Ka thei hi, hong thuciam pel ngeikei
A gensa thu bei ngeilo ding
A gilo sihna pan ka suakta
Amah mu ding nung ciangin ah
verse3:
Ka thei hi, ka om na’ng mun bawl khawl
A omna peuh keizong om ning
A lamdang Amah’n kei hong keem hi
Kei aa ding in hong paikik ding
chorus:
Ka thei, ka thei, To Zeisu hing hi
Leitungah hong paikik ding hi
Ka thei, ka thei, nuntaakna hong pia
Hehpihna Vaang A khut sung om

verse1:
Minthanna Nang aa, a thokik Topa
Bei ngeilo zawhna tawh, sihna Na zozo
Vantung mi siangthote’n, suangpi lemkhia aa
A kituunna puan zong, hoih takin khep uh
verse2:
Zeisu tawh kimu, hansung pan thozo
Itna tawh hong dawn in, launa teng beizo
A pawlpite lungdam, nuamna la sa uh
Topa tu in hing kik, sihna’n zo zolo
verse3:
Um khial nawn kei in, minthang Kumpipa
Amah lo ngal om kei, hong huh zo ding dang
Gal zote bek hilo, sihna zozo lai
Zawdan gun kantan in, vantung inn tung tu’n
chorus:
A hingkik Topa, minthanna Nang aa
Bei ngeilo zawhna tawh, Sihna Na zozo

zoTitle: Ka Thei Hi Keimah Hong Tanpa
engTitle: I Know That My Redeemer Lives
verse1:
Ka thei hi keimah hong Tanpa
A nungta tawntung hi
Thu hong ngetsak itna lahna
Suahtakna hong khaam hi
verse2:
A mah’n keima lu hong phongto
Hotkhiatna hong puak hi
Amah’n kei hong suakta sak zo
A hong langh baih ding hi
verse3:
Ka sian'tho ding hong deih Amah’n
Ama deih kua’n nang zo
Kei sungah tua thupha
Amah’n cingsak ding hi pello
verse4:
Zeisu aw, Na thu kip takin
Ka um, ka muang zo hi
Nangma kiangah hong la dingin
Nong pai takpi ding hi

engTitle: All Hail the Power of Jesus’ Name (2nd Tune: Disden)
verse1:
Dawn un, Zeisu' min vaanglianna
Vantung mite bok un, vantung mite bok un
Kumpi lukhu hong la unla
Kumpi...lian Kumpi, Kumpi, Kumpi
Kumpi, Kumpi, lianbel pia un
verse2:
Pasian biak ma'n thahna thuak te’n
Amah Kumpi pia un, Amah Kumpi pia un
Zise' suan in phatna ngah hen
Kumpi...lian Kumpi, Kumpi, Kumpi
Kumpi, Kumpi, lianbel pia un
verse3:
Teeltuam Itazila te aw
Tawmkha na hih hang un, tawmkha na hih hang un
Hong tanzo hi, hehpihna tawh
Kumpi...lian Kumpi, Kumpi, Kumpi
Kumpi, Kumpi, lianbel pia un
verse4:
Zentail mikhial te'n zong dan pan
Hong hot, mangngilh kei un
Minphatna a khe ah va nga'n
Kumpi lianbel pia un
Kumpi...lian Kumpi, Kumpi, Kumpi
Kumpi, Kumpi, lianbel pia un
verse5:
Hih leitung aa, minam kim in
Zeisu lianbel sak un
Liantna khempeuh Ama aa ci'n
Kumpi lianbel pian un
Kumpi...lian Kumpi, Kumpi, Kumpi
Kumpi, Kumpi, lianbel pia un

verse1:
Vakhu khawl na’ng (vakhu khawl na'ng)
Singhiang bawl hi (singhiang bawl hi)
Nitaak khuadam (nitaak khuadam)
A lungnuam hi (a lungnuam hi)
Tua Pasian thu (tua Pasian thu)
Mailam hi, ci (mailam hi, ci)
Lung ngaihna teng (lung ngaihna teng), Galile ah
verse2:
Paak pawl om hi (vakhu khawl na'ng)
Guam tui in nawt (singhiang bawl hi)
A nuam vasa(nitaak khuadam)
A ham lamdang (a lungnuam hi)
Nitaak zingsang (tua Pasian thu)
I phatna la (mailam hi, ci)
Mai mu ging za (lung ngaihna teng), Galile ah
verse3:
Ih lungngaih ciang (vakhu khawl na'ng)
Khuasikmul tho (singhiang bawl hi)
Tui tungah pai (nitaak khuadam)
Gunpi tungah (a lungnuam hi)
Kei ka ngaih ni (tua Pasian thu)
khatvei ngahkik (mailam hi, ci)
A nung ka zui (lung ngaihna teng), Galile ah
chorus:
(Aw Galile) Aw Galile
(A nuam gampi)a nuam gampi
(Zeisu deihna) Zeisu deihna
(Tampi om hi) tampi om hi
Aw Galile (Aw Galile)
A nuam gampi (a nuam gampi)
La sa in la (la sa in la)
Khatvei sakik (khatvei sakik)

verse1:
Ngai un beithei lo la ngaih, van pan hong kisa
"Minthang, minthang hen, Pasian" a sangbel ah;
A taang Pasian zumpi ah
Mi siangte leh van mi’n sa hi
Minthang, minthang hen, Pasian, a sangbel ah
verse2:
Ngai un zawhna la ngaih ging, leitung teng thawn khin
Tuipi kilok ging bangin, nuam' aw gingin
"Topa pahtawi in awng un!"
A zawhna gam ci-in phat hi
Minthang, minthang hen, Pasian, a sangbel ah
verse3:
Thum kigawm Pasian phat un, van mihonte aw
Phat un Pa leh a Tapa, leh Kha Siangtho
A beisa hun aa bangin
A tawntung in gingging den hi
Minthang, minthang hen, Pasian, a sangbel ah

zoTitle: Aw Mi Sang Tampi’n Zai Sa Ding
engTitle: Oh for a Thousand Tongues (1st. Tune: Lyngham & 2nd Tune: Azmon)
verse1:
Aw mi sang tampi’n zai sa ding
Hong taang vanglian phat ni
Hong taang vanglian phat ni
Ka Pasian vaanglian belna leh
(Hong hehpihna phat ni)x5
verse2:
Aw ka limbel keimah hong kha’n
Taang bang damna hong piang
Taang bang damna hong piang
Hih leitung mi khempeuh tungah
(Na thupha dim ta hen)x3
(Hong hehpihna phat ni)x2
verse3:
Aw Zeisu aw Nangmah siangbel
Dam na’ng leh lungdamna
Dam na’ng leh lungdamna
Mawh neite’n zong hong theih zawh na’ng
(Ka muan' lianbel Na hi)x3
(Hong hehpihna phat ni)x2
verse4:
Mawhna khempeuh hong phelzo hi
Mi vaitham zong gum khia
Mi vaitham zong gum khia
A sipha bel hong luangsak hi
(Eite hong itna hi)x3
(Hong hehpihna phat ni)x2

zoTitle: Gup Khiat Ka Hih Nung Sang
verse1:
Ke’n nei khin ta'ng, ka saknop la
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Ka Kumpi, Honpa phatna la
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
verse2:
Ke’n nei hong lungkim sak Khazih
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Ama deih bek ka bawl ding hi
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
verse3:
Ke’n nei kitel teci panna
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Beisak, launa leh uplahna
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
verse4:
Ke’n nei kei aa ding inn muan’pi
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Tua’h a tawntung ka om ding hi
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
chorus:
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
A ma min tawh vaanglian ning
Gupkhiat ka hih nungsang
Ka Honpa' min in ka vaanglian ding

zoTitle: Zeisu Ka Lungsim In Ka Deih
verse1:
Zeisu ka lungsim in ka deih
Hong hehpihna nakpi’n ka ngen
Hong hehpihna itna hong langh
Amah ke’n ka it phasem ta
verse2:
Leitung itna sung a nuam pen
Kiteh theilo Hong itna tawh
Kong ento lametna pi tawh
Na mai muh ciang lamdang ka sa
verse3:
Vantung gam sung nopna kidim
Paakte hoihna mu ding tua lai
Za nawnlo ding vantung mi aw
Ka kha in lamdang sa ding ta
verse4:
Nang lo-in nopna omthei kei
Ka lungsim hong damsak thei ding
Nang Na om ciang dahna nuamsak
Vantung nopna kei sung hong taang
chorus:
Lungsim phabel, hong guansuk in
Tua Kham khuapi ka muh nading
Lungsim sung hong taangsak in
Tua khuapi nuam kei aa ding hi

verse1:
A manpha pen suang ken mu ing
Lungdam in la ka sa
Zeisu kei aa ci’n la sa ning
Khazih la in sa ning
verse2:
Zeisu siampi ka Kumpi hi
Khuavaak kamsang pa hi
Tokhom mai ah kamsang lianpa
Ka van Kumpipa hi
verse3:
Amah topate’ Topa hi
Kumpite’ Kumpi hi
Amah in thumaanna Ni hi
A khanuai cidamna
verse4:
Kilem nading kei taang hong si
Kei taang a si hong bua
A lamdang kei hong Gumpa hi,
Amah mah in hong gum
chorus:
A manpha pen suang ke’n mu ing
Lungdam in la kasa
Zeisu kei aa ci’n la sa ning!
Khazih la in sa ning

verse1:
Kham ahih keh ngun a kihel kei hong gupna’n
Leitung hauhnate’n ka kha hong gumzo kei
Zeisu singlamteh si bek ke’n ka beel ding hi
Ka Topa hong sihna’n tu’n kei hong gum hi
verse2:
Kham ahih keh ngun a kihel kei hong gupna’n
Ka lungsung mawhnate pungin hong khangsak
Zeisu singlamteh si bek ke’n ka beel ding hi
Ka Topa hong sihna bekin hong gumthei
verse3:
Kham ahih keh ngun a kihel kei hong gupna’n
A siangtho thuciamna ka nai ding hong khaam
Zeisu singlamteh si bek ke’n ka beel ding hi
Ka Topa hong sihna’n ka launa beisak
verse4:
Kham ahih keh ngun a kihel kei hong gupna’n
Vantung gamsung tun na'ng hong leisak zo kei
Zeisu singlamteh si bek ke’n ka beel ding hi
Ka Topa hong sihna’n gupkhiatna hong pia
chorus:
Hong gumzo, hih hang ngun hi kei
Hong leizo, kham tawh hilo
A si tawh kei hong gumzo hi
Hong itna ki gen naikei

engTitle: Crown Him With Many Crowns (Tune: Diademata)
verse1:
Tokhom tung aa Tuuno, Kumpi namkim piazo
Ngai un, a ngaih vantung lapi!
La dang teng meng khin hi
Ka kha aw, tho in la
Nang aa ding hong si Pa
A lianbel Kumpipa ci in
A phatna la sa in
verse2:
Ki itna Kumpipa, en un, Ama liamma
A’ khut, A’ pang kimu lai hi
Minphatna in tuam hi
Hih thu lamdang lua hi
Phawk zawh loh in thuuk hi
Vantung mi’n zong en zolo in
Kuun hi nuailam en in
verse3:
Kilemna Kumpipa, Gal kidona bei aa
Thuumna leh phatna’n suahkhia in
Vannuai kilem na’ng in
Hong uk tawntung ding aa
Vantung khuanuam sungah
A Liam, Ama khe kiimkot ah
Paak tawh kidawn ding ta
verse4:
A tawntung aa Kumpi, hun bawl a uk Mangpi
Leitung pumpi Na piangsak zo
Gen theih loh Na Siangtho
Hong tan ka Topa aw
Kei’ taang Nang hong si maw!
Nang min phat tawp ngeilo ding hi’ng
A tawntung sa ding hi’ng

zoTitle: Ka Lung Sungah La Ngaih Hong Kisa
verse1:
Ka lungsung ah la ngaih hong kisa
Zeisu’ hong hopihna hi
Lau ke’n, nang kong ompih tawntung na
Lungnuam takin om in, ci
verse2:
Ka nuntakna mawhna’n sugawp zo
Lung lemloh natna damsak
Zeisu’n a siateng hong lepsak zo
A ngaih la khanglo kiksak
verse3:
Hong hehpih na pha tawh kivaak in
A khanuai ka beel ta aa
A maitai ka muh tawntung manin
Kiko nuamna la ka sa
verse4:
A sawt lo-in hong paikik ding hi
Van ah hong lato dingin
Theih loh gamah ka leengto ding hi
Amah tawh maang khawm dingin
chorus:
Zeisu, Zeisu, Zeisu
Min teng pan ngaih pen
Lunggulh teng kicin’na
La hong sasa nuamsak den

verse1:
Topa’n ka tuucingpa hi aa
Bangmah ka kisam kei
Lonona ah hong lum sakin
Tuidam kiang hong paipih
verse2:
Ka nuntakna tha hong dimsak
A ma min hang bekin
Keimah Ama thumaan lampi
Zui in hong paithei sak
verse3:
Sihna guam sung ka kheng zongin
Natna ka kihta kei
A molhtum leh A ciangkhut in
Kei hong lungmuang sak ding
verse4:
Ka galte a om laitak in
A mai’ an hong lui in
Ka lu sathau hong nilhsak aa
Ka hai a dimleet hi
verse5:
Hoihna leh migitna te in
Ka khan tawntung kei hong
Zui den ding aa Pasian inn sung
Ka ten na’ng hi den ding

verse1:
Pha bel Zeisu aw, na khempeuh Na uk hi
Pasian leh mihing ta Na hi
Nangmah ka muang hi, Nangmah ka phat hi.
Ka kisak theih nading Na hi
verse2:
Pawnpha mahmah hi, tulak zong a pha thei
Tuklai amaute’ hing lai hi
Dahna thuak mite, la sasak Zeisu
Na khempeuh sang a pha zaw hi
verse3:
Ni taang a pha mahmah, kha taang a pha zaw hi
Aksite zong te ding hoih hi
Van aa na khempeuh sangin Zeisu in
A pha zaw in a taang thei hi

verse1:
Phat un, phat un, eite hong hon thupha Zeisu
Sa un, sa un hong itna thangsak un
Dawn un, dawn un, Vantung mi a lianbelte aw
A min siangtho pahtawi in liansak un
Tuucing bangin, Zeisu’n naupangte cingin
A ma ang ah tawi hi, sun niloh in
Phat un, phat un, A liatna pha demzo omlo
Phat un, phat un, nuamna la tawh phat un
verse2:
Phat un, phat un, eite hong tan thupha Zeisu
Gimna, sihna, ei mawhna hong thuak hi
Dawn un, dawn un, Singlamteh thuak Topa Zeisu
Suahtaak nading lametna Suangpi hi
Eite' dahna hong puaksak Zeisu hi aa
Bei theilo hi, lamdang hi hong itna
Phat un, phat un, A liatna pha demzo omlo
Phat un, phat un, nuamna la tawh phat un
verse3:
Phat un, phat un, eite hong tan thupha Zeisu
Amah phatna’n vantung innpi thawn hi
Maang tawntung ta, eite hong hon Topa Zeisu
Kamsang, Siampi, Kumpiza ngah ta hi
Khazih hong kum ciang leitung zo gawp ding aa
Ukna, vaangliatna khempeuh Ama aa
Phat un, phat un, A liatna pha demzo omlo
Phat un, phat un, nuamna la tawh phat un

zoTitle: I Ngak Laitak Hong Tuak Diam?
verse1:
Topa Zeisu nuamna hong pia dingin
Sunkim zankim hong pai leh
Lungsim dikin, meivaak a baihsa in
I ngak laitak hong tuak diam?
verse2:
Zingsang khat peuh phalvaak tung pan laitak
Khat khat in hong sampak leh
Hong kepsak talen i piak kik laitak
"Pha hi," nang hong ci na diam?
verse3:
Hong vaikhakna bangin i hih zo leh
I siamna zah siit kei leeng
I lungsim kisuanna a om kei leh
Nopna pha i ngah ding hi
verse4:
A ngak zote in thupha ngah ding hi
Vantung khua ah maang khawm ding
Sunkim zankim A hong pai kha ding hi
I ngak laitak hong tuak diam?
chorus:
Ute naute, i kiging ciat zo hiam?
I kha inn nuam lut nading
Nangmah leh kei kiging sa’n hong mu diam?
Ngak in, Topa hong pai ding ngak in

verse1:
Zingsang, zingsol a tum ma diak ahi zongin
Khua hong vaak in, ni a suah ciang ahi zong in
Minthanna tawh dim in, Zeisu hong pai mu ding
Amah a umte a khop ciang
verse2:
Sun hun hi ta leh, zankim laitak hi ta leh
Zan khuamial sung ihsip laitak hi ta leh
Pasian khuavaak tawh minthang Zeisu hong pai ding
Amah a umte a khop ciang
verse3:
Vantung mi in, Hosanna ci’n a otna aw
Mun khempeuh ah kiza ding hi, vantung tum ciang
Vantung mi siangthote in a cing ding uh hi
Amah a umte a khop ciang
verse4:
Si lo-in, lungdam in vantung ah i pai ding
Dahna, gentheihna, natnate om nawnlo ding
Pasian tawh meii tung tuangin vantung i pai ding
Bangzah in a nuam diam, i lung
chorus:
Aw, Topa cik ciang hi ding hiam
Ko kiang nong paikik ding
Hong paikik ding, Haleluiah, Haleluiah
Amen, Haleluiah Amen

zoTitle: Vantung Ah Min Hong Sap Laitak
engTitle: When the Roll is Called Up
verse1:
Topa Zeisu hong paikik ciang vantung peengkul aw za aa
Zingtung khuavaak tawntung nuamtak taang ding hi
Kiphelna ngah mihingte in gungal hong kikhop ciangin
Min hong sap laitak keimah zong om ding hi’ng
verse2:
Zingtung meiikai omlo khuavaak Zeisu min tawh si tho aa
Topa tawh nungta kik aa nuam, sung tum hi
Sihna a ngah mihingte in vantung inn ah tum ciangin
Min hong sap laitak keimah zong om ding hi’ng
verse3:
Topa a na hong seemsak aa, zing nitum dong mateng in
Kidopna tawh ama itna gensak ni
Leitung sihna hun hong kheng ding hi, na sepna teng zo in
Min hong sap laitak keimah zong om ding hi’ng
chorus:
Vantung ah min hong sap laitak
Vantung ah min hong sap laitak
Vantung ah min hong sap laitak
Min hong sap laitak keimah zong om ding hi’ng

verse1:
Topa hong pai ding, nung ciangin
Kithawi in hong pai ciang!
Van inn nuam pan in hong pai ding
Kithawi in hong pai ding!
Amah thumaan i Topa hi
A teelsate thupha pia ding
A Pa Kumpi tokhom tu ding
Kithawi in hong pai ciang!
verse2:
Amah leitung hong pai baih ding
Kithawi in hong pai ding!
Gual zawhna ding hun hong tung ding
Kithawi in hong pai ding!
Halleluijah van pan ging ding
Zeisu’n gupkhiatna hong puak ciang
Meivak hoihte’n Topa mu ding!
Kithawi in hong pai ciang!
verse3:
En in, nang leh kei aa ding hi
Kithawi in hong pai ding!
A sawt lo-in peengkul za ding
Kithawi in hong pai ding!
Ei hong sam ding thukhenni ciang
Gam khempeuh pan mun khempeuh ah
A Kumpi tokhom mai ding ding!
Kithawi in hong pai ciang!
chorus:
Mopipa hong pai ciang na kithawi diam?
Mopipa hong pai ciang na kithawi diam?
Zingsang, sun leh zan hi zong
Na meivakte taang pha in,
Mopipa hong pai ciang na kithawi diam?

verse1:
I meivakte baih sa’n om diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
I meivakte taang sa’n om diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
Tua zan ah, tua zan dai ah
I meivak taang pha’n om diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
verse2:
Vaitutna aw i za ding hiam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
Nuamna otna aw i za diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
Tua zan ah, tua zan dai ah
I meivak taang pha’n om diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
verse3:
Hong khen kha ding ahih ciangin
Mopi hong pai ciang
Na kithawi na zekai kei in
Mopi hong pai ciang
Tua zan ah, tua zan dai ah
I meivak taang pha’n om diam?
Mopi hong pai ciang
chorus:
A baih sa’n om, a baih sa’n om
A baih sa’n om, Mopi hong pai ciang

zoTitle: Zeisu Leitungah Hong Kum Kik Ding
verse1:
Zeisu leitungah hong kumkik ding
Tuni hikha leh maw
Itna tawh hong uk ding hong pai ding
Tuni hikha leh maw
Kikhenna om leitung teng aa
A tatsa a siantho saksa
Hong la ding Ama lawm teelsa
Tuni hikha leh maw
verse2:
Dawi mangpa’ ukte bei ta ding hi
Tuni hi ta leh maw!
Dahna, khuisiatna bei ta ding hi
Tuni hi ta leh maw?
Misite khazih sung tho ding
Van kim lai ah Amah dawn ding
Cik ciang hihte eite’n mu ding
Tuni hi ta leh maw
verse3:
Lungkip thumaan in hong mutam maw
Tuni in hong pai leh
Lau lo kipaak in hong mutam maw
Tuni in hong pai leh
Hong pai ding lim tam semsem ta
Zing khuavaak ding mual kiseem ta
Vil giugiau un, a hun nai ta
Tuni hong hi kha leh
chorus:
Nuam si’ng! nuam si’ng!
Hong lungdamsak ding hi
Nuam si'ng! nuam si'ng!
Amah Kumpi ding hi
Nuam si’ng! nuam si’ng!
Lampi puah mengmeng ni
Nuam si’ng! nuam si’ng!
Zeisu hong pai ding hi

zoTitle: Ngai Un! Tul Sawm Gawsem Leh Aw Ging
engTitle: Hark! Ten Thousand Harps and Voices (Tune: Harwell)
verse1:
Ngai un! tul sawm gawsem leh aw
Van pan phatna aw ging
Zeisu’n uk, vantung a lungdam hi
Zeisu’n uk, itna Pasian
Itna gal ah Tokhom tung tu
Zeisu bekin leitung uk
Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Amen
verse2:
Min thang Kumpi tawntung uk hi
Sia ngeilo Kumpi lukhu
Tua itna sutat zo omlo
Nang aa ding aa Na bawlsa
Na hehpihna kigal muh
Pai ding Na Mai kiang tun dong
Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Amen
verse3:
Gumpa hong zekai lua kei in
Na minthan’ ni tungsak in
A lamdang thu sitna hun ciang
Leitung, vantung a bei ding hi
Tua ciang kham gawsemtum in
Thang hen (thang hen, ka Kumpi!)
Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Haleluiah! Amen

zoTitle: Gam Minthang Hong Piang Ding Hi
verse1:
Vantung ah gam a minthang bel eite aa ding in om hi
Kum sim in mi siangthote kikhawm uh hi
Gam minthang tawh kinai theih nading in, ni in hong kheng hi
Gam minthang piang ding hun hong tungdek tak hi
verse2:
Topa bawlsa vantung a gam minthang phual lung ngaihna in
Hong gum Topa hong pai ding hun i ngak hi
I thaang awkna hih leitung kol tanna sungah hong phel hi
Gam minthang piang ding hun hong tungdek tak hi
verse3:
Sawtvei i ngak ciangin hih leitungah lungkhamna tam hi
Meii kai manin mihing lungsim kisia hi
Gam minthanna thu gen inla, lapha sa in hansuah ni
Gam minthang piang ding hun hong tungdek tak hi
verse4:
Topa bawlsa vantung gam hong tun ciang i Topa mu ding
Hong pai manin vantung gam i mu ding hi
Hallelujah A si tawh hong gum i Topa minthang hen,
Gam minthang piang ding hun hong tungdek tak hi
chorus:
Gam minthang hong piang a hun tungdek ta hi
Gam minthang hong piang a hun tungdek ta hi
Kisa kholin ka kha aw, sawtlo peengkul tum ding hi
Kumpipa minthang tawh hong pai ding hi

verse1:
La sa un, "Zeisu in hong pai ding" ci
A si tawh a gup mihing ta dingin
Hong kum aa hong uk ding Amin thang hi
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
verse2:
Zeisu hong pai ciang misi a tho ding
I it i ngaih i lawmte kimu ding
Vantungah ei hong paipih nading in
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
verse3:
Zeisu hong pai ding a mi siangthote
Leitung lungdamna nuam piasuk ding hi
Bei ding hi, lungkhamna sinkhamnate
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
verse4:
Zeisu hong pai ding thuciamna om hi
A teelsa mihingte lato dingin
Ngak in, lawp in, a kisa in om in
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
chorus:
Zeisu hong pai ding, hong paikik ding hi
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
Lungdam in, lapha sa un nuam ding hi
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi

zoTitle: En un, Mopipa Hong Tung Zo
verse1:
En un, Mopipa zankim laitak in
hong tungzo hi
A kiging khol meivak mit ngeilo te’n
Thupha ngah ding hi
Topa hong paikik ciang aa
A muh mihai naseem pa’n
Meivak vaaklo meitui
Thun lo aa tawntung lusu hi
verse2:
Na kilim ginkholh kei leh na ihsip
Paisuak kha ding
Sihna hun sungah lutin kham lukhu
Na taan kha ding
Hoih takin kiging khol in
A hun ding ngak tawntung ding
Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho
Topa kote Nong huh den ding
verse3:
Tua ni a lauhuai ni theih kholh lohin
Hong tung ding hi
Meivak vaak in na meivak tui a dim takin thun in
Zingsang nitaak sunkim 
Zankim a hun ding kithei lo
Zipipa hong tung zo 
A dawn ding kuankhin un ci ding

zoTitle: Pasian’ Kha Siangtho Hong Kum Suk In La
engTitle: Spirit of God, Descend Upon My Heart (Tune: Ingleside)
verse1:
Pasian’ Kha Siangtho, hong kumsuk inla
Ka lungsim siang semsem ding hong heii in
Ka zawn’ khalna hong hehpihsuk inla
Nang kong it ding bangin hong itsak in
verse2:
Kong it ding Nong deih, ka To Pasian in
Pilna, thatang, kha, lungsim khempeuh tawh
Nangma singlamteh hong beel theisak in
Nang mai hong zongin hong muzosak aw
verse3:
Nong nai tawntungna kei hong phawksak in
Lungsim sung lem lohna, lungmuan’ lahna
Nial nopna lungsimte hong zosak in
Hong ngak zosak un thunget ngah lohna
verse4:
Van mite bang Nang kong it theih na’ng in
Ka pumpi’n itna siang hong zensak in
Na Kha Siangtho sung kei hong phumta in
Nang itna ka sung mei bang lumsak in

verse1:
Kha Siangtho meivakna tawh
Keima lungsim sung taang aw
Khuamialna na hawlkhia in
Khuamialna khua vaaksak in
verse2:
Kha Siangtho vangliatna tawh
Kei lungsim na sawpsiang aw
Khialhna in a sawt veipi
Ka lungsung ah ukzo hi
verse3:
Kha Siangtho lungdamna tawh
Ka lungsim sung nuamsak aw
Gimna khempeuh hawlkhia in
Dahna lungsim damsak in
verse4:
Kha Siangtho a dik mi aw
Ka lungsim sungah om aw
Milim khempeuh susia in
Nangmah guakbek na maang in

verse1:
Lungdam thu zeelsak un, mi omna citeng ah
Mihing lungsim omna, mihing gal tamna ah
Tapidaw leii khempeuh
lungdam thu gensak un
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
verse2:
Zan hun saupi bei ta, zing khua hong vaakzo ta
Lungsim vangikpi teng, hehna huging veng ta
Nitaang khammual panin
Hong suah khiattak ciangin
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
verse3:
A kha suang zatui tawh, kumpite’ To hatpa’n
Thongkia kha khempeuh tung hong puak, hotkhiat kicing
Thongpi hawm sung tengah
Zawhna lapi hong ging
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
verse4:
Gen zawh loh itna siang! ka leii in bang ci in
Gen zawh loh hehpihna, mi vakvai tung gen ding
Amah leh A meel taang
Sungah ka om theih na’ng
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
chorus:
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!
Vantung Kha Siangtho pen
Pa’n piak ding hong ciam pen
Lungdam thu zeelsak un
Mi omna citeng ah
Huhpa hong paikhin ta!

engTitle: Holy Spirit, Faithful Guide (Tune: Faithful Guide)
verse1:
Thumaan lamhilh Kha Siangtho
Tapidawte nusia lo
Vantung gam zuan zin mite
A khut tawh hong len gige
A gimte tawntung pha tuam
A zaak ciang Ama aw nuam
"Vantung innpi lam zong mi
Hong zui in, Kong kha ding hi"
verse2:
Hong ompih den Lawm pha pen
Ko guak hong zawttawm sak ke’n
Khuamial, lungman’, launa sung’
Nangmah’n hong ompih tawntung
Huihpi nasia mahmah in
Lungkia laitak hong ci in
"Vantung innpi a zuan mi
Hong zui in, Kong kha ding hi"
verse3:
Nasepna hun bei ta aa
Vantung tun ding bek om ta
Kei min zong a om buang tam
Zeisu si bek ka paulam
Sihna gun ka ngah laitak
Hong ci lai, siangtak, teltak
"Vantung innpi a zuan mi
Hong zui in, Kong kha ding hi"

engTitle: Breathe on Me, Breath of God (Tune: Trentham)
verse1:
Pasian nunna hong pia’n
Hinna thak hong dim in
Nang deih bang hong deihsak thei in
Nang bawl bang bawl dingin
verse2:
Pasian nunna hong pia’n
Lungsim siang ka neih dong
Nang tawh sinkhat lungkhat suah dong
Bawl khawm, thuak khawm dingin
verse3:
Pasian nunna hong pia’n,
Nang' mi ka hih khit dong
Leitung na khat ahi kei sung
Na thu mei bang kuang hen
verse4:
Pasian nunna hong pia’n
Si ngei nawnlo dingin
Nang tawh hong nungta khawm sak in
Hin’ tawntungna gam ah, Amen

zoTitle: Vakhu Bangin Kha Siangtho Hong Pai In
engTitle: Come, Holy Spirit, Heavenly Dove (Tune: St. Agnes)
verse1:
Kha Siangtho vakhu bangin ah
Hong pai in vanglian tawh
Na itna mei bang hong tawh in
A dai ko lungsung ah
verse2:
Kote lasak ngei bangin ah
Tho to in sa zolo
Hawsiana ci’n ko aw ginglo
Kote biakna si ta
verse3:
Topa tua bang ko si ding lo
Hehpih huai mahmah in
Ka hong itna uh a neu hang
Nang hong itna lian zaw
verse4:
Kha Siangtho vakhu bangin ah
Hong pai in vanglian tawh
Gumpa itna hong buak inla
Tawh kuangsak in ko mei, Amen

verse1:
Kha Siangtho a migi kha
Nong hilh ding ka deih pen uh
Pentekoh ni aa Nong piak
Vantung ki itna
verse2:
Ki itna in lung duaisak
Ki itna in niamkhiat sak
Ki itna in si ngamsak
Vantung ki itna
verse3:
Gen kholhna thute khempeuh
Khuavaak bangin mangthang ding
Ki itna thu bek kip ding
Vantung ki itna

verse1:
Kumpipa, hong makai in
Kuan ding ni hong tung zo
Tu aa kipan gal sungah
Nang’ buk ko’ inn hizo
Kigin’ sung nong hehpih na’n
Kote hong hatsak zo
Hing tawntung Kumpipa aw
Gal do la ko sazo
verse2:
Kumpipa’n hong masuan in
Mawhna gal bei mateng
Gal kilemna nuam om aa
Siangtho thukim mateng
Thau, tei leh nam, khuang ging tawh,
Pasian gam piang hikei
Ki it ki hehpihna tawh
Pasian gam hong tung thei
verse3:
Kumpipa’n hong kuanpih in
Laulo kong zui uh hi
Na mai kimuhna peuhah
Lungdamna khuavaak hi
Na singlamteh ko tungah
Lam pai na’ng hong taang in
Gal zawh lukhu’n hong ngak hi
Pasian aw hong pi in

verse1:
Khazih galkapte’n ah, gal sim ding kuan un
Eite mai a masa, Zeisu mitsuan un
Khazih eite Mangpa, makai hilo maw
En un, A’ dial paina, gal phual lam manawh!
verse2:
Zeisu’ min a zak ciang Dawi mite tai uh
Nawt un, tua a hih ciang, na mualsuah dong uh
Phatna aw kizak ciang, Dawi gam kiliing hi
Lawmte, tua ahih ciang, Awngun phatna pi
verse3:
Galkap honpi bangin, Pawlpi’n masot hi
Tang mi siangte bangin i totna khat hi
Eite kikhen lo-in pumkhat bek i hi
Lawp leh zuih kikhat in hong ki it sak hi
verse4:
Kumpi'za sia thei hi, kumpi gam kip kei
Hih hang Zeisu’ Pawlpi cikmah’n sia theikei
Dawi in Pasian’ Pawlpi cik ciang zo ngeikei
Khazih hong ciamsa hi, A ciam peel ngeikei
verse5:
Tua hi aa hong pawm un mi khempeuh inah
Ko tawh hong sakhawm un gal zawh nuamna la
A minthang pahtawi un leitung vantung ah
Tatsat lo-in phat un Khazih Kumpipa
chorus:
Zeisu galkapte’n ah, gal kap ding kuan un
Singlamteh pua unla, na mailam nawt un

engTitle: The Lord Bless You and Keep You
verse1:
Topa’n thupha hong pia hen
Topa’n nangmah hong en in hong keem hen
Lung nopna zong hong guan ta hen, Topa’n
A mai nang tung hong taansuk hen
Hong hehpih hen, hong hehpih hen, hehpih hen
Topa'n hong hehpih, hong hehpih ta hen
Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen, A...men

Tho in, tho in, Topa’n hong sam in om hi
Ei ding in, um in, um in Ama thute
Pai in, pai in, gen in Jubili kum pawipi la in
Khazih Topa hong itna thu a pha
verse2:
Ko in, ko in, sihna pan hong taang a theilo
Mite hong tung tuipi hong galkah hi
Zeelkhin gawp hen, leitung khempeuh na pai inla
Hih omna tengah kial aa zawng mite omna
verse3:
Pasian in nungta a tawi banga Na hong
Gup nading mi mang mualtung khumial sungah
Topa gupna na khut kha in tua mi kiangah
Mi mawh hong paipih in Topa Na inn sungah
verse4:
En in, en in, thuciam ni hong nai zota hi
Hong gum Topa a lian bel Kumpipa
Na khempeuh a zo khin aa niamlak khin ding hi
A lian bel, "Haleluiah," ci’n kiko ding hi
chorus:
Sa in, sa in a la hong taang ta hi
Lamhilh zingsol i tungah paipai un
I mailam ah, lam hong hilh, hong hilh
Hong gum Topa A min,
A minthang kiza tawntung henla
"Hawsiana, Hawsiana" kiko tawntung ni
A galkap mite'n ngai un
Zeisu Topa bek thei ni
"Haleluiah" kiko ni paina tengah

zoTitle: Topa Na Gam Ka It Hi
engTitle: I Love Thy Kingdom, Lord (Tune: St. Thomas)
verse1:
Topa Na gam it ing
Gamlapi aa Na inn
Thupha a piaksa a Pawlpi
Ama si tawh leizo
verse2:
Na Pawlpi ka it hi
Na ding, a kulhpi mai
Hawm thawhna leh ana mit tawh
En in, khut tawh hong len
verse3:
Pawlpi ka it manin
Luangsak luankhi tui bang
Keem in, cing in, A na seem ning
Leitung bei ni mateng
verse4:
Ka lungdam theih zahin
Vantung ka tun ciangin
Amah tawh nekhawm nuamsa in
Hong itna ka phat ding
verse5:
Na thumaanna bangin
Zion mual ah na sang ding
Leitung minthan nate bei in
Nuam zaw vantung thupha

verse1:
Ni khat, Ama min phatna van dim napi’n
Leitung ah mawhna zan bang mial manin
Nungak sung suak in Zeisu hong paisuk in
Mi lak hong teeng hi, lampha lak dingin
verse2:
Ni khat, Kalani mual kahto sak uh aa
Sing tung kilhcip uh khailum dingin ah
Mawhna teng pua in, simmawh, bawlsiat, huatna
Nakpi thuaksak uh hi, kei hong tan Pa
verse3:
Ni khat, huan sungah Amah kinusia aa
Ni khat, thuakna tawh pengin tawlnga aa
Vantung mite in A han hong cingsuk aa
Lametna bei te muan kei hong honpa
verse4:
Ni khat Amah han in siin zo nawnlo aa
Han kongvang khakna suangpi tukkhia aa
Sihna zogawp in sihna pan thokik aa
Tu’n vantung kah zo, tawntung kei' Topa
verse5:
Ni khat Amah peengkul in hong masuan ding
Ama vanglian vantung pan hong taang ding
Ka it ka ngaihte Amah’n hong tonpih ding
Angtan huai hi, tua Zeisu kei aa ding
chorus:
Nungta in hong it, si in hong hon hi
Kivui in ka mawhna a puakhia hi
Thokik in hong diksak, khawnkhong tawntung hi
Lungdam huai bel hi, hong paikik ding ni!

engTitle: I Know Whom I Have Believed
verse1:
Pasian’ hong hehpihna thupha
Kei kiang hong tun theihna
Ka kilawm lohpi hong deihna
Bang hang hiam theizo ke’ng
verse2:
Hong honkhia zo thei hih upna
Kei tung a hong piakna
A thu um leeng lungnop theihna
Bangci bang hiam thei ke’ng
verse3:
Kha Siangtho in mi lungsim hei
Mawhna hong phawksak thei
Zeisu hong musak, umsak thei
Bangci bang hiam thei ke’ng
verse4:
Topa mai ke’n ka muh ma in
A pha a sia tuah ding
Gentheih nading, nopsak nading
Bang ka sunsiah thei ke’ng
chorus:
Ahih hang ka Uppa ka thei hi
Amah muan huai hi, ke'n ka theizo hi
Ama tung ka piaksate zong
Keem zo ding hi tua ni dong

engTitle: Faith of Our fathers! Living Still
verse1:
Tanglai pate’ upna hing lai
Mei sung, humpi kua sung khiat thuak
Tuazah upna lian i zaak ciang
Aw bangzah in i lungdam hiam?
Pate’ upna, upna siangtho!
Ei zong sih dong i thuak ngam ding
verse2:
Tanglai pate’n kol bulh thuak in,
Thong sung khuamial mun ah kikoih
Hih hang lungsim siangtak tawh om
Tua bang mi’ tapa i sun ding!
Pate’ upna, upna siangtho!
Ei zong sih dong i thuak ngam ding
verse3:
Upna i cih pate’ up bang
Tual leh gal kidona sungah
Bang hangin teltak theihna tawh
Gitna itna kammal tawh lak
Pate’ upna, upna siangtho!
Ei zong sih dong i thuak ngam ding

engTitle: Glorious Things of Thee Are Spoken (Tune: Austrian Hymn)
verse1:
Zion khua kongpi suak dingin
Lai Siangtho a genzo hi
Ciampel ngeilo i Topa in
A om nading hong bawl hi
A kip tawntung suang om tung ta
A kiliing zo kei ding hi
Gup nading thu tawh om khawm
A galet in kilawm thei hi
verse2:
A hong it tawntungna panin
A hong luang hin’na luitui
Khua tanu leh tapate in
Dawn uh aa, lungdam uh hi
Tua bang luitui om ngei hi leh
Kuamah thakiam lo ding hi
Thupha hong pia Pasian bangin
Khang khat pan khang khat kip hi
verse3:
Tua khuapi laibu sung panin
Keima min a kikhum leh
Lawki te’n hong ko hangin ah
Ki sathei in om ning kei
Mawhna tawh nuam a omte in
Kisak theih na mang ding hi
A manpha bel nopsakna in
Tua khua bekah om ding hi

engTitle: How Pleased and Blest Was I (Crusaders Melody)
verse1:
Bangzah in ka lung nop
Mi honpi’ aw ka za
Tuni in Topa va zong ni
Lungnop takin om ni
Zion mualah pai ni
Kiciam in Topa min phat ni
verse2:
Zion mualah nopna
Hehpihna tawh kidim
A muan huai kulhpi tawh ki uum
Tua mun va beel ciat ni
Ama min phat ding leh lung damna
La ngai ding pai ni
verse3:
Tua ah Davuih Topa’n
A kumpi tokhom koih
Hehpihna tawh thumaan khen ding
Mi siangthote phat ding
Mawhneite dahsak ding
Kiniam khiat in lungdam tek un
verse4:
Lungnopna hong tung hen
Lungdam na’n hong zui hen
Mi khempeuh in thupha ngah in
Topa nopna saang hen
A pha deihna khangin
Gen zawh loh thupha hong tung hen

verse1:
Phat dingin kong pai hi
Na Biakinn siangah
Hehpih hong pia Topa
Na kiang hong kha in
Na tokhom kiang tung ding
Ka kilawm kei hi
Kong biakna thupha hang'
Na min thang ta hen
verse2:
Kiletsakna lungsim
Kiphasak lo in
Na minthang pahtawi ding
Nang kiangah kong pai
Khazih lungsim pha leh
Lung neemna tak tawh
Na min thanna muangin
Na min kong phat hi
verse3:
Kha Siangtho hong ompih
Na'ng in kong thuum hi
Ka kisapna khempeuh
Na kiangah kong ap
Kong biaknate sangin
Na min than nading
Na thupha ka theih na’ng
Lungsim hong guan in
verse4:
Phat dingin kong pai
Na Biakinn siangah
Hehpih hong pia Topa
Na kiang hong kha in
Kong thuciamna khempeuh
A thakin bawlin
Nasep lian sep nading
Kote hong sawl in.

engTitle: In Christ There Is No East or West (Tune: St. Peter)
verse1:
Khazih sungah, kikhen lo hi
Nisuah, nitum, sak, khang
Leitung khempeuh kua mi kua mi
Lawmkhat pawlkhat hi hang
verse2:
Khazih sungah, lungsim maante’n
Pawl ngah kawikawi ding hi
Ama nasepna, mi teng hen khawm
kham khauzang bang hi
verse3:
Khut kilen ni up kikhat teng
U leh nau bang hi hang
Bang nam hi leeng, Pa’ naseem teng
Behkhat phungkhat hi hang
verse4:
Khazih sungah, i kimat hi
Sak mi, khang mi, pam mi
Khazih lungsim bang a nei mi
Khempeuh pumkhat suak hi

verse1:
Pawlpite a bul in ah i Topa Zeisu hi
A si leh a thu in ah Pawlpi hong bawl zo hi
A si siangtho piang dingin vantung pan hong kum hi
Hong bua a si’n hong lei aa, hin nading a hong si
verse2:
Mi lak pan hong teel khia aa pumkhat hong bangsak hi
Pasian thu tawh hong suaksuk Amah khat bek om hi
Zeisu a min siangtho in Tua min bek a phat hi
Muanna lametna khat bek phat na’ng a hahkat hi
verse3:
Pawlpi sung kilem lohna thusia a om ciangin
Lawkite’n hong ko ding aa hong simmawh hangin ah
Mi siangtho hong cing lai in"Sawtpi lo ding," a ci
Zan in hong kheng, khuavak ciang nopna hong tung ding hi
verse4:
Hong bawlsia thei galkapte Pawlpite’n a do leh
Bei ngeilo nop saknapi a ngah ding uh hi ve
A pha bel mahmah nate a muh uh ciangin ah
Lungdamna a lianpite a ngah ding uh in pha

engTitle: Be Ye Strong in the Lord
verse1:
Topa leh A vangliatna sungah thahat un!
Ama thumaan sungah kiptak ding un
Gal kidona sungah Amah’n lam hong kai ding
Topa min tawh nang na gualzo ding hi
verse2:
Topa leh A vangliatna sungah thahat un!
Galte mai panin kihei ngeikei un
Thumaan galsim laitak Amah na kiang ding ding
Ama vangliatna sungah mainawt un!
verse3:
Topa leh A vangliatna sungah thahat un!
Ama thumaan nate pel ngeilo ding
Thumaan galsim laitak na taklam khut len ding
Amah muang in, na gualzo tawntung ding
chorus:
Thumaan in kiptak ding
Kumpipa thupiakna tawh zawh dong
Topa minthan nading leh
Ama thu gualzawh nading
Topa thahatna sung kiptak ding

verse1:
Lai Siangtho, Pasian thu bu
Ka neih manpha pen na hi
Koi pan ka piang hong gen ding
Bang ka hi hiam, hong hilh ding
verse2:
Lam ka pial ciang, hong tai ding
Honpa’ itna honglak ding
Lam hong hilh ding hong cing ding
Hong thuhilh ding, hong phat ding
verse3:
Hih leitung gam simtham ah
Hong hehneem ding, dahna ah
Hong hilh hi nei leeng upna
Mi in zong zo thei, sihna
verse4:
Nong hilh hi nopna ngah na’ng
Lang pan’ mi mawhte thuak na’ng
Ka neih manpha pen na hi
A siangtho Lai Siangtho bu

zoTitle: Van In Na Min Than’na Pulaak
engTitle: The Heavens Declare Thy Glory (Tune: Uxbridge)
verse1:
Van in na minthanna pulaak
Aksi tengah Na pilna taang
Na kammalte mit tawh et ciang
Na min a telzaw in kimu
verse2:
A kihei Ni, kilaih khuavaak
Sun leh zan hun, Na vaang bawlsa
Gen zawh loh Na hehpihna thu’n
Na dikna, hehpihna langhsak
verse3:
Thumaan thutak Ni hongsuak hi
Leitung miallak van khuavaak pia’n
Lungdamna thu’n mite pilsak
Na thu tangin, Na thukhen maan
verse4:
Na lamdanna hi pan mu ung
Khate thak suah, mawhna maisak
Topa, ka mawhna silsak inla
Vantung tun dong Na thu’n
Hong keem in, Amen

zoTitle: Lai Siangtho Beel In Ka Nau Aw
engTitle: Cling to the Bible, My Boy
verse1:
Hankhuk lam aa khualzin aa na paipai lai in
Kong deihsak khat om, nasep ding tawh kisai in
Tua thu kong genlai in limtak na ngai in
"Lai Siangtho beel in ka nau aw"
verse2:
Kamsiatna, dahna, kahna, thuakkha ta lecin
Satan tawh kum tampi kido do ta lecin
Limtak thu zui in, lau ke’n, mainawt tawntung in
"Lai Siangtho beel in ka nau aw"
verse3:
Na sim sialin thuthak khat thei khia den ni teh
Sing tung aa Zeisu’n hong sih lawhna thu hi veh
Topa leh vantung leh nangma tung thumaan ve
"Lai Siangtho beel in ka nau aw"
verse4:
Tua Laibu khuavaak leh upna sikkawipi hi
Zan khuamial aa, lam honglak khuavaak aksi hi
Hong sawlna bang mang leci’n, na maan den ding hi
"Lai Siangtho beel in ka nau aw"
chorus:
Lai Siangtho beel in, ka nau aw
Lai Siangtho beel in, ka nau aw
Hin’ hun leh sih hun in, na dang teng sangin
Lai Siangtho beel in ka nau aw

verse1:
Kei hong sakkik leuleu dih in
Lamdang nuntakna thu
A hoihna hong lak lailai in
Lamdang nuntakna thu
Nuntakna thupha hi
Gamtat na’ng hong hilh hi
verse2:
Zeisu’n mi khempeuh hong lui hi
Lamdang nuntakna thu
Hong sam hi, ngai un, mawhnei mi
Lamdang nuntakna thu
Hong piakhong hih thugol
Vantung khua lam hong zol
verse3:
Lungdamna thu na gensawn in
Lamdang nuntakna thu
Mawh phel, lungnopna, mi ko in
Lamdang nuntakna thu
Zeisu bek hong hon thei
Tawntung siangtho sakthei
chorus:
Thu hoih mahmah, thupha mahmah
Nuntakna thu mahmah
Thu hoih mahmah, thupha mahmah
Nuntakna thu mahmah

zoTitle: Leitung Aading Lai Siangtho Bu Kihong
engTitle: An Open Bible For The world
verse1:
Leitung aa ding Lai Siangtho Bu
Hih pen zuih kim, cih kim hi hen!
Huihkhi laan’ ciang, tua dial kipeei
Manpha thupha kizeel thaang hen!
verse2:
A tunna peuh kham khuavaak hi
Kiliah zolo nitaang bang hi
Meii bang liahte tui mang ding hi
Mawhna sepna a phel ding hi
verse3:
Pa’ mai tangah mi teng puak aa
Mawh maisak itna tawh taang hi
Adam khang pan a mangthang sa
Hehpihna thu van pan thang hi
verse4:
Lunggimte a tawl damsak hi
Khitui luangte a hehneem hi
Thakiam lungvaite tha a guan hi
Nuntaak tawntungna silhsak hi
chorus:
Pasian kammal, leitung, tuitung mun khempeuh ah
Khualmial sung aa vaakthaap mite
Pasian vantung hong tun’ Thu Bu

verse1:
Ci damin nipi khat sung
Pasian in hong keem lai aa
Tuni in Ama inn sung
Thupha saang ding i ngak ta
Ni sagih sung nuam bel hi
Vantung tawl damna lim hi
Ni sagih sung nuam bel hi
Vantung tawl damna lim hi
verse2:
Mawh phelna ding hehpihna
Hong tanpa’ min in kong ngen
Hong musak in Na maipha
Mawhna zumna beita hen
Tuni lung khamna bei in
Nang sung hong tawldam sak in
Tuni lung khamna bei in
Nang sung hong tawldam sak in
verse3:
Na min kong phat laitak un
Nong naina hong phawksak in
Na mai kong kilak lai un
Na vanglian hong musak in
Ko ngah ding vantung nuamna
Hong ciam kholsak in, Topa
Ko ngah ding vantung nuam na
Hong ciam kholsak in, Topa
verse4:
Nangma lungdamna thu in
Misia puah, mipha hehneem
Na thupha’n ta tam tawi in
Siatna khempeuh a pha’n lem
Tua bang piang hen, Nipi teng
Vantung Pawlpi tun mateng
Tua bang piang hen, Nipi teng
Vantung Pawlpi tun mateng

engTitle: O Day of Rest and Gladness (Tune: Mendness)
verse1:
Tawl damna leh lungdam ni
Khuavaakna, nuamna ni
Lungkhamna dahna damsak
A vaak a hoih pen ni
Tanglai a kipan tuni
A lian a neu kituak
"Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho," ci’n
Thum gawm Pasian phat ni
verse2:
No khempeuh a pian cilin
Khuavaak suak hi, tuni’n
Eite hong honkhia Zeisu
Hong hin’ kik ni, tuni
Gal zo i Topa’n tuni
Hong puak ni, kha Siangtho
Tua hi aa hih Nipi ni
Thupha namthum ngah ni
verse3:
Tuni in mi namkim tung
Vantung khomun hong tung
Mi siangtho kikhopna ah
Lungdamna thu kihilh
A gim a tawlte kisil
Tawldamna lui sungah
Lungdamna thupha a vaang
Mi siangte mai ah taang
verse4:
Vantung gam mi siangte bang
Hehpihna a dangdang
Tawldam ni Nipi ni pan
A thuapthuap i ngah hi
Tuni’n phatna kiza hi
Pawlpi mite kam pan
Phat un thum gawm a siangtho
Pa, Ta leh Kha Siangtho

verse1:
Nipi Topa na inn sungah
Kiciam in Nang tung kong kipia
Kote hong biakna hong saang in
Gamdai takin Nang kong phat uh
verse2:
Nong piak Nipi ni ka it uh
Tuasang ni thupi zaw omlo
Nasep nusia in hong bia ung
Nangmah phatnopna lungsim tawh
verse3:
Lungkham, sinkham om nawn lo-in
Mawhna gimna om nawn lo-in
Thumna, tauna om nawn lo-in
Na min phat ding thadah lo-in
verse4:
I lamet ni hong tung zo ta
Khuavaakpi in ei hong taan’ zo
Leitung haksa nusia ta ni
Tawldam na’ng ihmu phot dih ni

engTitle: Here, Savior, We Would Come (Tune: Trentham)
verse1:
Topa kiang kong pai ding
Na teelsa lampi ah
Nong sawlna bangbang mang dingin
Kong ciam uh hi, Nang kiang
verse2:
Kote thupha hong pia’n
Nang kiang kong tun' na'ng un
Ka ni bang un tha hong pia in
Tha hatna hong guan in

zoTitle: Luangdam Huai Hi, Nang Kong Teel Ni
verse1:
Lungdam huai hi, Nang kong teel ni
Keimah hong hon ka Pasian aw
Keima lungdamna a lianpi
Mi tung gen lo omthei ding maw
verse2:
Nasep pi bel kikhin zo hi
Kei Topa aa ka hizo ta
Hong kaih na na, ke'n ka zui hi
Ama' thu gen leng nuam ka sa
verse3:
Ka lungsim aw, lungka nawn ken
Hih thupha ah kiptak khawl ta’n
Topa kiang pa’n lungleeng nawn ke’n
A pha khempeuh nei hi, Amah’n
verse4:
Lunggsim takpi tawh ka ciamsa
Nisim in ka ciam phapha ding
Lungdam huai bel hih kiciamna
Ka sih ciangin thupha pia ning
chorus:
Ka nuam hi, ka nuam hi
Zeisu’n ka mawh hong phelzo hi
Thungetna zia a hong hilh hi
Nisim in hong lungdam sak hi
Ka nuam hi, ka nuam hi
Zeisun’n ka mawh hong phelzo hi

engTitle: O God, Thy Summons Still Is Heard (Tune: Serenity)
verse1:
Galilee tui gei aa Na thu hilhna kiza lai hi
Mi tampi in, Topa hong zuan
"Hong zui un," na cih ciang
verse2:
Mihing lungsim tuni’n saang in
Nang sapna a donte
Amau upna bangbang saang in
Kisuanna beisak in
verse3:
Tuni’n damna tui hong luan' in
Gupkhiatna limlah na’n
Lungsim mawhna teng suakta sak
Na thu tawh sawpsiang in.
verse4:
Mi khempeuh Na mipha suak hen
Leitung bei hun dongin
Nang tawh kizopna kip ta hen
Na min kong phat uh hi. Amen.

engTitle: Down to the Sacred Wave (Tune: State Street)
verse1:
Kha Siangtho hong luangsuk
Topa' nuntakna puak
Amah zuante’n Kha suahtaak ngah
Zawdan ah a lu nga
verse2:
Lungsim tak tawh i zui
Topa totna lam teng
Makai Pa tat bang i ta nuam
Minthang Pasian Tuuno
verse3:
Nang tung, Nang tungbek mah
Muang in, um in, lam en
Aw, mawhna Na silsiang zo hi
Mi mah aa ding Na si
verse4:
Nong kipiakna ka muang
Na singlamteh ka delh
Aw, mawh in ko silai ding maw?
Tho in Nangsung hing nung, Amen

engTitle: Break Thou the Bread of Life (Tune: Bread of Life)
verse1:
Nuntaakna khomun kei hong pia’n, Topa
Galilee tuili gei Na hih bangmah
Ka lungsim vahzo kei, Lai simna tawh
Nangmah tak ka lungdeih, hinna Thu aw
verse2:
Thumaan, thutak hong pia’n, ka Topa aw
Khomun Na piak bang zia’n, Na thupha tawh
Tua hi leh kol teng kia’n, ka suakta ding
Thumaan in hong khahkhia’n, ka lung nuam ding
verse3:
Kei aa ding, Topa, Nang nuntaak' khomun
Keimah ka suahtaak na’ng, Nangma Thu guun
Nang tawh vantung luah na’ng, Nong vaak ding hi
Hong itsak in thumaan, itna Na hi
verse4:
Topa aw, Kha Siangtho kei hong puak in
Keima mit khua mulo vaaksak dingin
Na thuthuuk Lai Siangtho hong telsak ding
Na Thu sung pan Nang, ko hong musak ding

zoTitle: Bang Dang Hilo Zeisu' Si Hi
engTitle: Nothing But the Blood of Jesus
verse1:
Bang in ka mawh sawpsiang thei
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si in
Bang in hong damsak kik thei
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si in
verse2:
Ka sianna ding hih ka muh
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
Ka mawhna kiphel na’ng thu
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
verse3:
Mawh maisak bang dang hilo
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
A pha ka bawl hang hilo
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
verse4:
Kei lametna, lungnopna
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
Kei in dikna ka ngahna
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi
chorus:
Manpha hi hong luang si
Vuuk bang hong ngosak si
Tui dang ka theikei hi
Bang dang hilo, Zeisu' si hi

engTitle: I Gave My Life For Thee
verse1:
Nangmah tat khiatna ding
Nunna na ngah nading
Kei nuntaakna kong pia
Ka sipha Kong buakhia
Ke’n Ka nuntaakna Kong piazo
Nang Kei bang nong piazo
verse2:
Khang tawntung aa nuamna
Na ngahtheih na'ng in ah
Gentheihna kum sawtpi
Nang aa ding Kong thuak hi
Nang aa ding kum sawtpi Kong gim
Kei hang bang tan na gim
verse3:
A taang Ka Pa' inn nuam
Ka tokhom vaanglian tuam
Nusia’n leitung Kong thuak
Lungzuan' dahna Kong thuak
Nang hang hih zahta Ke’n nusia
Kei hang bang nang nusia
verse4:
Dawi gam sungpan nangmah
Kong hotkhiat na’ng in ah
Ka thuak gimna pii te
Gen khinzo kei niteh.
(Nang aa ding gen zawhloh Ka thuak
Kei aa ding bang na thuak) x2

verse1:
Nong hehpihna lian hang, kong phat uh hi, Topa
Tua in kote tudong hong keem hi
Na hoihna leh itna lian ka zahtaak uh aa
Nangma sungah, lungsim pia in, kong kun uh hi
verse2:
Na hinna moh, a themvui kiate nangawn zong
A ne ding ka kilawm loh hang un
Nangma hehpihna tawh, kote Nong piak khong
Nangma hoihna suangin, tua an ko ne ung, tu’n
verse3:
Lungsim hong bun in, ka tha uh hong hatpah hen
Hi bang aa ka bawlnate uh tawh
Topa, Nong pai dong, Na sihna honglak hen
Nang tawh maan khawm hun dong
Ko hong thakhauh sak hen aw
chorus:
Nang Nong vaikhaksa mah bangin
Topa tuni’n, Na ankuang kong uumpih uh hi, tu’n
Kote tung aa Nang Nong gen thu phawkin
"Kei nong phawk denna un hih un"

zoTitle: I Topa Hong Itna Lamdang Hi
verse1:
I Topa hong itna lamdang hi
Mawhna, khialhna i neih hang tampi
Lian zawtham lai hong hehpihna si
Kalani mual tungah hong bua hi
verse2:
Mawhna lung kiatna’n tui khang bangin
Ka kha hong sut nuam hong to laitak
Gen zawh loh, lian zaw hehpihna in
Ka belh ding singlamtehpi honglak
verse3:
Kiseel zo nawnkei i mawhna nin
Bang a om diam hong sawpzo lai ding.
En un, hia a luang sisan gunpi’n
Vuuk saang' hong ngo zawsak pah thei ding
verse4:
Lamdang kicing hehpihna lian zaw
A um khempeuh, A hong pia khong hi.
A mai a mu nuamte khempeuh aw
Saang pak ve un hong hehpihna hi
chorus:
Hong hehpihna
I mawhna hong maisak, siangsak hi
Pasian, itna
I mawhna teng sangin lian zaw hi

zoTitle: Zan Kim Ta-A, Olive Mual Tung
engTitle: Tis Midnight; And On Olive’s Brow (Tune: O Live's Brow)
verse1:
Zankim ta aa, Olive mual tung
Aksi taang tu’n mialkiik leuleu
Zankim ta aa, en un, huan sung
Hong honpa kia’n thu ngen ngiu ngeu
verse2:
Zankim ta aa, Hong Honpa in
Amah guak launa tawh kibuan
A it nungzui pa nangawn in
Donlo hi, Topa khitui luan'
verse3:
Zankim ta aa, Mi Gentheipa
Mi dang' mawhna hang sisan kap
Ahih hang, Amah khuukdin aa
Pasian deihna sungah ki aap
verse4:
Zankim ta aa, Pa Pasian in
Mihing Tapa nusia saam lo
Vantung mite in hehneem in
Mihing Honpa in dahna zo

engTitle: From Every Stormy Wind That Blows (Tune: Retreat)
verse1:
Huihpi nakpi'n a nun simin
Dahna tui bang a khan' sim in
Zuat ding tawldam huai
Lung muanhuai mun om
Hehpihna tokhom nuai
verse2:
Eite i lu tungah, Zeisu’n
Lungdam sathau hong nilhna mun
Mun dang teng sang
Nuam pen mun om, hong suah
Sisan baang hehpihna tokhom
verse3:
Khat leh khat lungsim kigawm na
Lawm leh gual tawh kikholh theihna
Kikhen hang pumkhat bang hong suah
Hehpihna tokhom kiim kituah
verse4:
Pumpi' utna leh mawhna te’n
Hong nawngkai sakzo nawnlo den
Vantung in hong dawntuah suk ta
Vaang taang in tua tokhom tuam ta

verse1:
Zingsang tuh ding hi, ki itna khaici tuh in
Sun aa tuh bang zanin zong tuh in a ci
A aat hun ngak inla, a khop hun zong ngak in
Lungdamna tawh buh lomte i khawm ding hi
verse2:
Nisa sungah tuh in, a liap sung zong tuh in
Phalbi leh tuuklai lung man’na omlo pi
Na sepna zawh ciangin kikhop hun hong tung ding
Lungdamna tawh buh lomte i khawm ding hi
verse3:
Kap kawmin pai inla, Topa aa ding tuh in
Kisiatna in a hong dahsak hang a ci
Kahna khit ciangin ah, Topa hong sam ding aa
Lungdamna tawh buh lomte i khawm ding hi
chorus:
Buh lomte khawm in, buh lomte khawm in
Lungdamna tawh buh lomte i khawm ding hi
Buh lomte khawm in, buh lomte khawm in
Lungdamna tawh buh lomte i khawm ding hi

verse1:
Ngai un, gamlak khuamial sungah
Tuucingpa aw, kiza thei hi
Tuu khumna sung pan a pusuak
A mang tuute a samkik hi
verse2:
A mang tuute a zon nading
Tuucingpa kua in huh ding hiam
Khua dam omlo tuu khumna sung
Kua in tuute hong tumsak hiam.
verse3:
Gampa lak ah leh mual tungah
Amau kahna aw hong ngai in
Topa in, nangma kiangah ci
"Keima tuute na zong ding hi"
chorus:
Hong paipih’n, hong paipih’n
Khialhna mun panin hong paipih’n
Hong paipih’n, hong paipih’n
A mangte Zeisu kiang paipih’n

verse1:
Gimna sung pan lamet gamnuam
Cik ciang ka tung ding hiam
Cik ciang galvan ka koih ding hiam
Lailung ka muang ding hiam
verse2:
Sim leitung lailung dam omlo
Lum bang sung omlo tawh
Sim leitung sau nuam a hilo
Gam bang daihna a hi
verse3:
Lim bel siangtho ngah dingin ah
Lam bang na pial ke’n ci
Leeng vansiang nuam ka tun mateng
Nuamna hong pia ding hi
verse4:
Lim bel nen ah khawl zota in
Lamdang ka pial kei ding
Amah bang aa ka pham nung ciang
Leeng vansiang nuam tung ning
chorus:
Zeisu hong tun mateng
Zeisu hong tun mateng
I nasep zawh ciangin
Inn nuam sung om khawm ding

verse1:
Topa hong sapna tu in ngai in
Buh aat dingin hong sam
Buh aat ding tampi in hong ngakzo
Hih hang a aat ding tawm
verse2:
Mawhna khualmial sung om mite kiang
Pai in va khahkhia un
Pai in mawhna kol va sutkhia un
Mawhna hencip mi kiang
verse3:
Lunggim mite lungdamna sungah
Itna tawh vazol un
Amah nuntaak tawntungna khomun
Tua lai ei hong dawn ding
chorus:
Topa minin na mailam nawt un
Itna deihsakna tawh
Ei hong Gupkhiatna thupha letsong
Leitung teng thangsak un

verse1:
Mawhna lo lai aa a hoih buh lom teng
A kaikhawm ding an late a om
Nasepna dingin, thumaan phiaukawi keng
Kuamah khawl lo ding an laakkhit mateng
verse2:
Zawineu zong zui in zong in pha takpi
Lopa a sau hang buh omthei ding hi
Lamlian zong zui inla nusiat nei ke’n
Vantung innpi sung hong tumkhin uh hen
verse3:
Lo teng khempeuh ah an min khin ta hi
Leitung khempeuh in laak ding bek ngak hi
Ahih hang a la ding tawm, laak ding tam
La mengmeng kei leenglah a sia ding tam
verse4:
Tua ahih ciang hong pai un phiaukawi tawh
An pha kaikhawm un, no mihingte aw
An nei Topa hong pai mateng sem un
Tua ciang anlaak pawi ah lungdam khawm un
chorus:
An late kaw’h om, kua hong kuan nuam
Anlaak pawi sungah kua hong lungdam khawm nuam
Kua’n hong khoppih ding buhlom hoih teng
Mawhna lo sung aa a om buhlom teng

verse1:
Lo lai ah nasep ding a om lai ah
Buh at hun zo, naseem dingte tawm pha
Tuni thumaan naseemte a kiangah
Topa sawlna bangin ta un
verse2:
An kholna buhtang tawh na dimsak un
Lungdamna tawh lapha takpi sa un
Niitum aa khua a hong mial mateng in
Pha takpi na seem niloh un
verse3:
Nasepna haksa, ni a sawt hangin
Naseemte in nopna lian a ngah ding
Topa in a teelsa mita dingin
Nopna phabel hong pia ding hi
verse4:
Vangtung khuapi sungah nop pha mahmah
Haksa naseem khempeuh in ngah ding hi
Topa, itna thu in hong tun ciangah
Amau nasep a tawp ding hi
chorus:
Na seeem un, na seem un
Nopna pha na ngaihsun un
Topa in thahatna a hong pia ding hi
Nitum mateng in na seem un

verse1:
Tuni in ah tua gamnuam ke’n ka ngaihsun hi
Nitum ciangin ah ka tung ding hi
Hehpihna tawh Honpa kiang ka din’ ciangin ah
Ka lutung aksi taang a om diam?
verse2:
Topa hatna sungah na seemin thu ngen ding
Ka ngah mi bang kei hong hong hisak in
Minthan' ni’n aksi taang kei aa ding hikha ding
Amah phatna tuihual bang om ciang
verse3:
Ama mai ka et ciang, bangzah in lungdam ding
A khe phungah suangmanpha koih ding
Kham khuapi sungah lungdamna hong khangsak ding
Ka lu tung aksi taang a om diam?
chorus:
Ka lu tung aksi taang, aksi taang a om diam?
Nitaak aa ni a tum ciangin ah
Tawldamna inn sungah
Ka khan lawh ciangin ah
Ka lu tung aksi taang a om diam?

engTitle: Why Do You Wait, Dear Brother?
verse1:
U leh naute’n bang ngak hiam?
Sawtpi bang dinghkhawl lai uh hiam?
A sian'tho sak omna mun pia ding
Topa Zeisu’n hong ngaklai hi
verse2:
Khawllai lecin bang ngah ding
Bang lamen lai uh ahi hiam?
Zeisu longaal hong gumdang om kei
Zeisu lam lo, lam dang om kei
verse3:
Lungsim Kha Siangtho sawlna
Nangmah in theilo na hi hiam?
Bang ding gupna sanglo na hiam?
Mawhna vangik suahlo ding maw?
verse4:
U leh nau te’n bang ngak hiam?
An laak hun in hong kheng ding hi
Gumpa’n thupha nang hong pia nuam hi
Zia nei leeng, sihna gal om hi
chorus:
Bang ding? Bang ding?
Tu in hong pailo hiam?
Bang ding? Bang ding?
Tu in hong pailo na hiam?

zoTitle: Hong Kiu, Hong Kiu, Kua Om Hiam?
verse1:
Hong kiu, hong kiu kua om hiam?
Hong ngak, hong ngak, nang hong ngak
Khual zinpa in midikpa hi
Amah bang na mungei maw
Ka lungsim in lamdang sa hi
Kongkhak honlo ding na hiam?
verse2:
Hong kiu, hong kiu, hiah om lai
Hong ngak, hong ngak, na um hiam
Kongkhak hon ding haksa mahmah
Singkung lopa’n tuamcip aa
Khuamial khaugui in kancip hi
Kiimkot tengah len kip hi
verse3:
Hong kiu, hong kiu, bang om hiam?
Hong ngak, hong ngak, nang hong ngak
A kilhcip khut in hong kiu lai
A Kumpi lukhu nuai pan
A lungneem leh a migit mai
Hong Gum Topa’n hong ngak lai

verse1:
Tuni Zeisu hong sam, "Hong pai in," ci
"Vantung lam theilo mi, Kha hilh ding hi"
verse2:
Tuni Zeisu hong sam, tu in ngai in
Zeisu Topa mai ah, nangmah pai in
verse3:
Tuni Zeisu hong sam, Ama kiangah
Nangmah na tai kei leh, si ding lauhuai
verse4:
Kha Siangtho zong hong sam, Amah nial ke’n
A hong hehpih nuam hi, paikhia sak ke’n

verse1:
Hin' gim a mang mi aw, hong kihei in
Tuucing hoih pa’n hong sam, ngai in, Tuni’
Hong hon ding hong zong, sawpsiang ding hong ngak
Amah sang meng in, uaikai nawn kei in
verse2:
Hong ngaklai hive’n bang hang mangthang ding?
Tuubuuk pan gamla navaak khit hangin
A nuntaakna si tawh hong tan veve
Hong thuak pihna lian genzawh loh lamdang
verse3:
A thupha ngaihsun in, A thu ngai in
Mawh neilo pa’n singtung mawhna puakhia
Mawh maina kician nuntaak tawntungna
A sisan luanna tawh nangmah hong pia
verse4:
Thuman lampi zui in, tangtak pai in
Zeisu sung lut in, nuntakna kongpi
Zeisu in lungneem takin hong sam hi
Pai in lut un, a mangthang nawnlo ding
chorus:
Hong sam hiauhiau hi, hong thum lailai hi
Tuucing hoih pa’n nang hong sam za in
Hong thum nget-ngut hi, hong sam lailai hi
Itna tawh hong sam, "Hong pai in," ci

verse1:
A zaknop huai penpen thu
Thupha khat a om hi
A lamdang thuciamna thu
Kuama theih ngeiloh thu
Dah ta le hang nuam ta leeng
Tua thu um ta kei leeng
"Hong pai un," ci in hong sam
A singlamteh zuan ni
verse2:
Bang hangin hong it lawmpa
Kiang pan na taikhia hiam?
Ama kiang beel mengmeng in
A tawntungin kip in
Huh ding nei loin ka om
Mawhna sungah ka om
Amah ka taisan hangin
Tu in ka zuankiik hi
verse3:
Ama hong sap mah bangin
A kiang nai semsem ning
A aw neukha za peuh leng
Ka kinai semsem ding
Tuipi galkhat mualpang khat
Inn tawh ka gamlat hang
Na khut lenin hong zui ning
"Hong pai in" na cih bang
chorus:
Hong pai un ka kiang, Hong pai un ka kiang
Lungkham vangik puate, Ka kiang hong pai un
Ka kiang hong pai un, Ka kiang hong pai un
Lungkham vangik puate, Ka kiang hong pai un

zoTitle: Hong Honpa Kiangah Hong Pai Meng In
verse1:
Hong Honpa kiangah hong pai meng in
Lai Siangtho ah lam honglah bangin
Eite laizang ah tu ni’n ding in
"Hong pai ve," ci’n hong sam
verse2:
Ngai sin, "Naute hong pai vevua," ci
I vekpi in kipaak in diang ni
Eite in Amah va teel tawm ni
Zekai ke’n, pai ni, tu’n
verse3:
Ngaihsun pha in, tuni’n hiah om lai
Hong thu piakna pha lim takin ngai
Migi mahmah tu’n zong hong sam lai
"Nong pai nai uh hia," ci
chorus:
Mawhna khialhnate siangtho nungah
Topa mai ah kikhop ciangin ah
Tawntung inn nuam vantung khua sungah
Nuam pha mahmah ding hi

verse1:
Pasian saplai ka za kei diam
Leitung nopna ka khenglah diam
Nuntaak hun a beibei lai in
Ka kha ka koih diam, ihsip in?
verse2:
Pasian saplai ka tho kei diam
A itna aw ka nialthei diam
Hong sapna ka awlmawh kei diam
Hong sam lailai ka uaikai diam
verse3:
Pasian saplai hong kiukiu in
Ka lung ka khak diam a kipin
Hong ngak lai hong saang ding hizo
Ka dahsak ngam diam Kha Siangtho?
chorus:
Hong samlai! Aw, za in
Hong samlai! Aw, za in
Pa in hong samlai, aw za un
Pa in hong samlai, hong samlai! Aw, za un
Hong samlai! Aw, za un
Pa in hong samlai! Aw, za un, samlai!

verse1:
Zeisu’n kong kiu, nang hong sam
"Lunggim mi’n hong zuan un," ci
Hong gumthei Amah bek hi
Na kong za hon’ in
verse2:
Zeisu’n kong kiu hong gum ding
Nang aa ding A pumpi pia
Hing kikin han pan tho khia
Na kong za hon’ in
verse3:
Zeisu’n kong hong kiukiu lai
Na lungsim Amah pia in
Lungdamna hong pia ding hi
Na kong za hon’ in
verse4:
Zeisu’n kiu hunte beibei
Gup khiatna a nai lai in
Gumpa’n hong paisan ma in
Na kong za hon’ in
chorus:
Na kong za hon’ in, na kong za hon’ in
Na kong za hon’n, na kong za hon’n
Hong gumthei Amah bek hi
Na kong za hon’ in

zoTitle: Tu Nitak Na Ciah Ding Hiam?
verse1:
Inn nong ciah diam, vakthap mi?
Hong gum dingin Zeisu si
Lungkham, gimna thuak mi
Mawhna si baangna puante
Tuuno sisung na sawp diam?
Na puante paak ding vuuk bang
Na um diam, hong ciamna thupha?
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
verse2:
Inn nong ciah diam, a mang mi?
En in, Topa’n hong ngak hi
Pai in lunghei nawn ke’n
Ciah in na zekaai kha ding
Pai in Ama kiang beel in
Hong itna tha muang inla
Nong pai diam, ci’n hong samsam lai
Tu nitak na ciah ding hiam?
verse3:
Inn nong ciah diam, mawhnei mi?
Kua in na mawhna van pua?
Pualam sawt khawl nawn ke’n
Tu’n hong ciahin kisiik in
Topa thu ciamna muang in
Amah’n hong gum phasak ding
"Hong pai in," ci’n Zeisu’n hong sam
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
chorus:
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
Khuamial sung pan khuavaakna sung
Zeisu’ inn na ciah ding hiam?
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?
Hong it vantung i Pa kiangah
Tu nitaak na ciah ding hiam?

verse1:
Hong Honpa in hong kun, na thahatna neu hi
Thaneem te’n thu hong ngen un
"Cing takna ngah ding," hong ci
verse2:
Topa tu’n ka theizo, Nangma vaanglian bek in
Phak leh lol zong damsak zo
Suang lungneemsak tui bangin
verse3:
Hehpih ka ngah nading, phatna khat zong nei
Ka puan vuuk bang paak nading
Tuuno sisung hong sawp leng
verse4:
Sihna lupna tung pan, ka kha a kahto ding
"Zeisu in keimah hong tan,"
Ci in lungdam kiko ding
verse5:
Topa tokhom mai ah, kicingin ka din' ciang
Min phatna puak ning Amah
Ngasuk ning Zeisu’ khe kiang
chorus:
Zeisu’n loh khinta, Ama tung ka baa
Si bang sansa ka mawhna
Vuuk bang hong sawp ngo ta

verse1:
Omna om lai Tuuno innpi sungah
A vaang lianpi tawh nang hong sam ta hi
Tum in, tu in tum in, omna om lai
verse2:
Ni taang bei dek zo, ni in liap ta hi
Hong liap ta hi, manlang in ah pai in
Omna om lai, tum in, tu in tum in
verse3:
Mopina pawi sung zin a khop lai-in
Hong sap mi na hih leh tum in, tum in
Omna om lai, tum in, tu in tum in
verse4:
Dim khin dek hi, lungdamnna inn sungah
Manlang a na lut leh ngah lai ding hi
Omna om lai, tum in, tu in tum in
verse5:
Omna om lai, kong kihon’ laitak hi
Pai in tum lecin na laplai ding hi
Omna om lai, tum in, tu in tum in
verse6:
Tum in, tum in tua pawi nang aa ding hi
Ki it tawntungna hai kidawn ding hi
Tum in, tu in tum in, omna om lai

zoTitle: Zeisu' Omna Ding Na Nei Hiam?
engTitle: Have You Any Room for Jesus?
verse1:
Na mawhna taang a thuak
Zeisu om nading mun a om hiam
Kongkhak kiu in lut ding hong tu
Mawhnei te’n a ngai na diam
verse2:
Na lung sungah na omsak leh
Nuamna hong bawlsak ding hi
Om na’ng na omsak loh hangin
Na mawhna taang ding si hi
verse3:
Topa zeisu in a hun ciang
A thupha tawh hong sam ding
Tu ni’n a thupha saang inla
Zingciang ngak kei leteh pha
verse4:
Om na’ng thu a hun na pia in
A nuam ding ni kheng sak ke’n
Sawt loin a hong sam ding leh
Na lungsim khauhsak kei ve’n
chorus:
Topa Zeisu minthang Kumpi
A om na’ng mun tu’n bawl in
Na lungsim kongkhak tan zau in
Hong in na lutsak ding hi

verse1:
Zeisu’n hong huausim lai in, Pai’n mawh neite!
Nang aa ding thunget lai in, Pai’n mawh neite
Tu’n Amah nang aa ding hi, Pai’n mawh neite
Tu’n Amah na thei ding hi, Pai’n mawh neite!
verse2:
Nang zong na van gik hiam? Pai’n mawh neite
Zeisu’n na van hong puaksak, Pai'n mawh neite
Zeisu’n nang hong nial kei ding, Pai’n mawh neite
Zeisu in nang hong saang ding, Pai’n mawh neite!
verse3:
Aw, za in A hong thumna, Pai’n mawh neite
Pai in thupha saang dingin, Pai’n mawh neite
Zeisu’n hong huausim lai in, Pai'n mawh neite
Nang aa ding thunget lai in, Pai’n mawh neite!

verse1:
Hong gum Topa kei taangin sizo hi
Mawh tanna pan kei hong suakta sak hi
Pasian Tapa a um khempeuhte in
Nungta tawntung ding hi
verse2:
Topa tung mawhna tam ke’n ngazo hi
Ka mawhna leiba bang hong lohsak hi
Topa thu a um mi khempeuhte in
Hing tawntung ding uh hi
verse3:
Ka zawngkhal hangin ah thupha um ning
Ka mawh, ka khial zong hong thupiak muang ning
Pasian thu-umte lungdam nading in
Hing tawntung ngah ding hi
verse4:
A kilawm kei zong um khial ngeikei ning
A pai nuam pai un, hong ngai ding ci in
Na kiko un Topa thu a umte
Hing tawntung ding uh hi
chorus:
A maan takpi a nang kiangah kong cih in
A maan takpi a nang kiangah kong cih in
Pasian Tapa a umte maan takin
A hing tawntung ding hi

zoTitle: Na Kongbiang Pua Lam Ka Ding Hi
engTitle: Behold Me Standing at the Door
verse1:
Na kongbiang ah dingin ka om
Kong sapna za in hong en in
"Kong lut ding hiam," damtak kong ci
Mawh neite Nong tumsak ding hiam?
verse2:
Nang taang ling lukhu ka khu hi
Lungduai in sawtpi kong ngak hi
Kong lut ding hiam? Kong lut ding hiam?
Mawh neite aw hong dawng ve un
verse3:
A hong mawksap ka hikei hi
Gimna ka thuakna ngaihsun in
Na mawh phel ding, Ka pum Ka pia
Kong lut ding hiam? Kong lut ding hiam?
verse4:
Nangmah kong it kong ngaih manin
Na nuam na'ng vantung pan kong puak
Kong lut ding hiam? Kong lut ding hiam?
Mawhnei, gimna thuak te’n gen un
chorus:
Na kongbiang ah dingin ka om
Hong en in, dam takin kong sam
"Kong lut ding hiam? Kong lut ding hiam?"
"Mawh neite aw hong genkik un"

engTitle: The Light of the World Is Jesus
verse1:
Hih leitung mawhna khuamial bangin zing hi
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
Sun aa ni taang bangin ah a vaang taang hi
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
verse2:
A kiang a omte in khuamial mulo hi
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
Lam hilhpa a zuite in lamtang tawn hi
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
verse3:
Khualmial sung aa om mawhna a mittawte
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
Thu hong piak bang na mu ding hi hong sap leh
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi
verse4:
Vantung khua ah ni taang deihna omlo hi
A taang ding Topa Zeisu hi
Vantung khamgam sungah a siangtho khuapi
A vaang taang nading Zeisu hi
chorus:
No aa ding in khuavaak a taang hi
"Khuamial sungpan hong pai in" ci hi
Mittawte in tu’n khua muzo hi
Leitung khuavaakna Zeisu hi

engTitle: The Gate A jar for Me
verse1:
Kongpi kihong sa-in om aa
A sung panin a vaangpi
Singlamteh pan hong taang khia aa
Topa' itna honglak hi
verse2:
Hot khiatna zong mite khempeuh
Tua kongpi honsa'n om hi
A hau, a zawng, a lian, a neu
A kua, ci lo lut thei hi
verse3:
Hehpihna kong kihon' lai-in
Nang zong, lau ke’n, delh inla
Itna' piak lukhu ngah na'ng in
Singlamteh na saang ding ta
verse4:
Leitung ah hong piak singlamteh
Sih gungal ah i khia ding
Hinna lukhu hong piak tak teh
Amah i it zaw sem ding
chorus:
Hi takpi zo diam tua kongpi
Kei aa ding a honsa’n om maw
Keimah takpi, keimah hong kihon maw

zoTitle: Nang Leh Keimah Hong Sam Hi
engTitle: Softly And Tenderly Jesus Is Coming
verse1:
Maitaii in damtak Zeisu in hong sam hi
Nang leh keimah hong sam hi
Topa Zeisu’n lungduai takin hong ngak hi
Nang leh keimah hong ngak hi
verse2:
Bang khawl i hiam Topa Zeisu’n hong thum hi
Nang leh kei kiang hong thum hi
Hong hehpihna bang thu’n donlo i hi hiam?
Nang leh kei thupha hong pia
verse3:
A hun in a manlang in hong khengthei hi
Nang leh kei hong kheng ding hi
Khuamialna leh sihna natna hong nai hi
Nang leh kei hong nai ding hi
verse4:
Nong itna leh a lamdang thuciam napi
Nang leh kei aa ding koih hi
Gamtat khialhna Topa’n hong phelsak ding hi
Nang leh kei aa phel ding hi
chorus:
Inn ah ciah un, gimna thuakte hong ciah un
Lungdam takin Topa Zeisu in hong sam
"Mawhneite hong pai un," ci

verse1:
Zeisu in itna tawh inn ah hong sam
Tuni’n hong sam, tuni’n hong sam
Ni bang taang hong itna panin pua lam
Bang ding kidaaithah na hiam?
verse2:
Zeisu hong pia nuam a gimte tawldam
Tuni’n hong sam, tuni’n hong sam
Na van vapuak inla, ngah in lungdam
Nang A hong nialkei ding hi
verse3:
Zeisu’n hong ngak hi, pai in tu laitak
Tuni’n hong sam, tuni’n hong ngak
Na mawhna mah tawh vakuan in niamtak
Pai in, kizekaai sak ke’n
verse4:
Zeisu in hong zol hi, A’ aw ngai in
Tuni’n za in, tuni’n za in
Nuamna ngah ding hi, Amah umte in
Tho in paipah vingveng in
chorus:
Tuni’n hong sam, Tuni’n hong sam
Zeisu in hong sam
Hong it manin, tuni’n hong sam

verse1:
"A zate khempeuh" in hih thu taangko un
Leitung khempeuh ah hih thupha tungsak un
Mi na muh khempeuh hih nuamhuai thu ko un
"A ut khempeuh hong paithei"
verse2:
Hong paite in zekai nading thu omlo
Lut theih lai in lut un, kong hon sa’n omzo
Zeisu lo thumaan hinna lampi omlo
"A ut khempeuh hong paithei"
verse3:
"A ut khempeuhte" thuciam a maantak hi
"A ut khempeuhte" thuciam a kip ding hi
"A ut khempeuhte" nuntak tawntungna hi
"A ut khempeuh hong paithei"
chorus:
"A ut khempeuhte, a ut khempeuhte
"Cihna thu a mual a guam va thawnsak un
Hong it i Pa in hong samkik lam khialte
"A ut khempeuh hong pai un"

verse1:
Mawh neite Zeisu’n ngai hi
Hih thupha na thangsak un
Vantung lam khial a puuk mi
Lunghei nei mi va hilh un
verse2:
Hong pai in, hong damsak ding
Na muang in, A thutak hi
A sia bel pen zong saang ding
Mawh neite Zeisu’n ngai hi
verse3:
Tu’n sinsung kisuang nawnlo
Thukham mai ah ka siang ta
Amah’n hong siangsak khinzo
Thukham kalhna cin’ khinta
verse4:
Mawh neite Zeisu’n ngai hi
Kei nangawn a mawh pi mah
Vantung ah hong lutpih hi
Mawhna teng siangta in ah
chorus:
Sa sa un, sa kikkik un
Mawh neite Zeisu’n ngai hi
Hih thu teltak tangko un
Mawh neite Zeisu’n ngai hi

zoTitle: Hong Gum Topa Lut Sak In
verse1:
Zinpa kong kiangah om hi, lutsak in
Tam veipi hong paizo hi
Lutsak in, a pai ma’n lut na’ng pia in
Siangtho Topa lutsak in
Pa Pasian a Tapa in, lutsak in
verse2:
Lungsim kongkhak tu’n hon in, lutsak in
Ngak leh Amah paikhia ding
Lutsak in, lutsak in nangma lawmpa
Nangma lungsim kem ding aa
A tawp dong hong gum ding pa, lutsak in
verse3:
A kam khumna ngai inla, lutsak in
Tu’n piangsak in nang teelpa
Lutsak in, kongkhak kiang ding hi
Amah khangsak ding na lungdamna
Ama min na phat ding aa, lutsak in
verse4:
Tu in vantung khua zinpa lutsak in
Nang vakna pawi kham ding aa
Lutsak in A hong phel ding na mawhna
Lawmte tawh kikhen ciangah
Hong kha ding vantung inn ah, lutsak in

verse1:
Hong ciah’n, hong ciah’n
Na lungsim gimzo hi, lampi zong mialzo hi
Lauhuai in gamdaai ta
Aw a taaimang ta hongciah’n aw, hong ciah’n
verse2:
Hong ciah’n, hong ciah’n
Hong ngakin kong vil uh kongpi ah ka ding aa
Liim in hong khengkheng ta
Aw a taaimang ta hongciah’n aw, hong ciah’n
verse3:
Hong ciah’n, hong ciah’n
Mawh sakna dahna pan, mawhna maizumna pan
Kheempa nuihmai na pan
Aw a taimang ta hong ciah’n aw, hong ciah’n
verse4:
Hong ciah’n!, hong ciah’n
Neek ding an tampi om, vaitutna nuam zong om
Lawmte tawh kipawlna
Aw, a taaimang ta hong ciah’n! aw, hong ciah’n!
chorus: Hong ciah’n, Aw, hong ciah in

verse1:
Mawhna a neite hong pai in
Topa in hong hehpih
Ama thupha bel up ciangin
Nuamna i ngah ding hi
verse2:
Nuamna a hong pia ding Zeisu
A sipha bel luangsak
Vuuk sangin hong ngozaw sak thei
A si sung hong phum ta'n
verse3:
Nopna sung tun nading
Zeisu Thumaan lampi a hi
Topa na um ding khawlkei leh
Lung damna ngah ding hi
verse4:
Mi siangtho kikhopna tum leh
Mi phatna mun pai ning
Lungdam om tawntungna sungah
Nuamna nangmah'n ngah ding
chorus:
Amah muangin! Amah muang la
Tu in ah muang in, hong gum ding hi
Hong gum ding hi, tu in hong gum ding

verse1:
Pasian kiang pan gamla ka pial
Tu in hong ciah ing
Mawhna lam sawtlua ka tawn khial
Topa hong ciah ing
verse2:
Hunpha tampi mawk beisak ing
Tu in hong ciah ing
Tu'n kapin kisiik taktak ing
Topa hong ciah ing
verse3:
Mawhna lam pial, ciam tang Topa
Tu in hong ciah ing
Muang ning Na itna leh thupha
Topa hong ciah ing
verse4:
Ka kha cina, ka lung meima
Tu in hong ciah ing
Hong dipkik in, ka lawpna tha
Topa hong ciah ing
chorus:
Hong ciah ing, hong ciah ing
Vakkhia nawnlo ding
Thupha tawh Nang aa hi ning
Topa hong ciah ing

verse1:
Mawhna neite aw, Zeisu'n hong sam
A kiangah pai un
Hong pai un mawhna kisiik khempeuh
Zeisu kiang khia un
verse2:
A umte pai un nopna zong un
Topa kiang pai un
Na lungsim gimna, van gikna peuh
Zeisu kiang khia un
verse3:
Na upna in hong nuamsak ding hi.
Zeisu kiang pai un
Na kha aa ding gimna a tampi
Zeisu kiang khia un
verse4:
Hong pai un, no om na'ng omlai hi
Zeisu kiang pai un
Na van neih khempeuh a gik phapi
Zeisu kiang khia un
chorus:
Khia un, mawh neite khia un
Topa Zeisu kiang pai un
Khia un, mawh neite khia un
Topa kiang khia un

zoTitle: Na Mawh Phel Nading Om Hi
verse1:
Hong gum Topa min umin a kiang pai in
Lungsim hong bawlthak sak ding hi
A pha a hong bawlnop lai in pialkei in
Nang aa ding mawh phelna om hi
verse2:
Sihna phual tung na mawhna lampi zuihna
Bang zui nuam semsem na hi hiam?
Itna kamkhum tawh hong sapna nial ding hiam?
Mawh phelna thu nang hong pia hi
verse3:
Hong tung ding gal pelin, singlamteh nai in
Singlamteh in nang hong phel ding
Na up ciangin thakhat in Kha Siangtho in
Kisiik in, thupha hong pia ding
chorus:
Na mawh phel nading om hi
Na mawh phel nading om hi
Hong gum dingin Zeisu sizo hi
Na mawh bei na'ng thu hong pia hi

zoTitle: Gupna Ngah Na'ng Bang Ka Hih Diam?
engTitle: What Shall I Do To Be Saved?
verse1:
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
Dahna sung ka kha vangik pua bang
Tuipi kilok bangin
Huihpi hong nung bangin
Dahna kei tungah hong kihual aa
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam
Aw, gup ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
verse2:
Khangno lungsim a bei ciangin
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
Ka it ka lawmte in
Leitung a nusiat ciang
Han phualah dahin ka kapkap hi
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam!
Aw, gup ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
verse3:
Cinat in hong bawlsiat ciangin
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
Leitung tawlkhat bek hi
Meii bangin thengthei hi
A hun bei ngeilo muh theih na'ng in
Gupna ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam
Aw, gup ngah na'ng bang ka hih diam?
verse4:
Hong hehpih inla, hong en in
Nopsakna keimah hong khiatsuk in.
Topa kianglo mun dang
Kua kiang ka zuan ding hiam
Lungsim kitam Topa'n damsak thei
Hi bang hih ning! Hi bang hih ning
Gupna ngah na'ng Zeisu beel ning

zoTitle: Pai In La Zeisu Kiang Gen In
verse1:
Zeisu kiang pai in, na mawhna gen in
Na nuntaakna ding Ama thu um in
Na lungsim vangik hong zangsak ding hi
Topa en in na mawh hong phel ding hi
verse2:
Zeisu kiang pai in, na mawhna lian hi
Na mawhna mualcia in a liat hangin
Mawhna phel ding hi, nuamna ngah na'ng in
Topa Zeisu a si luang ciamteh in
verse3:
Zeisu kiang pai in, na launa gen in
Na lau loh nading a ang hong pom ding
Upna khangsak in, na khitui nuul hi
A tawntung nuamin na lungdam ding hi
chorus:
Zeisu kiang pai in, na mawhnate gen in
Ama lam nga in, na mawh hong phel ding hi
Zeisu kiang pai in, Ama lam zuan in
Na mawh gen in, Topa'n hong phelthei ding hi

verse1:
Dahna, lungkhamna a tun ciang
Topa hong sapna ngai in
Khazih Topa thupha um ing
Tuni'n a kiangah pai ning
verse2:
A Siangtho kiniam sak Topa
Na kiang keimah kong pai hi
Hong kem in hong cing in Topa
Na khut nuai hong omsak in
verse3:
Ka Kha nopsak na'ng Topa aw
Nangma kiang kong beel ding hi
