Vantung ah mi siangthote tawh
Ka maang khawm tawntung nuam hi
verse4:
Ka kiangah hong om in Topa
Lungkhamna huih daisak in
Lungdamna piangsak in, dahna
Khuamial, ni taang bang sak in
chorus:
Kei hong pai ning, kong pai ding hi
Topa thupha sang dingin
Kei hong pai ding, kong pai ding hi
Topa kiang maan' ngah dingin

zoTitle: Nih Vei Na Suak Kik In
verse1:
Upa khat zan lai Zeisu kiangah pai aa
Gupna ngah nading kuavak lampi dong hi
Topa in a tel takin a hilhkik aa
"Nih vei na suak in," ci
verse2:
Topa Zeisu thuhilh kikna a pha hi
Leitung mihingte ngaihsut ding kilawm hi
A thu piakna a mawkna hilo ding hi
"Nih vei suakkik in," ci
verse3:
A teel mite tawh lungdam in la sa ta
Mipha te'n a min thang lungdam in nuam aa
Hin' tawntung lungdamna, nuamna ngah nop leh
"Nih vei suakkik in," ci
verse4:
Na muhnop mihingte vantung khuapi ah
A siangtho kongbiang ah nang hong ngak uh hi
Tua bang na muh nang hih thu piakna ngai in
"Nih vei suakkik in," ci
chorus:
Nih vei na suakkik in
Nih vei na suakkik in
A maan takin kong ci hi, kong hilhkik hi
Nih vei na suakkik in

verse1:
Khialhna a nei gimna thuak mi ka hi
Vantungah ka et leh tum nuam ka hi
Hih hang tua sungah khialnei om theikei
Hih hang "Hong pai in," cih aw khat ka thei
verse2:
Nisim ka pai lai, vantung khua lampi
A tawntung mawhna, khialhna'n hong kheem hi
Hih hang "Pu laakin, na kisiik kik leh
Mawh kiphel ngah ding" cih thu kathei hi
verse3:
Kihhuai mi ka hih ciangin bang ci in
Tua khua siangtho sungah ka lut ding hiam
Pasian tokhom mai ah dingthei ding hiam
Hih hang, "Hong nai in," khut tawh hong sam in
verse4:
Zeisu Topa a aw, ke'n ka za hi
Ama khut in kei hong naisak thei hi
Ama si in ka mawhna ka khialhna
Hong phelthei vantungah hong luutsak ta
verse5:
Topa aw ka hong thumna hong ngai in
Na hehpihna in kei aa ding kicing
Na ling lukhu in kei kumpi lukhu
Ka nuntaakna ding Nang nunna Nong pia
verse6:
Neihsa bangmah nei keng, Nang kong puak ding
Ka lungsim pumpi'n Nang kong kipia khin
Ka lungsim teng bang ci'n kong piathei diam
Mawh phel nading thu'n ka lung hong nuamsak

zoTitle: Tuuno Si Tawh Na Kisawp Zo Hiam?
verse1:
A siangtho ngah ding Zeisu kiang na pai hiam?
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp zo hiam?
A thupha kicing dingin na um nai hiam?
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp zo hiam?
verse2:
Nisim in Topa kiangah lam na zui hiam?
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp zo hiam?
Kithat a thuak Topa kiang na beel ta hiam?
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp zo hiam?
verse3:
Mopipa hong pai ciang na puan siang dingin
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp ding hiam?
A bawl innpi nuamah luut theih nading in
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp ding hiam?
verse4:
Mawhna khialhna a baang na puansilh paai in
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp ding hiam?
A sianglo na lungsung ciktui luangsak in
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp ding hiam?
chorus:
Tuuno a sipha tawh
Nangmah in na kisawp siang zo maw?
Na puansilh vuuk bangin ah na ngah zo hiam?
Tuuno si tawh na kisawp zo hiam?

verse1:
Dahna kha nenniam sung ka kawivaak zo hi
Tu in lungnuam takin ka tawl a dam hi
Zing tung pan nitaak dongin la kasa hi
Kumpipa tawh ka tonkhawmna thu hang hi
verse2:
Kum tampi mawhna hencipin ka om hi
Leitungah hong hon zo omlo kathei hi
Tu in vasa bangin ka suakta zo hi
Lungdamin Kumpipa tawh ka tonkhawm
verse3:
Leitung kibuaina sung aa cimawh kha aw
En to in, Zeisu na sungah luutsak in
Lungdam huai gupkhiatna a hong puak ding hi
Ni taang sung zuanin Kumpi tawh tonkhawm in
chorus:
Kumpi tawh tonkhawm, Haleluiah
Kumpi tawh tonkhawm A min phat
Ka kha vaakthap nawnlo inn lam a zuan
Kumpi tawh tonkhawm kikum khawm

zoTitle: Lam Khial Tuu Ka Hi A
engTitle: I Was a Wondering Sheep (Tune: Lebanon)
verse1:
Lam khial tuu ka hi aa, Tuu khumna ka deihkei,
Hong cingpa aw ka deihlo aa, A thu ka ngai nuamkei
Gilo ta hi’ng, ka Pa' inn ah omnuam lo-in,
Ka Pa' aw ka ngai nuamkei aa
Gamla painuam kha ing
verse2:
Tuucing pa’n tuu zon bang, Pa in ta hong zong hi
Mual tung guam sungah va pai hi
Gamla vaak kawikawi hi
Ka sidek ta hong mu, gilkial in ka om hi
Ki itna tawh Amah’n hong pua, lam khialpa hong gum hi
verse3:
Tuucing pa’n Zeisu hi, Amah’n ka kha it hi
Ama si tawh a hong sawp zo, A hong cingsak zo hi
Amah’n lamkhial mi zong
Tuu mangthang a mu hi
Amah in tuu khumna hong pi, tu in hong keemthei hi
verse4:
Lam khial tuu hizo ta’ng, Kuama thu ke’n ngai ke’ng
Tu in tuucing aw ngai nuam ta’ng
Tuu khumna om nuam ning
Ta gilo ka hi aa, ka vaak kawikawi nuam hi
Ahih hangin tu’n ka Pa’ inn sungah ka omnuam hi

verse1:
Singlamteh tung aa Zeisu en in
Nang aa ding leh kei aa ding hong si
Ngai in itna’n A kiang hong saplai
En in, hing ta in!
verse2:
Na mawh vangik kha hong gum ding hiam?
Nuntaak tawntungna na nei ding maw?
Zeisu bekin hong honzo thei hi
En in, hing ta in!
verse3:
Han pan a tho Zeisu en le cin
Manlang in inndei sung omlai in
A mai nuam in hong lungdamsak ding
En in, hing ta in!
verse4:
Zeisu’n van nunnuam hong bawlsak hi
Lungkham mawhnei mi' sapna hongthei
Na paina peuhah hong kha ding hi
En in, hing ta in!
chorus:
En in, hing ta in! En in, hing ta in!
Nang aa ding sing tung sihna en in
En in, hing ta in!

zoTitle: Kei’ Dahna, Khuamial, Kol Tan’na Pan
verse1:
Kei’ dahna, khuamial, koltan'na pan
Zeisu, kong pai!, Zeisu, kong pai
Nang’ nuamna khuavaak, suahtaakna lam
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai
Ka natna pan Nang' damna sungah
Ka zawnna pan Nang hauhna sungah
Ka mawhna sung pan nangma sungah
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai!
verse2:
Zumhuai lelhna, supna panin ah
Zeisu, kong pai!, Zeisu, kong pai
Vaanglian Na singlamteh meetna ah
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai
Leitung dahna pan Nang khoina sung
Huihpi sung pan Nangma daihna sung
Lung gimna pan nuam la sakna sung
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai!
verse3:
Pha theilo kisak theihna panin
Zeisu, kong pai!, Zeisu, kong pai
Nang ma deihna bangbang mang dingin
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai
Ka pumpi nusia’n Na itna sung
Lung kiatna pan vantung nuamna sung
Saang semsem leengto ning a tawntung
Zeisu, Nang kiang kong pai!

zoTitle: Ka Nun’ Sung Ka Tat Khialhna
verse1:
Ka nunsung ka tat khialhna tam zo aa
Ka lungsim mawhna tam zawsem ta
Ka kahna in khua mu lopi
Kong honsa ka va kiu ding hi
verse2:
Amah itna lakah kei a neu pen
Thungetna ah zong a zawngkhal pen
Hong sap bang ke’n ka zuan mawk hi
Amah in hong niallo ding hi
verse3:
Ka khialhte hehpihna in siin ding hi
Ka mawhna Amah’n silkhia ding hi
Meidawi aa kiplo keima khe
A taang kongpi lam zuan gige
verse4:
Ka nunsung ka tatkhialhna tam zo aa
Mawhna hang ka lungsim sung minta
Ka kahna in khua mu lopi
Hong Honpa’n hong tumsak ding hi
chorus:
Ka mawhna ka ginat lohna
Tampi ka phawk semsem ta
Ahih hang Zeisu’n hong sap ciang inn sungah
Ka tum ding kongpi honsa

verse1:
Topa, ka za Na aw
Nang kiang a Nong sapna
Kalani Na si manpha tawh
Keimah hong sawp nuam aa
verse2:
Zawngkhal, kihhuai hangin
Ka tha Nong khauhsak hi
Nengkha zong kihbaang nawn lo-in
Mawhna nong sawpsak hi
verse3:
Leitung vantung aa ding
Upna, itna, lawpna
Lungnopna, muanna a kicing
Zeisu hi hong Guanpa
verse4:
Mawhna a manna sa
Keima lungsim sungah
Thupha nasepna hong pantah
Hong kipsak Zeisu mah
verse5:
Zeisu in hong pia ding
Hong khapsa khempeuhte
A thu mantak a zuita ding
Upna tawh ngen peuh leh
verse6:
Thang hen, mawh maina si
Thang hen, hong tan itna
Thang hen, Pasian’ hong piak Khazih
Eite’ Tha leh Dikna
chorus:
Kong pai hi, Topa, kong pai hi, tu in
Kalani a Na sipha, keimah hong sawpna in

zoTitle: I Mawhna Hangin Zeisu Kap Maw?
engTitle: Did Christ O’er Sinners Weep? (Tune: Boylston)
verse1:
Mihing mawhna hangin, i To Zeisu kap maw?
Mi khempeuh kapin om kei un
Ka khitui taak ciangin
verse2:
Zeisu khitui luangin, vantung mi’n hon en aa
Haksatna thuakin khitui luang
Nang taang ding Topa’n thuak
verse3:
A kah bang kap unla, mawh mai na’ng khitui hi
Vantung ah mawhna om nawnlo
Khitui luanna omlo
verse4:
Tuunno Zeisu a hi, a tawntung in phat un
Hong thuciam bangin nungta in
Van leh lei Topa hi

zoTitle: Kah Hang Hong Gum Zo Lo!
verse1:
Kah hang hong gum zolo
Khitui in ka mai sawp zong
Ka launa daisak tuamlo
Mawhna kum sawpsiang theilo
Kah hang hong gum zolo!
verse2:
Sep hang hong gum zolo
A hoih pen ka seemthei zong
A siang pen ka ngaisun zong
Ka kha thaksuak sak theikei
Sep hang hong gum zolo!
verse3:
Ngak hang hong gum zolo
Huh theih loh mawhna nei zong
Ka bil sung hehpih’n hong sam
Ngaklai leng ka si ding hi
Ngak hang hong gum zolo!
verse4:
Khazih upna’n hong gum
Hong umsak in Na Tapa
A bawlsa nate um in
A khut in kei hong pom ding
Khazih upna’n hong gum!
chorus:
Zeisu kap, kei taang ding si
Singkhuam tungah khaina thuak
Kei hong hon dingin hong ngak
Amah bek hong honthei

engTitle: I Am Coming to the Cross
verse1:
Singlamteh kiang kong pai hi
Tha leh sum lo mittaw pi
Na dang bangmah man lopi
Hotna cing ka zong ding hi
verse2:
Nang kong lung gulhna sawt hi
Ka gitloh sawt luazo hi
Zeisu in damtak hong ci
"Na mawhna Kong sawp ding hi"
verse3:
Ka vekpi’n kong kipia ta
Ka lawm, ka hun, ka neihsa
Ka vekpi’n ka pum ka kha
Nang aa ka hikhin nuam ta
verse4:
Na thuciamte ka muang hi
Na sipha tu’n ka phawk hi
Ka lungsim ka niamkhiat hi
Nangmah tawh ka sikhawm hi
chorus:
Topa, Nangmah kong muangzo
Singlamteh tung si Tuuno
Na singlamteh kong beelzo
Hong hon aw, tu’n hong hon aw

verse1:
Ka hi bangin paulap neilo
Kei aa ding Na siluang simloh
Nangmah in nong sapna thu tawh
Pasian' Tuuno, kong zuan, kong zuan
verse2:
Ka hi bangin misia, mittaw
Khua muhna hauhna, damna tawh
Ka sapna teng ngah dingin aw
Pasian' Tuuno, kong zuan, kong zuan
verse3:
Ka hi bangin mawhna baangin
Kisil tawm dingin khawl lo-in
Na si’n hong siangsak thei manin
Pasian' Tuuno, kong zuan, kong zuan
verse4:
Ka hi bangin Nong sang mah ding
Nong phel, Nong sawp, Nong huh mah ding
Na thuciam ka um zo manin
Pasian’ Tuuno, kong zuan, kong zuan

verse1:
Kong sapna ngai in, tu’n hong hehpih in
Hong Honpa hong pai in
Ka lung gimzo, Nang kong ngaita tu in
Hong Honpa hong pai in
verse2:
Zan khualmial sung, ka belh ding ka neilo
Hong Honpa hong pai in
Khatvei Nong et hinna khuavaak hizo
Hong Honpa hong pai in
verse3:
Lam gamdai aa, ka khe zong gim zota
Hong Honpa hong pai in
Ka daak leh Na it mai mu zenzen aa
Hong Honpa hong pai in
verse4:
Na nial ngeikei lung tamkhamte’ thuumna
Hong Honpa hong pai in
Na ngai in lung niamkhiat aa kong thuumna
Hong Honpa hong pai in
chorus:
Ka va gammang mual tung khuadam lak ah
Inn pan gamlapi ka pial khin
Tu’n hong la in, Nong ciahpih’n nang inn ah
Hong Honpa hong pai in

zoTitle: Na Kheempeuh Khatvei In Zo Hi
verse1:
Thukhaam sung pan suakta nuam mahmah ing
Zeisu in a si tawh a hong sawp hi
Thukhaam sung pan ka suahtaak nading
Hong itna tawh hong gumzo hi
verse2:
Thukhaamna pan i suakta zo khin aa
Zeisu’n gupna kicing hong piazo ta
Kam siamin hong sam "Hong pai un" ci
Khatvei hong gum leh kicing hi
verse3:
Pasian' Tapa cihna i ngah zota
A puukte itna tawh hong phongzo ding
Hong sap ciang sihna pan hingkik ding
Zeisu'n cing ding khatvei gum hi
chorus:
Cing ding hi mawh neite’n umta un
Cing ding hi, u te nau te’n um un
Singlamteh beel leeng mawhna kia ding
Zeisu’n cing ding khatvei gum hi

verse1:
Kiphat sakna’n kum sawt ka beisak
Kei aa ding kithat Topa donlo
Kei aa ding hong sih lam ka phawk kei
Kalvari ah
verse2:
Pasian thu in ka mawhlam phawksak
Bang ka hi ka phawk ciang ka liing aa
A mawh ka kha thuumin, ka kihei
Kalvari lam
verse3:
Tu’n Zeisu a vekpi’n ka pia khin
Tu’n Amah ka Kumpipa hita
Tun’ a siasa kha in la a sa
Kalvari mah
verse4:
Aw, gupkhiatna thu a geel itna
Aw, mi tung dong hong puaksuk thupha
Aw, a khauh kizopna lei hong dawh
Kalvari ah
chorus:
Manpiak loh hehpihna a lian leh
Mawh mai sakna kei tungah khang aa
Ka kha vangik tu in suakta hi
Kalvari ah

verse1:
Kei aa ding tam Khang Suangpi
Nangma sung kong beel ding hi
Na pang vang pan hong kizui
Thakhat luang khia, "si leh tui"
Mawh kiphel thuapna hi hen
Hong sut henla hong sawp hen
verse2:
Ka khutin ka sepna tawh
Thukhaam, deihna cin zolo
Hahkat den zo mah leng zong
Tawplo khitui luang hang zong
Mawhna kiphel zo saamlo
Nangmah bekin Nong honzo
verse3:
Khut sung bangmah keng lopi
Na singlamteh kong beel hi
Puan neilo Nangmah’n Nong guan
Cimawh hehpihna kong zuan
Kihhuai tuinaak kong delh hi
Nong sil ke’h ka si ding hi
verse4:
Ka nuntaak lai hita leh
Ka sih laitak hita leh
Theih loh gam ka kaiciang zong
Thu khenna mai kong tun dong
Kei taang kitam Suangpi aw
Nangma sung hong beelsak aw

verse1:
A pha takpi in nado in
Zeisu’n lung khauhna hong pia ding
Nuntaakna pha takpi lem aa
A hi ding nangma lungdamna
verse2:
Pasian upna tawh kidem in
Daak to, Ama maitang en in
Nuntaakna lampi a om hi
Zeisu’n lampi leh nuamna hi
verse3:
Lung manna paai inla um in
Zeisu in hong hehpih ding hi
Nuam in muang inla, Zeisu in
Nangma nuntaakna hi, thei in
verse4:
Thazawng kei in na nuam inla
Zeisu kiang mipha na hi aa
A thu na up leh Zeisu in
Nangma deihna a thei ding hi

verse1:
I gal te’n ah hong zo ci’n na lau hiam
Pualam khuamial sangin sungah mial zaw hiam?
Khuavaakna kongvangte khempeuh hong inla
Nitaang khauvaak luutsak in
verse2:
Na nasep laitak na upna a kiam hiam
Nangmah na thungetna in hong ngailo hiam?
Khuavaakna kongvangte khempeuh hong inla
Nitaang khauvaak luutsak in
verse3:
Nuamna tawh lampi na paito nuam ding hiam
Ni sunlai khua mialna theilo na deih hiam?
Khuavaakna kongvangte khempeuh hong inla
Nitaang khauvaak luutsak in
chorus:
Nitaang khuavaak luutsak in
Nitaang khuavaak luutsak in
Khuavaakna kongvangte khempeuh hong inla
Nitaang khuavaak luutsak in

zoTitle: A Sangna Lam Ka Kah To Hi
verse1:
A sangna lam ka kahto hi
Nisim a thak ka tungto hi
Kah to kawm kong thuumlai Topa
"Hong suanto in a sangzaw ah"
verse2:
Lung manna, launa tamna ah
Mi dangte a ut hangin ah
Kei ka lungsim a utkei hi
Kei' tupna a sangzaw na hi
verse3:
A sangzaw aa mi siangte' la
Upna tawh keimah in ka za
Dawi mangpa’n thal in hong kap hang
Ka sangzaw nuam hi leitung sang
verse4:
A sang pen dong ka kah nuam hi
Vaangliatna taang ka munuam hi
Vantung ka muh dong, Topa aw
A sangzaw ah hong pi to aw
chorus:
Topa aw hong domto inla
Ka muhngei nailoh van zangah
Upna tawh hong dingto sakin
A sangzaw ah hong suan to in

verse1:
Hong phat ung, Topa
Kote Nong it manin
Si aa tu’n van aa om
Zeisu Nong piak manin
verse2:
Hong phat ung, Kha Siangtho
Khuavaak Nong piak man’
Ko Honpa Nong lak aa
Khuamial nong beisak man'
verse3:
Thahna thuak Tuuno
Minthang hen, phat ciat un
Mawhna pua aa, nitna
Hong sawpsiang Pa phat un
verse4:
Hong hingkik sak in
Na itna hong guan in
Ko khate van pan mei tawh
Hong kuang kiksak in
chorus:
Haleluiah! Nangma minthang
Haleluiah! Amen
Haleluiah! Nangma minthang
Hong hing kiksak in

zoTitle: Topa Pasian, Na Na Seem Ding
engTitle: Thy Work, O God, Needs Many Hands (Tune: Manoah)
verse1:
Topa Pasian, Na naseem ding
Mitam kisam tawntung
Tuate in seemkim zolo ding
Huhna puak kei le ung
verse2:
Topa Nangmah kong it man un
Nasepna dingin ah
Kong piak uh zangin Nangma thu’n
Zeisu min dingin ah

zoTitle: Si A Khut Guak Masuan Ding Maw
engTitle: Must I Go and Empty Handed?
verse1:
Si aa khut guak masuan ding maw
Topa mu ding hi bangin
A' na nikhat beek zong seemlo
Puak ding bangmah keng loin
verse2:
Sih ding kihta ka hikei hi
Topa in hong honzo tah
Ahih hangin guak pai ding pen
Ngaihsut ciang sinlung kha lah
verse3:
Mawhna sung aa mawkbei kum teng
Khatvei samkik theileng maw
A vekpi in Topa pia in
A' deih bang mang nuam sing maw
verse4:
Hahkat un, dingun, mi siangte
Sun lai na citakin seem
Sihna zan in hong phak ma in
Mi ngah na’ng sep theih lai seem
chorus:
Si ding aa, khut guak masuan in
Hong Honpa mai mu ding maw
Amah dawnna ding mikhat zong tonpih lo
Guak pai ding maw

engTitle: A Charge To Keep I Have (Tune: Boylston)
verse1:
Sep ding ka neih tavuan
Pasian minthan sak ding
Gumkhia thei si ngeilo Kha khat
Vantungah ka bulh ding
verse2:
Tu hun ka kipia ding
Hong sapna ka saang ding
Ka hih theih khempeuh ka zang ding
Ka Topa deih bangin
verse3:
Nang hong iplah sak in
Na muhna sung hing sak’n
Aw, Na naseem pa, kiging sa’n
Sazian laak ding om sak’n
verse4:
Vil in thunget hong huh’n
Nang tung bekmah muangin
Kei muanna bang piangkei kha leh
A si den ding ka hi

zoTitle: A Sia Ding Hon Khia In
verse1:
A sia ding honkhia in, a si ding don in
Mawhna leh sihna panin dokkhia in
Kah in lamkhial mite, Phong in a puukte
Zeisu' hotna theisak in amaute
verse2:
Amau don takei leh, Amah’n ngak lai veh
Saang lai ding hi, amau kisiik peuh leh
Va sam in citakin, damtak va zol in
Um peuh le uh mawh kiphel maan takin
verse3:
Dawimangpa netcipsa, Mihing' lungsim pha
Hehpihna thupha in phongkik thei aa
Itna tawh va zol in, Phong leeng dam takin
Khuangkhau tatsa peh bang ngaih ngei bangin
verse4:
A sia ding hon khia in, phamawh sep lohin
Sep zawh nang tha hong pia ding Topa in
A kawcik lampi ah, zol teitei inla
Hilh in ama taang Topa sikhin ta
chorus:
A sia ding hon khia in, A si ding don in
Zeisu in hehpih hi, A hon ding hi

verse1:
Na seem un, na seem un
Pasian sawltaak hi hang
I Topa totsa lampi mah a zui hi hang
Ama thu nuam in ei hong thahat sak ding hi
Na sep ding i muh peuh thahatna tawh seem ni
verse2:
Na seem un, na seem un
Gil kialte an vaak un
Nuntaakna tuinaak ah mi gimte paipih un
Singlamteh leh lungdamna thu tawh kipaak ni
Tangko un, "Man ngen lo, a khawnkhong hong hon hi"
verse3:
Na seem un, na seem un
Om hi mikim sep ding
Theihkhialhna khumial gam hi eite sukmang ding
I Topa Pasian min i pahtawi ding a hi
Tangko un, "Man ngen lo, a khawnkhong hong hon hi"
verse4:
Na seem un, na seem un
Topa’ tha tawh seem ding
Kumpi puan leh lukhu nuamna eite’n saang ding
Tatkhiatsa mi dikte tawh eite’n i vekpi'n
Sa khawm ding, "Man ngen lo, a khawnkhong hong hon hi"
chorus:
Na seem un, na seem un
Na seem un, na seem un
Lam en un, thu ngen un
Topa hong pai mateng seem un

verse1:
Kumpipa galkap te’n a et dingin ah
Dial pei khat a kilak hi
Gupna ngah mite’n la a sak khawm laitak
Hih dial na saangsak ding hi
verse2:
Galkapte in tui bang tam a om hangin
Dial peina na laksak un
Dial peina nuaiah Topa galkap bangin
Lau lo-in na do ta un
verse3:
Leitung, tuitung, mite omna khempeuh ah
Lungdamna thu zasak un
Topa in Ama thu a umte lak na’ng
Dial peina tangthu hilh un
verse4:
A kinaina khua a vaak laitakin ah
Kumpipa a galte in
A tai uh ama singlamtehna inah
Leitungah maang ding hi
chorus:
Pai ta un, mai nawt un
Zeisu aa ding khempeuh pai un
Hahkat na seem un, la sa un
Zeisu Kumpipa'n koih un

zoTitle: Hiah Om Ing, Hong Sawl In
verse1:
Topa hong sapna aw ngai in
Tuni’n kua pai na seem ding?
An vuite kuai zo, laak ding ngak
Kua’n a site haih khia ding?
Topa in naakpi in hong sam
Thaman tampi pia dingin
Kua’n lungdamna tawh hong dawngin
"Hiah om ing, hong sawl in!"
"Hiah om ing, hong sawl in!"
verse2:
Tua tuipi na kanzawh kei leh
Lawkite gam na tung ding
Tua gam sung nai zaw’n na mu ding
Na huh thei ding na kongbiang
Tul tampi na piakzawh kei leh
A neu pen in na hih thei
Meigongnu bangin na piathei
Nang ma aa ding a manpha!
Nang ma aa ding a manpha!
verse3:
Van mi bang na genthei kei zong
Pawlu bang na siamkei zong
Zeisu hong itna na gen thei
Kei taang ding si na ci thei
Lamdang a thu khen nading tawh
Thaneem khan’lawh zawhkei leh
Naupangte na makaih thei ding
Topa hong khut zaakna sung!
Topa hong khut zaakna sung
verse4:
"Ka sep theih bang mah omkei" ci'n
Kuama kiang genngei kei in
Mi dangte a sih laitak in
Topa in nang hong sam hi
Lungdam in nasep ding hong pia
Lungdam in A na sem in
Hong sap ciang manlang in dawngin
"Hiah om ing, hong sawl in!"
"Hiah om ing, hong sawl in!"

verse1:
Topa it teng pai ni
Langhsak ni i nuamna
Kituak takin la sakhawm ni
Kituak takin la sakhawm ni
Topa' tokhom kiim ah
Topa' tokhom kiim ah
verse2:
Ei' Pasian thei lote’n
Phat nuam takei le uh
Ei vantung Kumpipa' tate
Ei vantung Kumpipa' tate’n
Thangsak un nuamna thu
Thangsak un nuamna thu
verse3:
Vantung gam sung tum ma
Kham khuasung siik ma in
Hong maleep hi siangtho nuamna
Hong maleep hi siangtho nuamna
Zion mual kah lai in
Zion mual kah lai in
verse4:
Tua hi aa, la sa un
Nul un dahna khitui
Vantung gamah a nopna mun
Vantung gamah a nopna mun
Tun nading lam i zui
Tun nading lam i zui
chorus:
Zion khua i pai hi
A kilawm khupha pi Zion
I tun mateng kah toto ni
Kilawm Pasian’ khuapi Zion

verse1:
Singlamteh galkap ka hi hiam
Topa' nungzui hi hiam?
Ama nasepna dingin ah
Ka maizum thei ding hiam?
verse2:
Midangte’n nopna ngah dingin
Sih dongin a do hi
Paak tawh kibawl lupna tungah
Van a kipua ding hiam
verse3:
Gal do ding galte a om hiam
Tui luanna thuak ding hiam
Leitung gitlohna in Pasian
Kiang hong paipih ding hiam
verse4:
Mang dingin ah ka kido na’ng
Hong hangsak in Topa
Nangma thupha’n hong huh ta in
Gimna ka thuak ciangin
chorus:
Kei taang ding a si mipa
(A minpha tawh ka do ding)
Singlamteh ka puak hangin ah
Zawhna lukhu ngah ding

engTitle: Must Jesus Bear the Cross Alone? (Tune: Maidand)
verse1:
Zeisu kia’n singlamteh pua aa
Guak pai ding maw lei mi
Hilo, mikim puak ding om aa
Kei' puak ding zong om hi
verse2:
Singlamteh ke’n ka pua ding hi
Sihna’n hong khah mateng
Kumpi lukhu ka ngah ding hi
Vantung innpi tung leng
verse3:
A kikhen let Zeisu khe kiang
Liimlangh suangphah tungah
Ka kham lukhu ka ngaksuk ciang
Nuam in phat ning Amah
verse4:
Aw manpha hi, tua singlamteh
Vaanlian kumpi lukhu
Ka ngah ding hi hinkik ni teh
Hong lak ding lawpna thu

verse1:
I Topa Pasian muangin
Mainawt un! Mainawt un
Hong ciamna kammal muangin, Mainawt un
A minthangna nial ngei ke’n
Hi kei leh na maizum ding
A minthanna kizelh dong, Mainawt un!
verse2:
Amah’n lo lai hong sam zo
Mainawt un! Mainawt un
Zan hong tung ding tu’n um in, Mainawt un
Upna, itna, biakna sung
Amah hatna tha suangin
Khotak i ding tawntung ding, Mainawt un!
verse3:
Kham khaicii hong piazo hi
Mainawt un! Mainawt un
Vawh in na atkik ding hi, Mainawt un
Na Topa lam na sial in
Ngak nading leh khawl nading
Na thuumna za'n hong saang ding, Mainawt un!
verse4:
A beina hong naizo hi
Mainawt un! Mainawt un
Launa tawh Topa phat un, Mainawt un
Khazih na pum a tenna
Vantung khomun lampi ah
Minthan' ni ciang dong hong kha, Mainawt un!

zoTitle: At Hun Ciang Bang Aci Diam?
verse1:
Ki itna khaicii zingsang vawh un
Ni sun laitak in zong na suan un
Nitaak lam in zong na hahkat un
Zan ciangin zong khaicii na vawh un
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
verse2:
Khaicii kimkhat lampi ah kia hi
Khaicii kimkhat suang lakah kia hi
Khaicii kimkhat ling lakah kia hi
Khaicii kimkhat leihoih ah kia hi
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
verse3:
Gimna thuakin khaicii pha vawhun
Lungsim siat hang khaicii na vawhun
Mi maisiat thuak hangin hahkat un
Mai zumna thuak hangin lungkia ke’n
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
chorus:
Sun ahi zong, zan ahi zong vawhun
Thakhauh lai bang, thaneem lai zong vawh un
Nuntaak sung hi leh, sih khit hi leh
A khop hun khatvei tung ding hi
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?
At hun ciang bang a ci diam?

verse1:
Tapidaw limtak pai, launa hong nai
Launa, linna sung aa khual na zinlai
A pua ah thaang, a sungah ze-etna
Tumkik sak ding, hong zol mawhna sungah
Tapidaw limtak pai, Tapidaw limtak pai
Tapidaw limtak pai, launa hong nai
verse2:
Tapidaw nuam in pai, huihpi lak dong
Ging ngeingai in, mialin a lauhuai hang
Huihpi leh meiipi hong theng kik pah ding
Tua ciang na Honpa tawh tawlnga den ding
Tapidaw nuam in pai, Tapidaw nuam in pai
Tapidaw nuam in pai, Huihpi lak dong
verse3:
Tapidaw ngen in pai, na puuk zel hang
Honpa na koh khialh leh na puuk zel ding
Thungetna galvante nang na silh leh
Ze-etna haksa kantan zo ni teh
Tapidaw ngen in pai, Tapidaw ngen in pai
Tapidaw ngen in pai, na puuk zel hang

verse1:
Paak tampi a om tui a pha takpi luanna
Mualkuam ah hong gum Topa tawh ka pai ding aa
Lam a hong hilh khempeuh Ama nung ka zui ding hi
Amah tawh kawipai aa vantung tung ding hi
verse2:
Huihpi a nung aa tuipi nakpi a luanna
Mualkuam ah hong gum Topa tawh ka pai ding aa
Amah in ka khut hong let ciangin ka laukei ding
Topa in hong nai laitak kalau theikei
verse3:
Mualkuam a hi aa, mual sangpi tung ahi zong
Hong gum Topa tawh kinai in ka om ding aa
Pasian mual tungah mihingte a kikhopna ah
Ama totsa lampi ah hong kha ding hi
chorus:
Kong zui ding hi, Zeisu kong zui ding hi
Gamlapi gam khempeuh ah kong zui ding hi
Kong zui ding hi, Zeisu kong zui ding hi
A hong hilh lampi tengah ka zui ding hi

engTitle: Open My Eyes That I May See
verse1:
Hong mu sak in, Nangma thumaan
Keima aa ding Na koihsate
Ka khut sungah hong pia in
Nangmah'n hong khahkhia thei kol sutnate
Nangma deihna muh theih nading
Kong ngak hi, Topa Pasian aw
Hong musak in, Hong vaaksak in
Kha Siangtho aw
verse2:
Hong za sak in, Nangma thumaan
Teltak aa Na gin sak thute
Tua hi leh thu tampi ka zaak hang
Leeng mang ding hi a maan lote
Nangma deihna tel theih nading
Kong ngak hi, Topa Pasian aw
Hong zasak in, Hong vaaksak in
Kha Siangtho aw
verse3:
Hong za sak in, Nangma thumaan
Mun khempeuh ah lungdam takin
Ka lungsim hong puahsak, honsak ta’n
Nangma mite ka it na'ng in
Nangma deihna hih theih nading
Kong ngak hi, Topa Pasian aw
Ka lungsim sung, Hong vaaksak in
Kha Siangtho aw

zoTitle: A Nai A Gamla Lote Ah
verse1:
A nai a gamla lote ah
Ante minkhin zota hi
Sim leh zo, mual lo zaang lo ah
An vuite min zota hi
verse2:
Zingsang phalvaak tuung a hi zong
Sun kim ciang a hi zongin
Hong kuansak lai in nitaak zong
Lolai teng an khawm dingin
verse3:
Kuan meng un, Topa' sawltakte
An vuite kuai zota hi
An kaikhawm khin, ni hong tum teh
Lungdam in na ciah ding hi
chorus:
Topa aw, kote hong thumna
Hong ngai in, an nei Topa
An la ding mi hong kuansak in
An laak hun a kheng ma in

zoTitle: Seem Un, Khua Hong Mial Ding Hi
engTitle: Work, for the Night is Coming
verse1:
Seem un, khua hong mial ding hi
Zingsang tungin seem un
Zing dai nomlai in seem un
Khua tung lai seem un
Vai hamsaan' ciang zong seem un
Ni sa sung zong seem un
Mihing nasep kizawh hun
Zan hong tung ding hi
verse2:
Seem un, khua hong mial ding hi
Sun ni taan' lai seem un
Khuavaak laiteng hahkat un
Om ding hi, khawl hun
A hun bei khongsak kei un
Na manpha khat seem un
Mihing nasep nawn loh hun
Zan hong tung ding hi
verse3:
Seem un, khua hong mial ding hi
Ni kaii ciang zong seem un
Ni vaang kimuh lai seem un
Ni’n hong kheng ding tu’n
Hong taangkik nawn loh ding hun
Ni tum siang dong seem un
Khuamial kuan in zong seem un
Tawp hong hun ding hi

zoTitle: Thu Maan Ngam, Hang Ngam in
engTitle: Dare To Be Brave, Dare To Be True
verse1:
Lau lo, hang in, thu maan ngam in
Thumaan hanciam nang tawh Topa om hi
Hangtak do in, Na tha khauhsak in
Khazih'n lam honglak maanlo bek kihta’n
verse2:
Lau lo, hang in, thu maan ngam in
Pasian na Pa hi, na tung hong cing hi
Na thuakna thei in, Na lungsim thei
Hong hon ding sam in, Don lo cih omkei
verse3:
Lau lo, hang in thu maan ngam in
Na zawh nading, Pasian in tha hong guan
Mi dangte huh in, Gi tawntung in
Hong langpan pha pen, Na lawm suaksak in
chorus:
Do in, gal kap siam, Do in hangtak
Khazih’n hong makaih, hong gum ding hi

verse1:
Thukhaam bang zui dingin ah
Guihtheih khamtheih zu
Phat un a taang Danzila
Amah’n phatna a mu
verse2:
Danzila bang hilo aa
A lau aa om mi
Zum aa a lau mi inah
Kisiatna sung tung hi
verse3:
Huaiham, hehna, gitlohna
Tampi om hangin
Danzila zuite inah
Do ciangin a mang ding
verse4:
Dawi mang gilo kihta ke’n
En in, Danzila
Khai in lungdamna dial pei
Belh ciang nazo ding ta
chorus:
Khatguak om hangin ah Danzila bangin
Guih theihte tan nangin ah, lau lo-in gen in

engTitle: Yield Not to Temptation (duest S le A)
verse1:
Mawhna' zol zuikei in, Na zuih leh khial ding
Khatvei zophot lecin, A zom zawh nop ding
Pasal! nakpi’n do in, lunggulh na mialpi
Zeisu en gige in, Hong zawhpih ding hi
verse2:
Kholhpih gilo peel in, Kam hoihlo zang ke’n
Pasian' min zahtaak in, A mawkna’n zang ke’n
Thu khualin citak in, thumaan in migi
Zeisu en gige in, hong zawhpih ding hi
verse3:
A zote Pasian in, kham lukhu pia ding
I puuk kha zel hangin, Upna tawh zo ding
Eite hong Honpa in, tha hong guan' ding hi
Zeisu en gige in, hong zawhpih ding hi
chorus:
Hong huh nading thu ngen in
Tha hong pia hong keem ding hi
Hong huh nuam hi Topa in
A hong zawhpih ding hi

verse1:
Launa namkim omna mual kuamthuuk sung a hi zong
Launa omlo nitaang khuvaak sung mah a hi zong
Khua sia ta leh, khua pha ta leh ke’n khat thei ing
Zeisu’n hong zui peuh leh koima peuh pai ning
verse2:
Nuntaak lungdamna thupha ka puak peelmawh ding hi
Sehnel niso kaantan in, mawhna dim buaina ah
Keima meel bang pua in tua mun ka pha ding hi
Zeisu’n hong zui peuh leh koima peuh pai ning
verse3:
Mi dangte in a mau vangik pua in a om lai
Ke’n ka singlamteh pua in, inn ah ka om ding aa
Ama aa ding teci pangin upna lak ning
Kei tawh hong om peuh leh koima peuh om ning
chorus:
Zeisu tawh ton peuh leng pai ning
Koima peuh kei aa’n vantung hi
Koi ah om ta leng, hong om peuh leh
A singlamteh ka pua ding
Kei hamphatna hi
Zeisu'n hong zui peuh leh
Pai ning koima peuh

verse1:
Aw lawmte aw, dial pei en un
Vantung aa a khai
Hong huh ding Mangpa hong kuan ding
I zawhna a nai
verse2:
En un gal tampi hong pai aa
Dawi mang hong masa
Thahatte a kim sizo aa
Hanna beidek ta
verse3:
A vaanglian dial pei kimu hi
Peengkul aw kiza
Hong uk Mangpa a minpha tawh
Galte ka zo ta
verse4:
Gal kapna sawtvei haksa aa
Huhna hong nai hi
Hong uk Mangpa hong pai laitak
Lungdam khin un, ci
chorus:
Gal do in tu’n ka hong pai ding
Zeisu dial honglak
A thupha tawh om tawntung ning
Dial na lakkik sak

verse1:
Gal van a tawi tangvalte i hih ciangin
Kumpipa thupiak aw i ngai ding hi
"Kuan un" cihna thu i zak ciangin ah
Galkap maangpa kiang pan gal i do ding hi
verse2:
Gal van a tawi tangvalte i hih ciangin
Galkapna sungah galkap van cing ni
Gal kapna kiko aw i zak ciangin
"Hih lai ah kei ka om hi," ci in gen ni
verse3:
Gal van a tawi tangvalte i hih ciangin
Vaanglian sung Kumpi lukhu ngah ding hi
Gal kapna pha takpi’n gal i do ciang
Nuamna thaman sang kei hong saangsak ding hi
chorus:
Kuan, ci kiko na aw na ngai ta un
En un, a zawngkhal mite lungkia hi
Gal van a tawi tangval i hih ciangin
Galkap maangpa in ei hong muang ding hi
Gal van a tawi tangval i hih ciangin
Galkap maangpa in ei hong muang ding hi

zoTitle: Ding Un, Ding Un, Zeisu' Mi
engTitle: Stand up, Stand Up For Jesus (Tune: Webb)
verse1:
Ding un, ding un, Zeisu’ mi
Singlamteh galkapte
A kumpi dial saang khan un
Lelhna thuaksak lo ee
Gal khatkhit khat a ban in
Amah’n hong zawh pih ding
Gal khempeuh zawh khit ciangin
Khazih Topa'n maang ding
verse2:
Ding un, ding un, Zeisu’ mi
Mang un, peengkul sawlna
Galpi phualah va kuan un
Tuni Topa' nipha
Pasal, kisa teng kuan un
Galte a tam hangin
Tha leh tha ki siisak un
Hang seem un lau ciangin
verse3:
Ding un, ding un, Zeisu’ mi
Ama tha bek suang un
Mihing tha’n hong lelsak ding
No mau tha muang kei un
Pasian thu galvan bangin
Silh in, vil in, thungen
Gal leh sep ding om ciangin
A baih sa’n om khial ke’n
verse4:
Ding un, ding un, Zeisu’ mi
Gal beihak nawnlo ding
Tu’n gal kap nading zing ciang
Gal zawhna la ging ding
A zote khempeuh inah
Nuntaak lukhu ngah ding
Vaanglian Kumpipa kiangah
A tawntung maang khawm ding

verse1:
Min thanna tawh Topa hong pai
Ka mit in mukhin zo
Amah in hehna leenggah
Kikoihna lo, tuancil khinzo
Kihtaakhuai, a zaptel khuaphelep
A' namsau khahkhin zo
I Pasian’n mai nawt hi
verse2:
Giahphual zakhat kiim aa mei taangah
Amah mukhin ing
Nitaak dai nom lakah biakna tau lam uh
Ama aa ding Ama thukhenna maante
Mei taang kiaukiau ah simthei ing
I Pasian’n mai nawt hi
verse3:
Nungkik dinga, sam ngeilo ding
Peengkul Amah’n mut hi
A thukhenna tokhom mai ah
Mihingte' lungsim sit hi
Ka kha aw, Amah dawng meng in!
Nuam in, ka khe! nuamhuai hi
I Pasian’n mai nawt hi
verse4:
Tuipi galkhat, unok paak hoih lakah
Khazih suakkhin hi
Nang leh kei hong kikheel sak
A' angsung minthanna tawi hi
Mite siangsak ding hong sih bangin
Mi’ suahtaak na’ng si ni
I Pasian’n mainawt hi
chorus:
Min thang, min thang, Haleluiah
Min thang, min thang, Haleluiah
Min thang, min thang, Haleluiah
I Pasian mainawt hi

verse1:
Gal dona awng un, gal naizo, en un
Topa' dial khai un sang takin
Galdal silh inla, kiptak ding inla
Lai Siangtho' hilhna, na siiksan in
verse2:
Eima lam mahin zo ding theikhol in
Galte ngap thawhin i kuan hi
I lum leh i dial ni ah te zialzial
Thumaan in thukhial lel ngeilo hi
verse3:
Mi khempeuh' Pasian, hehpihna hong pia’n
Ko a neu a lian hong huh in
Gal zawh ciangin ah Nangma maitang ah
Hong suak nung zawhna lukhu khu in
chorus:
Khai leh! ding un, dial kiim hong kikhawm un
Limtak, kiging! na kihilh sawn un
Kuan un, mai nawt, Hawsiana kiko un
Khazih in makaih hi galkap hon

zoTitle: I Lungnuam Hi Zeisu Muang Leng
engTitle: Tis so Sweet to Trust in Jesus
crossrefs: Louisa M.R. Stead 1850-1917, S.H. 221, William J. Kirkpatrick, 1838-1921
verse1:
I lungnuam hi, Zeisu muang leeng
Ama hong gen bang um leeng
Ama hong kamciamna muang leeng
Topa’ hong cihna thei leeng
verse2:
I lungnuam hi, Zeisu muang leeng
Hong sawpna A si muang leeng
Hong dam, hong siangsak thei A si
Sungah upna tawh bual leeng
verse3:
I lungnuam hi, Zeisu muang leeng
Mawhna pumpi nusia leeng
Nuntaak, lungnop, tawldam, nuamna
Zeisu’ khut tung pan sang leng
verse4:
Zeisu kong muang theih ka nuam hi
A manpha lawmpa na hi
Hong Honpa aw, a tawp dongin
Nong ompih ding ka thei hi
chorus:
Zeisu, Zeisu, ke’n ka muang hi
A muanhuaina theizo ing!
Zeisu, Zeisu, manpha Zeisu
Amah muang semsem nuam ing!

engTitle: Who Is On the Lord's Side? (Tune: Armageddon)
verse1:
Topa lam kua pang ding? A na kua’n seem ding?
Kua in Amah huh ding? Mi dang kua’n puak ding?
Kua’n leitung na nusia? Kua’n gal do ding?
Topa lam kua pang ding? Kua kithawi pai ding?
A hehpih na’n hong sam, hehpih in hong sam
Topa lam ah i pang, Gumpa ko Nang aa
verse2:
Minthan nopna hilo, lukhu deih hilo
Na galkap ding tumin, galhang laam to ding
Na nuntakna pia aa, Nong sihna hang hi
Ama lam a pangte, Zeisu’n min ciamteh
Itna khau tawh hong khih, hehpih in hong sam
Topa lam i pang hi, Gumpa ko Nang aa
verse3:
Zeisu ko Nong leizo, Sum tawh lei hilo
Nangma sisan Nong bua, lukhu aa ding in
Na hehpihna dim hi, Nang kiang hong pai peuh
Kote Nong lawpsak aa, ko Nong suakta sak
A lian Gupkhiatna tawh, hehpih in hong gum
Topa lam ah i pang, Gumpa ko Nang aa

zoTitle: Kei Ka Singlamteh Zeisu'n Pua Khin
engTitle: Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken (Tune: Ellesdie)
verse1:
Zeisu’n puaksak ka singlamteh
Vangik khia’n Amah ka zui
Cihmawhna, gentheina ka thuak
Tu pan Nang aa ka hi ta
Lametna teng khempeuh siat hang
Zon'teng, lamet teng mu khin
Hauhna khempeuh kicing khin pah
Pasian leh van kei aa hi ta!
verse2:
Leitung mudah, nawlkhin thuakin
Gumpa nangawn a deihlo
Mihing lungsim in hong kheem hang
Na hikei, maanlo mi bang
Kei tung' Nong nuihmai ciangin ah
Itna, pilna, thahat Pa
Lawmte galten hong pelh uh hang, ko Nonglak hi vaangtaang Na mai
verse3:
Simmawh bawlsiat ka thuak ciangin
Nang ang hong tun' tuate hi
Nuntaak haksa’n hong netcip hang
Van pan tawldamna Nong puak
Na itna kei kiang om ciangin
Dahna om hang na salo
Nang kihel lohna mun peuhah
Lungnop hehnepna omlo hi
verse4:
Hehpihna tawh minthanna ah
Upna lum tawi thungen ding
Tawntung vantung nuntaakna sung
Pasian khut in hong khading
Leitung nasepna hun bei in
Vantung khual zinna bei ciang
Lametna hong kikheel ding aa
Upna’n mu thu ngenin phat ding

zoTitle: Mi Nam Kimte’ Pa Le Topa
engTitle: Dear Lord and Father of Mankind (Tune: Elton)
verse1:
Minam kimte Pa leh Topa
Ka hai tuntun uh tawh
Lungsim ngei hong guanpha inla
Hong guanin siangtho gamtatna
Zahtaakna a thuk zaw
verse2:
Syria tui gei aa mite in
Nangma sapna thupha
A zaak uh ciang mangpah bangin
Ko zong kamkhat beek nial lo-in
Hong zui pah nung, Nangmah
verse3:
Kote’ thuakna bei hun mateng
Daitui hong taak lai in
La khia’n lung sung noplohna teng
Nangma lungnopna a phateng
Ko tung ki langhsak in
verse4:
Kote’ lungsung deihna a sa
Hong mutkhing sakta in
Pumpi’ deihnate nialzo aa
Huihpi, meikuang, zinling sungah
Nang’ aw hong zasak in

engTitle: More Love to Thee, O Christ
verse1:
Hong it zaw ning Topa, hong it zaw ning
Khuk din aa kong thumna, Nang hong ngai ding
Hih bang hi kong thumna, Khazih hong it zaw ning
Hong it zaw ning, hong it zaw ning
verse2:
Ni dang leitung nopna, ka lunggulh pen
Tu in kong deih Nangmah, a hoihpha pen
Tu in kong deih Nangmah, Khazih hong it zaw ning
Hong it zaw ning, hong it zaw ning
verse3:
Dahna natna thuak hang, phanmawh salo
Nangma sawltaakte bang la ka sazo
Ka sakhawm amau bang, Khazih hong it zaw ning
Hong it zaw ning, hong it zaw ning
verse4:
Ka sih laitakin ah, Nang kong phat ding
Ka hu tawpna in ah, ka vaikhak ding
Ka ngen lailai hih mah, Khazih hong it zaw ning
Hong it zaw ning, hong it zaw ning

verse1:
Siantho na'ng hun zang in, thu ngen zelzel in
Ama sungah om in, A Thu'n kivaak in
Pasian Tate pawl in, a nangte huh in
Na khat na hih ciangin, donghkhial ngeikei in
verse2:
Siantho na'ng hun zang in, mi a kin zongin
Zeisu bek tawh om in, hun tampi zangin
Amah na sut na'ng in, etteh tawntung in
Ama lim langhsak in nang tatna panin
verse3:
Siantho na'ng hun zang in, hong pina zui in
A mai ah tai kei in, bang a ci zongin
Na nuam na dah zongin, Topa mah zui in
Zeisu en tawntung in, Ama thu muangin
verse4:
Siantho na'ng hun zang in, lung hi dide in
Ngaihsut a nam kimin, Amah uksak in
Kha Siangtho tua bangin kikai sak lecin
Vantung na seem dingin, siam ding sawt lo-in

engTitle: Prayer is the Soul's Sincere Desire (Tune: Lambesh)
verse1:
Thungetna in lungsim sung aa
Lunggulh takna a hi
Mei bang hong lumsak awm sung aa
Deihna lian pen a hi
verse2:
Khuisatna, khitui luanna zong
Thungetna mah a hi
Pasian lamet tohna bek zong
Thungetna mah a hi
verse3:
Mawhnei mi khat lungsim tak tawh
Kisiikin phun bek leh
Vantung mite'n nuam la kiko,
"En vaw, thu ngen ta ven"
verse4:
Thuzui ta ding thungetna in
Hinna hu bang a hi
Thungetna tawh sihkong panin
Vantung khua ah lut hi
verse5:
Nangmah, hinna, thuman lampi
Pa kiang tun nading in
Nangma totsa thunget lampi
Kote zong hong hilh in

zoTitle: Nang Tawh Nai Zaw Nuam Ing
engTitle: Nearer, My God, To Thee (Tune: Bethany)
verse1:
Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing, ka Pasian aw
Singlamteh thuak ta leng, hong domto aw
Thuak hang ka sasa ding, Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing
Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing, ka Pasian aw
verse2:
Zakoh bang ka vaak aa, ni tumta hang
Khuamial aa suangtum bek, ka lukham hang
Ka mang hong nainuam ing, Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing
Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing, ka Pasian aw
verse3:
Ka maiah honglak in, vantung lampi
Nong ngahsak khempeuhte, hehpihna hi
Vantung mi hong sam ding, Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing
Nang tawh naizaw nuam ing, ka Pasian aw
verse4:
Nangma min phatna tawh, ka khanglo ding
Ka dahna teng Pasian phat na'n nei ning
Tua bangin dahna hang, Nang tawh kinai zaw na'ng
Nang tawh kinai zaw na'ng, ka Pasian aw

verse1:
Hong pai san ke'n, migi Topa
Kong thum hong ngai in
Midangte kiang na baan bangmah
Kei hong khengkei in
verse2:
Hehpihna Na tokhom mai ah
Kisiik kong khukdin
Nang hong huhin ka up lahna
Noptuam hong pia in
verse3:
Nangma phatna bek ka suang hi
Na mai muh nading
Na thupha tawh Nong phel ding hi
Lungzan dam nading
verse4:
Ka nuamna teng bulpi Nangmah
Hinna sang phazaw
Leitung vantung omlo kuamah
Nang sang a phazaw
chorus:
Topa, Topa, kong thuum hong ngai in
Midangte kiang na baan bangmah
Kei hong khengkei in

verse1:
Hong gum Topa thupha piak na'ng
Guah zu ding thu kiza hi
Lei keute a neelkik nading
Kei zong guah hong khasak in
verse2:
Pa Pasian aw, hong taisan ke'n
Keimah ka lungtom hangin
Taisan ding ka kilawm zongin
Keimah hong lungngai lai in
verse3:
Hong gum Topa hong taisan ke'n
Nangma kiang kong beel nuam hi
Na thupha ka ngah nuamlua hi
Na deih bang hong piang ta hen
verse4:
Kha Siangtho aw, hong taisan ke'n
Mittaw khua na musak in
Zeisu thupha bel honglak in
Keima tungah hong taang in
chorus:
Keimah zong, keimah zong
Kei zong guah hong khasak in

zoTitle: A Hoih Huan Sung Thu Ngetna
verse1:
Zeisu hong ngakna mun huansung khat om
Tua in a lamdang munhoih khat hi
A vaang liatna khuavaakpi a taang hi
A hoih huansung thungetna mun ah
verse2:
Zeisu hong ngakna mun huansung khat om
Vangik pua kawmin Amah ka zuan
A kam sung pan hehnepna aw ka za
A hoih huansung thungetna mun ah
verse3:
Zeisu hong ngakna mun huansung khat om
Amah tawh kimu dingin hong sam
Topa tawh kimu kiho khawm dingin
A hoih huansung thungetna mun ah
chorus:
Aw, a hoih huansung
Huansung thungetna a hi
Aw, a hoih huansung thungetna hi
Hong Gumpa'n hongngak aa
Kongkhakpi hong honsak
A hoih huansung thungetna mun ah

zoTitle: I Mawhna Leh I Dahna Teng
engTitle: What a Friend We Have in Jesus
verse1:
I mawhna leh i dahna teng
A pua ding Zeisu i Lawm
Pasian kiangah i sapna teng
Thuum theih na'ng thupha a om
Lungnopna tampi i taan aa
Thuak loh ding pi i thuak hi
Na khempeuhte Pasian kiangah
Thuumin i koh loh hang hi
verse2:
Ze-et, bawlsiat a hi zong in
Lungkhamna khat peuh om maw
Cikmah ciang lungkia ngeilo in
Topa kiangah ko in aw
Dah teng thuakpih nuam Zeisu bang
Lawm maan dang muzo ding maw
Zeisu'n theikhin i sap bangbang
Ama kiangah ko in aw
verse3:
Lungkhamna vangik bang lel in
Zawngkhal in na thaneem maw
Manpha Honpa i belh hi in
Ama kiang thungen in aw
Mi'n hong simmawh hong huat ciangin
Zeisu kiang i pai ding hi
A' angsung hong pom hong dalin
Lungnopna hong pia ding hi

zoTitle: Topa Aw, Kei Hong Mangngilh Kei In
verse1:
Kei hong Honpa A si luangin
Ka Kumpi hong si maw?
Tangtel bangbek keimah aading
A' lutang hong zang maw
verse2:
Keima gitlohnate hangin
Singlamteh tung tau maw
Lamdang hehpihna leh itna
Bang tawh tehthei ding maw
verse3:
Ama piansak mi mawhna hang
A piangsak Pa Khazih
Hong sih laitak, khuamial sungah
Ni a buk mah ding hi
verse4:
Kei zong singlamteh ka muh ciang
Zum in ka kiseel diam
Lungdamna tawh lung nehno in
Ka khi ka luangsak diam
chorus:
Nang tung kong thumaan zawh na'ng in
Topa kei hong huh in
Kumpi tokhom Na luah ciangin
Kei hong mangngilh kei in

verse1:
Nang kong deih tawntung hi, migi ka To
Lungnopna hong piathei, a dang omlo
verse2:
Nang kong deih tawntung hi, naitak kei kiang
Ze-et na'n hong zolo, Nang Nong nai ciang
verse3:
Nang kong deih tawntung hi, nuam leng, dah leng
Nuntaak na'n man neikei, Nang hong taan leng
verse4:
Nang kong deih tawntung hi, hong thuhilh in
Nong khapsa a phate, hong ngahsak in
verse5:
Nang kong deih tawntung hi, siang pen Pa aw
Nang aa tak hong hi ning, Tapa pha aw
chorus:
Kong deih hi, Nang kong deih hi
Nang kong deih tawntung hi
Thupha hong pia'n, Topa aw
Nang kong zuan hi.

verse1:
Hinna tawntung Topa Pasian
Lawmte sang ka it zaw hi
Vantung lam kazon laitak ah
Topa kiang ka tawnnuam hi
(Nang kiangah)x4
Vantung lam ka zon laitak ah
Nang kiangah ka tawnnuam hi
verse2:
Leitung ah hauhna leh nuamna
Minthang thu ka ngenkei hi
Nangma kiang ka om laitak ah
Lungdam in ka seem ding hi
(Nang kiangah)x4
Nangma kiang ka om laitak ah
Lungdam in ka seem ding hi
verse3:
Mualkuam khua mialna sung hi hang
Tuipi gal ah hongkha in
Hin tawntung na kongpi sungah
Nangmah tawh hong lutsak in
(Nang kiangah)x4
Hin tawntung na kongpi sungah
Topa kiang ka lut ding hi

zoTitle: Na Deihna Bang Hi Ta Hen
verse1:
Ka Topa aw, Nangma kiangah
Lampi haksa pai khawm lai ah
Hong cisak thei in
"Na deihna bang hi ta hen"
verse2:
Dahna ka thuak, lawmte sita
Hih hang Na thu ngaihsun lai ah
Hih bang gen ding hi'ng
"Na deihna bang hi ta hen"
verse3:
Na Kha Siangtho in keima hong kha
Hong kipsak ding hong paisak in
Hih thu genlai hi'ng
"Na deihna bang hi ta hen"
chorus:
Nangma deihna, bang hi ta hen
Hong cisak thei in
"Na deihna bang hi ta hen"

engTitle: Saviour, More Than Life to Me
verse1:
Topa bek hong phelthei hi
Keimah in ah Na kiang ka beel hi
Na sipha tawh hong sawp in
Na kiangah hong omsak tawntung in
verse2:
A kisia thei leitung ah
Dam takin keimah lam hong hilh ta
Topa bek i up ciangin
Cikmah hunin lam khial nawnlo ding
verse3:
Sih ding hun hong tun mateng
Vantung innpi nuam sung tun mateng
Nang kong up na'ng khangsak in
Topa tawh kikhen nawnlo dingin
chorus:
Ni simin, nai simin
Sipha thanna theisak in
Hehpih aa, Nong itna tawh
Khau bangin ah keimah hong hen in

zoTitle: Nang Ading Thu Ka Ngen Hi
verse1:
Hong gum Topa in kei aa ding thu ngen hi
Topa it huai hih leitung ah zuitawm hi
Tu in Topa in, nuamtak kei hong cinglai hi
Amah in nang gumpa piang ta hen, ka ci
verse2:
Nuam tawntung ding i lawpna maan takpi hi
Hehpihna hong pia Topa Pasian om hi
Topa mai muh ding hong sap hong sawtlo ding hi
Nangmah hong hilh hen keimah tawh paikhawm ni
verse3:
Gunpi bang nopsakna kei aa ding omzo
Hih nopsakna leitung mite'n theilo hi
Hong gum Topa in hong uk hong piazo bek hi
Nang zong hong pia hiam keimah'n kathei nuam hi
verse4:
Topa Zeisu in hong zong hong muh ciangin
It huai Topa in nang hong phelthu gen in
Topa min mi lakah a than na'ng thu ngen in
Nang taang nget kingah zo, nang zong ngah ding hi
chorus:
Nang aa ding thu ka ngen,
Nang aa ding thu ka ngen
Nang aa ding thu ka ngen
Nang aa ding thu ka ngen

crossrefs: C.W. 337, Rev. William W. Walford 1772-1850, William Batchelder Bradbury (1816-1868)
verse1:
Thunget hun nuam, thunget hun nuam
Lungkhamna pan hong samkhia aa
Ka deih ka sapna a tuamtuam
Ka gentheih hun ka Pa mai ah
Dahna hong tun ciang thungen leng
Ka lungsim hong nuamtuam sak aa
Mawhna'n hong zol ciang thungen leng
Dawimangpa' thaang pan ka suakta.
verse2:
Thunget hun nuam, thunget hun nuam
Va lenpih in keima thumna
Keima kha thupha a pia nuam
Thuman a dik Pasian kiangah
Keima mai ah um in, muangin
Hong pai in, hong cihkhit nung sang
Thunget hun nuam hong tun simin
Lungkhamna teng Amah suan ta'ng
verse3:
Thunget hun nuam, thunget hun nuam
Kei lungsim hong hehnem lai in
Pasian hong ciam Kanan gam nuam
Luah ding ka lentoh mateng in
Hih ka pumpi puan bang suah aa
Sang dingin tul ngeilo noptuam
Ka lentoh ciang khaning mangpha
Thunget hun nuam, thunget hun nuam

engTitle: Tis the Blessed Hour of Prayer
verse1:
Thungetna hun pha hi aa, lungsim i niamkhiat ciang
I lawm leh Honpa Zeisu kiang i kikhop ciang
Ama hutna ngah ding muanna tawh zuan leng Amah
Tua lai ah va kihel leeng, damna zatui hi pah
verse2:
Thungetna hun pha hi aa, ze-etna a thuakte
Honpa kiangah a dahna uh hongpuak uh teh
Amah'n hong khasiat in, hong paihsak i haksatna
Tua lai ah va kihel leeng, damna zatui hi pah
verse3:
Thungetna hun pha hi aa, Honpa a hong pai ciang
A mite ngai dingin ah Amah hong om ciang
I haksatna teng khempeuh i va puak ciang Amah
Tua lai ah va kihel leeng, damna zatui hi pah
verse4:
Thungetna hunpha sungah, A thupha i ngette
Peel lo-in ngah ding cih kiptak in i up leh
Nopna kidim sungah beipah ding i haksatna
Tua lai ah va kihel leeng, damna zatui hi pah
chorus:
Thungetna hun nuam
Hun nuam thungetna
Tua lai ah va kihel leeng
Damna zatui hi pah

verse1:
Lunggim mi aw, inn nuam om hi
Lungkhamna, gimnate gal ah
Kikheel ngei nawn lohna innpi
Kua tung nuamlo ding tua lai ah
verse2:
Leitungah na thuak ding a hi
Vangik lel aa na kun hangin
En in, na tun nading innpi
Ngak in, lungneem in ah ngak in
verse3:
Na lampi ah ling a om leh
A' lu tung a khu Pa phawk in
Lunggimna, dahna na tuah leh
Nang sang siangzaw Pa'n zong thuak khin
verse4:
Sem in, na thuakna, na thumna
Hong zakloh khat beek omlo hi
Na ngah nading hi tawldamna
Lungneem takin na ngak ding hi
chorus:
Ngak in, thuakin thum lo-in ngak in
Ngak in, thuakin thum lo-in ngak in
Ngak in, ngak in, thum lo-in ah ngak in

verse1:
Hong gum Topa, ngai in, Nang kiang kong nai hi
Ka leiba loh dingin, Nangmah na si hi
Na minpha tawh mawh phelna
Nang kong up ciang ka ngah hi
Topa hong beel dingin, Na kiang kongnai hi
verse2:
Hong gum Topa ngai in, hehpihna kong ngen
Thupha tawh hong gum in, launa beisak in
Na thuciamna ka um hi
Na thupha bel ka muang hi
Hong gum Topa Pasian, Na kiang thu kong ngen
verse3:
Topa aw, hong it in, keimah hong la in
Keimah bek leitung ah, hong paisak kei in
Keima lam hong taangsak in
Na minthang ka kimkot ah
Nang aa ding taangsak in, ka belh suangpi aw
verse4:
Topa aw, hong liah in, Na kiang hongkoih in
Na nasep zawh mateng, lampi honghilh in
Tua ciangin lungdamna la
Ka sa ding hi, vantungah
Topa tawh tua munah, om nuam tawntung ing

verse1:
Gupkhiatna ngah ding Pasian in thu hong ciam zo
Ama Tapa Zeisu min a um khempeuhte
verse2:
Tua lampi gamdai in a lauhuai hangin ah
Topa Zeisu in kei hong paipih zo ding hi
verse3:
Ka it ka ngaih tampi vantung gamsung tungzo
Lungmuang tak tua gamah hih lapi sa uh hi
verse4:
Naupang note Ama kiangah dinguh ka mu
Gupkhiatna la sa uh, Amah na nui hiuhiau
verse5:
Kikhopna sung kumpite kamsangte ka mu
Kham kongzing lampite zui in la sa uh hi
verse6:
Nang leh kei aa ding in tua lai ah la om hi
A tawntung in tua lai i phat tawntung ding hi
chorus:
Haleluiah khin zo, Tapa min ka umzo
Ama sisan in kei hong gumkhia khin zo ta
Haleluiah khin zo, Tapa min ka umzo
Ama sisan in kei hong gumkhia khin zo ta

verse1:
Sum haupa a inn phabel kongkhak kiangah
Topa Pasian ta khat a tu hi
Leitung ah gimna, tawlna khempeuh a ngah
A sih khitciang a nuambel ngah hi
verse2:
Gimna bei in si leeng, bang i piang ding maw
Eimah in sin sungah ngaihsun hi
Leitung ah nuntaakna vangik pua bang hi
Dahna khitui luannate om hi
verse3:
Zeisu nungzuite in sum a tawm hangin
Vantung khua ah om sum lamdang hi
Ze-et bawlsiatna teng i paisan ding hi
Nung ciang kikhel ding lungdamna hi
verse4:
Topa Pasian omna mailam paita hen
Pilna a hun tawh Topa hilh in
Na sepna a tawm hang za ngahna a lian
Singlamteh pua, khamlukhu khu in
chorus:
A nopna sungah vantung mite'n paipih
Van kim lai ah la sa aw dim hi
Vantung inn nuam sungah Topa in la hi
A itte tawh nopna a ngah hi

verse1:
Keimah ka muanna a bulpi
Zeisu si leh siangthona hi
A dang thu teng ka umngam kei
Zeisu Amin bek ka umthei
verse2:
Khuamial in a mai liah ciangin
A hong hehpihna ka muang ding
Huihpi naakpi a nun ciangah
Mun liahna sungah siikkip khia
verse3:
A thuciamna te Ama si
Tuipi kan lai ka muang ding hi
Ka kiimkot teng a siat ciangah
Ka muanna in Zeisu Topa
verse4:
Peengkul aw tawh A pai ciangin
Amah mai ah ka ding nuam hi
A hong siangtho sak khit ciangin
Mawh neilo in ka om ding hi
chorus:
Keima dinna Zeisu Suangpi
Omna dang teng sehneel bang hi
Omna dang teng sehneel bang hi

verse1:
Topa thuciamna pha muang takin om ning
A tawntung in hong gum Topa vaang um ning
A minthang hi ci inah ka kiko hi
A thuciamna pha ka muang ding hi
verse2:
A sia theilo Topa thuciamna ka muang
Up khialh man aa launa huih bang hong nun hang
Nuntaak nang aa, a thupha bel tawh zawh nang
A thuciamna pha ka muang ding hi
verse3:
Tu in a thuciamna muangin ka om hi
A sipha tawh hong sawp leh ka siang ding hi
Mawhna sung pan suahtaak ding thu ka ngah hi
A thuciamna pha ka muang ding hi
verse4:
Topa Zeisu na thuciamna ka muang hi
A thupha tawh khau bangin hong hen ding hi
Kha Siangtho tawh dawimangpa ka zo ding hi
A thuciamna pha ka muang ding hi
chorus:
Muang in, om ning
Hong gum Topa Pasian thuciamna pha muang ning
Muang in, om ning
Hong gum Topa Pasian thuciam muang ning

zoTitle: Zeisu Bek'n Nuamna Hong Pia Thei
verse1:
Aw Topa Zeisu kei lungsim
Na thu ka um man aa
Sawtpi ka zong a nopna in
Lungdamna ka ngah ta
verse2:
Lungdamna ka zon laitak in
Topa ka mangngilh hi
Hong gum Topa ka nial ciangin
Hong it a hong zol hi
verse3:
Leitung aa nopnate deih in
Lungkim ngah dingin ah
Hahkat in aa ka zon hangin
Lung kiatna teng ka ngah
verse4:
Zeisu hong it thupha inah
Keimah ka ngah ma in
Si thei nopna lungsim neih hang
Topa ka ngaihsun ke'n
chorus:
Tuni Zeisu sim loh inah
Deihna dang omlo pi
Itna, hinna, tawntung nopna
Topa kiang ka ngah hi

verse1:
Topa thu kiciamna thei aa
Up khialna ka pai ding hi
Lung kiatna thuak loh na'ng in ah
A thupha ka um ding hi
verse2:
Kimawh sakna Zeisu in ah
A sipha tawh hong sawp hi
Keimah hong siangthosak zo ta
Innpi ah hong kha ding hi
verse3:
Topa Zeisu hong hehpih man
Kihtaak launa omlo hi
Ka lampi ah khua a mial hang
Khuavaak hong taangsak ding hi
verse4:
Ka nuamna teng Zeisu ka pia
Amah bek ke'n ka deih hi
Amah in leitung teng uk aa
Deihna teng A kiang om hi
verse5:
Ka vekpi in Zeisu ka pia
Ka lungsim ka pum khempeuh
Ka lametna a om khempeuh
Tawntung Ama kiang om hi
chorus:
A kicing hi, a thupha pi
Keimah in ah ka um hi
A kicing hi, a thupha pi
Keimah in ah ka um hi

verse1:
Um un, a umte'n um un
Galdona a sawt hang
Nangma zawhtheih nading in
Nang lam Topa pang hi
verse2:
Um un, gal a tam hangin
A lauhuai lampi ah
Ze-etna a tam hangin
Lam hong hilh ding, Topa
verse3:
Topa'n hong gumzo ding hi
I Zawlpa phabel hi
Um un, a umte'n zo ding
I Zawlpa phabel hi
chorus:
(Um un, um un) x2
Khuamial a lauhuai hang
(Um un, Um un) x2
Khua hong vaak dektak hi

engTitle: The Way of the Cross Leads Home
verse1:
Singlamteh lam tawnin ka ciah kuul ding hi
Tua lo lam dang om lopi
Tua khuavaak kongpi tung theingei kei ning
Singlamteh lam ka khialhkhak leh
verse2:
Singlamteh phung ka van teng tolh khiakhin hi
Topa mai ka muh ciangin
Lungtaii tak tua lam tawn ding kong kipan
Ka lungsung phatna tawh kidim
verse3:
Si kithehna lam tawn ka ciahsuak ding hi
Topa totsa lampi mah
A dawn dongin kei ka kahtoh theih leh
Pasian inn sung ka kha teeng ding
chorus:
(Singlamteh'n inn lam hong hilh) x2
Mailam ka pai ciangin nuam semsem ding
Singlamteh in inn lam hong hilh

engTitle: There's a Wideness in God's Mercy (Tune: Wellesley)
verse1:
Pasian hehpihna zailua hi
Tuipi lian bangin zai hi
A thukhenna ah thumaan hi
Suahtaakna sang zaizaw hi
verse2:
Mi mawhte dawnin vaitut hi
Hehpihna thu Honpa kiang
Tam sem hi, miphate aa ding
A sisung damna om hi
verse3:
Bang hang hiam cih leh, teh zawh loh
Pasian hong itna hang hi
Nuntaak tawntungna lung tangin
A migiitna lamdang hi
verse4:
Ei itna, a neem ngi-ngei leh
Ama thu bang zui ding aa
Topa' citna ciamna sungah
I nuntaakna taang ding hi

zoTitle: Topa Zeisu Nang Hong Muang Ding
engTitle: I Am Trusting Thee, Lord Jesus
verse1:
Topa Zeisu Nang hong muang ing
Nang bek hong muang ing
Gupna ngah ding Nang hong muang ing
Khawnkhong, cing
verse2:
Mawhmai nading Nang hong muang ing
Na khe mai kong kun
Na hehpihna leh na thupha
Muang ing, tu'n
verse3:
Thahat nading Nang hong muang ing
Nang tha puuk ngeilo
Nangma'n kei nong piak ding thu te'n
Zo den zo
verse4:
Topa Zeisu Nang hong muang ing
Hong puuksak ngei ke'n
Vekpi aa ding Nang hong muang ing
Tawntung den
verse5:
Hong sawpsiang ding ci'n ka um hi
Sisan gunpi sung
Hong siangsak ding ci'n ka um hi
Na si tawh
chorus:
Ke'n hong muang ing
Nang bek hong muang ing
Ke'n hong muang ing, muang ing
Nang bek hong muang ing

zoTitle: Lam Tawntung A Hong Paipih Hi
engTitle: All the Way My Saviour Leads Me
verse1:
Lam tawntung A hong paipih hi
A dang bang ka ngennawn diam
Khan tawntung lam hong hilhzo hi
Hong itna ka muangkhial diam
Amah muang leng leitung ah zong
Vantung nopna pha kanei
Kei tungah bangbang hong tung zong
Zeisu'n a phabawl ka thei
Kei tungah bangbang hong tung zong
Zeisu'n a phabawl ka thei
verse2:
Lam tawntung A hong paipih hi
Lam haksa hang lungnuam sak
Ze-etna zawh na'ng hong hehpih
Hinna Anlum in hong vak
Ka kha tui duh dangtak in vul
Ka khe tawl puukdek laitak
Ka maiah Suangpi pan hong phul
En un lungdamna tuinaak
Ka maiah Suangpi pan hong phul
En un lungdamna tuinaak
verse3:
Lam tawntung A hong paipih hi
Kicing lamdang hong itna
Tawl damna tak, hong khaamzo hi
Vantung ka Pa' inn sungah
Sih nawn lohna puan bang silhin
A taang gam kakaii ding hi
Tua ciang sa ning a tawntungin
Zeisu'n hong kha mualsuak hi
Tua ciang sa ning a tawntung in
Zeisu'n hong kha mualsuak hi

zoTitle: Thupha Guah Bang Hong Zu Ding Hi
engTitle: There Shall Be Showers of Blessing
verse1:
"Thupha guah bang hong zu ding hi"
Itna tawh hong ciam bangin
Tha malhna hun hong tung ding hi
Hong buaksuk ding Topa in
verse2:
"Thupha guah bang hong zu ding hi"
Thahat kiikna a manpha
Hong ging zuazua ding hi, tampi
Mual tung, guam sung, mun tengah
verse3:
"Thupha guah bang hong zu ding hi"
Hong buaksuk in Topa aw
Thathak tu in, Nong guan' ding hi
Nong ciamsa hong tungsak aw
verse4:
"Thupha guah bang hong zu ding hi"
Tu ni'n hong zu taleh maw
Zeisu kiangah thu i ngen hi
Pulak in Pa kiang i mawh
chorus:
Thupha guahzu bang
Thupha guah i kisam hi
Hehpihna mal hong kia teei hang
Hong zusuk hen a tampi

zoTitle: A Ki Gelh Hiam Ka Min?
verse1:
Topa hauhna ngaihsun ke'ng
Kham leh ngun lunggulh ke'ng
Vantung gam ciam masa ning
Tuu kuamsung lut nuam ing
Vantung gam laipi sungah
Na' ciamtehna sungah
A kigelh hiam keima min
Zeisu aw, hong gen in
verse2:
Gun gei aa, sehnel bangin
Ka mawhna tam hangin
Topa aw, Nong tatna si
Kei aa ding kicing hi
Na thu ciamtehna laipi
Mual theilo ding taang hi
"Na mawh si bang san hangin
Paaksak ning vuuk bangin"
verse3:
A siangtho khuapi sungah
Innpite taang mahmah
Vaangliat na ngah aa mite
A puansilh uh a tee
Tua a phate siasak ding
Bangmah tum theilo ding
Vantung mite' cinna ah
Ka om ding hi keimah
chorus:
Gam ciamtehna sungah
Nuntaakna lai sungah
Vantung ka tun theih na'ng in
A kigelh hiam ka min

crossrefs: Word: S.S. 627, Tune: S.S. 1099, Ira David Sankey (1840-1908), Jessie H. Brown (1861-1921)
verse1:
Zeisu tawh mun khempeuh ka paikhawm ding hi
Kikhen lo-in hong khakna kazui ding hi
A khe kiangah tu leng launa omlo aa
Zeisu tawh paikhawm ding hi
verse2:
Mun khempeuh kei guak hi keng, Zeisu tawh hi'ng
Lawmte'n nusiat hangin Zeisu kei-aa hi
Lam haksat hang, A khut tawh hong kha ding aa
Zeisu tawh paikhawm ding hi
verse3:
Zeisu tawh mun khempeuh kei ka lumthei aa
Sihna a liim in hong kiimkot hangin ah
Ka thawh ciang kawivaak nawnlo ding ka thei hi
Zeisu tawh paikhawm ding hi
chorus:
Paikhawm, Zeisu tawh paikhawm ding
Paikhawm, mun khempeuh pai ding
Paikhawm, Zeisu tawh paikhawm ding
Mun khempeuh ah Zeisu tawh pai ding

zoTitle: Ka Kha Aading A Hoih Hi
engTitle: It Is Well With My Soul
verse1:
Gunpi taanglo bang nuam na'ng nong hilhna in
Dahna tui bangin hong let hi
Topa hong hilhna pha hi ka kha aa ding
Hoih bel hi, kha aa ding, hoih bel hi
verse2:
Dawi in hong khem aa, bawlsiatna hong tun' hang
Ka up ding a thuciam om hi
Topa Zeisu in ka thaneem hong en hi
Hoih bel hi, kha aa ding, hoih bel hi
verse3:
Hong it aa, a nuam i ngaihsut ciangin ah
Ka mawh ka khialhna sung panin
Ka suahtaak nading singlamteh tung si hi
Ka lungsim in ka phat hi Topa
verse4:
Topa Zeisu tu nung ciang hong pai ding hi
Ka lungkhamna teng beiding hi
Topa hih leitungah hong pai dingin ah
Ka Kha Siangtho aa ding a pha hi
chorus:
Hoih bel hi, hoih bel hi
Kha aa ding, kha aa ding
Hoih bel hi, hoih bel hi, kha aa ding

verse1:
Jerusalem khua, nang in bawngnawi khuaizu omna
Nangmah ka lungngaih laitak
Ke'n lamdang ka sa ta
Keima aa ding lungdamna, leh nopna a tampi
Ke'n ka theihloh min thanna
Tua santak ah om hi
verse2:
Zion khua innpi sungah, bawlsiat a thuakte leh
Puanpaak silh vantung mite
Bang in ah la sa veh
Topa in amau kiangah, A om tawntung ding hi
Thupha a ngahte omna
Ni a taang tawntung hi
verse3:
Davuih tokhom a om leh
Gimna bei khit ciangah
Galzo leh a lam mite' lasakna aw kiza
Hih mite in Topa aw, galdona ah zo ci
Tawp ngeilo tawntung in ah
Puanpaak silh ding uh hi
verse4:
Gam lamdang a phabel in, Pasian thuzui omna
Gam lamdang a phabel in
A muang mite' deihna
Zeisu na hehpihna in, tua khua hong paipih in
Pasian leh Kha Siangtho tawh
Minphatna ngah ta hen

zoTitle: A Tawntung Ihmu Cip Ding I Hi Kei
engTitle: We Shall Sleep, But Not For Ever
verse1:
Ihmu leeng khangma cip lo-in
Minthanna khua hong vaak ding
Hinkiik ni ciang kimu kik leeng
I kikhen nawnkei ding hi
A thuuk bel gunpi sung panin
Sehneel gam khampi panin
Mual dawn, mual kuam gamlak panin
Mi tampi hongtho ding hi
verse2:
Paak hoih bang aa i deih mahmah
I lung hihmawh phat mahmah
I angsung pan i laakkhiat ciang
Lian mahmah hi, i dahna
Ni a tumdek mateng in ah
Han kiang ngak aa om i hi
Eite paak i it manin ah
Lametna beibang kisa
verse3:
Eite a tawntung han sungah
Khangma cip ding i hikei
Hong sap ciangin, thupha a pia
Topa'n thupha ngahta hen
Sihna om ngeinawn lohna mun
A kip tawntung khuapi ah
Omna inn nuam ngah dingin ah,
Hong deih leh hong sam ding hi
chorus:
Ihmu leeng khangma cip lo-in
Min thanna khua vaak ding hi
Hinkiik ni ciang kimu kiik in
I kikhen nawnkei ding hi

verse1:
Thupha khuavaak sungah, Zeisu tawh pai lai ah
Eite paina lam hong taangsak hi
A deih bang zuih ciangin, Amah tawh paikhawm in
A thu ngai aa muang aa om ding hi
verse2:
Van a gikte pua aa, gimna tawlna thuakna
Topa hong hehpihna kicing hi
Eite launa ding aa, Dawimangpa hong khemna
Zeisu thu ngai in muang leeng bei hi
verse3:
Ni liim ahih hangin, meiikai ahih hangin
Zeisu in thakhat a hawlkhia hi
Launa leh kihtaakna, tauna leh kahnate
Zeisu i muanlai in om thei kei
verse4:
Ki-itna pha tawh mah, Topa Zeisu mai ah
Kikhawm ciangin lam paikhawm ding hi
Thu hong piakna ngai aa, hong sawlna pai ding aa
Cikmah hun lau lo-in nuam ding hi
chorus:
Muang un, ngai un. Lampi dang omlo hi
Zeisu kiang nuam ngah dingin
Muang in a thu ngai un

verse1:
Lungdam thu khatvei ngai dih in
Gumpa kiang pan, na za hiam
Hong sapna dawnglo ding na hiam?
Topa lam na kihei diam?
verse2:
Khua hun tampi beisak zo teh
Tam veipi tuuktung theiteh
Khua khal in phalbi vuuktui tah
Nang lah mawh sung kawivaak teh
verse3:
Zeisu in nang deih bang hong ngak
Vaakvaak lo khentat pak in
Kha Siangtho hong hah zol lai in
Gumpa lam zongin zui in
verse4:
Na lungsim Pasian kiang pia in
Khazih si um in muang in
En to in, Zeisu vantung om
A kamciam pelhsak lo hi
chorus:
A umte'n zuan, a umte'n zuan
Zeisu zuan in hing ta un
A umte'n zuan, a umte'n zuan
Zeisu zuan in hing ta un

verse1:
Hih leitung aa dahna khempeuh paaikhia in
Nitak hun ciangin ah, damdam lungngai in
Thukpi in phum inla, pha takpi'n seel in
Zeisu kiangah gen in, thupha hong pia ding
verse2:
Zeisu kiangah gen in, na dahna thei hi
Zeisu kiang gen lecin, huhna hong pia ding
Na lampi hong taan ciang, pai in kaikhawm in
Thu ngen in na dahna, na van zang ding hi
verse3:
Dahna lungkhamna tawh, khua a mial hangin
Nang sang aa a gimzaw, mi dangte huh in
Na dahna paaikhia in, thupha ngah nading
Mi dangte aa ding zong, Zeisu kiang gen in

verse1:
Nisim in Zeisu a min
Um in, huihpi nun ciangin
Thu upna a tawm hangin
Zeisu bek umin muang in
verse2:
Kha Siangtho keimah tungah
Hong taang hi, ka sin sungah
Lam hong hilh leh puuk zolo
Zeisu bek thu umkhin zo
verse3:
Lam a nop leh la sa ta
Khua hong mial leh thum inla
Gimna thuak ciang thu ngen in
Zeisu bek um in muang in
verse4:
Ka nuntaak lai van leh lei
Bei mateng umkhial nawnkei
Tun' mateng vantung khuapi
Zeisu bek i um ding hi
chorus:
Nisim in Zeisu Topa
Um in beelin muang inla
Lai Siangtho hong hilh bangin
Zeisu bek um in muang in

zoTitle: Aw, Zeisu Bang Zah'n Ka It
verse1:
Ka zaknop min khat a om hi
Tua min la'n sak tham hi
Tua min bil ah la bang ka za
Leitung aa minngaih bel
verse2:
Hong Gumpa itna hong gen hi
Hong tankhia ding si hi
Ama si manpha hong hilh hi
Mawhnei mi mawh maina
verse3:
Pa neih khempeuh kei hong hilh hi
Nisim sapna khempeuh
Khuamial sung lam ka paikhak ciang
Lampi in hong taangsak
verse4:
Hong itna lungtak hong gen hi
Khialhna khempeuh phawksak
Dahnate Amah'n hong puakpih
Puakpih nuam dang omkei
chorus:
Bang zah'n Zeisu ka it
Bang zah'n Zeisu ka it
Bang zah'n Zeisu ka it
Hong it masak hang hi

verse1:
Ciamna kip thupha, Zeisu kei aa
Pasian vaanglian bang hong ciamsakna pha
Hot khiatna luahpa, Pasian' leisa
Kha Siangtho a suak, si a sawpsa
verse2:
Thu manna cing aa, cing hi nuamna
Ka mit kha'n ka mu hi lianpi nuamna
Vantung mite in, ka bil sungah
Hehpihna, itna, hong gen ka za
verse3:
Thu manna cing hi, tawlnga khin hi
Hong Honpa sung lung nuamin ka om hi
Vil kawm, ngak kawmin, ka ento hi
Ama hoihna, itna hong dim hi
chorus:
Ka gengen ding hi, ka sasa ding
Hong Honpa phatna sun ni lohin
Ka gengen ding hi, ka sasa ding
Hong Honpa phatna sun ni lohin

verse1:
Thupha khuavaak mualsang tungah
Pasian' mite dingun
Zan khuamial hong liah ma in ah
Mai nawtin ah kuan un
Mual kuam sunga galte sim ding
Thaneih teng siit kei ni
I thei hi, leitung zawh nading
Upna i nei ding hi
verse2:
Ama hong itna dial nuai ah
A Thu tem bang zangin
A zosa mi siangte' khap mah
A zui lai eite in
Upna tawh huihpi nung banah
Galte nawk gawp uh aa
Sihna a zawhna uh upna mah
Hi lai ei muanna
verse3:
I ziat, i vei, i kiimkot ah
Galte in hong pang hi
Noptat maan'na nusia in ah
Pai un, do ding kuan ni
Hotkhiatna lukhu khu in ah
Thumaan i teeng ding hi
Lei liing ding hi i khe nuai ah
I aw'n mualthawn ding hi
chorus:
Upna in zawhna hi
Upna in zawhna hi
Upna in zawhna ding hi
Leitung zawh gawp nading

verse1:
A dahte hong pai un, na vulna pan un
Hehpih tokhom mai ah, hong khukdin un
Na lung liamna, natna, hong pai hong gen un
Vantung' damsak lah dahna omlo hi
verse2:
Lungsim hawmte' nuamna, lamkhial te' khuavaak
Vul ngeilo, mual ngeilo, lawpna honglak
Kha Siangtho Huhpa in hong neem hi nuamtak
"Vantung' damsak lah dahna omlo hi"
verse3:
En un, Hinna Anlum, en un, Hinna tui
Pasian' tokhom maipan hong luangsuk tui
Hong pai un, hih lai ah, itna pawi kilui
Vantung' damsak lah dahna omlo hi

zoTitle: Zeisu In Nangma Dahna A Thei Hi
verse1:
Dahna a om khempeuh Topa Zeisu'n thei
Lungsim kisiikna leh thungetna zong thei
Lau keei lo-in um in, na lung khauhsak in
Na van Topa suan in, hong nuamsak ding hi
verse2:
Zeisu lungsim sungah nang pha hong sa hi
Na galte khut sungah nang hong gum ding hi
Ama deihna bangin lam hong hilh ding hi
A vaang taanna mun ah na tungthei ding hi
verse3:
Gal na do Zeisu'n thei, na thumna za hi
Na lunggim lam thei, na kikona za hi
Na kha tha khauh na'ng in, na tailoh na'ng in
Lungsim nuam hong pia ding, na khitui nul ding

crossrefs: 1 Peter 1:8, SS. 659, W.R. Featherston (1846-1873), Rev. Adoniram J. Gordon (1836-1895)
verse1:
Zeisu aw, kong it hi, kei aa Na hi ta
Nangma hang, mawhna nuam namcin ka khia ta
Keimah hong Tanpa, hong Honpa Na hi ta
Kong it ngei leh zong, tu'n kong it phasem ta!
verse2:
Tun' Nang kong it hang Nangma'n Nong it masa
Nong it ma'n singlamteh tung Nong tanzo ta
Ling lukhu Na tal tungah kikhen zo ta
Kong it ngei leh zong, tu'n kong it phasem ta!
verse3:
Hong it tawntung ning hinna, sihna sungah
Hong phat tawntung ning, hu Nong kawmlai in ah
Sihna daitui ka tal ah kaai ciangin ah
Kong it ngei leh zong, tu'n kong it phasem ta!
verse4:
Nuamsak tawntungna minthang innpi sungah
Na min hong phat tawntung ning a taang van ah
Zawhna lukhute khu in sa ning hih mah
Kong it ngei leh zong, tu'n kong it phasem ta!

verse1:
Hih Zawdan gunah tui kiphum dingin ah
Mawh neite khempeuh hong kikhawm ta
Topa thupha a umte khempeuh in ah
Zawdan gunah a sam uh a pha
verse2:
Hih Zawdan gun geiah ding aa omte in
Vantung la aw tawlkhat ngai uh hi
Mihing khempeuh mawhnate a phel Topa
Vantung tokhom kiangah hong mu hi
verse3:
Vantung pan aa thu hongpiak a aw in ah
"Ka Pa in nang hong mu hong pai in
Ka Pa zong nang hangin ah a lungdam hi"
Vantung khua siiklongpi tumsak in
verse4:
Ni tumta zingsang in hong tumkiik mateng
Tu in tate aw hong ciah meng un
Ka Pa in zong vantung mite kiangah gen
A lamdang thupha na theisak un
chorus:
"Vaang lian, vaang lian," vantung mi'n ci hi
La sa uh hi min phatna la hi
"Haleluiah vaang lian minthanna pha ci," ci
Vantung sang innpi zelsak uh hi

zoTitle: Zeisu In Ka Lung Sungah Tum Hi
engTitle: Since Jesus Came into My Heart
verse1:
Topa Zeisu ka lung sungah hong lut phetin
Ka lungsim hong kikheel pah hi
Topa Zeisu ka lungsung ah hong tum phetin
Ka lung sung khua hong vaak pah hi
verse2:
Topa Zeisu ka lung sungah hong lut phetin
Lam ka khial nawnkei pah ding hi
Topa Zeisu ka lungsung ah hong tum phetin
Ka mawh khempeuh hong sawpsiang hi
verse3:
Topa Zeisu ka lung sungah hong lut phetin
Upna a kip ka ngah pah hi
Topa Zeisu ka lungsung ah hong lut phetin
Up khialhna teng beikhin pah hi
verse4:
Topa Zeisu ka lung sungah hong lut phetin
Sihna kuam pan khua vaak pah hi
Topa Zeisu ka lungsung ah hong lut phetin
Khuapi kongkhak kimu pah hi
chorus:
Topa Zeu ka lung sungah
Hong tum hong khawl khit phetin ah
Tuipi kilok bang ka lung sungah khuavaakna
Tha khatin a hong taang pah hi

verse1:
Hong it Zeisu Topa aw
Tuihual hong nailai takin
Huihpi nung daih nai loh tawh
Na angsung hong omsak in
Nuntak huihpi kam mateng
Hong Honpa aw hong liah in
Keima kha Nong laak mateng
Khawlmun nuam ah hong kha in
verse2:
Belhding dang khatbeek nei keng
Cimawh in Nang kongbeel hi
Hong nusia peuhmah ngei ke'n
Nong huh, Nong neemlai ding hi
Kong muang hi Topa, Nangmah
Huhna Nang kiang ka ngah hi
Topa aw, Na kha nuaiah
Keima lu nongliah ding hi
verse3:
Kei deihna teng kicinna
Khazih Topa Nang Na hi
Pukte phong, mittawte kha
Na damsak lungsim, pumpi
Nang Na dik, Nang Na siangtho
Kei kihhuai, mawhna ka dim
Ka pumtang sianna neilo
Nang thutak, hehpihna dim
verse4:
Ka mawh siin khinzo dingin
Hehpihna Nang kiang kicing
Damna guntui hong luan in
Ka lungsung siangden nading
Nang nuntaakna naak Na hi
Nangmah hong dawndawn sak in
A tawntung nuntaak tui li
Ka lungsung hong phulsak in

verse1:
Topa' min leh Ama thu ah
Ka maizum ngeikei ding
Ama thu leh A singlamteh
Ka pahtawi ngitnget ding
verse2:
Zeisu ka Pasian' min ka thei
Tua minbek hi kei' muan
Hong maizum sak ngeilo ding kei
Lam etna A hong guan
verse3:
Ama thuciam kip tawntung aa
A khutsung ka piak teng
Amah'n phatak na kem ding ta
A hun a tun mateng
verse4:
Tua ciang A Pa Pasian mai ah
Ka min hong sam ding aa
Jerusalem khuathak sungah
Omna hong pia ding ta
chorus:
Singlamteh! Singlamteh! Khuavaak ka muh ciilna
Ka lungsung a vangik teng beikhin na
A thu ka up ciang khua ka muthei ta
Tu in ka lung a dam tawntung ta

verse1:
Ka lampi sau in a gimhuai aa
Vangik pua in kikeem khial in
Lungdam la sa in, lungsim a nat ciang
Zeisu in kei a hong keem hiam?
verse2:
Sun khuavaak in a hong mial ciangin
Kei kiangah a hong nai om hiam?
Ka lampi mialin, lauhuai a tam ciang
Zeisu in kei a hong keem hiam?
verse3:
Haksa ze-et ka thuak laitak in
Zan tawntung khitui luanna tawh
Hong hon ding omlo ka dah laitak in
Zeisu in kei a hong keem hiam?
verse4:
I itte tawh mangpha kipia in
Lungkham lutang nat a bei ciang
Topa in ei bang ci in hong mu diam
Zeisu in kei a hong keem hiam?
chorus:
A hong keem hi, ke'n ka thei hi
Ka dahna hong phawkpih hi
Sun in om nuam lo-in, zan a lauhaui laitak
Hong Gumpa'n hong keem

verse1:
Kei guak huan sungah ka vaak aa
Paak tungaa daitui a kaailai in
Ka bil sungah, ke'n Ama aw ka za
Hong hopih Pasian' Ta in
verse2:
Ama' thugen khum kisa in
Vasa te'n dai takin ngai lialua
A ngaih mahmah la keimah hong pia ta
Ka lungsung hong ging ziazua
verse3:
Amah tawh tua huanah giak ning
Zan khuamial in hong kiimkot hangin
Ahih hang Amah'n mawhna aw sung pan
Hong sawl hi, pai ta in, ci'n
chorus:
Amah'n hong tonpih, Amah'n hong tonpih
Kei Ama aa ci in hong gen
I neih bangin i lungdam ding tualai
Kua mah'n ciam kha ngeilo hi

engTitle: I Will Guide Thee (Tune: Precious Promise)
verse1:
Thu ciamna pha hong piazo hi
Lungkhamna na thuak zawh ciang
Leitung pan vantung lampi ah
Ka mit in nang kong cing ding
verse2:
Ze-et nate na zawh khit ciang
Na muanna'n hong ngak zawh ciang
Hih kiciamna khutbuh na nei
Ka mit in nang kong cing ding
verse3:
Na lamet nate kisia in
Lawpna kumte a bei ciang
Hih kiciamna na letlai in
Ka mit in nang kong cing ding
verse4:
Nuntaakna ding hun hong bei in
Sihna ding hun hong tun ciang
Topa hong sapna na za ding
Kamit in nang kong cing ding
chorus:
Nang kong cing ding, nang kong cing ding
Kamit in nang kong cing ding
Leitung pan vantung lampi ah
Kamit in nang kong cing ding

zoTitle: A Mah'n Ka Mawhna Teng Lakhia Zo
engTitle: He Had Taken My Sins Away
verse1:
Lungsim leh aw in Topa phat ning
Ama sung ka kipaak ding
La in sa ning lamdang hong itna
Ke’n sasa ning hih la
verse2:
Nopna khawlna ngah ding Ama kiang
Ka mawhna tawh ka pai ciang
Ka nget hong za in, hong khahkhia ta
Ke’n sasa ning hih la
verse3:
Ka hu tawpna tawh Amah phat ning
Sihna ka zawh man in ah
Amah phat ning a tawntung in ah
Ke’n sasa ning hih la
chorus:
Amah’n ka mawhna teng lakhia zo
A minsiang phat un, A minsiang phat un
A mah’n ka mawhna teng lakhia zo
Halleluijah Min phat un’

verse1:
Keima Pa in inn leh lo a hau hi
Leitung sum khempeuh a khutsung ah om hi
Suang hoih, a san, a kang, kham, ngun, a vekpi
Kisim zo lo-in Amah a hau hi
verse2:
Keimah ka Pa ta hong gum Topa in
Mizawngte bangin leitung ah a vaak hi
Tu in vantungah tawntung inn ah mang hi
Nung ciang ei vantungah inn hong pia ding hi
verse3:
Masa-ah leitungah zin mi ka hi
A mawhnei mi a lawmte tawh khen mi hi
Tu in innluah minthanna ngah nading in
Vantung khua sungah keima min ki at hi
verse4:
Puanbuuk ahih hangin phamawh lo hi
Keima aa ding kumpi inn a lamta hi
Inn pan gamla hangin la sathei ding hi
Keimah in Kumpipa a tapa ka hi
chorus:
Keimah in Kumpipa a tapa ka hi
Honggum Zeisu tawh Kumpipa ta ka hi hi

verse1:
Nuntaakna tuipi tungah huih nun ciangin
Si ding cih ngaihsun in na lungkiat ciangin
Thupha khat nungah khat na ngaihsun inla
Topa in tampi hong pia na thei ding ta
verse2:
Lung manna vangik bangin na thuak ngei hiam
Singlamteh hong puasak in a gikthei hiam
Thupha khat nungah thupha na ngaihsut leh
Ni simin a tawntung la nasa ding hi
verse3:
Mi dangte a sum a paai na et ciangin
Zeisu kiangah na ngah ding sum ngaihsun in
Vantung khuasung ah na omna inn hi zong
Kuamah in leizo kei sum a om ding hi
verse4:
Tua ahih ciangin gal kido laitak in
Pasian in na khempeuh uk hi, lau kei in
Vantung mihingte in nang kiangah om hi
Lampi tawp dongin nang a hong huh ding hi
chorus:
Thupha khat nungah khat ngaihsun in
A tampi hong pia in theita in
Thupha khat nungah khat ngaihsun in
Pasian in a tampi hong pia theita in

verse1:
Kei in lawmpa khat ka mu hi
Ka theih ma in hong it ta
Ki itna khau tawh hong kai hi
Tua khau tawh hong paipih ta
Keima lungsim a hong khih hi
A kuamah’n a phelzawh loh
Topa in keimah hong uk hi
A tawntung ding hikhin zo
verse2:
Kei in lawmpa khat ka mu hi
Hong gup nading hong si ta
Nuntaakna tui hong piazo hi
Topa mah in hong pia ta
Keima neihsa bangmah omkei
Topa bek a hi ding hi
Lungsim thatang, hinna sumte
Topa aa hi tawntung hi
verse3:
Kei in lawmpa khat ka mu hi
Vanglian khempeuh hongpia hi
I pai laitak vantung lampi
Innpi ah hong kha ding hi
Vaanglian tawntung gamla panah
Hong huh dingin hong tan in
Tu’n ngak in, um in, do inla
Nung ciang nopna na ngah ding
verse4:
Kei in lawmpa khat ka mu hi
Hong it, hehpihna, nem hi
Lam hong hilh hong ngaihsun sak hi
Hong liah na'ng in, vaanglian hi
Hih zah hong it Topa kiangah
Khen sakthei vaanglian om kei
Hinna, sihna, leitung gimna
Hong khenzo ding na omkei

verse1:
A migi tuucingpa en un
Tuikhuuk kiang a dinlai in
Tui leh an a duhte pai un
Gam hoihna vantung khua ah
verse2:
Nuntaakna lam a zuite bek
Pasian in lungdam pih ding
Topa Zeisu sihna hangin
Nuntaak thak hong pia ding hi
verse3:
Tuu khumna buuk sungah omte
Ama tuu taktak te hi
Amah in Pasian a up bang
Ei zong Topa i um ding hi
chorus:
Hong paipihna peuh zui un
Hong paipihna peuh zuiun
Haleluiah, Haleluiah
Hong paipihna peuh zui un

zoTitle: Hong Khah Ngei Lo Ding Itna Aw
engTitle: O Love That Wilt Not let Me Go (Tune: St. Margaret)
verse1:
Hong khah ngeilo ding itna aw
Ka lunggimna teng kong ngata
A pha zaw, cing zawthei nading
Nong piaksa keima nuntaakna
Nang kong apkik ta ding
verse2:
Hong tonpih tawntung khuavaak aw
Keima meimit dek kong apta
Nang sungah taang phazaw nading
Nong kawmsak keima khuavaakna
Nang kong apkik ta ding
verse3:
Keimah hong zong khia nuamna aw
Keima lungsim Nang kong honta
Dahna sung pan nuam muh nading
Kip ding hi Nangma thuciamna
Dahna bei theih nading
verse4:
Ka lu hong phong Singlamteh aw
Nang kong taisan ngam nawnlo ta
Nuntaak bei in leivui suak ding
Lei pan paak bang Nong tawi tota
Ka hin tawntung nading

verse1:
Tuni in keima lungsim sungah
Khuavaak a hong taang hi
Leitung ni sang a vaang taangzaw
Ka khuavaak Zeisu hi
verse2:
Tuni in keima lungsim sungah
Kumpi phatna la sa
Kei saktheih loh langiahte zong
Zeisu’n ngai leh a za
verse3:
Tuni in keima lungsim sungah
Topa hong tum manin
Lung nopna leh gamtatna pha
Hong po, hong palh pan in
verse4:
Tuni in keima lungsim sungah
Nuamna, lawpna, dim hi
Hong piaksa leh hongpiak lai ding
Thupha, nuamna, hang hi
chorus:
Aw ka lungsung, lung khuavaakna
Lungsung nopna, nuamna hunpha hi
Zeisu mainuam ka muh ciangin
Ka lungsim sung hong taang hi

zoTitle: Keen Sang Tawn Vantung Kah Lo Ding
engTitle: We May Not Climb the Heavenly Steeps (Tune: Serenity)
verse1:
Keen sang tawn, vantung kahlo ding
Khazih Topa la ding
A thuk pen zong zon hang mulo
Ama sung lau omlo, Amen
verse2:
Itna siangtho, itna kicing
Tumah’n hong huhtheih hi
Itna, upna hong lah bangin
Galilee tui geiah, Amen
verse3:
Mong neilo damna puan silhin
A dah lupna kiangah
Amah i lawnkhak ding hong om
Hong damsak kik ta hi, Amen
verse4:
Kote khempeuh To leh Siapa
Kote’n bang min puak hang
Nong sapna za’n Nang aa hi nuam
Nang aa ding hong sit in
verse5:
Ama min suangin thu ngen leeng
Naupang bangin thum leeng
Sihna in ei a hong phak ciang
Ama min i suang ding

verse1:
Lungsim a pha mihingte aw
Topa tungah na lungdam un
Topa a teel mihingte aw
Dahna lungmanna paisan un
verse2:
Lungdam ve un Topa in ah
Leitung, vantungah phabel hi
A thupha a la phate tawh
Hong uk a eimah hong phel hi
verse3:
Topa aa ding gal kapna ah
Galte hong zodek hang a ci
Topa galkap mangte in ah
Galte sangin a tamzaw hi
verse4:
Sunlai in khua hong mial hangin
Zanlai van hong khup hang in ah
Na lungsim na mawhlo ding hi
Um in gal bei mateng thupha
chorus:
Nuam un, nuam un
Topa tungah na lungdam un
Nuam un, nuam un
Topa tungah lungdam khin un

verse1:
Nang aa hi’ng, Topa, Na aw zazo ing
Kei nong itna hong gen hi
Ahih hang upna tawh hong kahto in
Kong kinai zaw lai nuam hi
verse2:
Hong siangtho sak in hehpihna vaang tawh
Na’ nasem ding hong zang in
Lungkia ngeilo in lametna kip tawh
Nang' deih bang hong deihsak in
verse3:
Na tokhom mai ah tawlkhat sungbek mah
Thu ngenin kong khukdin zong
Lawmta bangin lungsim kum khawmin ah
Kalung hong nuam mahmah khong
verse4:
Gungal kah bang sihna galkai mateng
Itna thuk phawk khin zolo
Nangmah tawh nuamtak kong khawlkhawm mateng
Nuamna sang kiban nailo
chorus:
Hong naisak in, thupha Topa aw
Na sihna singlamteh tawh
Hong kai in Na kiangah, thupha Topa aw
Naitak in Na pang si tawh

engTitle: Saviour, Thy Dying Love (Tune: Something For Thee)
verse1:
Hong Honpa, Na sih dong kei Nong it zo
Nang aa ding na khat zong ka hong itlo
Itna tawh hong kun ning
Ka ciamna tangtun ning
Nang kiang tu’n hong tun ning, na khat teitei.
verse2:
Hehpih tokhom mai ah hehpih kong ngen
Upna neih sunin ah Zeisu kong en
Thuak ding, gen ding, sak ding
Na khat peuh nang aa ding
Kei hong hih zosak in, na khat teitei.
verse3:
Lungsim maan hong pia in, Nangma aa’ bang
A ni kipeel lo-in, ka hih theih na'ng
Itna tawh nasepna
Khatpeuh tung mi gitna
Lam khial khat ngah zawhna, na khat teitei.
verse4:
Keimah leh ka neihsa, Nong piaksa hi’ng
Hih lai ka nuntaakna, Nangma aa ding
Na mai kong muh ciangin
Tat khiatsa ka kha in
Hi hen, Nang aa ding in, na khat teitei.

verse1:
Galdona tam hih leitung pan
Zeisu in hong sam hi
Nisim in a ma aw ging hi
"Keinung hong zui in" a ci
verse2:
Leitung sum leh paai bialo ding
Zeisu in a hong sam hi
Hong khaam milim hawlkhia ta in
"A mau sang hong it in" ci
verse3:
Dahna sung, lungdamna sungah
Nasep lai tawlnga lai ah
"Tuate sangin kei hong it zaw’n"
Ci in a mah’n hong sam hi
verse4:
Topa’n hong sap ciang ka ngai ding
Topa hong hehpih ta in
Nangma itna na seem dingin
Topa aw, hong huh ta in

zoTitle: Zeisu Ading Nuntak Maan Ka Nungta
verse1:
Zeisu aa ding nuntaak maan ka nungta
Sepna ah nuamsak ding ka hanciam ta
Lungdamna tawh, A deihna ka seem hi
Hih bang hihna in kei lungdamna hi
verse2:
Kei tang si Zeisu aa ding ka nungta
Kei mawh kei zumna Kalani pua ta
Hong itna in, Amah hong zuinuam sak
A lam lahna zui in ka kibup piak
verse3:
Omna peuh Zeisu aa ding ka nungta
A min siangtho sungah na ka sem ta
Gimna supnate ke’n ka thuak nuam hi
Hih bangte Zeisu aa ding thuakna hi
verse4:
Tomkha sung Zeisu aa ding ka nungta
Amah nuihmai mah manpha pen ka sa
A mangte zongin gum ding a si hi
A gimte a sung tawldam ding la hi
chorus:
Zeisu, Topa, Honpa aw
Nang tungah kong kipia
Nong gupkhiatna dingin ah
Kei aa ding Nong kipia
To dang kuamah ka neilo
Ka lungsung hong teeng in
Ka nuntaakna Nang tung kong pia
Khazih Nang aa dingin

zoTitle: Na Khempeuh Zeisu Kiangah Ka Pia Ding Hi
verse1:
Hong gum Topa keimah in ah
Na khempeuh paai in zui ning
Ka Topa aw, Nangmah in ah
Lam hong hilh Pa Na hi ding
verse2:
Hong gum Topa keimah in ah
Nangma kiang ka hong nai hi
Kisiik aa thupha kong ngetna
Ngai in hong gum in, kong ci
verse3:
Hong gum Topa keimah in ah
Leitung nopna ka nusia
Kha Siangtho leh Topa Pasian
Hong om in ka lung sungah
verse4:
