Hong gum Topa keimah in ah
Nong gupna lapha sa ning
Vantung gungei kong tun mateng
Nang hangin ka lungdam ding
chorus:
Na khempeuh paai aa
Na khempeuh paai aa
Na khempeuh Topa khut sungah
Keimah’n hong pia ning

engTitle: My Faith Looks Up to Thee (Tune: Oliver)
verse1:
Kong up kong muanna lian
Hong hon Topa Pasian, hong tan Tuuno
Kong thumna hong ngai in
Ka mawhna teng paai in
Tuni aa kipan in hong tangkhin aw
verse2:
Keima lungsim zawngkhal
Hong guan in tha leh ngal, tha nuamsak in
Kei aa ding Nong si ta
Kei zong Nang kong itna mit ngeilo
Ka sungah lum densak in
verse3:
Lungman khuamial lakah
Dahna tampi lakah, lam honghilh aw
Khuamialna vaaksak in
Dahna khitui siak in
Pial lo, hong naisak in Nangma kiang tawh
verse4:
Leitung nun tombei aa
Sihna gun ka tungah hong tuum ciangin
Launa, lung himawhna
Hong paih khiatsak inla
Na tatsa keima kha hong puato in

verse1:
Nungta Topa hong hopih in
Topa aw, Na aw zanuam ing
Nong zon bangin, a mangthang sa
Cimawh tate hong muta in
verse2:
Hilh theih na’ng Topa hong hilh in
A manpha Na genkhiat thute
A thuk mahmah mi lungsim sung
A tun dongin hong paupih in
verse3:
Na thu tawh kei hong dimta in
A dimleet dong hong guan inla
Mit ngeilo Na thu taangsak in
Na itna leh phatna lak in
verse4:
Hong zangin, Topa hong zangin
Deih hun, deihna peuh hong zangin
Na hehpihna mai ka muh dong
Na min thanna hong hawmta in

engTitle: O Jesus, Thou Art Standing (Tune: St. Hilda)
verse1:
Aw, Zeisu, kong pua’h na ding
A kikhak cip kongpi
Lungneem takin na ngak hi
Tua kong kihon mateng
Ama min pua u leh nau
Tapidawte zumhuai
Zumna tungah zumhuai hi
Tua tan vei i dinsak'
verse2:
Aw, Zeisu’n kong hong kiu hi
En un na muhsak loh
Liamma leh a khuk ling kual
A mai ah khitui luang
Itna theihna a gawmkhawm
Lungduai takin hong ngak
Aw, mawhna tung aa, mawhna
Kongpi khakcip mawhna
verse3:
Aw, Zeisu, kiniam khiatna
Kam tawh nong hopih aa
"Nang taang si ing, ka tate ding
Kong bawlzo," na ci
Topa aw tu’n maizum za’n
Kong ka hong hon uh hi
Ko it Gumpa aw, tum in
Hong nusia ngeinawn ke’n

zoTitle: Hong Paipih Na Peuhah Zui Ning
verse1:
Topa hong sapna ka za hi
Topa hong sapna ka za hi
Topa hong sapna ka za hi
"Singlamteh pua in hong zui in," ci
verse2:
Lunggimna huan ah zong zui ning
Lunggimna huan ah zong zui ning
Lung gimna huan ah zong zui ning
Lam tawntung ah Amah zuizui ning
verse3:
Thukhenna mun ah zong zui ning
Thukhenna mun ah zong zui ning
Thukhenna mun ah zong zui ning
Lam tawntung ah Amah zuizui ning
verse4:
Minpha leh hehpih hong pia ding
Minpha leh hehpih hong pia ding
Minpha leh hehpih hong pia ding
Lam tawntung ah hong tonpih pih ding

zoTitle: Nang Tawh Ka Pai Ding Hi
engTitle: O Master Let Me Walk with Thee (Tune: Maryton)
verse1:
Nasepna lam lungnemna tawh
Nang tawh ka pai ding, Topa aw
Gimna, tawlna ka thuak dingin
Nangmah in kei hong huhlai in
verse2:
Nangma thu umlo mite in
Thu hilh nading in hong huh in
Lamkhial mite vantung lampi
Hilhkik nading thu honghilh in
verse3:
Hehpihna thu honghilh inla
Nang tawh lampi pai dingin a ah
Lam dang ah pailo nading in
Hong gum Topa aw, hong huh in
verse4:
Nangma lawpna, muanna, itna
Nuntaak laitak ke’n ka deih mah
Nangma lungdamna zong deih hi
Nangmah tawh kei ka pai ding hi

zoTitle: Nang Aading Ka Nungta Ding Hi
engTitle: My Life, My Love, I Give to Thee
verse1:
Ka nuntaakna leh ka itna
Nangma kiangah keimah’n ka pia
Nangma thu ka ngai ding
Topa, hong gum Topa Zeisu
verse2:
Nang hong saang ding ke’n ka um hi
Ka nuntaak na’ng Nang Na sizo hi
Tu nung ciangin ka lawp ding hi
Hong gum Topa Zeisu
verse3:
Ka kha hong gum dingin Topa
Na si Kalani mual tungah
Ka pum vekpi, nang ka hong pia
Hong gum Topa Zeisu
chorus:
Nang aa ding ka nungta ding hi
Nangmah in kei taang ding Na si
Keimah ka lung a dam ding hi
Hong gum Topa Zeisu

engTitle: Take My Life, and Let It Be (Tune: Hendon)
verse1:
Topa aw ka nuntaakna
Tang in, siangtho tak zang in
Itna tawh Nangma sawlna
Ka khut mangsak, semsak in
Ka khut mangsak, semsak in
verse2:
Ka pheiphung hong zang inla
Nang aa ding ngal hatsak in
Ka aw zong Nang tang inla
Ngaih tak Na min phatsak in
Ngaihtak Na min phatsak in
verse3:
Ka kam, ka muk hong zang in
Na thupha gentheih nading
Ka sum ka paai tangkhin in
Neukha bek hong it kei ning
Neukha bek hong it kei ning
verse4:
Ka itna teng hong sang in
Na khe mai ah hong sung ning
Ka pumpi in hong tang in
Nang aa bek hikhin den ning
Nang aa bek hikhin den ning

engTitle: My Jesus, As Thou Wilt (Tune Jewett)
verse1:
Zeisu, Nangma deih bang
Keimah’n zong deihnuam ing
Nangma itna khut sung
Hong ki apkhin nuam ing
Dahna nuamna sungah
Nang mah’n hong tonpih in
Cizo nuam ing, Topa
"Nang deih bang hisak in"
verse2:
Zeisu, Nangma deih bang
Luankhi’n liah zeel zongin
Ka upna aksi taang
Mualsak, mangsak kei in
Nang zong hih leitung ah
Na dahna kap manin
Nang tawh kap dingin ah
"Nang deih bang hisak in"
verse3:
Zeisu, Nangma deih bang
Kei aa ding phakhin hi
Mailam a piang bangbang
Nangmah kong apkhin hi
Lung patau lo keimah
Tangtak ka zuan van inn
Hinlai, sih ciang, ka la
"Nang deih bang hisak in"

verse1:
Zeisu aw ka sih dongin
Nangma nasem dingin
Kiciamna kip ka koih zo
Nangmah ka Lawm ka To
Hong panpih tawntung le cin
Nang lam honghilh le cin
Galdona kihta kei ning
Lampaam siikkhial kei ning
verse2:
Nong nai hong phawkkhial sak ke’n
Thudang te’n hong neh den
Muhnop huai te’n hong leng hi
Zaknop huai hong meng hi
Ka galte hong nai tawntung
Ka kiim leh ka lungsung
Tuate sang hong naizaw in,
Mawhna pan hong dal in
verse3:
Nangma pau hong zasak in
A siang a tel takin
Lungsung huihpi nun ciangin
Manglo phun nuam ciangin
Ka lungmuan theih na’ng inah
Nong sawlna Nong khaamna
Hong theisak hong ngaisak in
Ka lungsim hong cing in

zoTitle: Ka Hi Bang Hong La In
verse1:
Topa Zeisu ka thu ngai in
Na hongphel kei leh ka si ding
Kiphelna thu hong piasuk in
Ka hibang hong la in
verse2:
Phelna mulo mawhna tampi
Ka neih manin Topa a si
Nong hehpih leh Nong phelthei hi
Ka hibang hong la in
verse3:
Bangmah a pha ka bawl zolo
Ka thuciamna ka siasak zo
Na min tawh hong phelsak in aw
Ka hibang hong la in
verse4:
Na khe mai ah kong kuun Topa
Nong muh bangin kei ka hi hi
Nasep kipan kiman khinzo
Ka hibang hong la in
chorus:
Ka hibang hong la in
Ka hibang hong la in
Nangma sih keima phatna hi
Ka hibang hong la in

verse1:
Topa tawh kibang zaw nuamlai ing
A kiniam khiat bang, a migit luat bang
A thanop bang, a thumaan mah bangin
Hong vaikhak mah bangin, kipia’n seemnuam ing
verse2:
Topa bang nisim thu ngennuam ing
Thahat nuamlai ing, singlamteh pua ding
Hanciam nuamlai ing, Ama gam aa ding in
Kha Siangtho sam lai, a vakthapte aa ding
verse3:
Topa bangin nungta’n khangnuam ing
Amah bang midang itna laknuam ing
Galile ah pumpi deih a nial bang
Topa tawh a tawntung in kibang nuam ing
chorus:
Kalung sungah, Nang aa bek hi nuam ing
Ka lutang la inla, Nang aa suak hen
Ka mawh teng silsak in, Topa, tu in
Silsiang in Nang aa ding hong keem den in

engTitle: Have Thine Own Way, Lord (Tune: Adelaide)
verse1:
Nang deihbang Topa, Nang deih bangbang
Nangmah beelseek pa, kei tungman bang
Nangma deih bangin kei hongbawl in
Taang lo, mang dingin Nang kong ngak hi
verse2:
Nang deihbang Topa, Nang deih bangbang
Tuni in Topa, hong sit in Nang
Vuuk sang ngozaw in tu’n hong sawp in
Lungsim neem takin Nangmai kong kuun
verse3:
Nang deihbang Topa, Nang deih bangbang
Ka liam ka gimna, hong huh in, Nang
Vangliatna khempeuh, Nang ma’n Na nei
Hong damsak in kei, hong Honpa aw
verse4:
Nang deihbang Topa, Nang deih bangbang
Keimah nuntaakna hong uk in, Nang
Khazih keima sung, mi’n muh nading
Hong guan in kei sung, Na Kha Siangtho

zoTitle: Zeisu Thu Hong Hilh Dih In
engTitle: Tell Me The Stories of Jesus
verse1:
Zeisu tangthu hong gen dih in, ke'n zanuam ing
Hih lai ah hong om hileh, bang ka gen ding hiam
Lam gei aa muh teng, tuipi' tangthu
Zeisu’ tangthute, kei honghilh in
verse2:
A masa in naupangte tawh a kikholhna
Tuaciang, Ama thupha piakte kei tung om hi
Gitna kambek dim, hehpihna dim
Itna khuavak taang, Zeisu maitang
verse3:
Khuapi sungah ka zui ding hi, naupanghon tawh
Dial lek in, nisuh hiang tawi in, khut tawh lam in
Ci in, "Hosiana" Zeisu Kumpi
Amah phatna la naakpi takin

verse1:
Van pan lei ah kua hong kum?
Zeisu Khazih i To
Hong suak naungek kiniam khiat
Zeisu Khazih i To
verse2:
Singkhuam tungah kua kikhai?
Zeisu Khazih i To
Nang leh kei damna dingin
Zeisu Khazih i To
verse3:
Kua’n maisak ding ci, mawhna?
Zeisu Khazih i To
Um in, hing un, kua’n hong ci?
Zeisu Khazih i To
verse4:
Tu’n van tokhom tung kua tu?
Zeisu Khazih i To
Kua Thu zui in, kua it ding?
Zeisu Khazih i To
verse5:
Van pan kua hong kumkiik ding?
Zeisu Khazih i To
A mite hongkhawm dingin
Zeisu Khazih i To
chorus:
Sa un, A min phatna la
Gupkhiatna hong tungzo hi
Tua bang itna pha omkei
Zeisu Khazih i To

verse1:
Zeisu in eite khuai meivaak bangin
Zan khuamial na sungah taangin hong zaw hi
Hih leitung khuamial sung, ei i taang ding
Nang na omna kiim ah, Kei, kei’ kiim ah
verse2:
Zeisu’n hong taangsak, Ama aa ding in
I meivak a mial ciang Amah’n hong mu hi
I meivaak taang van pan, Amah’n ensuk
Nang na omna kiim ah, Kei, kei’ kiim ah
verse3:
Zeisu’n hong taangsak, miteng aa ding in
Khuamial na tampi tawh kidim hih leitung
Mawhna, dahna, natna sung i taang ding
Nang na omna kiim ah, Kei, kei’ kiim ah

verse1:
Zeisu’n hong it ka thei hi
Lai Siangtho in hong gen hi
A neu a hatlo mite
Amah hat hong huh na ve
verse2:
Zeisu’n hong it man si aa
Vantung kong hong honsak ta
Ka mawhna hong sawpsak ding
Vantung ah hong luutsak ding
verse3:
Zeisu’n ka zawngkhal hangin
Hong it lailai veve in
A taang vantung tokhom pan
Ka lupna hong vil Amah’n
chorus:
Zeisu’n hong it hi
Zeisu’n hong it hi
Zeisu’n hong it hi
Lai Siangtho in gen hi

verse1:
Hong pai ciangin, hong pai ciangin
Suang manpha khawm dingin
Ama itte, Ama aa te
A suang manphate
verse2:
Hong khawm ding hi, hong khawm ding hi
A' gamsung omding mi
A siangthote, A taang phate
A suang manphate
verse3:
Naupang note, naupang note
Hong Tanpa a itte
Ama aa hi, Ama it hi
A suang manpha hi
chorus:
Zingsang aksi sol bangin
A taang ciat ding uh hi
A Kumpi lukhu tungah
Te diamdiam ding hi

verse1:
Vantung aa i Pa in A hong itna
Hong piak Lai Siangtho sungah hong gen ta
Lai Siangtho sungah thu a ngaihpha pen
Zeisu in kei hong itna mah hi pen
verse2:
Amah mangngilh in ka taisan hangin
Hong it lailai hi, ka mangthang hangin
Zeisu in hong it ke’n ka phawkkik aa
Ama angsung ka delhkik vingveng ta
verse3:
A phatna tengtawh A' mai ka muh teh
La khatbek sathei ding hong kici leh
Bang la kasa zawdiam hih lo a dang
"Zeisu in kei hong it piandang lua sa’ng"
verse4:
Zeisu’n hong it aa, kei zong ka it hi
Ka kha hehpih in tan ding hong kum hi
Hong it manin singlamteh tung si aa
Tua ahih ciang hong it takpi hi ta
chorus:
Zeisu’n hong it man ka nuampha hi
Kei hong it hi, kei hong it hi
Zeisu hong it man ka nuampha hi
Kei nangawn hong it hi

zoTitle: Tua A Zaknop Tangthu Ka Ngaihsut Ciang
engTitle: I Think When I Read That Sweet Story (Tune: Sweet Story)
verse1:
Tua a zaknop tangthu ka sim ciang ka phawk
Mite lakah Zeisu om lai
Naupang note, tuuno hon tawh a genteh lai
Amah tawh tua bang omnuam mah sing
verse2:
Ka lutung A khut hong ngaleh ut mah sing
A baan tawh hong angpom henla
Tua ciang Ama hong itna maitang en to in
"Hong pai un," a cih kam za nuam ing
verse3:
A hi zong Ama khekhaap zui in pai ning
Ama itna ka ngahzawh na’ng
Lungsim takpi tawh Ama nuai ah ngento leng
Amah mu in, tungpan hong dawng ding

engTitle: Rejoice, Ye Pure in Heart (Tune: Marion)
verse1:
Nuam un, lung siangthote
La sa’n lungdamna pia’n
Na galkap te'n dial peisang kha’n
Na Kumpipa Khazih
verse2:
Vantung mite’n la sa
Leitung misiang tengtawh
Lung damna thu zeelsak unla
Lung kimna manpha zaw
verse3:
Na sianna sangsak in
Khauh takin mainawt in
Khuamial sungah galte’n na seem
Kham khua hongvaak mateng
chorus:
Nuam un, nuam un
La sa'n lungdamna pia'n

verse1:
Hahkat pawlpi gamla nai aa
Kikhawm dingin a hong pai un
Tawpna a nuam a omnate
I gen ding hi, Pasian thupha
verse2:
Khazih Topa phat dingin ah
La sa dingin hong kikhawm un
Mi neute in hih mun panah
Hing tawntung muh nading in ah
verse3:
Topa Pasian' na seem dingin
Kiciamna pha a thak koih ni
Vantung inn nuam tun mateng in
Upna behlap in na seem ni
chorus:
Hahkat pawlpite aw, Topa kiang kikhawm un
Lungsim kituak pha tawh, Amin phatna gen un
Topa leh a gampi aa ding in hahkat in
Pawlpi a hahkatte huh nading thu ngen ni

verse1:
Tapidaw ihmu nawn ke'n
Mi ngah na'ng septheih lai seem
Khut zepin dingmawk ding maw?
Topa in thu hong pia leh
verse2:
Topa min na it ding hiam?
Hong ciamna na umzo diam?
Sapna teng a kiang ngen in
Hong sapna na nial ding maw?
verse3:
Na sansa bangin um in
Hong hilh bangin nungta in
Ama aa bek hi den in
Sepna tawh upna lak in
verse4:
Singlamteh i puak ding om
Kham Lukhu na khuk nopleh
Thathak tawh ma i sawt ding
A hun tom, a nite tawm
chorus:
Pai in seem! ding kipan in
Pai in zong, a mangte gum
Khuamialna sung mawhnei mi
Tua pawi ah, hong paipih in!

verse1:
Topa tawh tonkhawm in, bangbang piang ta leh
Na lampi khuamial hang, Ama nung zui in
Na galte’n hong neh in a lauhuai hangin
Zeisu tawh ton leteh kihtaak ding om kei
verse2:
Topa tawh tonkhawm in, na paina peuh ah
Khua mialna liim sungah lam honghilh ding di
Ama vaang in na lampi hong taangsak ding
Keugaw gam zong lo nona hong piangsak ding
verse3:
Topa tawh tonkhawm in, nang thu’n tawlnga ke'n
Hong thu piakna bangin na gamta ding hi
Hong sawlna bang mang in, Ama tha muang in
Zeisu nung na zuih leh na khial ngeikei ding
chorus:
Tonkhawm in, hangtak mainawt in
Na tha hong khauhsak ding hi
Nisim in Amah tawh pai in
Na khual zinna lam hong pi ding hi

engTitle: Now In the Days of Youth (Diademata)
verse1:
Tu na khangno lai in
Hun hoih zattheih lai in
Topa ko lungsung hong om in
Vekpi’n hong kipia ung
Kong kipiakna bangun
Kilawm bang hong saang in
Nuntaak sungteng sepna peuhah
Pa deihna bang hi hen
verse2:
Hong hilh in Na deih bang
Ka gamtat theih na’ng uh
Nang deih bangbang gamtat theih nang
Ka lungdam ding uh hi
A lian pen teel tuanlo
A neu pen paai tuanlo
Ko sepnate Nang sep bangin
Hong thupi khinsak in
verse3:
Thu hoih thupha deihna
Kote hong hilhhilh in
Hun tomcikno khat sungbek zong
Ka siatkhak loh na’ng uh
Ka tha uh tawh dinzawh na’ng
Hong panpih ta in
A siangtho nate bek deih ung
A siate deih kei ung
verse4:
Ka suah tuung bang mah un
Kha Siangtho hong pi in
Itna gamtat hoih neihtheih na’ng
Lungnop hithiatna tawh
Kum tampi sung man ding
Ka kigin kholh na’ng uh
Tawntung nuntaakna hun nuampi
Pa inn ah ka zong ding

engTitle: Tell Me the Old, Old Story
verse1:
Tanglai thu hong genta in, a kimu ngeilo na
Zeisu leh a vanglian ci’n Amah in hong itna
Tangthu teltak hong gen in, naupangte hilh bangin
Hong hilh in ka gimzo hi
Ka khialgawp khin ta hi
verse2:
Tua tangthu damtak gen in, ka theih baih nading in
Amah in hong tatkhiatna, mawh kiphel nading in
Thu tangthu hong genkik in ka mangngilh theih loh na’ng
Daitui bang zingsang om hang, sun ciangin mangthei hi
verse3:
Tua tangthu damdam gen in, nuamna aw tawh gen in
Mawhna pan hongphel nading Zeisu hong gum phawk ning
Tua tangthu gen laitakin gimna khat hong tun leh
Hehnepna hong pia ding ci’n tu’n tangthu gen ta in
verse4:
Lawkite nopsakna in vantung gimna om hi
Kei taang ding lung hihmawh leh tua tangthu hong gen in
Hong zolna zuidek ciangin, hih leitung nopsakna
Zeisu’n hong lenkip ding hi, tangthu om bang gen in
chorus:
Tua tangthu hong gen ta in
Tua tangthu hong gen ta in
Tua tangthu hong gen ta in
Zeisu leh hong itna

zoTitle: Na Omna Mun-Ah Taang Sak In
engTitle: Brighten the Corner Where You Are
verse1:
Nasepna lianbel seem dingin lawm aw zekai ke’n
Khuavaak na taangsak dingin khawl ke’n
Na hih ding ngeina om bangin thupha omsak in
Na omna munah taangsak in
verse2:
Lungkia aa, dahna thuakna a kipsak kiktheih leh
Nang aa ding a phabek ngaihsun ke’n
Khat bek hang aa na lungsim om noptuam nasak leh
Na omna munah taangsak in
verse3:
Na omna munah na khuavaak na taangsak theih leh
Omna mun aa ding zong taangsak in
Na khutah a lim khomun hawm aa na vaktheih leh
Na omna munah taangsak in
chorus:
Na omna munah taangsak in
Na omna munah taangsak in
A kisia ding aa om, mi khat peuhmah gup nading
Na omna munah taangsak in

zoTitle: Na Hi Zo Diam, Topa'n Hong Ci
engTitle: Are Ye Able? Said the Master
verse1:
"Na hizo diam," Topa’n hong ci
Amah tawh kikhai khawm ding
Sih dong Na deih bang gamta ding
Lungsim ah khentat zo ung
verse2:
"Na hizo diam," tua thu phawk ding
Gutapa khuadaakna mun
Mawhna khempeuh kimai sakzo
Pazadih munnuam tung zo
verse3:
"Na hizo diam," haksat hun ciang
Na kiimkot khua a mial ciang
Amah na kipiak theih nading
Na lungsim zo masa in
verse4:
"Na hizo diam," Topa’n hong sam
Nangmah hong sam lailai hi
Galile gam a sap bangin
Lungsim hang takin dawng in
chorus:
"Hizo mah nung," Topa Nang aa hi ung
Hong bawlpha in, Nang tawh kibang in
Lam Nong hilhna vaang taang ka muh uh ciang
Na meel bangin hong it in, na thumaan nung

zoTitle: Ka Lung Sungah La Ngaih Ka Za
engTitle: In My Heart There Rings a Melody
verse1:
Zeisu hongpuak la khat ka ngah hi
Tua la van pan hongpuak hi
Tua sang a ngaihzaw la om ngeilo hi
Tua in ki itna la hi
verse2:
Kalani aa si Khazih it ing
Ka mawhna hong sawpsak hi
Ka lung sungah langaih khat hong koih hi
Ka thei, tua la teeng den ding
verse3:
A tul ngeilo min thanna la hi
Vantung mite tawh sa ding
Tua la in a kilem mahmah la hi
Vantung zum panin hong ging
chorus:
Ka lungsung langaih khat kaza hi
A kilem mahmah vantung pan hong kisa hi
Ka lungsung langaih khat kaza hi
Tua la in ki itna la hi

verse1:
Khazih leh Pawlpi aa ding la sa ni
Thupha eite Kumpipa Amin pahtawi ni
Khangno thahat lai utna tawh na sem ni
Vantung gam thumaan aa ding teci pang ni
verse2:
Khazih leh Pawlpi aa ding thungen ni
Nisim singlamteh puain a dialkhai zui ni
Kha Siangtho vaangliatna, hong sawlna zui in
Nuntak sung hunhoih laitakin na sem ni
verse3:
Khazih leh Pawlpi aa ding utna tawh
Neihsa, siamna leh hun, Topa min tawh ap ni
Cikmah hun bei ngeilo, lungsim thuk itna
I neihsa phabel Topa kiangah pia ni
chorus:
Khazih it huai hong Gumpa
Ei hong tan ding a si
Si tawh leisa Pawlpi aa ding
Topa hong hangsak in

zoTitle: Honpa, Tuu Cing Bang Hong Pi In
engTitle: Saviour, Like a Shepherd Lead Us
verse1:
Honpa, tuucing bang hong pi in
Nong huaina ko kisam pha
An tam gam nuamah hongvak in
Hong bawlkholh sakin omna
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nong leizo, kote Nang aa
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nong leizo, kote Nang aa
verse2:
Hong pawl in, Nang neihsa kote
Ko paina lampi cing in
Hong kem, hong hu in, Na tuute
Lam khialh ciang hong zongkik in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Ko thungetna hong za in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Ko thungetna hong za in
verse3:
Mi zawng, mimawh ka hih uh hang
Nong ciamzo hong saang dingin
Mawhna phel na’ng, sia’n na'ng, dal na’ng
Hehpihna Na nei cing in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nang lam hong kihei sak in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nang lam hong kihei sak in
verse4:
Ka neulai un Nangma pahtaak,
Na awi bang hong tasak in
Hong hon Topa pha aw, dimtak
Nangma itna hong guan in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nong it zo, hong it lai in
Thupha Zeisu, thupha Zeisu
Nong it zo, hong it lai in

engTitle: Where Cross the Croowed Ways of Life (Tune: Geremany)
verse1:
Nuntaak lamtam kituahna ah
Nam khat, beh khat ki elna ah
Huaiham kitotna aw tungah
Mihing Tapa, kong za uh hi
verse2:
Gentheihna, sapna tamna ah
Launa khuamial dimna inn ah
Huaiham duhgawh bukna lamah
Nangma khitui luang ko mu thei
verse3:
Nangma aa ding tui suahna hai
Nangma hehpihna gimnam lai
Ahih hang Nangma migit mai
Mi honpi te’n munuam lai keei
verse4:
Mualtung pan hong kum in, Topa
Damsak pak ven mi lunggimna
Lungsim tawldamna omloh na
Khua sung kongzing hong siik kik aw

engTitle: For the Beauty of the Earth (Tune: Dix)
verse1:
Lungdam huai leitung meel pha
Lungdam huai vantung etlawm
Suah tunga kipan itna
Kote kiim ah hong omkhawm
verse2:
Sun leh zan, a nai sim aa
Ka muh uh lamdang nate
Mual leh kuam, singkung, paak pha
Ni, kha, a taang aksite
verse3:
Sanggam, suahpih, nu leh pa
Ki it diamdiam a nuamna
Lei leh van aa lawm a pha
Migitna, ngaihsutna pha
verse4:
Nangma pawlpi a tawntung
Mun khempeuh, gam khempeuh, pan
Siangtho biakna itna lung
Khut siangtho tawh hongpuak man
Hih teng hang, khazih Topa
Kong sak uh lungdamna la
chorus:
Hih teng hang, Khazih Topa
Kong sak uh lungdamna la

verse1:
A nuam Khamtung gam
Tuisiangtho tam, paak zong a tam
Mual leh guam tengah
Vasa te’n nuam sa’n la a sa
verse2:
Khamtung mi’n ka suak
Khamtung mi bang ka nuanta ding
Gam leh mi aa ding
Pilna, siamna, hatna pia ning
chorus:
Ih vekpi in kipaak in la sa ni
Khua khempeuh ah nuamna la sa un
Khamtung eimaute Khamtung
Khamtung ginalo gam hi kei

zoTitle: Ei Inn Bek Mah Nuam I Sa
engTitle: Mid Pleasures and Palaces (Tune: Home Sweet Home)
verse1:
Bangzah a nuam Kumpi inn sung i om zong
Bangzah’n noptuak ta leh ei inn mah nuam i sa
Van gam leimong khatah a nopna om hi
Ci in leitung mi'n a zon hang muzo tuankei
verse2:
Gam lak, tu lakah pai in, khuapi en in
Ka nu in zong a tapa tu’n ngaihsun kawm in
Ka buukno khat uh sung pan, khapi en in
Hih hang gamlak sing leh nate’n hong don tuanlo
verse3:
Inn pan taikhia in mun dang nopna zon hang
A nuamzaw mun omlo, ka bukno bekmah nuam
Nuamtak vasa’n lasa ka sap hong dawng hang
Lungnepna hong pia in, tua sang nuamzaw om kei
chorus:
Inn, inn, a nuam inn,
Inn dang nuam om kei
Aw! Ei inn bekmah nuam

verse1:
I kiimkot teng ki lawmna, innkuan ki it leeng
Aw ging khempeuh lungdamna, innkuan ki it leeng
Lungnopna leh kicinna, kiheina teng maitaina
Hun khempeuh nuam mahmah aa, innkuan ki it leeng
verse2:
Bukno khatsung zong nuamna, innkuan ki it leeng
Huatna, en’na om lohna, innkuan ki it leeng
I paina tengah nuamna, leitung khempeuh lungdamna
Lungdamna dim nuntaakna, innkuan ki it leeng
verse3:
Pasian zong hong lungdam pih, innkuan ki it leeng
Leitung teng ki itna dim, innkuan ki it leeng
Lui gingbek zong la ngaihpi, vandum bek zong maitaina
Pasian vanpan hong nuih pih, innkuan ki it leeng
chorus:
Innkuan sung ki it leeng
Hun khempeuh nuam mahmah aa
Innkuan ki it leeng

verse1:
Vuuk a paak mualdawn pan in
Khang lam leimong dong in
A mual a guam a zaang ah
Tuitung leitung tengah
Teeng aa a om mite in
Pasian lam khial khin aa
Tua khialhna kol suut dingin, hong sam in om uh hi
verse2:
Khua lumna gamah huih in
Pha takpi in a nung hi
Et ding hoih a tam hangin
Mihing te’n kihuai hi
Pasian in hehpihna tawh
Na tampi hong pia hi
Lawki te’n mittaw bangin, suang leh sing bia uh hi
verse3:
Vantung pan in khua vaakna
I lung sungah taang hi
Khua mialna sung aa omte
Pasian meivak pia ni
Gamlapi mite inah
Zeisu min thei mateng
"Hong gum hi, hong gum hi," ci’n lung damna kiko in
verse4:
Ama lungdamna thu in
Huih aw na paipih in
Mi vekpi’n theih mateng in
Tapidaw paipih in
Khial neite taang ding sih thuak
Tuuno in hong pai ding
Leitung kumpipa bangin, lungdamna tawh maang ding

engTitle: The Morning Light is Breaking (Tune: Webb)
verse1:
Zingsang khua hong vaakta hi, khua mialna beita hi
Leitung mite tho khin hi, dah in khitui luang hi
Gamlapi pan huih hual in, lungdamna thu hong puak
Leitung minam khempeuh tung, Zion gal a do ding
verse2:
En un lawkite zong kuan, i it Pasian mai ah
Van pan lungdamna thu hang, tul tampi lungdam hi
Mawh neite mawhna kisiik, lungdamna thu zui uh
Gumpa thupha piak zongin, leitung thakhat in zui
verse3:
Gupkhiatna guntui luang hi, na mai uh nawttek un
Gam khempeuh ah luang unla, hauhna tawh khawl kei un
A zawngkhal pente dongin, zawhna tawh inn tun dong
Amah phatna la sa in, "Topa hong pai," ci un

zoTitle: Topa In A Maang Ding Hi
verse1:
Ni in a taang thei gampi ah
Topa Zeisu a maang ding ta
Tuipi khat pan tuipi dongin
Ama gamin a zai ding hi
verse2:
Nisim tawntung Ama kiangah
Mihing te’n thu a ngen ding aa
Lukhu bangin minphat napi
Ama lu tungah om ding hi
verse3:
Kam tuam a gen pawlte in ah
Min phatna la sa ding uh aa
Naupangte in a neu laitak
Ama min a thangsak ding hi
verse4:
Ama ukna sung lungdam ta
Thong sung aa omte suah taakna
A ngah, gimna a thuak mite
Tawlngak nading uk ahi hi
verse5:
Leitung mihing khempeuhte in
Ei Kumpipa' min thangsak un
Vantung mite’n la sa dingin
Leitung ah hong kum sukkik un

verse1:
Zion lungdam ni zingsang dawntek ta un
Khuamial zawh loh gam hangin lungdam hang
Dahna kahna awte haihkhia khinta un
Zion in zawhna tawh hong uk ding hi
verse2:
Zion lungdam ni zingsang dawntek ta un
Itazila kamsang te’n genzo hi
Tul, then, tampi kol bulhsa tu’n suakta ciah
Zudah, Zentail, a kibang khuavaak ngah
verse3:
En un sehnel gam zong paak na gam po tah!
Lui hawmte zong, tui a dim in luang hi
Mual sangte dawn pan, lungdam aw thawn kiza
Lungsim kituak kigawmna la sakhawm
verse4:
En un gam khempeuh pan, tui, tuikulh dongin
A kahto Zahova Topa phat un
Gal vanteng puukkhin in gamlumna bei hi
Gupkhiatna aw vantung thawnin ging hi

zoTitle: Leitung Aading Khazih! La I Sa
engTitle: Christ for the World! We Sing (Tune: Italian Hymn)
verse1:
Leitung aa ding Khazih, Khazih aa ding i sa
Late lawp tak’n, a zawng, dah a kapte
Cih nang theilo lung mang
Mawhna hang lungkhamte, Khazih’n damsak
verse2:
Leitung aa ding Khazih, Khazih aa ding i sa
Late ngenkawm, lam zui leh lam pialte
Itna in domto in
Loh zawhloh tawh hong tan, khuamial sung pan
verse3:
Leitung aa ding Khazih, Khazih aa ding i sa
Nate kituak’n, a kibang seemkhawm in
Neh in i ngen ngam aa
Singlamteh i puatek, Khazih min ding
verse4:
Leitung aa ding Khazih, Khazih aa ding i sa
Lungdam takin, A suakthak i khate
Mawhnate nusia in
Lam en i lungsim bun, Khazih ei aa

verse1:
Lungdamna thupha ka za, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Tua thupha na gen inla, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Gam khempeuh ah pai inla, mual kaal, gunkaal kan ding aa
Na gen in Topa thupha "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
verse2:
Gunpi kan in kiko in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Gamla, nai mi kiang gen in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Tui lai lei ah kiko in, a galkhat na tawnsak in
Leitung ah lungdamna in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
verse3:
Galkapna sung kiko in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Singlamteh tung sihna in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Hehpihna i deih ciangin, tua thute na ngaihsun in
Sihna zo ma'n la sa in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
verse4:
Leitung ah na kiko in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Mi khempeuh lungdam sak in, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"
Mual tung leh kuamthuuk sungah, hong phelna thu gen inla
Hih zawhna thu lasakna, "Zeisu in hong gum hi"

verse1:
I Topa hong hehpihna in
Suum pempam in hong taang hi
Tua khuavaak eite hong pia hi
Tui tung tengah taangsak in
verse2:
Mawhna in khua hong mialsak hi
Tuihualpi hong kilok hi
Hoih takin khuadaak pha inla
Tui dung teng phatak en in
verse3:
Na meivaak phatak vaak inla
Tuihual in mi taaikha ding
Noptakin suahtaak theih nangun
Tawl ngakna mun tuntheih na'ng
chorus:
Meivaak teng a vekpi’n vaak in
Tuihual teng kimuh nading
A cimawh tuikia om kha ding
Gumkhia inla kaikhia in

verse1:
Taangsak in, taangsak mengmeng in
Tuipi kilok kantan in
Hotkhiatna thu zeelsak meng in
Migi gum khia Pa' min in
verse2:
Taangsak in, khate’ sihna ah
Tuazan khuamialna mun ah
Hat meng in, hunte beibei veh
A nai, a nai in bei ta
verse3:
Taangsak in, Topa’ hong sawl hi
A thu siangtho lim ngaih dih
"Paikhia in, ka thu va gen in
Hong ompih den ning," a cih
chorus:
Taangsak in, taangsak mengmeng in
Tuipi gaal, tuikulhte dong
Taangthu lamdang va zasak in
Itna, hehpihna khawnkhong

verse1:
Leitung teng Zeisu thu gen un
Gun gaalkhat pan gaalkhat ah
Mawh neite, Zeisu thu gen un
A khuavaak pha taangsak un
verse2:
Lungdam thun’n gamlapi zeel hen
Khuamialna mun gam khempeuh
Lungdamna khuavaak theisak un
Thangsak un khuamial gam ah
verse3:
Tuipi tung leh mualtung tengah
Lungdamna Thu thangsak un
Mun khempeuh Zeisu Thu gen un
Hong sapna thu thangsak un
verse4:
Mi khempeuh aa ding thu ngen in
Lungdamna tawh huh ciat un
I gam aa ding zong thu ngen in
Zeisu ei gam aa ding in
chorus:
Thangsak un, leitung tengah
Lungdam Thu gungaal khat ah
Leitung teng Zeisu thu gen un
A tawntung A min phat un

verse1:
Lungdamna thupha ngai in, gamla a nai gen in
Sihna thuak Topa Zeisu, hong gupna thu gen in
Om tawntung hi Ama thu, A thuciam kip ding hi
Topa Zeisu a umte, A min thangsak ding hi
verse2:
Sawt vei khuamial aa omte, mawhna lam a zuite
Topa Zeisu’n tan napi, en in thupha bel hi
Lungsim na neih zah in ah, A thuciamna um in
Topa kiangah thu ngente, kisia ngeilo ding hi
verse3:
Leitung ah vangik puate gimna tawlna thuak mi
Na vangik a pua dingin Topa in hongngak hi
Thupha lamdang hong pia aa, mi khempeuh hawmsak hi
Topa Zeisu thu umte a min thangsak ding hi
chorus:
Topa Pasian kiangah, hehpihna ngente in
Gupna thupha maantak aa ngahthei ding uh hi
Topa Pasian kiangah hehpihna ngente in
Gupna thupha maantak aa ngahthei ding uh hi

zoTitle: Mial Lak Tuipi Hual Tung Pan Kiko
verse1:
Miallak tuipi hual tungpan kiko aw in
Khuavaak hongpuak un ci
Khuamial sungah a cimawh mi tampi in
Khuavaak hongpuak un ci
verse2:
Makedawni gam pan a sapna aw in
Khuavaak hongpuak un ci
Singlamteh mai ah, i biakna koihsuk in
I khuavak vapuak ni
verse3:
Zeisu hong hehpihna mi’n ngahkim nading
Khuavak hongpuak un ci
Khazih lungsim bang kimuh kawikawi nading
Tangsak ni, tangsak ni
chorus:
Taangsak ni! Nuamna thupha khuavaak
Taangsak ni, mun khempeuh ah
Taangsak ni! Nuamna thupha khuavaak
Taangsak ni, tawl ngalo in

zoTitle: Mite Tung Gen Ding Thu Khat I Nei Hi
engTitle: We've Story to Tell the Nations
verse1:
Mite tung gen ding thu khat i nei hi
Aman lungsim Aman hei ding
Thumaan leh hehpihna tangthu
Kilemna, khuavaakna thu
Kilemna, khuavaakna thu
verse2:
Mite tung sak ding la khat i nei hi
Topa lam lungsim nga sak ding
Siatna a zo ding la khat hi
Tei leh namsau susia ding
Tei leh namsau susia ding
verse3:
Mite tung thupuak ding khat i nei hi
Vantung ah a maang Topa in
Eite gum ding aa A Ta hong sawl
Pasian’ itna ei honglak
Pasian' itna ei honglak
verse4:
Mite lah ding Honpa khat i nei hi
Dahna lampi a tawnkhin Pa
Leitung mihing lian khempeuhte
Pasian’ thumaan ah pai na’ng
Pasian' thumaan ah pai na’ng
chorus:
Zan khuamial, zing khuavaak suak ding aa
Zing khuavaak, sun nitaang suak ding
Khazih gam leitung’h hong pai ding hi
Itna leh khuavaakna gam

zoTitle: Hat In, Zion Seem Meng In Na Nasep Ding
verse1:
Hat in, Zion, seemmeng in na nasep ding
Mi teng tungah, khuavaak Pasian hilh in
Mihing khat zong khuamial sung aa mangthang ding
Phal hetlo hi mihing piangsak Pa in
verse2:
En ven, mawhna khuamial thong inn mial sungah
Mi tul tampi, kihen in om uh hi
Khatbeek va pailo a mau ko dingin ah
A suahtaak na’ng uh Topa’ si napi
verse3:
Mi namkim, pau namkimte kiang va gen in
Amau’ hinna in itna Pasian hi
Kiniam sakin a bawlsate hon dingin
Van nunnuam piakna ding hong sisuk hi
verse4:
Na tate sawl in tua thupha gen dingin
Na sum tawh huh in manlang theih nading
Na lungsim teng tawh nakpi’n thu ngetsak in
Na zat khempeuh Zeisu’n hong dimkik ding
chorus:
Lungdamna thupha, nopna thupha
Zeisu, hong tatna Thupha, va gen meng in

verse1:
Lungdamna thu gingsak in
Gamkhat pan gamkhat dongah
Suahtaakna thu zel khinsak in
Kei leh nang aa ding bawlta
Leitung hong it manin, A Tapa a hong pia hi
A thu um mite khempeuh in
Nuntaak tawntung ngah ding hi
verse2:
Lungdamna thu’n hong sam hi
"Mi khempeuh hong paita hen"
A hong sapna na nialkei in
Pasian hehpihna lian hi
"Ke’n hinna ka hi hi, lungsim khial a nei mi in
A mawhnate a san hangin
Tuumul bangin a ngo ding"
verse3:
Lungdamna thu ngailo mi
Bang gimna a thuakding hiam
Tua lungdamna thu a khum in
Kikepna hong hilhlai aa
Hi’n na gupkhiat na’ng in, khawl lo-in ah tai inla
Na nunglam kihei kik kei in
Hi kei leh na si ding ta
chorus:
Lungdam thu gingsak in
Gamkhat pan gamkhat dongah
Lungdam thu, man neilo
Nangmah leh kei aa ding hi

zoTitle: A Thu Ka Gengen Nuam Hi
engTitle: I Love to Tell the Story (Tune: Tidings)
verse1:
Athu ka gengen nuam hi, muh nailoh vantung na
Zeisu leh Ama vaangpi, Zeisu leh hong itna
Tua thu ka gengen nuam hi, thumaan ahih manin
Ka lungsim hong kimsak in, thu dangte banglo in
verse2:
Athu ka gengen nuam hi, lamdang semsem ka sa
Ki ngaihsun theinawn lopi, tua sang lamdang zaw na
Tua thu ka gengen nuam hi, hong noptuam sakna lian
Tua hang mah’n kong gensawn hi, Tu in lawm aw, nang kiang
verse3:
Athu ka gengen nuam hi, gengen leeng nuam semsem
Ka gengen sa hi napi, gengen leeng ngaih semsem
Tua thu ka gengen nuam hi, hot khiatna thu a pha
A za nailo mi om hi, Pasian’ hong gen thupha
verse4:
Athu ka gengen nuam hi, a thei pente in zong
An duh tui duhbang duh hi, mi dangte sangin zong
Vantung vaangliatna sungah, lathak ka sa ding hi
Tua ciangin hih thu lui mah, kei in ka sa ding hi
chorus:
Tua thu ka gengen nuam hi
Gengen lai ning vantung ah
Hih thu tul thei ngeilo pi
Zeisu leh hong itna

verse1:
Khaici manpha vawh un
Zingsang phalvaak kipat tungin
Khaici manpha vawh un, sun khuaphat laitak
Khaici manpha vawhun, khangno lungsim zepna dingin
Khaici manpha vawh un, dawmin lungduai tak
verse2:
Khaici manpha vawh un
Ni a kaai laitak in ah zong
Khaici manpha vawh un, khua muina sungah
Khaici manpha vawh un, phunlo, um lah lo-in om un
A vekpi’n Pasian ap in Amah muang un
verse3:
Khaici manpha vawh un
Lawpna leh hanciamna taktawh
Khaici manpha vawh un, kham khaici manpha
Khaici manpha vawh un, khutte thazaw sak ngeilo in
Pasian in ni leh guah puak ding thu ngen un
chorus:
Khaici manpha vawh un
Khaici manpha vawh un
Gamla naiah vawh un, lungduai itna khut tawh
Nuntaak khomun balnen, lungdamna tangthu gen ta un
Khaici manpha vawh un, i it gam sungah

engTitle: Go Ye Into All the World
verse1:
Gamlapi aa mawhna khuamial gam sungah
Mi tul leh then gam mangin om uh hi
Kua pai ding aa gupkhiatna thu va gen ding
Khazih en in, gimna ding ngaihsun ke’n
verse2:
Khuadaak le cin kong honsa in hong ngak hi
Khazih galkapte aw pai in luut un
Tha neihzah teng gawmin kikhen thaang lo-in
Thupha hilh in mawhna kol vasuut un
verse3:
Bang hang note si zenzen ding hong ci in
Pasian hong sapna thu vako sawn un
Hotkhiatna leh hinna na ngah nading in
Zeisu si in hong tanzo va ci un
verse4:
Pa Pasian aw, hong tungsak mengmeng ta in
Mi namcin in Na minphat nading hun
Hotkhiatna la lungdamna tawh kiko in
Halleluiah, Topa Kumpi phat un
chorus:
“Vaangliatna kei tung hong piazo
Vaangliatna kei tung hong piazo!
Vak kawikawi unla, lungdam Thu vagen un
Note tawh ka omkhawm tawntung ding

engTitle: When the Mists Have Rolled Away
verse1:
A siangtho mahmah mual tungah
Meiilum a then’ ciangin ah
Nisa a vaang taanna vaak pha
Cik leh lui neute tung tu’n
Sakhi tuihup a vaang in ah
Itna phalai kisim ta
Eite kimu dingin a hun
Meiilum a then’ ciangin ah
verse2:
Mihingte khuamial sungah khial
Leitung mi ahih mangngilh
Phatna ding aa hahkatna aa
Ki itna thupha paaikhia
Nopsak na'ng Topa'n hong phel ding
Eite khempeuh hong liah ding
I ngak dingin zingsang hun hi
Meiilumte a theng ding hi
verse3:
Meiilumte ei khempeuh tungah
A leen toh laitakin ah
I it khempeuh lawmte tawh
Eite i kimu ding maw
Khuamial cipna gungal khatah
Khuavaak nitang hong tungta
A lamdang khuavaak i muhna
Meiilum a then’ ciangin ah
chorus:
Eite i kimu ding hi, leitung ah kimuh bangin
Tua thupha leh lungdamna ni, zingsang a phalvak ciangah
Eite kimu dingin a hun
Meiilum a then’ ciangin ah

engTitle: Beyond The Smiling And The Weeping
verse1:
Nuihna leh kahna kheng gal khatah
Man langin ah ka tung ding hi
Ihmutna leh thawhna kheng gal ah
Tuhna leh atna kheng gal khatah
Man langin ah, ka tung ding hi
verse2:
Palhna leh vulna kheng gal khatah
Man langin ah ka tung ding hi
Khuavaak leh khuamial kheng gal khatah
Lawpna leh launa kheng gal khatah
Man langin ah ka tung ding hi
verse3:
Khuadam leh khualum kheng gal khatah
Man langin ah ka tung ding hi
Suang mualte leh gunte gal khatah
Tawntung leh tawntung lo gal khatah
Man langin ah ka tung ding hi
chorus:
Nong itna pha innpi pha ah
Om dingin hongkha in Topa aw

zoTitle: Tua Tuikhuk Ah Kei Nong Mu Diam?
engTitle: Will You Meet at the Fountain
verse1:
Tua tuikhuuk ah kei nong mu diam?
Min thanna gam ka tun ciang
Tua tuikhuuk ah kei nong mu diam?
Lungdam in khut i beeng diam?
I lawmte’n tua lai hong dawn in
Lawm it dangte aw za ding
Tua tuikhuuk ah la i sa ding
Nang zong tua lai nong mu diam?
verse2:
Tua tuikhuuk ah kei nong mu diam?
Tua lai kongthei takpi ding
Migi i kha kikhawl khawmin
Ka theihna sate sangin
A ngaihzaw la ka za ding hi
Ka bil sung hong gin ciangin
Vantung gam bang nopna kicing
Na kamkhum aw ka thei ding
verse3:
Tua tuikhuuk ah kei nong mu diam?
Nang tawh kinai zawsem ding
Ka it Topa ka muh ciangin
Hong dawnna kam kazaak ciang
Amah’n tuikhuuk hong mu ding hi
Amah’n kei hong angpom in
Tua tuikhuuk min thanna om ding
Nang zong tua lai nong mu diam?
chorus:
Hi hi, tua tuikhuuk kong mu ding
A hoih a taang tuikhuuk ah
Aw, tua tuikhuuk ah kong mu ding
Hi hi, kong mu ding, mu ding

zoTitle: Amaute In La Thak A Sa Uh Hi
verse1:
Vantung inn sungah i lawmte’n la sa hi
Hong gum Topa Amin a phatna uh hi
Leitung ah lungkhamna teng mangngilh khin aa
Mi siangtho te'n lungdamna lathak a sa
verse2:
Hong hehpihna phat na’ng lathak om kim hi
A um ta ding thupha bel ahi ding hi
Topa si aa a piangkik A minthanna
Ka gen masa nuambel hi Pasian kiangah
verse3:
Tuni sipha tawh a kisil lote in
Tua lathak kuamah in sa theilo ding hi
Mawh neite mawhna phel aa hong hehpihna
Phatna lungdamin limtakin la sa ni
chorus:
Zeisu minphat ni
Kalani mual tungah sizo hi
Zeisu minphat hi
Sihna zo aa hingkik ta hi

engTitle: We Shall Stand Before the King
verse1:
Kumpipa’ mai i ding ding
Vantung mi tawh la sa ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
A taang gungei lam zui ding
Topa’ minphat tawntung ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
verse2:
Vantung khua siiklong tum ding
Kumpipa' mai i ding ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Dah nate paisan ding aa
Sa tawntung ding min phatna
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
verse3:
Ka kha in manpha puak ding
Kumpipa' mai i ding ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Zawhna A khemai nga ding
Amah bang meel kicing ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
chorus:
Kumpipa' mai i ding ding
Vantung mi tawh la sa ding
Kumpipa A min phat ding
Haleluiah! Haleluiah
Kumpipa’ mai i ding ding

engTitle: Safe in the Arms of Jesus
verse1:
Gaal omlo Zeisu’ angsung
Kham khut tawh hong kawi ding
Hong itna aa limbeel leh
Ka lungsim nuamsa ding
Ngai un vantung mi aw in
A vaangtang vantung ah
Mual tung tuipi gaal panin
La sa bang hong tungta
verse2:
Gaal omlo Zeisu’ angsung
Gimna tawlna a bei
Leitung ze-etna khialhna
In ah hong zol zokei
Lungsiatna leh dahnate
Kihtaakna zong dai hi
Leitung ah khitui luanna
Neu khabek om lai hi
verse3:
Kei taang ding Topa’ Zeisu
Singlamteh na thuak hi
A om tawntung suangpi bang
Ka belh niloh ding hi
Zankim lai hong kheng mateng
Thuak in nangak ding ci
Zingsang aa phalvaak mateng
Lamen ka om ding hi
chorus:
Gaal omlo Zeisu' angsung
Kham khut tawh hong kawi ding
Hong itna a limbeel leh
Ka lungsim nuamsa ding

verse1:
I omna inn ngaihsun inla
A taang gungal khatah om a ci
Mi siangthote nuamna a om aa
Puanpaak tawh kizem a om hi
verse2:
Nangma lawmte ngaihsun inla
A mailam amau te’n a zui hi
Lungdamna tawh amau te'n la sa
Vantung khua dongin kiza hi
verse3:
Vantung hong gum Topa’ kiangah
Keima lawmte nuamsa a om hi
Tua munin gimna om nawn lohna
Keima kha in a tung nuam hi
verse4:
En in, i lawmte vantung ah
Amau in vantung khua a luut zo
A lungkhamna teng beikhin ding aa
Gimna tawntung mulo om zo
chorus:
Vantung ah, vantung ah
I om nading inn vantung ah
Vantung ah, vantung ah
Vantung ah (vantung ah)
I om nading inn vantung ah

zoTitle: Tua Lai Ka Om Nuam Hi
verse1:
A sap mi gam nuamah om nuam ing
A nopna kam in gen zawh hilo
Nii sangin a taangzaw gam nuamah
Zeisu tawh a tawntung om nuam ing
verse2:
Lai Siangtho sung thu katheih ciangin
Tawntung nuntaak nopna thu hi ding
Gimna tawlna dangtaakna khempeuh
Tua gam i tun ciang om nawnlo ding
verse3:
A nuam a hoih tua gam nuam sungah
Sihna lungkhamna om nawnlo ding
Kahna khitui luanna om nawnlo
Sihna omlo nunnop gam nuamah
verse4:
Tua gamnuam sungah om thei dingin
Pasian in mawhnei mi hong hehpih
A thuciam bang a um khempeuhte
A tawntung tua gamah om ding hi
chorus:
Hih lam ah, hih lamah
Zeisu tawh a tawntung omnuam ing
Hih lam ah, hih lam ah
Zeisu tawh a tawntung omnuam ing

verse1:
Vantung inn nuamah kikhawm dingin ah
Ni nuam, zingsang gungei cikkhuuk ah
Kikhawm ding hong ngakte tawh kimu leeng
Lungdam nuamsa in la i sa ding
verse2:
Hong tel Topa hong hehpihna pha aa
I lawmte ei hong ngakin omta
Dahna tawh kipelh in i om ding hi
Kimuh ciang lungdamin la sa ding
verse3:
Hong gum Topa Zeisu tokhom tungah
Lawmte aw a mai kikhawm in ah
Hong itna hong hehpihna a pha aa
A min thanna phatin la sa ni
chorus:
Kikhawm ding innpi ah
A nuam gunpi leh ciktui gei ah
Hong ngak i lawmte tawh
Nuam in Topa min i phat ding hi

verse1:
A tawntung Topa tawh, "Amen" hong cisak in
Sihna pan nuntaakna kammal
Tua nuntaak tawntung na
I pumpi hong kepsak, vaakthaap in, taikhia in
Zan thapai tuipuan buuk lam in
Ni khat sang’ inn nai zaw’ng
verse2:
Vantung ka Pa’ innah, ka kha inn tawh kinai
Khat veivei ka upna mit in
Kham kongpite mu in
Ka kha a sihbup ciang, ka utna mun tung ding
Mi siangthote’ luah ding a taang
Jerusalem khuathak
verse3:
Meiipi hong kai manin, lametna teng beikhin
Naw-i vakhu bangin tuipi
Huihpi lakah ka leeng
Sawt lo-in meii thengin, tuipi leh huih daai in
Ka kha lungnuam in, nuam takin
A om hun ni ciangin
verse4:
Zingsang nitaak ka za, sun leh zankim ciang zong
A ngaih mahmah van mite’ aw
Lasakna ke’n ka za
Tua thawh kikna kammal, tua gualzawhna awging!
Khatvei, "A tawntung Topa tawh"
Amen, cisak lai in
chorus:
Inn nai zaw’ng, inn nai zaw’ng
Ni khat sang' inn nai zaw’ng

verse1:
Sun sang a phazaw gam nuam om aa
I upna in kigaal muh thei hi
Ei aa ding, tua gampha vantung ah
I Pa'n omna hong bawl kholhsak hi
verse2:
Eite in tua gungaal gampha ah
Thupha ngah mite'n langaih sa in
Dah ngei nawnlo ding i lung sungah
Khuisa ngei nawnlo ding tawldam khin
verse3:
Hong piak sa vaanglian hong itna pi
Hong siangsak thupha, pahtawina la
Tawl ngalo phatna i sa ding hi
Hong it vantung Pa Pasian mai ah
chorus:
Nung ciangin a nopna
Tua gampha ah i kimu ding hi
Nung ciangin a nopna
Tua gampha ah i kimu ding hi

verse1:
Ze-etna leh nasep nate bei ciang
A hoih tuipi geiah muangtak om ding
Ka it mahmah Topa kiang nai om ding
Tanglai pekpan minthanna kei aa ding
verse2:
A bei ngeilo hehpihna hong piak ciang
Vantung khua ah omna khat ka nei ding
Topa maitang tua mun ka mu den ding
Tanglai pekpan minthanna kei aa ding
verse3:
Sawtpi a muhnop lawmte na om ding
Lungdamna kiimkot ah gunbang luang ding
Gumpa maiah nuihmai bek om ka thei
Tanglai pekpan minthanna kei aa ding
chorus:
Aw, kei aa ding tua minthanna
Tua minthanna, tua minthanna
Hong hehpihna, Amai ka en ding ta
Tua minthanna in keima aa ding hi

zoTitle: Kham Gam Nuamah Ka Teeng Hi
verse1:
Gamlapi aa galdona thu ka bil in ka za hi
Tua ciang leitung mawhna'n van nuai zeel ding ka thei hi
Muanlahna launa leitung nate'n kei hong zol uh hang
Hong ngah khia lo ding hi, khamgam nuam pan
verse2:
Gamlampi aa om leitung ah lungmanna huih nung aa
Leitung mite in sawt veipi gaal a do uh hi
Kei ka hih leh Pasian inn muanhuai sungah ka om aa
Gaaldona'n hong ban kei, khamgam nuam ah
verse3:
Huihpi naakpi nun hangin phamawh kasa kei ding hi
Pasian khut nuai kiliah in, lung muangin ka om hi
Hih lai ah ni taang tawntung aa, hong siasak ding omlo
Tawntung ka lungmuang hi, khamgam nuam ah
verse4:
Pasian nasepna mu in, ka lung ka ngaih ciangin ah
A aw, ka za aa, lampi hong puahsak ka mu hi
Kha Siangtho ka ngah khin aa, gupna thu ka telkhin hi
Lungdam in om den ning, khamgam nuam ah
chorus:
Mual tungah meii kai lohna
A nopna ah ka teeng hi
Tuinaak pha pan a hong luang
Tui kang ngeilo dawn ing
Hi hi, bei hun neilo a hong piang
Mana tawh ka kivaak hi
Kei in khamgam nuamah ka teeng hi

verse1:
Lim ngaihsut dide khat
Lungsim hong phawng pahpah
Inn lam naih zaw'ng, tuni'n, tuni'n
A beisa nite sang
verse2:
Omna tampi omna
Ka Pa inn lam naih zaw'ng
Kumpi' tokhom naih zaw'ng, tuni'n
Suangpaak tuipi naih zaw'ng
verse3:
Van gikte kingakna
Nuntaak gamgi naih zaw'ng
Singkhuam ngak ding nai zaw'ng, tuni'n
Lukhu ngah ding naih zaw'ng
verse4:
Lam ke'n ka siik khialh ciang
Ka kiangah hong nai in
Inn tawh ka kinai zaw tuni'n
Ka ngaihsut sangin ah
chorus:
Inn tawh nai zaw'ng
Inn tawh nai zaw'ng
Inn tawh nai zaw'ng tuni'n
Tuni'n, a beisa nite sang

verse1:
Zeisu sii in hong sawpsiang hi
I khawm ding sihna gungaal ah
Natna hong tun kik ding nai lo
Nuamna thu kikum in om ni
Sihna gungal khat ah
verse2:
Dahna hong tun ding ka laulo
Upna'n ka mu, vantung ka en
Ka za hi vantung mi'n la sa
Khitui khempeuh Topa'n nuul khin
Sihna gungaal khat ah
verse3:
A itte tawh kikhop nuamna
Bang aw ka za ding hiam tua ah
Ka lungsim hong vut hong thosak
Na dang deihna tua mun mangsak
Sihna gungaal khat ah
verse4:
Topa hong hilh bang ka zuihna
Lungdam ka ngah a kicinna
Khawl ngeilo in ka phat ding hi
Khitui khempeuh hong nuul sak hi
Sihna gungaal khat ah
chorus:
(Sihna gungaal khat ah) x3
(I tung ding hong nai ta) x4
Sihna gungaal khat ah

verse1:
Zawdan gun geiah ka ding aa
A gal lam ka en hi
Khanan gamnuam hong kilangh aa
Ka luah nading gam hi
verse2:
Tua gam phabel sungah innah
Khuavaak tawntung om hi
Pasian leh Zeisu vaang in ah
A taang tawntung ding hi
verse3:
Cikciang tua gam ka tung ding hiam
Khuamial om lohna ah
I Pa maitang lungdamna dim
Cikciang ka mu ding hiam
verse4:
Ka sin sungah lungdam nading
Leitung sawtpi omlo
Zawdan gunpi kilok hangin
Lungdam in ka tung zo
chorus:
Tua gamnuam sungah ei i khawl ding hi
A nop tawntung gungaal lam in ah
Nung ciangin Mawsi leh Tuuno la sa ding hi
Zeisu tawh maang tawntung ding hi

zoTitle: A Nung Ciangin I Zo Ding Hi
verse1:
Topa Zeisu'n hong sam hi
I maiah koih khinzo hi
Thaman la ding pai un ci, vantung pan
Itna kamkhum tawh hong sam
Mawhna khuamial sung om mi
Dam takin Topa'n hong sam, hong nai hi
verse2:
Lam hong hilh bang zui ding hi
I tun nading inn nuam ah
Hong zui un, ci'n hong sam hi, vantung pan
Tua ciang kikhen nawnlo ding
Lawp aa i lametna bang
Upna bangin khial lo-in, hong nai hi
verse3:
Ze-et bawlsiat i thuak zong
I inn ding vantung om hi
Zeisu'n hong it veve hi, vantung pan
Topa siamna a lianpi
A kamciam peel ngeilo hi
A tawntung i phat ding hi, hong nai hi
chorus:
Nung ciang a kiang kimu ding
Nung ciang a kiang kimu ding
Nung ciang aa Topa Zeisu tawh maang ding hi
Nung ciang a kiang kimu ding
Nung ciang a kiang kimu ding
Nung ciang aa Topa Zeisu tawh maang ding hi

engTitle: When We All Get to Heaven
verse1:
Zeisu'n an bang hong itna pha
Lam bang paak zaila sa ni
Thangvan inn taang sausiang nunnuam
Ko aa ding ngo bang langh hi
verse2:
Thangvan tuang lam i zuih laitak
Zaitha tawlna om ding hi
Hi zong i pai khit ciangin ah
Zaitha tawl omlo ding hi
verse3:
Zang nisuah sim i um ding aa
Limbel sawl sang i leeng ding
Saumang nunnuam kuam bang luah na'ng
Gua bang hin lai ngaih khua ah
verse4:
I mai nopna lailung damna
Va bang leeng tung nuam ing ci
Thang van kankiil i tun ciangin
Kham vaang khuapi i mu ding
chorus:
Thangvan dong, i tun ciangin
Deih teng leh lailung damna ngah ding hi
Kumkhua in, la sa ni
Topa Zeisu i phat ding hi

verse1:
Vantung gamlam ka zin nading in
Zeisu in hehpih in lam hong sial
I gal khempeuh a vek in zozo
Hih lamah hong pai un u leh nau
verse2:
Hehpihna lam tu in zong unla
Tua zawh ciang khua mialna hong bei ding
A umte in vantung gam tung ding
Na up leh hih vantung gam lamah
verse3:
Zeisu in hehpih in ah hong sam
A umlo mite umsak dingin
Hong hehpihna lianpi i mu ding
Pasian gamnuam sungah i luut ding
chorus:
Gam nuamah om dingin
Om dingin, om dingin
Hih lamah, hong pai un u leh nau
Gam nuamah om dingin
Om dingin, om dingin
Hih lamah hong pai un u leh nau

verse1:
Ni tumna gaal ah, Aw a nuam zingsang
Topa hong om ciang, vantung hizo
Khual zinna bei in, minthanna mu ding
Ni tumna gaal ah, lei bei ni ciang
verse2:
Ni tumna gaal ah, meii kai ngei lohna
Huihpi om nawnlo, launa bei ta
Aw lungdamna ni, Aw bei ngeilo ni
Ni tumna gaal ah, tawntung nopna
verse3:
Ni tumna gaal ah, khut tawh hong kha ding
I biak i Topa, Pasian kiangah
Ama minthanna, hong dawnna kamkhum
Kei aa ding hi ta, tua gungaal ah
verse4:
Ni tumna gaal ah, lungdam kikhawlhna
A tungsa i it, i lawmte tawh
Tua a nuam gam sung, kikhen nawnlo ding
Ni tumna gaal ah, a tawntung in

verse1:
Tua lai gam om nitum lohna
Van ah ni taang tawntung
Tua lai nitak om ngeilo hi
Topa vaang in taang hi
verse2:
Tua lai mun om kilemna gam
Gimna om nawn lohna
Tua lai huihpi zong nung hiauhiau
I tun na'ng tua mun ah
verse3:
Tua lai inn om, minthang inn om
A kigen van inn nuam
I tun nading vantung inn nuam
Ei hong dawn ding tua lai
verse4:
I pum lui na i nusiat leh
Manlang in hong kheng ding
A taang van zinpa kiang zuan leeng
I lungnuam tawntung ding
chorus:
Singlamteh e'n i puak leh
Kham lukhu i khu ding
Mi hoihte sung i ten leh
Khuavaak sung i omden ding

verse1:
It aw, nuamtak ihmu in tawlnga in
I Topa diip tung lukham in nei in
Nang kong it hang, Topa'n hong it zawsem
Mangpha! Mangpha! Mangpha!
verse2:
Naungeek bang nuamtak ihmu hithiat in
Dahna, kahna te'n nang hong phawng lo ding
Nang aa a nuam hithiat ihmut na hi
Mangpha! Mangpha! Mangpha!
verse3:
Hih leitung ah niliim a bei mateng
Topa'n A tuubuuk sung hong khop mateng
Ni vaangtaang khuamial a hong bei mateng
Mangpha! Mangpha! Mangpha!
verse4:
Pasian tokhom mai kimuh kik mateng
A sia theilo puan a hongpiak mateng
Tu'n i theih bangin i kitheih mateng
Mangpha! Mangpha! Mangpha!
verse5:
Minthanna thawhkik zing khuavaak mateng
Khazih sung a site thawhkik mateng
Ginalo bek tawh hong paikik lo ding
Mangpha! Mangpha! Mangpha!

verse1:
Sihna kuam gaal khat ah khua lianpi khat om hi
Minthan nate kigen khin zolo
Tua munah ni tumlo, singtehte vul ngeilo
Tua Pasian kham khuapi hoih sungah
verse2:
Tua mun'n i it Kumpi, hong Tanpa Topa om
Thumaan mite'n lungdam'n en uh hi
Tua mun ah thumaan mite aksi bang taang ding
Tua Pasian kham khuapi hoih sungah
verse3:
Singlamteh phung i tunpih khitsa kha khempeuh
Tuubuuk sung i tunsa tuu khempeuh
Lukhu zep nading suangmanpha bang kikem hi
Tua Pasian kham khuapi hoih sungah
chorus:
Tua mun ah, ni tumlo, singtehte vul ngeilo
Tua mun ah thumaan mi maitang Topa'n en ding
Tua Pasian kham khuapi hoih sungah

verse1:
Vantung vaanglian hehpihna gam
Mi siangthote inn a hi
Ama kiangah om tawntung ni
Leitung na khempeuh paai ni
verse2:
Tawntung inn nuam vaanglian gam ah
I lawmte tua gam om ding
Tua inn nuam sungah om dingin
Mi namcin a khawm ding hi
verse3:
Hong gupna sipha vaang lianpi
Hehpihna gam teng zeelsak
Hih gal gam ah i om lai in
Hong hehpihna thu gen in
verse4:
Khattang hih hang pai in gen ni
Leitung dahna kiam ding hi
Lungsim deih teng tawntung omna
Kim takin a om ding hi
chorus:
Leitung ni a bei ciangin ah
Nung ciangin inn nuam ah
Mi siangthote omna lam ah
Vantung khua om ding hi

zoTitle: Tua Lai Dahna Om Nawn Lo
verse1:
Vantung ka ngaihsun hi, Topa Pasian omna
A kham maitang nisim mu ding
Nop kicing man ngahna
verse2:
Vantung ka ngaihsun hi, hong teel Topa omna
Hong itna pha phat nading la kisa
Tawntung ding hi
verse3:
Vantung ka ngaihsun hi, vantung mihingte in
Puanpaak silh in a om uh hi
Ei zong i om ding hi
verse4:
Vantung ka ngaihsun hi, a tungsa i lawmte
Mu aa kikhen nawnlo ding aa
Nuam tawntung ding hi veh
chorus:
Dahna kipelhna mun
Dahna kipelhna mun
Itna kicing, vantung khamgam
Dahna kipelhna mun

zoTitle: Ka Om Na'ng Khua A Hi
verse1:
Ni a taang khatna gam lamah
Nopsak na'ng gam lamah
Aksi zong a taan'na gamah
Ka om na'ng khua a hi
verse2:
Gimna thuakna gungaal khatah
Lunggim tamna lamah
Kikhel aa i nopsak na'ng ah
Ka om na'ng khua a hi
verse3:
Sihna tuipi gaalkhat lamah
Khuamialna gam sungah
Lungdam nuamna i ngah nading
A taang in ka mu hi
verse4:
Mawhna leh hehna leitung ah
Hong liah aa mangsak hi
Tawntung tua khuapi nuam sungah
Zeisu tawh om khawm ning
chorus:
Tua khuapi nuam, khut tawh bawllo
Tua gam, eima aa ding
Tawntung vantung mi'n la a sa
Eima omna ding hi

verse1:
Hong tung ding leitung hin bei ni
Tu'n ka theih bang la salo ding
Ka thawhkik ciang ka nuam ding hi
Topa Kumpipa tawh om ning
verse2:
Leitung ka inn puuk ding ni om
Cikciang ding hiam genthei lo hi
Hih hang kathei, kei aa ding om
Vantung ka om na'ng ka thei zo
verse3:
Ni a taang hong liapsak ciangin
Nitum khuavaang taang liim nuai ah
Ka Topa'n kei pha hong ci in
Hong luutsak ding hiam khawlna ah
chorus:
Ka mu ding hi, Topa' maitang
Gupna thu itna tawh hong gen
Ka mu ding hi, Topa' maitang
Gupna thu itna tawh hong gen

zoTitle: Keima Aading Vantung A Hi Ding Hi
engTitle: That Will Be Heaven for Me
verse1:
A bawl innpi ah hong paipih dingin
Topa hong pai ding hun kithei lo hi
Ahih hang Topa om aa khuamial taangsak hi
(A minthanna kei aa ding hi) x3
Ahih hang Topa om aa khuamial taangsak hi
A minthanna kei aa ding hi
verse2:
Ka theih nai loh vantung mite'n la sa
Kham gawsem tawh Pasian minphat uh hi
I Kumpi Topa Zeisu a phatna uh la
(Tua la kisa kei aa ding hi) x3
I Kumpi Topa Zeisu a phatna uh la
Tua la kisa kei aa ding hi
verse3:
Innpi hoih a lim ka thei naikei hi
Bang min ka ciahpih ding ka theikei hi
Hih hang hong gum Topa Zeisu hong ngai ding hi
(Vantung in keima aa ding hi) x3
Hih hang hong gum Topa Zeisu hong ngai ding hi
Vantung in keima aa ding hi

zoTitle: A Sawt Loin Innah Ciah Ding
engTitle: In a Little While We're Going Home
verse1:
Lampi ah hong lungnuam sak ding la khat sa ni
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
Zan khuamial bei ding, nitaang tawntung na sungah
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
verse2:
Sep ding i muh peuh i khut in i seem ding hi
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
Pasian' hehpihna in i tha hong khauhsak ding
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
verse3:
A gim khete' aa ding lam i maaisak ding hi
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
Itna lungsim kizel kim in hoihna lawh hen
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
verse4:
Lungkhamna pengin tawldamna gaal khatah om
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
Tua khuapi nuam sungah khitui luanna omlo
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding
chorus:
A sawt lo-in ah, a sawt lo-in ah
Tuipi hual i kantan ding
Eite kimu ding huihpi nung a ven ciangin
A sawt lo-in ah innah ciah ding

zoTitle: Inn Pha Bel Ah I Pai Ding Hi
verse1:
Mi siangthote pai nading lampi in
Pasian maiah a om ding hi
Vantung khua mualah i pai ngitnget aa
Zingsol i tungah hong taang hi
verse2:
Lamnuam tawn mi siangtho honpite in
Zion khua ah a paikik ciang
Meivaak sungah namgim tui thunkhol un
Vantung khua ah i pai ding hi
verse3:
Lamnuam tawn ding aa i ngaihsut tek leh
Khat leh khat i ki itna in
Pasian tawh eite i omkhawm ding aa
Nuam in i om tawntung ding hi
verse4:
Zawdan gun gei aa a votna geiah
I din hangin a gaal khatah
Topa Pasian tawh i ngapkhawm ding aa
A min i phat tawntung ding hi
chorus:
Inn pha belah i pai ding aa
Lungdamna tawh i kimu ding hi
Khua munnuam bel eite'n i phak ciang
Dahna om nawnlo hi

verse1:
Zan khua mialna ah i vakthaap nawnkei ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
Pasian' khuavaak ahih na khua i pai ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
verse2:
Natna, satna, dahnate om nawnlo ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
Taangte bangin i lawmte tawh kipawl ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
verse3:
Genkhiat zawh loh lawpna kei aa hi ta ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
Amah en leng tuazah a siangtho kicing
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
verse4:
Leitung vangik mi nawngkai sak nawnlo ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
Nuam tawntungna ah Khazih tawh i teeng ding
Kilawm, kongpite kihon ciang
chorus:
A kilawm kongpi kihon ciang
A kilawm kongpi kihon ciang
Tua'h Topa mu ding
Tua tawh i lungnuam ding
A kilawm kongpi kihon ciang

zoTitle: A Nung Ciangin Kimu Kik Ding
engTitle: We Shall Meet By and By
verse1:
I kimuh na'ng gungaal khatah
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Khuamial hun om ngei lohna ah
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Khual zin gimna beikhin aa
Minthanna tawh galzo in
Ni bangin i taang ding hi
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
verse2:
Minthanna gawsem i tun ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Ei hong gupna la i sa ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
A kisia ngeilo vantung
Lungdam gualnop denna mun
Gungaal thawn in la sa ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
verse3:
Zeisu mu in kibang ta ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
Kisia theilo lukhu ngah ding
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin
A thu bang kicing ding aa
Vantung mi naseemte in
Ei' na hong sepsak ding hi
Nung ciangin, nung ciangin

verse1:
An leh leengtui gam ka tung zo
A phatna teng kei aa hizo
Lungdam huai ni taang tawntung hi
Keima khuamial leengmang zo hi
verse2:
Hong Honpa kei tawh hong vakkhawm
Nuam takin kei tawh hong omkhawm
A khut in dam takin hong kaai
Vantung gamgi ciang dong ka nai
verse3:
Gamgi gaal panin paak namtui
Huih nung hiauhiau tawh hong kizui
A vul ngeilo paakte palhin
Hinna lui luang a tawntung in
chorus:
Aw gam nuampi, a pha gampi
Mualsang tung pan ka galet aa
Kei aa ding bawl kholhsa innpi
Tuipi gaal ah ka galmuh ta
Ka ten nading, vantung khuapi
A taangpha hi tuipi gaal ah

verse1:
Zeisu maiah mi tampi kikhawm uh aa
A min phatna la sa in, gawsem tum uh hi
verse2:
Mawhna nei ngeite tua mihon mai tangah
Puanpaak silh in, sa uh hi, A min phatna la
verse3:
A simmawhte siampi, kumpi suaksak hi
A sipha tawh lei in, lathak pha , sasak hi
verse4:
Hong tatkhiatna om kha zenzen lo hi leh
Mawhnei mite bangzah in i cimawh ding hiam
chorus:
Ei hong it aa, i mawhna hong phelsak Topa
Ama minthang tawntung ta hen!
Amen, Amen

zoTitle: Topa In Ei Hong Kha Ding Hi
verse1:
Vantung Kumpipa tate
Na pai lai la sa un aw
Hong gum Topa' vaangpi tawh
Phat in ah la sa un aw
verse2:
En un aw, khuavaak mite
Zion khuapi mudek hi
Tua a Topa tawh nuamsa
Topa pi mukim un aw
verse3:
Launa tam kikhen nuam un
Leitung lam tawp ah ding un
A ta Zeisu Topa hi
Hang in ah a painuam hi
verse4:
Leitung a omte nusia
Ngai in a Khazih nuam hi
A nung ka zuih na’ng in ah
Topa in lam honghilh aw
chorus:
Vantung inn ah pai ding om
(Tanglai mi paina lampi) x2
Tu lai mi nuamsa un aw
A sawtlo eite’n mu ding

engTitle: Sweeter as the Years Go By
verse1:
Mawhna sung ka om lai in
Zeisu itna'n hong zong
A lamdang hehpihna in
Hong khakik tuubuk dong
A thuuk, a sang hehpihna
Tuipi sang zong thuukzaw
Vantung sangin zong sangzaw
Ka deih bel hilo maw
verse2:
Tanglai Judea gam sungah
Zeisu vak kawikawi aa
Hotkhiatna thu theinuam in
Mihon hong pai uh aa
Lung tamkhamte damsak in
Mittawte vaaksak hi
A migitna lungsim in
Kei nangawn hong it hi
verse3:
A lamdang hong itna hang
Supna, baina hong thuak
Singlamteh tungah gimna
Phunlo, pau lo-in thuak
Tatkhiatsa mi siangte tawh
I aw sangkhai ve ni
Leitung, vantung thawnsak in
Ei hong Tanpa phat ni
chorus:
A kumkum in nuam semsem
A kumkum in nuam semsem
Zeisu itna lianzaw
Cingzaw, thuukzaw, khumzaw
A kumkum in nuam semsem

zoTitle: Kum Tawn Kha Tawn Nong Kep Manin Topa
engTitle: God of Our Life, Through All the Circling Years
verse1:
Kum tawn kha tawn, Nong kep manin Topa kong muang uh hi
A beisa hun launa, dahna khempeuh, Nang Nong huh hi
Zingsang khuavaak, nitaak hong suaksial in
Topa hehpihna bek kongngak uh hi
verse2:
A beisa hun teng zong Na khut sung om, hong ompih in
Upna tawh thuciamna gam sung tun na'ng, lam honghilh in
Khuamialna ah khuavaak hong taangsak in
Upna lungsim khuavaak hong neisak in
verse3:
Mailam hun ding zong a theikhol Topa, kong zui uh hi
Muanhuai mah le ung zong hong ompih in, hong beelbeel nung
Nuntaak lai teng Nang nuntaakna Khomun
Ko hun bei ciang inn nuamah hong kha in

zoTitle: Kum Lui Bei Na'ng, A Thak Daak Sat
engTitle: Ring Out the Old Ring In The New (Tune: Waltham)
verse1:
Kum lui bei na'ng a thak daaksat
Mun khempeuh ah tua daaksat un
Kum lui bei ding teng beivet hen
A hoihlo teng pai khiatpih hen
verse2:
Damdam in daaksat diaidiai un
Kum lui beilam ki theisak un
Gamtatna hoihzaw neihtheih na'ng
Nuntaak siangtho zaw neihtheih na'ng
verse3:
Kumlui kumsia, a kihhuai kum
Duhhop, huaiham, kihhuai kum hi
Gal kisim simna teng bei hen
Mailam kilemna hong tung hen
verse4:
Gaalhang mipha, mi suaktate
Lungsim hoihte, mi hehpihte
Gamsung khuamial khempeuh bei hen
Khazih deih bang hong piang ta hen

verse1:
Topa' kum dangkhat hong tung, kumpha hong hisak in
Nang tawh a nuamkhawm thei ding, Nang tawh hunzang khawm ding
Khantoh zawk na'ng kum dangkhat, Na minphat na'ng kum dang
Nangma Nong ompih tawntung, telzawk theihna kum dang
verse2:
Topa' kum hoih khat hong tung, lungnop hehpihna kum
A lungdam huai kum dangkhat, Na maipha muhtheih kum
Kipiak theih na'ng kum dangkhat, Nang belh theih na'ng kum dang
Nangmah kong muan theih na'ng uh, lungnop hiit hiatna kum
verse3:
Topa' nasep theih na'ng kum, Nang Nong itna hangin
Nangma nasep siamzawk na'ng, hoih zaw kicin theih na'ng
Topa' kum dangkhat hong tung, kumpha hong hisak in
Vantung leitung koimah peuh, Nangmah tawh kum paikhawm

zoTitle: Ni Tampi Kheng Zo Ta Hi
engTitle: While the Days are Going By
verse1:
A lung mangte hong hehpih in
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Gimna lungkhamna thuakna in
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Khual zinna leh kikal aa
Nuamna lung damnate tawh
Thu a pha ka bawl uh maw
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
verse2:
Mawkna in a hun beisak ke’n
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Namai zingsang khuavaak bang hen
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Leitung ah dahna sungah
Lungkhamna kahna om aa
Na unau te phong inla
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
verse3:
Itna tawh a kikhih khempeuh
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Eite in i nusia ta hi
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
Khaici pha kituh khempeuh
A vakpha a liim nuaiah
Hong po aa, i lungdamna
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi
chorus:
Ni tampi, khengzo hi
Ni tampi, khengzo hi
Thupha gamtat theih nading
Ni tampi khengzo ta hi

engTitle: Come, Ye Thankful People, Come (Tune: St. George’s, Windsor)
verse1:
Thupha theite hong pai un
Buhphual pai in la sa un
Saal sungah kisia theilo
Buhtangte kikhawm khinzo
Kicingin deihna khempeuh
Pasian in hong pia leuleu
Topa biakinn sung, tum un
Buhphual paina la sa un
verse2:
Topa Pasian, locingpi
Leitung pumpi khempeuh hi
Lopate buh lo lai ah
Kihelin minzo ta hi
Lei leh van bei mateng in
Buh pha a pian nading in
Kote aa ding a uk Pa
Topa aw hong hehpih in
verse3:
Kote hong lato ding aa
Hong pai ning, Na cih thupha
Ko in ka theiciat uh hi
Gamlak lopa tanghum teng
Mei tawh Na haaltum khit ciang
Sal sungah buh koih dingin
Vantung ah Na mihingte
A sawl ding Topa Pasian
verse4:
Hong pai in thusiam Topa
Vantung ah mang khempeuh tawh
Vantung pan Na mihingte
Hong sawl in ka Topa aw
A siangtho mihing phate
Buhphual paina la sakna
A sang vantung innpi ah
A vekpi kikhawm sak in

engTitle: We Plow the Fields, and Scatter (Tune: Dresdeh)
verse1:
Mihingte in lo lai in, khaici pha i tuh hi
Ahih hangin Pasian in, tui buakin khangsak hi
Phalbi lai vuuk hong pia in
Ni taang, khualum, huihkhi, guahneel tawh
Kithuah sak in, anvui taksuak sak hi
verse2:
Amah bek a Bawlpa hi, gamla, nai, na namkim
Vansang dawn aa taang aksi, i kiim paakpalh namkim
Huihpi, tuipi’n zong mang hi
Vate zong an piakim, ei Ama ta A ma mi
Hong vaksem ve, ni sim
verse3:
Hi mah aa Pa aw, nuam ung, a hoih teng Nong piaksa
Lopawi hun leh anlaak hun, nuntaakna leh damna
Nong it Nong hehpih hangin, kote' lungdamna lim
Kong puak uh tawh hong saang in
Na deih pen ko lungsim
chorus:
Eite kiim leh paam aa, na a hoihte vekpi
Van aa Topa’n hong piak hi aa
Nuamhuai kim hi

verse1:
Honpa itna thu ka za hi
Itna lamdang hi mah hi ding hi
Hih hang, itna hehpihna tawh,
Van pan kei aa ding hong kumsuk maw?
Van pan kei aa ding hong kumsuk maw?
verse2:
A thuakna si luanna ka za
Singlamteh tung thuaklah a sihna
Hih hang cih theih hiam? Hih bangin
Kei aa ding hong thuaksak hi, ci in
Kei aa ding hong thuaksak hi, ci in
verse3:
Zeisu tate in a ngah ding
Vantungah inn nuam om cih za ing
Hih hang kei aa ding bawlsa diam
Kei aa ding tua lai mun a om hiam?
Kei aa ding tua lai mun a om hiam?
verse4:
"Nang lo, ke’n kua zuan ding?" ci aa
Kong dotna thu hong dawng in, Topa
Na Kha Siangtho tawh hih hong ci’n
"Honpa leh vantung om, nang aa ding"
"Honpa leh vantung om, nang aa ding"
chorus:
Hi hi, hi, kei aa ding in
Hi hi, kei aa ding, Topa’n hong it man
Hong tuaksuk hi, van pan
Sing tung si, nang leh kei hong gum ding!

zoTitle: Hehpihna Tawh Note Hong Hon Zo
verse1:
Pasian hong hehpih na’n
A geel hotkhiat kicing
Lang do mite honkhia dingin
A thupha sung hong teel
verse2:
Hih Pasian thupha lian
Tapa ah kilangh sak
Zumhuai singlamteh ah thuak in
Pasian thu kithang sak
verse3:
A um takpi mite
Pasian in hong theisak
Khazih hangin hotkhiatna cing
"Tate" cihna ngahsak
chorus:
Upna tawh gupna i ngah, up man, up man
(Nang dikna hilo upna tawh) x2
(Sep hilo) x6
Hi leh mi kisial ding
Pasian hong piak khong hi
Sep hilo, hi leh mi kisial ding
(Pasian hong piak khong hi.) x4
Hong piak khong hi

zoTitle: Gumpa I Cih Hi Bang Hi, Hallelujah
verse1:
"Gimna thuakpa" mawh neite
Gum khia dingin
A pumpi pia Pasian Tapa min hi
Haleluiah! Hi bang gumpa!
verse2:
Bawlsiat, maizum a thuak hi
Kei hangin, paihkhiat a thuak
A si tawh kei hong lei hi
Haleluiah! Hi bang gumpa!
verse3:
Mawhna dimin i cimawh
Mawh baanglo Pasian Tuuno
Hong gumkhia zo takpi maw
Haleluiah! Hi bang gumpa!
verse4:
Sianglamteh in khaina thuak
"Ka zo zo hi," ci’n kiko
Van pan phatna aw ging hi
Haleluiah! Hi bang gumpa!
verse5:
Minthang Kumpi hong pai ciang
A tatsate hong la ding
A thak hih la i sa ding
Haleluiah! Hi bang gumpa!

verse1:
Tho un, no hotkhiatna tate
Lutang Khazih beel khempeuh
Tho un, no minam vaangliante
Zion ah gal hong pai ma’n
verse2:
Eima aa mi siang galhangte
Hi thu bekah kip uh hi
I tung aa dial kipeei mu un
Zeisu si hang gual zote
verse3:
Si lo-in, i lau kei ciat hi
Nuntaakna Pasian sung om
Ama hong kilat zingsang ciang
Minthanna tui hong luangkhia
verse4:
I vek A mai i ding baih ding
Minthang i to i mu ding
Lungdam in Amah phat baih ding
Thaman ciat ding saang ciat ding
chorus:
A vaanglian la gingsak ta un
Tuipi naakpi ging bangin
Ei hong tatna Khazih si hang
(Gualzo pente i hi hi) x3
Ei hong tatna Khazih si hang
Gualzo pente i hi hi

verse1:
Kei taang ding, a si nuam mipa khat hiah om hi
Ka kha ginalo, nungta sak ding
Singlamteh tawn lampi khat Amah’n zui nuam hi
Ka mawhna teng hong puaksak dingin
verse2:
Amah dikin hong it aa, kei aa ding nuam hi
Ka lungsim hong sawpsiang sak ding hi
Hih hang mawh sakna omlo ka suakta ka thei
Kei mawhna taang ding sing tung kilh hi
verse3:
Ama tungah kipia ning, kikhen nawnkei ning
A nisim lungdam A nung zui ning
Ka lungsung la sa in ka kamtawh zong phat ning
Ka mawhna teng puakhia khinzo hi
chorus:
Singlamteh tung kilh hi
Singlamteh tung kilh hi
Aw, bangzah in Amah’n gimna thuak!
Khuavul sisan suak in
Zeisu’n singlamteh pua!
Ka mawhna teng singkhuam tung puakhin!

verse1:
Aw itna lian, mihing ngaihsut zawhloh dong
Na tokhom maiah thungen kong khuk din
Mong neilo itna tua munah a om ding
Nong kipawl a tawntung khat suak dingin
verse2:
Aw hinna lian, amau muan lianbel Na hi
Upna kip leh a duai ngii ngei itna
Lawpna tawh thuakzo aa, hang takin thuakna
Si zong, na zong naupang bang um in muang
verse3:
Leitung dahna bei sakin, lungdamna pia’n
Leitung kisiatna bei, kilemna pia’n
A kithei lo zingciang nuntaakna ni ah
Taikhua valsak, tawntung hinna, itna

engTitle: Send Out Thy Light (Tune: Lux Fiat)
verse1:
Na khuavak leh Na thuman hong zuisak in
Na mual siangtho ah hong paipih sak in
Na khuavak leh Na thuman hong zuisak in
Na mual siangtho ah hong paipih sak in
Aw hong zuisak in, Aw hong zuisak in
Na mual siangtho ah hong paipih sak in
Amen!

Aw Pasian Nang thusiam pen
Deihna teng kicinna, nuntaakna thu laigil pen
Amau sung lutsak in, sih ciang omkhawm thei dingin
A thuciam kipsak in
Na vangliatna ngaihsun in
Na thupha musak in
verse2:
Leitung aa na omlai in
Kana khua na pailai, kitenna pawi va sim in
Tui leenggah na suaksak, tu aa mopina pawi zong
Thupha hong pia inla
Amau deihna bang piang hen
Na min ki pahtawi hen
verse3:
Nangmah hong muan theih na'ng un
Pasian aw hong huh in, haksatna thuaknate ah
Nangmah’n hong ompih in, amau nuntaakna bei in
Leitung nusia ta leh
A tawntung hong ompih in
Na innah hong pi in

verse1:
Pasian in kitenna pawi bawl khinzo hi
A siangtho innkuan a suak dingin
A kicing innkuan khat a suah nading in
A siangtho nuntaakna a nei ding
verse2:
Zeisu in Tapidawte a it manin
A nuntaakna a hong piak bangin
Hih zi neipa in zong tua bangin hih hen
A siangtho thuhilhna zuita hen
verse3:
Topa Nang' khut sungah hihte omta hen
Amau sungah khantohna om hen
Kithu tuahna lungsim om tawntung ta hen
Thahatna teng Nang aa ding zang hen
chorus:
Lungdam takin nuampih ciat ve un
I lawmte kitenna pawi sungah
Hih lungdamna thu vantung dong thangsak un
Leitung nuntaakna a bei ciangin

verse1:
Leitung bei dong, i Kawlgam
Ei pupa gam, i luahsa it ciat ni
Kawlgam bup hut na'ng
Hinna paaingam ning
Hih ei gam, hih ei lei, eima neihna
Ei gam, ei lei phattuam na’ng
Ei kilung tuak in, i hanciam ding hi
Eima sep ding, i gam manpha

Pasian minpha ta hen! Hong itna lian hi
Leitung hong it manin, A ta hong pia hi
A ta’n mawhphel na'ng in a luang hong paai aa
Vannuai luut theih nading hin kongpi hong ta
verse2:
Sisan a hong leisak tat khiatna kicing
Pasian hong ciamsa hi a umte aa ding
Gilopen khat in zong a up taktak leh
Mawh maina ngahpah hi a up phetmah teh
verse3:
Thu manpha a lianpi ei hong theisak hi
Ei aa ding na lianpi hong sepkhiat sak hi
Lungdamna a lianpi hong ngahsak a Ta’n
Mai i muh ciang lamdang ding hi ei! Nuam na
chorus:
Phat ve vua! Phat ve vua!
Leitung ah kiza hen!
Phat ve vua! Phat ve vua!
Mi khempeuh lungdam hen!
A Ta Zeisu tawnin A Pa kiang luut un
Sianmang hawm siamna hi
Amin thangsak un

crossrefs: Arr. by Adolphe Adam, Alfred Judson
verse1:
Zan a min siang, aksite bang te kelkel!
Pasian' Tapa hong suah zan mah dingin pha!
Mi aa min piang mawhna lel a vul ningniang
Pasian' Tapa’n lungkia ke’n, hong ci aa
Lungsi khinsa, thakhat thu’n hong khanglo sak
Hotkhiat nading lametna khua vaksak
Ngai dih vevua, mi siangte la in ka za bang!
Na za uh hia! A ngaih dan lamdang lua
Van aa Pasian in ei hong itna la
verse2:
Mipilte’n zong lam hilh aksi taang zui in
Bawng ankuang kiang a va tun uh mah bangin
Eite in zong upna khuavak lam zui in
Lunggulh tunna phualah tu’n khuk dinin
En un, kumpi khempeuh tung Kumpi lian pen
Deihna sapna hong thei i Lawm phapen
Kuun in bia un, Amah sang lian zaw omlo
I lawm, i To, Khazih hong it i To
Kuun un, kuun un, bia un, i Kumpino
verse3:
Ama maanna sungah ki itlo omlo
Ama mite kilem diamdiam uh a hi
Kideidan na sila leh to, cih omlo
U leh nau bang kiho thei a vekpi
Lungdam nuamna la a ngaih zaw kipaih ni
Amin siangtho phatna la ngaih sa ni
Ngai un, la pha, van aa mi siangte’n la sa
Sa un, sa un, Khazih min phatna la
Sa un, sa un, no zong min phatna la
chorus:
Van aa Pasian, ei hong ompih hizo ta
Kilemmna Mang, leitung hong ukta hen
Ama thunuam mi in ciamkim ta hen

zoTitle: Van A Pa Aw Ka Hong Pahtawi Uh Hi
verse1:
Van aa Pa aw, Nang kong pahtawi uh hi
Van aa Pa aw, Nang kong pahtawi uh hi
Hong it ung, hong bia ung
Na maiah hong kuun ung
Van aa Pa aw, Nang kong pahtawi uh hi
verse2:
Pasian Ta aw, Na min hong liansak ung
Pasian Ta aw, Na min hong liansak ung
Mawhna pan Nong sawp aa
Kha Siangtho Nong guanzo
Pasian Ta aw, Na min hong liansak ung
verse3:
Kha Siangtho lamdang hehnem Pa na hi
Kha Siangtho lamdang hehnem Pa na hi
Ka lampi Nong hilh aa
Ka sungah Nong teeng hi
Kha Siangtho lamdang hehnem Pa na hi

engTitle: As the Deer Panteth for Water
verse1:
Sakhi te’n ciktui luang sialsial a lunggulh bang
Nang hong lunggulh ing
Nangmah bek ka lungtup na hi
Nangmah bek hong bianuam ing
chorus:
Ka hatna, dalna lum na hi
Nangma sung bekah kong kipia hi
Nangmah bek ka lungtup na hi
Nangmah bek hong bianuam ing

zoTitle: A Gen Bang Hong Pai Kik ding Ka Um Hi
verse1:
Mualsang tung khat panin Topa van kah to aa
Puanpaak silh mi nih in, nungzuite hehnem hi
"Lungzuang kha peuhmah kei un
Tu aa kilato Zeisu in
Van a kah na muh bang un hong kumkik ding"
verse2:
Topa hong kilat ding, nai mahmah ta kha ding
Tuni zong hi thei hi, tu hun zong hi thei hi
Tua hun teh mi siang khempeuh
Leitung in huup zo nawnlo ding
Van kim lai ah laak tohna ngah ding uh hi
chorus:
Hong gen bang hong paikik ding ka um hi
Vantung mi’n peengkul hong tum in
Misite tho ding cih ka um hi
Mitphiat sung kikal in ah
Vantung hong keek in ah
A gen bang hong paikik ding ka um hi

engTitle: Cleanse Me, Search Me, O God
crossrefs: J. Edwin Orr (1936 -), G.M. 168, B.H 266, Xt. 176, Maori Melody
verse1:
Kei lungsim sung, Nangmah’n hong veel dih in
Ong sittel inla ka sung hongthei in
Ngaihsut hoihlo khat peuh a om leh zong
Ong sawpsak in ka lung sung a sian dong
verse2:
Nong siangsak aa, ka nuam hi Nangma tung
Na Thu hong dim in, siangden hen ka sung
Zumhuai, kih huai, nidang ka lung sungah
Tu’n Nang min phatna mei bangin kuang ta
verse3:
Kei nuntaakna Nangmah’n tang khinta in
Kei lung ginalo itna hong dim in
Ut pen, deih pen, tup pen teng suahkhia in
Kong tokaai hi, kei sung hong luahta in
verse4:
Kha Siangtho aw, lawpna thak hong guan in
Lawpna thanuamna hong khanglo sak in
Kote sapna, ngah ding, Na cih sa hi
Tu’n hong pia in Na thupha, kong thuum hi

zoTitle: A Hong Itna Hi A Lencip
engTitle: Love Held Him to the Cross
verse1:
Keima mawhna teng panin
Hong sawpsiang nading in ah
Ka Topa’n hong bua hi Ama si
Gen zawhloh hong it manin
Vangliatna nusia in ah
Singlamteh A hongthuak tazen hi
verse2:
Mawhna sung si ding kimlai
Hong dawn ding A hong pai aa
Kei sih taang dingin A hong si hi
Phatphat mah ning ka nunlai
Sasa mah ning ka nuamna
Ama hang bekin ka suakta hi
verse3:
Ka sung hong puah siangsak in
Ka sungah hong ompih aa
Nisim in lungsim hong kumpih hi
Khual gam pan a ciah bangin
Inn tun kaal ka ngaklah ta
Ka tun ciang A mai ka mu ding hi
chorus:
Singlamteh tung a khencip
Siiktukkilh nasak khak leh
Kei A hong itna hi a lencip
Kei sih taang A sih manin
Kei a suakta thei ka hi
Zeisu lo ngal in thuakzo ken teh

crossrefs: John Newton (1725 - 1807), S.H. 195, Xt. 279, Arr. by Edwin O. Excell (1851 - 1821)
verse1:
Lamdang lua hi, hong hehpihna!
Kei bang peuh hong hon aa
A gammang sa lam maan honglak
Mittaw khua hong musak
verse2:
Hehpihna in hong lah ka mu
Kei aa ding lauhuai thu
Tua lauhuai pan suahtaak lampi
Hehpihna thu mah hi
verse3:
Lauhuai thaang kamsa lak panin
Hehpihna thu mah in
Hong kaikai in hong tun, hih dong
Hong kha lai ding inn dong
verse4:
Van ah eite ni bang taang aa
Phatna sasa ding aa
Nuam mahmah ding kumtuul, kumthen
Veng ngeilo nuam denden

zoTitle: Zeisu Khe Ah Ka Va Tu A
engTitle: Sitting at the feet of Jesus
verse1:
Zeisu' khe ah ka va tu aa
Hong hona kamnuam lamdang!
Lungdamna tua bang omthei ta!
A nisim va khawl nuam tang
Zeisu' khe ah ka va khawl aa
Sawt lai thu ka phawksaan hi
Hong it mahmah na hi khong ta!
Ka lung hong zopeet ta hi
verse2:
Zeisu' khe ah ka va khawlna
Mun nuam zaw omlo ding hi
Lung sung vangik teng ka suahna
Tawldam nuam ka ngahna hi
Zeisu' khe ah kei va tu in
Duh leh dah ka vako hi
Itna, hehnepna a cingin
Hong pia khial ngei nailo hi
verse3:
Hong hon Topa aw, Na thupha
Tu in kei hong ngahsak in
Itna tawh hong ensuk inla
Na mai nuam hong musak in
Nangma lungsim bang hong guan in
Nang' sian bang hong siangsak in
Nong ompih cih ka lah na'ng in
Nangma hoihna hong guan in

crossrefs: William O. Cushing (1823 - 1902), S.S 908, Xt. 364, William F. Sherwin (1826 - 1858)
verse1:
Etlawm mualkuam Eden gamnuam
Sunkam bang daihna nuam
Gim aa vulte' lungzuan damna
Nuam khua huihkhi zaamna
verse2:
Nangma sun ni khambang taang hi
A dah a kap tungah
Lungnop huai la hong kiza hi
Gamla pekpan in ah
verse3:
Hong Honpa' innpi nuam sungah
Mi siang honpi te’n la
Tua van sang gamnuam tung tengah
Lathak kihual ka za
chorus:
Etlawm mualkuam Eden gamnuam!
Mi siangthote omna! Omna!
Tuihual lauhuai in honglok laitak
Ngai sing ei na daihna nuam

zoTitle: Beel Hong Tawm Ken' Kha Ke'n
engTitle: Bring Your Vessels, Not a few
crossrefs: Mrs. C. H. Morris, T. H. 110, Xt. 488
verse1:
Tuni’n Topa thupha cing takin
Ngah ning ci’n lamen in
Nang na lunggulh giugiau hiam?
Hong khapsa hi, ci in ah
Hong genna tawh kituak takin
Ngen lel in i Pa' kamciam
verse2:
Leibeel hawm teng hong keng un
Zeisu' si aa sawpsiang sa in
Thupha deih peuh hong pai un
Pum leh lung siangsa sungah
Kha Siangtho hong sun mateng in
Pa' maiah kuunin ngak un
verse3:
Bing sung sathau kilawi ngeilo
Hong hehpihna mah bangin
Hong itna zong dang ngeilo
Topa' hong ciamsa mah bangin
Vang i neihtheih nading in
Hong dim ding hi Kha Siangtho
chorus:
Topa in na sung a dimdong hong sun ding hi
Beel hong tawmken khake’n ci
"Tampi tak hong keng in" ci
Topa in tuni’n a dimdong hong sun ding hi
Kha Siangtho leh vangliatna

crossrefs: Elisha A. Hoffman (1839 - 1929), S.H. 295, Xt. 237, Elisha A. Hoffman
verse1:
Zeisu vako ning, ka lung kham lua hi
Kei guak in ka van puakhak lua hi
Amah’n A mite donkhial ngeilo hi
Kei zong hong huh nuam ding ka thei hi
verse2:
Ka lunggimna teng, Zeisu vapuak ning
Amah lo omkei, Lawm a migi
Amah ka lungsim teng va kokhin ning!
Ka lunggimna teng beipah ding hi
verse3:
Ze-etna haksa, vangik hih zah tawh
Kisam hi veeng aw, hong panpih ding
Zeisu lo omkei, a dang ka muanzawk
Amah’n ka van teng hong dawnzo ding
chorus:
Zeisu vako ning! Zeisu vako ning!
Kei guak in ka van puakhak lua hi
Zeisu vako ning, Zeisu vako ning
Kei hong huhzo ding, Amah bek hi

zoTitle: Lam Hong Hilh In, Tung Pasian Aw
engTitle: Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah
crossrefs: John Hughes, Rev. Haugo, William Williams
verse1:
Lam hong hilh in tung Pasian aw
Nang' gam zuan kong zinlai un
Ka hatloh hang Nang nahat hi
Na khut taklam hong len in
Van khomun aw, van khomun aw
Ka kham dongin hongvaak in
Ka kham dongin hongvaak in
verse2:
Limlang tui naakah hong khah inla
Damna tuisiang hong luan in
Meiilum kaai leh kammei khuampi
Lam tawntung hong piisak in
Honzo Pa aw, Honzo Pa aw
Hong dal in tha hong pia in
Hong dal in tha hong pia in
verse3:
Jordan gunpi gei ka phak ciang
Ka launa hong daisak in
Hong ngahpih in sihna tui khang
Gaal aa Canaan dong takin
Na min phatna, Na min phatna
Tawlnga lo ka sa ding hi
Tawlnga lo ka sa ding hi
verse4:
Topa, Na vangliatna kong muang
Na khutmate lamdang lua
Saltaang Na mite Na honkhia
Na gel bang Na tangtung sak
Sihna hankhuuk, galpa satan
Nang na zogawp khinzo hi
Nang na zogawp khinzo hi

verse1:
Ka za hi a lui tangthu
Van pan Honpa hong paina thu
Kalvary ah sihna hong thuak hi
Misia kei hong hon hi
A si hong luankhiat man aa
Gim in A tauna thu ka za
Ka mawhnate ka kisiik aa
Tu’n zawhna ka ngah hi
verse2:
A damsak theih thu kaza
Ama vangliatna langhsak aa
Khebaite hoihtak lam paisak hi
Mittaw khua musak hi
Tua ciang ka it Zeisu kiang
"Kei hong damsak in"ka cih ciang
Amah ka kiangah hong pai aa
Zawhna a hong pia hi
verse3:
Van aa inn nuam thu kaza
Topa’n kei aa ding bawlzo ta
Kongzing khempeuh ah khambek kiphah
Limlangh tuipi gaal ah
Vantung mite' lasakna
A hong tatkhiatna thu kaza
Khatvei ciang ken zong tua lai ah
Zawhna la kasa ding
chorus:
Zawhna om hi, a tawntung
Ka Honpa Zeisu sung
A si tawh kei mimawh
Hong zongin hong leizo
Ka theih ma’n hong it zo aa
Kei zong ka it kikthei ta
Gualzawhna ka ngah nading
A si sung hong phumzo

verse1:
Nitak aa ni a tum lamdang sa ing
Nisuah zong lamdang sa seem ing
Ka lungsim hong khoih kha a lamdang pen in
Pasian in hong itna hi, nuam sing!
verse2:
Tuuk hun, anlaak hunte lamdang si ee
Vantung aksi, nite zong ee
Ka lungsim hong khoih kha a lamdang pen in
Hih ka phawkthak hong itna hi ee
chorus:
O hih mah lamdang pen sa'ng!
Hih mah lamdang pen sang!
Pasian in kei hong it zenzen!
O hih mah lamdang pen sa'ng!
Hih mah lamdang pen sang!
Pasian in kei hong it zenzen!

crossrefs: W.E.M, M. P. 259, W. Elmo Mercer
verse1:
Kalsuan simin Honpa ka maiah pai hi
A itna khut tawh hong makaih aa
Husan simin Topa, Nangmah kong bia hi
Nangmah tawh tonkhawm leeng nuam ka sa
verse2:
Ka upna tha khat veivei a hong kiam ciang
Ka etna khempeuh lungkiatna hi
Kihei kikin, kei hong Honpa ka et ciang
Hong ompih manin ka thahat hi
verse3:
Bangbang hong piang ta leh Pasian ka muang hi
Nuntaakna Ama sungah om hi
Amah, lampi a hong honsak thei Pa hi
Khapsa gam nuamah hong tun ding hi
chorus:
Kalsuan simin A hong pii ding ka thei aa
A sangzaw ah hong paipih tawntung hi
Khatvei ni ciang lam tawpna ka tung ding a
Kalsuan simin inn ka nai semsem hi

zoTitle: Pasian Ei Lam Hong Om Leh
verse1:
Topa sung nuam un! Hong hehpihna phat un
Hong hencip khempeuh phelkhia hi
Si tawh hong tanzo, launawn peuhmah kei un
Zeisu ah deihna teng cing hi
verse2:
Topa sung hat un! A thahatna suang un
Nisim thumanin citak ni
Siatna’n hong nawk ciang thuman aa ding hang un
Amah i tha leh bukna hi
verse3:
Ama thu muang un! A kamciam peel ngeilo
