Khazih sung "Amen" hi khinta
Lei a bei zongin A thu beithei ngeilo
Lai Siangtho in genkhin zo ta
verse4:
Topa sung kip un! A ang muanhuai sungah
Tawntung nunna kipatna hi
A thaneem pen zong A khut sung pan in ah
Kuamah in sut zolo ding hi!
chorus:
Ei lam ah Pasian, ei lam ah Pasian
Ei lam hong om leh, kua i langpang zo ding?
Kua?, kua?, kua?
Kua i langpang zo, kua pangzo ding?

crossrefs: E.E. Hewitt, GM. 22, Jno. R. Sweney
verse1:
Zeisu' thu thei semsem nuam ing
Hong itna thu gengen nuam ing
Kei tang aa si Pa' hong itna
A cing zawin ka theinuam hi
verse2:
Zeisu' thu ken sinsin nuam ing
A deihna khentel thei nuam ing
Pasian' Kha Siangtho ka Siapa’n
Khazih thute kei hong hilh hi
verse3:
Zeisu' kammal zaza nuam ing
Topa tawh ho limlim nuam ing
A aw ngai ning vai khempuh ah
A gen teng ka pomkim nuam hi
verse4:
Van tokhom ah a tutna thu
Van hauhna teng a neihna thu
A gam zai na'ng leh hong pai na'ng
Za nuam ing Kumpi a suah na'ng
chorus:
A thu zaza nuam ing
A thu zaza nuam ing
Kei taang aa si Pa' hong itna
A cing zawin ka theinuam hi

crossrefs: F. J. Crosby, Ira D. Sankey
verse1:
Mihing' Tapa hong paikik na'ng
Tua khuavak pha zingsang leh
A min thanna taangpha eite’n i mu ding
Micin namcin lak pan aa, Ama' mite hong ciahpih teh
Hotkhiat sa te' kikhopna lianpi hi ding!
verse2:
Ama sung a ihmu sa mi
Zeisu’n A thawhsak hun ciang
A gamdai hankhuuk leh tuipi sung panin
Siangtho pumpi nei in van ah kila to ding Ama' kiang
Hotkhiat sa te' kikhopna lianpi hi ding!
verse3:
Omna tampi a omna mun
Tua khuapi lian i et ciang
A khawnkhong a luang nuntaakna gun mu ding
Sihna in hong khensa lawmte nuamna tawh i muh hun ciang
Hotkhiat sa te' kikhopna lianpi hi ding!
verse4:
Kumpipa hong pai taktak ding
A hun hong nai khinzo ta
Hong naizo hong ciamsa ni thupi muh ding
"Mitphiat kaalsung hun tomno ah" eite i kikheel khin ding
Amah tawh a tawntung in i omkhawm ding!
chorus:
Kikhopna lian! Kikhopna lian!
Hotkhiat sa mite tawh kikhopna lian itna gam sungah
Kikhopna lian! Kikhopna lian!
Hotsa mite kikhopna lian vantung ah!

zoTitle: Gunpi Ah I Kikhawm Ding Hiam?
engTitle: Shall We Gather at the River?
verse1:
Gunpi ah kituah ding hiam?
Van mite totsa mun ah
A tawntung in a tee dialdial
Pasian' tokhom pan hong luang
verse2:
Tua gunpi pang dungdung teng in
Ngun bangin kisil siang aa
Lam pai in i biaden ding aa
Tua nopna hun i ngah ciangin
verse3:
Tua gunpi a taanna sung pan
Honpa' maitang kilang sawn
Sihna’n a zawh loh mi siangte’n
Hotna la sa in kithawn
verse4:
Tua gunpi ei zong tungpah ding
Hong beipah ding i khual zinna
I lungsim lawpin kipaak ding
Nopna la ngaihpi i sa ding
chorus:
Hi hi, gunpi ah kikhawm ding
Kilawm mahmah a hoih mahmah gunah
Pasian' tokhom pan hong luang gunah
Mi siangte tawh kikhawm ding

crossrefs: F. J. Crosby, S.S. 967, Jno R. Sweney
verse1:
Leitung ka nasep bei aa tuihualpi ka kantan ciang
Vaanglian taangpha zingsang ka muh hun ciangin
Ka Honpa ka thei ding hi gungaal khatlam ka tun ciang
A nuihmai kei Hong dawnna masa hi ding
verse2:
A maitang ka et ciang aa ka lungsim hong dim lawpna
A mit hah kilawm ka et hun ciangin ah
Van aa keima aa ding omna hong bawl kholhsak itna
Thupha hehpih Hong piakman phat ning Amah
verse3:
Aw! Van aa ka it te’n hong pai in ci’n hong khut vaan uh
A maute tawh gun aa kikhen lai phawk ing
A etlawm Eden mualah dawnna la hongsak ding uh
Aih hang ka Honpa mu masa bel nuam ing
verse4:
Nii bang a taang puan silhin khuapi kongpi kantan in
Kah nawn lohna munah kei hong tonpih ding
Nuamin kipaak ning khang tawntung hong tuum ding la ngaih in
Hih hang, ka Honpa mu masa bel nuam ing
chorus:
Amah thei ning, Amah thei ning
Hot ngah aa, A kiang ka din ciangin
Amah thei ning, Amah thei ning
A khut a kikhetna pawn pan in

zoTitle: Et Lawm Mual Kuam Unok Paak
crossrefs: I. G. Martin, Arr. by I. G. Martin
verse1:
Zeisu in ka lawmhoih pen hi
Bang ka kisam nawn diam?
Mi tul tampi sangin Amah manpha zaw
Mual kuam, Unok, paak bangin
A hoihna ka mu ta
Ka mawh hong sawp in hong siangtho sakzo hi
Ka dah ciang hong hehnem hi, ka lau ciang ka bukna
"Na vangik teng kei hong suan in" hong ci
verse2:
Ka lungkhamna teng la khin
Ka dahna teng zong pua
Ze-etna hong pai ciang aa ka belh mun hi
Na khempeuh nusia khinta ing
Ngaihsut hoih lo teng zong
Ama vangliatna in kei hong kem ta hi
Ka lawm te’n hong nusia in, Satan in hong khem hang
Zeisu hangin ka tupna taangtun ding
verse3:
Kei hong nusia nusia lo ding
Zong hong taisan lo ding
Upna tawh nungta in Ama na sem ding
Ka maiah lauhuai om hang
Bangmah kihta nawn keng
Nisim ka khamkhop an Aman hong pia hi
Tua ciang kei hong ciah pih in, Ama maitang mu ding
Lungdamna ciktui tawntung luanna ah
chorus:
Etlawm mualkuam unok paak leh
A tang zingsol aksi
Mi tul then tampi sangin, Amah hoih zaw

zoTitle: Bang Zah In A Nuam Ding Hiam!
verse1:
Zingsang phalvaak tung pan laitak
Khanglo in ngaihsun zel ing
Pengkul sapna aw a ging hiam? ci’n ngai ing
Meii san ciangin khua pha ding
Cih ih gen kholh theih mah bangin
Peengkul sapna aw, ka za tam
Ci in geel ing ka sun mangin
verse2:
Leitung ah ka gentheih nate
Ngaihsut taak sa peuhmah keng
Hong kam vaikhak nunung pen ke’n ngaihsun leng
Hong paikik in hong la ning
Cih hong kam vaikhak khinzo aa
Ka Topa maitang muh ding mah
Ka geel ciang ka ngaklah zo ta
chorus:
Topa hong paikik ciang
Bangzah tak a nuam ding hiam
A tate hong kaihkhop ciang
Bangzah tak a nuam ding hiam
A mai tang munuam zen sing
A khut pawn lawngnuam zen sing
Topa hong paikik ciang
Bangzah tak a nuam ding hiam!

verse1:
Vantung sangpi pai ding ih hamciam hangin ah
Aksite khengin gamla pek pai hang
Topa' aa ding leitung in inndei neuno khat
Vantung teng in a huangno themkhat bek hi
verse2:
Phalbi khuadam in paakte a pulhsak hangin
Tuuk hun ciangin tua paakte hong palh bang
Na lungziin' leh pianthakna in hong bawlpha ding
Pasian' khut in nang hong laamto ding hi
chorus:
Topa lian hi, A gam in bangzah in zai hiam?
Kam tawh gen ding ka kipat simloh ngal
Amah lian hi, vangam leimong uk dingin ah
Ka lungtang sung Amah tu’n hong teng hi

crossrefs: I. G. Martin, Arr. by I.G. Martin
verse1:
Ni suahna lam kongpi sungah
Zing tung in nang kongdawn ding
Khualzinpa aw, kiging khol in
Nong zekai loh nang in ah
verse2:
Nang' kei sang na masak zawk leh
Tua kongpi ah nangak in
Kei zong zingtung in kong pai ding
Sawtvei hong ngakkei ni teh
verse3:
Na meivaak taangsak tawntung in
Mopipa’n nang hongngak hi
Amah zong hong pai ding tua ah
Ni suahna lam kongpi ah
verse4:
Tua kikhopna bangzah nuam ding!
Hong ngak mi siangthote tawh
Thupha a dim nuamna kikhop
Ni suahna lam kongpi ah
chorus:
Nang kong dawn ding
Nang kong dawn ding
Ni suahna lam kongpi sung tua lai ah
Nang kong dawn ding
Nang kong dawn ding
Nang kong dawn ding
Zingsang tungin tua lai ah

crossrefs: As sung by Rex Nelson Singer
verse1:
Mite’n kei hong muhna ah
A genthei mikhat hi'ng
Mi zawng daaipam hong ci
Khial sazen mah sing
Nopna ka neih gige lam
Lakkhia nuamzen mah sing
Nuam lua ing, Nong piak thupha hangin
verse2:
Neih leh lam ka hau kei hi
Puanthak zong silhzo keng
Topa Nang kong neizo!
Sum leh paai hawm mah leeng
Mite’n hong pimuh loh hang
Awlmawh taak sanawn keng
Nuam lua ing, Nong piak thupha hangin
chorus:
Ka teen nading inn nong pia aa
Nuamtakin Nong khim aa
An zong Nong vak den aa, khedap Nong guan hi
It tawplo Nong it aa, innkuan Nong nuamsak hi
Nuam lua ing, Nong piak thupha hangin

verse1:
Lono nim dildial ni liim a omna ah
A ta itte Pasian hong kha
Tui dam luanna ah a gimte khe hong silsak
A ta itte Aman' hong kha
verse2:
Khatvei leh mual sangdawn ni taang silsial sung
A ta itte Pasian hong kha
Khat veivei mualkuam zang leh zan khuamial lak
A ta itte Aman' hong kha
verse3:
Satan in hong do aa dahna hong tun ciang
A ta itte Pasian hong kha
Hong hehpihna tawh i galte hong zawh pih
A ta itte Aman' hong kha
chorus:
Pawlkhatte tuithuk tuihual sungah
Pawlkhatte mei sung, sisan luang in thuak
Zan thapai khuamial sung leh sun hun in
Amah phatna la hong sasak zo den

verse1:
Mualtung leh zanglei pan thu khat hong kiko sawn
Khazih tungah thumaanna, thumaan cihtakna
Tua la ngaih hong kithawn
Mual te’n zong hong thawnsawn
Thumaanna hi, thumaanna
Khazih tung thumanna
verse2:
Za un, tua la kithawn, leitung teng thawn kawikawi
Khazih tungah thumaanna, thumaan cihtakna
Sem ngam dingin tho un
Thumaan gingsak un, tu'n
Thumaanna hi, thumaanna
Khazih tung thumanna
verse3:
Thumaan pawl hong pawm un, khialhna beisak khawm un
Khazih tungah thumaanna, thumaan cihtakna
Satan' dial khai na mun
Peengkul tumin do un
Thumaanna hi, thumaanna
Khazih tung thumanna
verse4:
Thahat lai khangnote, Zeisu tung kipia ni
Khazih tungah thumaanna, thumaan cihtakna
Leitung gam khempeuh ah
Taangko ni lungdam thu
Thumaanna hi, thumaanna
Khazih tung thumanna
chorus:
Galzo ding kuan un! Galzo ding kuan un!
I galkap Mangpa’n ci "Kuan!"
A hong sawlna mang ni
I ngah ding hi tua gam, thumaanna hi
Thumaanna, Khazih tung thumaanna

engTitle: Home Is Where the Heart Is
verse1:
"Inn mah ki lunggulh pen hi,"
Cih paunak ka zazel hi
Mi tampite in inn mah lunggulh sa ing
Kei bel ka Topa Zeisu tawh
Kikholh ding mah lunggulh veng
Amah tawh kiteeng khempeuh peuh leng ka vakthaap nawnkei ding
verse2:
Inn mah khenglah ih hih leh
Zeisu' tenna inn hi veh
Amah tawh ten ding lunggulh bel in nei ing
Sum leh paite ka neikei hi
Gual nopna ka zongkei hi
Ka To Zeisu in van ah innpi nei teh hong ci, nuam sing
verse3:
Inn leh lo deih masa keng
Nopsakna ding zong teel keng
Ahih hang lawmhoih tampi ke’n ka nei hi
Hih leitung ka nusia baih ding
Ka deihna Topa’n cin' ding
Ka tun ngei lohna inn lianpi ah tun' ding ka ngaklah hi
chorus:
"Inn mah ki khenglah pen hi,"
Cih kei aa ding ka khamuanna hi
Ka ciahna ding mun Paradise aive
Hih lei ah mun tampi teengzo ing
Tua khempeuh ken cimtaak zo ing
Zeisu ka kipiak teh ka khenlah van a zuan ding kai ve!

zoTitle: Nuam Lua Ing, Ka Honpa Hang
engTitle: Thanks to God for My Redeemer
crossrefs: August Ludwig Storm, Tr. by Corl E. Backstorm, TRACK O GUD, J. A. Hultman
verse1:
Nuam lua ing, Nong piak Honpa hang
Nuam lua ing, Nong huhna hang
Nuam lua ing, Zeisu ka kiang om
Nuam lua ing, hun beisa hang
Nuam lua ing, khuahun nuamte hang
Nuam lua ing, zan khuamial hang
Nuam lua ing, khitui nong nulsak
Nuam lua ing, lungnopna hang
verse2:
Nuam lua ing, thungetna Nong dawn
Nuam lua ing, Nong dawnloh hang
Nuam lua ing, buk na'ng inn Nong pia
Nuam lua ing, Nong vaakna hang
Nuam lua ing, haksat nuamna hang,
Nuam lua ing, Nang Nong hehnem
Nuam lua ing, Nong hehpihna hang
Nuam lua ing, Nong itna hang
verse3:
Nuam lua ing, paak hoihte hangin
Nuam lua ing, paak lingte hang
Nuam lua ing, innlum, lolum hang
Nuam lua ing, lametna hang
Nuam lua ing, dah leh nuamna hang
Nuam lua ing, khamuanna hang
Nuam lua ing, ka lametna hang
Nuam lua ing, tawntung sung dong

zoTitle: Topa In A Khut Tawh Hong Lawng Hi
engTitle: I Was Touched by the Hand of the Lord
verse1:
Ka kam tawh ka gentheih loh
Lungnopna ke’n nei ing
Topa in a khut tawh honglawng hi
Ka vangik teng tukkhia zo
Satan zong omthei nawnlo
Topa in a khut tawh hong lawng hi
verse2:
Pasian in hong lawn' khit teh
Dam siangtho khin pah ing
Tuuno si in hong sawpsiang zo hi
Tu’n mi thak ka suakta aa
Khua zong ka muthei ta hi
Topa in a khut tawh hong lawng hi
chorus:
Topa in a khut tawh hong lawng hi
Lungkhamna up lohnate mang ta
Ka kha lungdam kipak
Hong suahtaak, hong damsak
Topa in a khut tawh hong lawng hi

verse1:
La sa thei ing khawl in ka phawk ciangin ah
Lunggimna tam ka gualzawh na'ng hizaw
Tua lampi te’n a saan na hong tunpih aa
Hih leitung bel teensuak na'ng hi kei zaw
verse2:
Leitung nate ih thupi’t sakna kiam ding
Hong kikawm pak a hih lam phawkthei leng
Lunggulhna tawh hong liingsak leitung nate
Nuihsan lel ni a mu kholthei hi leng
verse3:
Hih leitung ah nasepna, gimna dim aa
Gentheihna leh gimna ih tuak pahpah
Mite’ kha in muvanlai leengding bang aa
Kikhah peuh leh a tupna "Van" tung pah
chorus:
Tua ni ciangin ke’n pawh la sasa mai ning
Tua ciangin ka lungdam den ta ding
Tua ni ciang in, ka mit ten khuapi en ding
Pasian in kei, tuah hong sam ding

zoTitle: Tuukhun Nong Khap Man Nuam Si'ng
engTitle: Thank God for the Promise of Spring
verse1:
Ka tungah meii a vom hangin
Sun khuavaak ka muh theihloh hang
Meiivom sung pan ni vaang in hong kapsuk in
A nuihmai mudek ding hi hang
verse2:
Ih tenna tul in kolh hangin
Khaicite zong a kausan hang
Tuate khempeuh hong nokik pah ding uh hi
Tuuk hong nai kuan mahmah thei ta’ng
chorus:
Tuuk hun nong khap manin nuamzen sing
Khatvei la sakik thei ning
Nithak khat hong suakkik dekta ding
Tuuk hun Nong khap manin nuam sing

zoTitle: Zeisu Phatna La Simloh Sak Ding Nei Keng
verse1:
Zeisu phatna la simloh sak ding nei keng
Pasian’ Ta hi, hong hon ding hong pai Pa
Mawh mai na’ng leh tatkhiat na’ng Aman thuak zo
Singkhuam tungah a nuntaakna piazo
verse2:
Ling lukhu leh puansan Amah pia uh aa
Singlamteh tung a si manpha baang hi
Hong paikik ding lametna a hanhawm aa
Hih thu mi teng tung ka sa dending hi
verse3:
Zeisu phatna la simloh sak ding nei keng
Gungaal khatah ka tun ciang nangawn in
Vantung mite tawh phatna la sakhawm leng
Kei hong Honpa tawntung ka phat ding hi
chorus:
Zeisu phatna la simloh sak ding nei keng
Kalvari leh Khazih bek sasa ning
La kasak sial hih thu mah tangko den ning
Sasa den ning, a lamdang hong itna

zoTitle: Pasian Kihelna, Neu Cih Om lo
engTitle: Little Is Much, When God Is In It
verse1:
Lo sungah ante min khinzo
Mi’kim sep theih ding om aa
Ngai dih ve, Pasian in hong sam
Tua ante a la ding in
verse2:
Topa in nang hong koihna mun
Neu in kuama’n theihloh hang
Hong koihpa hangin thupi hi
A man hong mangngilh ngeilo
verse3:
Na pumpi hong zawngkhal tadia
Sep zawhloh hun hong tun ciang
Thungetna tawh Topa' aa ding
Gal nasim thei lai veve
verse4:
Leitung haksat nate nusia’n
I nasep i zawhkhit ciang
Citak aa nasempa tungah
Pha hi,"ta" hong ciah ta’n ci
chorus:
Pasian kihelna neu cih omlo
Minthanna hauhna zong ke'n
Zeisu min suang aa nasep leh
Kham lukhu na ngah ding hi

zoTitle: Ka Mitte Khitui Tawh Hong Sil Sak Hi
engTitle: He Washed My Eyes with Tears
verse1:
Ka mitte khitui tawh hong silsak hi
Tel takin khua ka muh theih zawk na'ng hi
Ka lungtang phelkham aa, a sung en hi
Launa, kisak theihna, ngen tang mu hi
Ka mit hong mialsak meii seem khiain bei
Tu’n ka mit kihong aa, khua ka muthei
Kei hoih pen nang aa hi, tu’n ka thei hi
Ka mitte khitui tawh hong silsak hi
verse2:
Ka mitte khitui tawh hong silsak hi
Hihzah tak hong itna lamdang lua hi
Kei khut taang ding a khut kikhen let aa
Kei khe taang ding a khe kikilh cip hi
Kei mawh a sian nading A si bua aa
Kei thuak ding dan khempeuh Aman thuak hi
Tu’n kei pawhnuam mah si'ng, tatsa ka hi
Ka mitte khitui tawh hong silsak hi

engTitle: Will You Make Me This Promise Too?
verse1:
Khatvei ni ciangin ah
Kikhen cih om nawnlo ding
Ih leitung khualzinna hong bei ding
Hi zong, mangpha kikhak ma’n
Ih nuntaakna a bei ma in
Kamciam na nong pia ngamdiam tuni’n
verse2:
Ke’n bel hong kamciam ing
Gun piauah ih kimu ding
A dum dildial gun piauah teeng ding
Lungkiatna cih om nawnlo
Singtehte zong vulngei nawnlo
A paisa lawmte mu ding hizo!
verse3:
Ih nun’na ah sihna
Tung peelmawh ding cih thei hang
Bang lokaal hun sungin bei thei hi
Khatvei ni teeiteei ciangin
Ei’ tungah hong tung veve ding
Tua ni aa ding na khamuang nai diam?
chorus:
Khatkhat in gungaal khatah ih kan ta ding aa
Kihal lo in a kan ih omzeel ta
Tua ma'n kiptak nong kamciam diam
Gun piauah ih kimu ding hiam?
Ken bel tung ning ci’n hong kamciam ing

verse1:
Zankim khuamial laitakin
Lau in ka buzeel aa
Ka tungah huihpi nungin
Ka belh ding lah thei keng
Hih van ginna phual panin
Hong ngai in, kong thumna
"Hong kem in huihpi a ven mateng"
verse2:
Hahkat hang a mawkna pi
Dahna bei theilo pi
Lametna zong ombeek kei ci'n
Satan' hong khem hi
Aih hang Nong ompih thei ing
Zing ciang thoto in ah
"Ka pai ding huihpi omlohna ah"
verse3:
Zan saupi bei khinta aa
Huihpi a ven ciang in
Na maiah ka ding ding hi
Tua a ta'ng gun geiah
Tua gamah huihpi omlo
Hong teng ning Topa aw
"Huihpi a ven khit takciang in maw"
chorus:
Huihpite vengmang khin aa
Vangingte a beisiang dong
Van a meiite bei mang aa, khuaphat dong
Topa aw hong len in
Na khutkuak sung hong koih in
Hong kem in, huihpi a ven mateng

zoTitle: Nuntak Tawntungna Ciktui Ka Dawn Hi
verse1:
Mawhna, zumna dim leitung ah ka dangtaak hi
A phasak thei bangmah ka mukei hi
Nuntaak tawntung na ciktui tampi a luanna
Thupha Khazih kiang nikhat ka pai hi
verse2:
Pasian kiang pan hong luang tui in lim mahmah aa
A tawntung in ka lung hong damsak hi
Minthanna, hehpihna leh thupha ka ngah hi
Nisim in "Hallelujah" la ka sa
verse3:
Nang zong tuni'n Kalani pailo ding na hiam?
Tua takah thuuk aa zai ciktui luang ci
Na kha dangtaakna a phasak thei tua munah
Tua tui dawn ding Honpa'n tun nang hong sam
chorus:
Nuntaak tawntung na ciktui ka dawn hi
Tu'n ka lungdam hi,
Ka kha dangtaak nawnkei
Nuntak tawntung na ciktui ka dawn hi
O a lamdang tui tampi a luang hi

zoTitle: Pasian Khut In Hong Keembit Hi
engTitle: Sheltered in the Arms of God
verse1:
A neel a dik khut in hong lawn ke'n kaphawk
Tua khut in ka lampi ah hong makaih
Zeisu tawh ka tonkhop ciang lau om nawnlo
Pasian khut in kei hong kep hang hi
verse2:
A sawt lo-in van pan sapna ka za ding
"Ka ta hong ciah'n na khual zinna tungta teh"
Ihmu suk in vantung ah ka khanglo ding
Pasian khut in kei hong keembit hi
chorus:
Tuihual lianpi om in, khua hong mial hang
Hong lungkham saklo
Pasian' khut in kei hong kepbit manin ah
Hong tonpih ma'n leitung in hong zolo ding
Pasian khut in kei hong keembit hi

zoTitle: Nute' Hong Itna Bang Zah In Lian!
verse1:
Mim bang ka piancil in, ka nu'n hong it manin
A aang nunkhumtui tawh hong vaakden aa
Ka deihna bangbang in hong gamtat sak manin
Ka nu hong itna bangzah in lian hiam?
verse2:
Ka nu'n manphat nading, a hong pattah manin
Nu aw nong itna lian ka phawkden aa
Topa'n hong hehpih in na nunkum sawtsak hen
Sim leitung kumsawt gua bang hingkhawm leeng
verse3:
Nute' pumpi khempeuh ei aa dingin manpha
A aang ah hong tawi in hong lumsak aa
A nungah hong pua in nuamtak hong ihmu sak
Nu aw nong itna lian ka phawkden hi
chorus:
Hong it ka nu, bang tawh ka tehthei diam?
Nong ho kamkhum, bang tawh ka tehthei diam?
Lei zawhloh suang manpha sang lianzaw hi
Nu aw nong ho kamkhum zanuam den ing

verse1:
Kei hong Honpa sisan sung pan
Hamphatna ke'n ngahthei ding maw?
Amah gimsak keima' aa ding
Keima aa ding in hong si maw?
verse2:
Van aa A pa' tokhom nusian'
Khawnkhong itna bei ngeilo tawh
Vantung liatna khempeuh nusia'n
Cimawh Adam' tate hon maw?
verse3:
Kei guak om hang' lau nawnkei ing
Amah kei aa, kei Ama aa
Ka lutang hi, A sung' teeng ing
Thumaan thutak in hong tuamta
chorus:
Hi thei ding maw ka Pasian aw
Nangmah takpi hong si ding maw?
Lamdang itna ka Pasian aw
Nang mah takpi hong si ding maw?

crossrefs: 1&2: Gin Khat Suan, 3: Thang Gin Lian
verse1: Theihloh meelmak gam zang, sing vaangkhua pan lungzuan zatam. Tuunnu mu bang hong ngai ing, tangbang na damlai nam. Ang lai nunkhum leh na' tongneem no lungah sial leng. Aw, na von lungzuang sial zatam tawh tuibang kiam veng. Tuanglam ka siikkhial a zong, Tuun na min theibang konglo. Heina peuh tumbang guai dong, tuunngaih gim duangah thengmawh. Tuunngaih aw! Tuunngaih aw! Kawi ang pan ke'n hong siallai veng. Taang bang na dam in miimbang pianna, sen Tuunnu aw
verse2: Thei bang sen zu bang mom aa, tongdam nem tawh maabang nong pat. Guallai sawl bang hei maimit nong suat zaalmang nong mat. Sei sang tangkuan giibang kikhenna heina khatlo. Zan ciang zaalmang meelin hong mu ing sen Tuunnu aw. Ei bawl sinthu hilo aa khang vai mangnu sinthu. Honuam lai gi bang kikhen, lailung zuan zatam Tuunnu. Tung sianmang in hong huaihen, heina peuhah taangbang dam ni. Na von lungzuang meel hong mulai aw, sen Tuunnu aw
verse3: Tuun aw, sinlai lungah naubang na san, Sianmaang sinthu. Na tawi vonno te'n tuu bang cingin, paai bang kuah ung. Sian in lumbang hong sung, gual tawh tanbang kim ta ung. Lailung muang in maw, miim bang pianna, sen Tuunnu aw. Ei bawl sinthu hilo aa khang vai mangnu sinthu. Honuam lai gi bang kikhen, lailung zuan zatam Tuunnu. Tung sianmang in hong huaihen, heina peuhah taangbang dam ni. Na von lungzuang meel hong mulai aw, sen Tuunnu aw

zoTitle: Khanan Gam Zuan In Ka Pai Hi
engTitle: I Am Bound for the Promised Land
verse1:
Zawdan gun geiah ding in a gaal lam
Lunggulhna tawh ka en
Noptuak mahmah kei luahding gam
Khanan ka gaalmuh hi
verse2:
Tua gam zapi zaanglei nuamah khua a
Vaak tawntung na mun hi
Pasian' Tapa' maanna hi aa
Zan khualmial om nawnlo
verse3:
Tua gamah natna sihna kikhenna
Te om nawnlo ding aa
Dahna launate beisiang ding
Tua lungdamna gam sungah
verse4:
Cikciang tua gamnuam sung
Kei ka tungding hiam?
Kei tung mengmeng nuam ing
Ka Pa mainuam enen nuam ing
Khawl nuam ing A aang ah
chorus:
Tua gamnuam a sawtlo in a
Luah dingin i paita ding hi
O kua teng in hong zuinuam hiam?
Tua Khanan gam nuamah

verse1:
Leitung kimkot in kei khualzin ngei keng
Gam hoihte leh mun nopci ke'n tam muhngei keng
Ahih hangin kei ka khualzinna munkhat om aa
Calvary mual aa ka Honpa en dingin
verse2:
Zeisu paina Calvary lam ke'n zui ing
Pasian Tapa kikhaina ke'n ka mukhin hi
Ka khukdin aa khitui luangin ka thumna hong za
Oh! Praise the Lord, kei Calvary ah pai ing
chorus:
Calvary paikhin ing
Ke'n Topa ka mukhin ta
Calvary paikhin ing
A kammalte tung panin hong itna siangtho hang
Tua in kei hong liingsak hi
(1: A thei ding tua Honpa kei aa hi)
(2: A phawk ding tua Honpa kei aa hi)
(3: Lungngai ding tua Honpa kei aa hi)

verse1:
Zeisu thungetna huanah
A khutte hensak uh aa
Kong lakah zumhuai pi'n paipih
Mawh neilo a siangtho Honpa
Cilphih gawp uh aa
Mawh hi, singtung that un ci uh hi
verse2:
A manpha a lutung ah
Ling lukhu khusak uh
Zahpih in "Kumpi en un" ci
Haamsiat in satgawp uh aa
Min siangtho zahpih uh
Na khempeuh Amah bek in thuak hi
verse3:
Singtung a khet uh ciangin ah
A nu a gei ding aa
"Numei na ta en in!" a ci
"Tui ka duh hi" ci na pi'
Dawn ding bangmah pialo aa
Mawhnei mite thahna a thuak hi
verse4:
Migilote tung ki ap in
Hehpihna a ngenkei hi
Zumna sing Amah kia'n thuakta
"A zozo hi" ci'n awng aa, lusu in sita hi
A lamdang hotkhiat nasep manta
chorus:
Leitung susia'n Amah khahkhia ding
Vantung mi tulsawm samthei napi'n
Vantung mi tulsawm samthei na pi'n
Nang leh kei aa ding in hong si hi

verse1:
Kumpipa' galkap dingin sapna aw kiza
Gal kuan ding galkapte, sapna naza hiam?
Lawpna tawh zekaai lo, dawng in hong sapna
Nangma ut tawmna tawh na min na pia diam?
verse2:
Vaang tawh a dim galkap ding Zeisu in hong sam
Ama na a seem ding, nisim naisim in
Hong taisan lo ding pi, ih kiang hong omden
Nangma ut tawmna tawh na min na pia diam?
verse3:
Migi mahmah Topa in hong it man hong sam
Minam kimte aa ding, A lung himawh mi
Tu'n zong hong samlai veh, Aw kitel takin
Nangma ut tawmna tawh na min na pia diam?
verse4:
Gal kisimna hun bei in gal ih zawh ciangin
Thuman diktat mite, hong kikhop ciangin
Minthanna kumpi lukhu hong khusak ding
Nangma ut tawmna tawh na min na pia diam?
chorus:
Zeisu aa ding a thuman, a hoih galkap
Midang te'n min piazo, nang e leh?
Zeisu Kumpipa hi, launa ding omlo
Nangma ut tawmna tawh na min na pia diam?

verse1:
Mite'n gen uh ka khualzinna
Gamla pekpek munah
Aksi leh vante khengin ka zin ding
Siklongte kitumna munah
Van mite lasakna munah
Van inn ka luutteh ka mu ding
verse2:
Tawm vei sung ih kikhen hangin
Ih totlam kibang hi
Nang kia na zin hangin "Lungkia kei in"
Lawmte in hong dawn ding uh aa
Zeisu in zong hong muak ding aa
Van inn na luutteh na mu ding
chorus:
Lungkhamna leh dahna tam
Kei kia ka zin laitak
Khat veivei nopna a om teei hang
Gamla pekpek munah
O! Topa khatvei teitei
Teeng na ve'ng, teeng na ve'ng

verse1:
Kum leh hun tampi beita
Ka zaak masak pekpan
Zeisu hong pai ding nai zawsem ta
Kiging khol in sanggam aw
Hong huh theilo ding kai ve
Hong pai ding hun nai mahmah ta aive!
verse2:
Kidona hong tam semsem
Gitlohna khang semsem
Upmawh loh laitak hong pai ding ci
Pasian' kammal taangtung ta
A teelsate hong la ding
Muan om nawn ke'n Zeisu hong pai ding hi!
chorus:
Mun tengah lim hong kilangh ta
Thusia lasia tawh leitung kidim ta
Vantung lam vilin ngak gige in
Na lu phong in, tatna ni hong naita!

verse1:
Tuipi geiah ka ding aa
A gaalkhat lam ka gaal et leh
Tuipi geiah tembaw khat
A khawl ding mu ing ee
A maute a dawn dingin
A lawmte tampi om veh
It teng tawh kikhen lohna
Vantung hong phawksak ee
verse2:
Ka nu in nunna huihpi
Thuakin hong paisan khinzo aa
Tawntung mun hong pii dingin
Honpa nei teh hong ci
Tu'n ka telsiang theita hi
Ke'n zong tua mun ka zuanta
Ka nu'n gaal ah hong ngak hi
Nui kawm'n hong dawnta ding
chorus:
Innlam ka zuan hi
Zion tembaw tung tuangin
Gaalkhat pekah meiilum lakah
A taang ka galmuh ta
Tembaw khawlna ciang dong
Hoihtak, inn ka tun mateng in
Vantung mite aw, kei hongkha aw!

verse1:
Leitung ah inn hoihpi cih neikei ing
Topa hong piaksa buukno khat nei ing
Tua sungah Ama hong piak thupha sang ing
Mi dangte in kei hong theihpih kholh loh uh hang
Topa hong piak thupha tawh kei ka lungkim hi
Tawmvei hih leitung a kantan pak ka hi
Mi hau tampite neih bang ka neihzawh loh hangin
Ka Topa'n hong kamciam khinzo ta hih bang'n
verse2:
Khat veivei leitung ah ka maimial aa
Ka kiim ka paam aa mite ka en kha
Amaute in ih Honpa thei hetlo aa
Bang hangin dau pai in nuamsa thei cih thei khang
Pasian kammal hoihtak ka etkik tak ciangin
Ih suah lai in bangmah ih kenloh mah bang'n
Ih leitung nunna bei in, lei ih nusiat ciangin
Ih neihsa bangmah kengin ciah ding hi khang
chorus:
Na lungkham ke'n, lunghei nei ke'n
Vantung aa ka Pa um in
Kei zong hong um peuh le cin, na om nading bawlin pai ning
Mite lamtawm a hilo
Innpi liante kong lamsak
A hun tun ciang i teeng ding hi

zoTitle: Vantung Pawh Nuam Mah Si Ih Ci Ding
engTitle: This is Just What Heaven Means To Me
verse1:
Hua gamah gimna natna om nawnlo
A tawntung in ah ih lungnuam den ta ding
Tua khuapi ah huihpi cih bang kimu nawnlo
Vantung nuam mah si ee ih ci ding!
verse2:
Khatvei ciang Zeisu' maitang ihmu ding
A maitang mu peuh leng lungzuan om theilo
Kumpite' Kumpipa ci'n i phat den ding hi
Vantung nuam mah si ee ih ci ding
chorus:
Hua gal khatah ih kimuh ciang nuam si'n teh!
Tatsa mi honte tawh ih kikhawl ding
It teng tawh kimu in Khazih Kumpi suah ciang
Vantung nuam mah si ee ih ci ding

zoTitle: Nang Deihna Mun Peuhah Pai Ning
engTitle: I'll Go Where You Want Me to Go
verse1:
Topa hong deihna mun ke'n thei keng
Mual tung sangpi maw tuitung
Gal mai, sa mai bangmah ke'n thei keng
Hong deihna khat om ding hi
A aw khumno tawh hong sam leh maw?
Gammial maw khuapi sung maw?
Hi hen! Topa aw, ka khut hong lenkip in
Pai ning Na deihna mun peuh ah
verse2:
Mawhna sungah kha mangthangte kiang
Lungdamna thu gen dingin
Lampi haksa khuamial sungah zong
Topa hong makaih in maw
Tua lungdamna thu ka gen ding aa
Nong gensak thu khumte
Hi hen! Topa aw, tua thu ka gen ding
Gen ning Na deihna bangbang in
verse3:
Leitung bup ah ante min khinzo
A gina lo munah zong
Leitung tomno i nuntaak sungin
Zeisu aa ding in sem ni
Ka vai na khempeuh Nangma kong ap
Kei nong itluat thei ing!
Lungsim tak tawh Na deih bang seem ning
Nang deihna bangbang mang ding hi'ng
chorus:
Kong it Topa aw, Nong sawlna peuh ah
A mual, a guam zaang sungah
Gen ding aa Nong deih bangbang gen ding
Nong deihna mun peuhah pai ning

verse1:
A gim mite khawl na'ng munkhat om hi
Lungnop tawldamna mun hi
Inn dei tungnung ah Zeisu tawh lungkham vangikte hong puaksak
verse2:
A tawl khualzin mi aa ding tuivot om
Lungsim tam khamte' aa ding damna
Vangik pua a gim mite' aa ding zong tawldamna tak Aman hong pia ding
chorus:
Inn dei tungnung aa Zeisu tawh
A khephung ah ka tu hi
Oh, Oh kikholh khopna nuam zen si!
Topa'n lungnopna hong pia

crossrefs: F.M. Lehman, Arranged by Claudia L. Mays
verse1:
Pa' hong itna lian zen si maw!
Gen zawh hilo, gelh zawh hilo
Aksi sang pente sang' sang zaw
Hell niam pen sung nangawn ban zo
Mawh neite hong ngahkik dingin
A Tapa hong pia hi
Amah tawh hong kilem sak aa
Mawhna hong maisak hi
verse2:
Haksatna hun hong bei ding aa
Leitung gamte hong bei ding hi
Mite'n mualte tung thuum ding aa
Hong vukcip un, ci ding uh hi
Ahih hang Pasian' hong itna
Kisia ngeilo ding hi
Adam' tate hong hehpihna
Van mite'n sa ding hi
verse3:
Tuipi khempeuh laitui hi in
Vantung khempeuh laidal hi leh
Singkung khempeuh laikung hi leh
Mi khempeuh in gelh thei hi leh
Pasian' hong itna gelh sak leeng
Tuipi hong bei ding hi
Vantung dimin ih gelh zongin
Kicing zolo ding hi
chorus:
Pa' hong itna, lian zen mah si
Tehpih ding omlo hi
Kisia kik ngei nawnlo ding ci
Van mite'n sa ding hi

verse1:
I nuntaak khualzinna hong beipak ding
Gamlapi aa om a hoih gunpiau ah
A taang van inn ah i kimuh mateng
Kimu kik nawnlo kha ding hi hang
verse2:
Gi bang khen leeng sinlai hong kuaithei aa
Kikhen thunget in, lailung na sak in
Aih! hang vantung ah dahna om nawnlo
Kimuh kik dong Sian nang tawh om hen
verse3:
Meivom kai in vante a khuh lohna
Tua lai ah i dah ngeinawn kei ding hi
Nung ciangin a nopna tua gungei ah
Kimu kik ding tua gam phabel sung
chorus:
Leitung ah kimuh kik loh hang
Haksat nate i phut kawmin
Khua ah i kimuh na'ng munkhat
Nuntaakna luitui gei hi ding
Paak hoihte a tawntung paak ding
Kikhen na zong om nawnlo ding hi
Leitung ah i kimuh loh hang
Hoih gunpiau ah kimu ding

verse1:
Zeisu kia in, Gethsemane huan ah A hong thuak hi
A dah huai pen dahna hai kei aa ding in hong dawn hi
Kalani mualah Amah kia in singlamteh pua in
Pa' deihna bangin Honpa hong pai hi
verse2:
Zeisu kia in, a gilo singkhuam tungah hong si hi
Kei' sian nading a manpha A si hong luang khiasak hi
Khuamial dai paam, leivot sungah, Amah guak kisial hi
Pa' deihna bangin Honpa hong pai hi
verse3:
Zeisu kia in, a kisiin cip han sungpan hong tho hi
Sihna zo in launa, dahna khempeuh beimang sak hi
A pa' ngimsa bangin na khempeuh kicing sak zo hi
Pa' deihna bangin hong nungta kik hi
verse4:
Zeisu kia in, ka mawhna khempeuh hong paihkhiat sak hi
A lauhuai thukhenna pan mawhnei keimah hong hon hi
Gen zawhloh nuamna leh lungdamna tawh ka kidim hi
Pa' deihna bangin ka nungta nuam hi
chorus:
Hi hi, Honpa kia bek kei aa ding hong si hi!
Hi hi, mawhna pan hong suakta sak khin zo hi!
Lametna bei, mawhna tawh dim, Hih khuamial leitung ah
Pa' deihna bangin Honpa hong pai hi

zoTitle: Nung Ciangin I Thei Na Ding Hi
verse1:
Lunggimna haksa i tuah ciangin ah
Bang hangin ke'n hih zahta thuak aa
Ka kiim ka paam aa, mi dangte in lah
Tuak ngei selo hiam, lamdang ka sa
verse2:
I it i ngaih khat sihna'n hong laak ciang
I inn sung hawmin, hong gamdai aa
Banghang a hiam kei' thuakna hihzah liang
Khantawn mi tatsiate lah nuamsa
verse3:
Ong it i Topa'n A hong vaikhakna
Tawlkhat na thuak keeikaai lai le teh
Gen thamlo ding hi tu aa na thuakna
Van innpi nuam sung na luttak teh
verse4:
Van innpi nuam sung lut hun a tun ciang
I Topa in ei hong la hi aa
Ama inn nuam sung A mai i muh ciang
Tel siang ding hi hang i lungmanna
chorus:
Nung ciang a vekpi'n i thei nading hi
Banghang ei dah aa mi nuamsa hiam?
Na lung nuamsak in ni taang khuavak ah
I telna ding hi i nua ciangah

zoTitle: Ka Khut Hong Len In, Topa Aw
verse1:
Ka lampi lauhuai ciang
Hong nai in keima kiang
Ka sihdek laitak Topa
Ka thuumna hong ngai aw
Ka puuk ding hong len aw
Innpi ah hong tun in maw, Topa
verse2:
Sun in hong tumsan in
Khua hong mui semsem in
Zan khuamial in hong tuam ta
Gun geiah ka ding khin
Hong len in, hong pii in
Innpi ah hong tun in maw, Topa
verse3:
Khualzin hun beidek ta
Hong makaih in, Topa
Kei hong hatsak in, Topa
Nang aa ka hi khinzo
Kei kia pai ding hilo
Innpi ah hong tun in maw, Topa
verse4:
Hong phongin, hong len aw
Hong kai in, Topa aw
Kei ka gim kei ka zawm, kei ka bah
Huihpi nung tase leh
Khuavak ah hong pii ve
Innpi ah hong tun in maw, Topa

zoTitle: Topa' Nasepna Ah Nuamsa Semsem Ing
engTitle: The Longer I Serve Him The Sweeter He Grows
verse1:
Zeisu'n ka vekpi'n hong tangkhin
Amah ka piak nungsang
Ka lungsim ka piakkhit nungsang
Topa' nasepna ah, nuamsa semsem ing
verse2:
Ka sapna khempeuh hong pia hi
Tam zaw sem simzo keng
Nisim ka lampi hong taangsak
Topa' nasepna ah, nuamsa semsem ing
chorus:
Topa nasepna ah nuamsa semsem ing
Nisim in tha hong guan hong thahat sak hi
Vantung gam bang hi, ka lungsung hong dimsak
Topa nasepna ah nuamsa semsem ing

verse1:
Hih leitung ah ka khenlah na khempeuh in
Hong kikawm pak hi, kei aa hi kei
Zeisu in ka nuntaak sung hong zatsak pak a hi
Hong phawksak in, phawksak in, Topa
verse2:
Pasian Ta suah nading hoihna khatbeek nei keng,
A khut pawnte tawh kei kituak keng
Ahih hang Kalani lampi kei aa ding’n teelzaw
Hih zah hong itna ke’n telzo ke’ng
chorus:
Topa aw keimah hong phawksak zelzel in
Nong hotkhiat ma'n lau huaina tawh ka kipelh zota
A mangngilh thei mikhat kahih man'n Topa
Hong phawksak in, phawksak in, Topa

engTitle: Life at Best is very Brief
verse1:
Nuntaak hun tom mahmah hi
Singteh pulh tawh kibang hi
Husan khat tawh kibang hi, hunlap in!
A ni a nai hong cingcing
A hun na lapkei kha ding
Na husan hong bei kha ding, hunlap in!
verse2:
Paak hoih pen zong vulpak thei
Meel hoihna zong kiikpak thei
Sawtpi hing ding na hi kei, hunlap in!
Kha Siangtho’ hong zollai in
Mawhnei aw, vak nawnkei in
Siatna na bawl suak ma in, hunlap in!
verse3:
Hunte mengmeng in bei hi
Sihna, thukhenna nai hi
Zeisu’ ang vazuan ta ni, hunlap in!
Lawm aw, geel in na tuak ding
Gimna mun na tungkha ding
Hell khuuk sung na tung kha ding, hunlap in!
verse4:
Mawhnei aw, A aw ngai ve
Tu’n Topa mah hong teel ve
Hong nuam pih ding vantung in, hunlap in!
Khuamial pan khuavak zuan aw
Zeisu kibawl hoihsak aw
Van lam zuan ding hong pai aw, hunlap in!
chorus:
Hunlap in! Hunlap in!
Zeisu in nang hong saplai in, hunlap in!
Mawhna sungsawt na thaamleh
Kong honsa’n mukei niteh
Na kiko na’n lapken teh, hunlap in!

zoTitle: Ka Pa Inn Sungah Omna Tampi A Om Hi
verse1:
Ka Pa’ inn sungah omna tampi a om hi
Om kei leh Amah in hong genzo ding hi
Tua khuapi nuamah teeng di’n Amah paizo hi
Kei aa ding omna hong bawlsak ka thei hi
verse2:
Zeisu in singlamteh tung ka dahna pua aa
Nuntaakna thak na neih na'ng in hong si hi
Ni khat ni ciangin Amah hong paikik ding aa
Leitung ah mawhna, dahna omlo ding hi
verse3:
Na lawmte’n hong nusia aa, na lungzuan ciangin
Lungkham aa na cih na'ng na theihloh ciangin
Mawhna nusia in Zeisu’ kiang zuanpah leh cin
Gen zawh loh lungnopna nang hong pia ding hi
chorus:
Sanggam aw, Honpa’ itna na nialkha kei in
Nial le ci’n vantung langaih salo ding hi teh
Ka Pa’ inn sungah omna tampi a om hi
Zeisu na san leh nang zong pai ding hi teh

zoTitle: Kum Tul Kum Then A Bei Zong
verse1:
Lawm aw na ngaihsun ngei maw Honpa hong paina
Singtung zum huaina tawh a hong kithatna?
Na teldong na kanngei hiam hih zah hong thuakna
Kalvary ah hong sihna ei’ ding mawhlawh hong tawina
verse2:
Zeisu’n ei hong kepna thu telzo kei mah ni
Ih lawm hong suakna thu, hong hehnepna thu
Ih tel zawhloh thu tampi Pasian bek in thei
Hong itna lamdang manin tu in Amin lian phat ni
chorus:
Kumtul kumthen a bei zong hithei ding maw?
Nang leh kei' ta'ng ding singlamteh tung
Hong sihna thu telthei ding maw?
Ih mawhna a bei nangin
Mawh lopi hong sihna thu
Kumtul kumthen a bei zongin
Tua zah itna tel ding maw?

zoTitle: Siangtho Lawmpa Khat Ka Nei Hi
verse1:
Kei hong cingden siangtho Lawmpa khat ka nei hi
Kei tawh tonin ka lam hong pii den ta
Hong lungdam sak, zanmial pen zong hong taangsak hi
Ka Topa hi, ka pumpi hong ukta
verse2:
Kum tampi sung hong itna man theikei kha ing
Singlamteh tung hong sih thu kazaak ciang
Amah ka muan teh keima Honpa hong suak ta
Tua a kipan kei hong tonpih den hi
chorus:
Lam haksa in a kawi hang phamawh sa keng
Keenlak guamlak khuamial in tuam ta leh
Ka kiang hong omden ka theih teh lungmuang ta ing
Kham kong zing ah kei hong paipih ding hi

verse1:
Topa aw, Na thupha khat nangawn
Ngah dingin Nang aa ding'n
Bang sem khong ka hi hiam?
Topa aw, Nong lahsa mi gitna
Itnate ngah dingin
Bang sem khong ka hi hiam?
verse2:
Topa aw, Nang tung kong bat khempeuh
Loh zawh na'ng in lampi
A om leh hong hilh in
Topa aw, Nang kiang kong zuat kikna
Ka muhsa thu khempeuh
Ka lawmte kiang lak ning
chorus:
Hong huh in Zeisu
Ka hun mawk beisak kha ing Zeisu
Kei bang mah man ke'ng
Tu'n Nang kong kisap lam
Theita ing tu'n hong huh in Zeisu
Ka hong ki ap hi

verse1:
Lawm aw, Nang na lungkham in
Tua vangik na lel hiam?
Na vangik hong dawn dingin
Lawm aw, na zong ngeizel hiam?
verse2:
Khual zinpa kaw'h na om hiam?
Na meivaak a taang hiam?
Na dah ciang hong hehnem ding
Na sap ciang kua'n hong za hiam?
verse3:
Na lungkiatna kua'n thei hiam?
Na thuumna kua'n za hiam?
Na lungkhamna kua'n tel hiam?
Na khitui kua'n hong nul hiam?
chorus:
Na thei maw, ka Zeisu?
Na thei maw, ka Lawm?
Aman nang hong it hi
A tawpdong hong ompih den ding hi

verse1:
Aw, a etlawm Betlen aksipi
Khuamial thuukpi hong taan ciaituai
Sawt veipi sung gammang mi hong taan hi
Zeisu a kisialna mun dongah
Mi pilte lam paina lak hi
Hong taan in etlawm Betlen aksi aw
verse2:
Aw, etlawm aksi, lamet khuavak
Mualsang dawn pan zingsang mateng
Khualzinte zan tawntung in lam nalak
Khuavaak mahmah na ih tunciang pawh
It huai vaangtaang khiasak ding hi
Hong taan in etlawm Betlen aksi aw
verse3:
Aw, etlawm aksi, tawldamna lim
Tat khiatsa midik ta dingin
Galkhat minthang kham lukhu ih saan ciang
Zeisu'n tua siangtho aksi hita
Taang semsem, taang semsem ding hi
Hong taan in etlawm Betlen aksi aw
chorus:
Aw, a etlawm Betlen aksipi
Ko tungah hong taangin zingsang mateng
Na khuavaak tawh lampi hong taan in
Khuavaak mahmah gam tun mateng
Hong taan in etlawm Betlen aksi aw

zoTitle: Vanglian Khut Te'n Lam Hong Pi
verse1:
Kei hong kiphawk kha lo-in ah
A gammang bang ka hih hang
Pasian in kei hong cing gige
A mai ka muhtheih loh hang
verse2:
A ma kiangah thu ka nget ciang
Nuam sa'ng hong za ka theih teh
Ka lungkhamna khempeuh ko ning
Lungkham in kei ka vul teh
verse3:
Mihing khempeuh aa ding in ah
Hong geelsak sa khat om aa
Ni khat ni teh ih thei ding aa
Leitung ni bei ciangin ah
verse4:
Ka kumte Amah'n simkhin aa
Ka hun khempeuh zong keem hi
Natna, khitui a om lohna
Gal khatah hong la ding hi
verse5:
Nungciang bang piang ding ke'n thei ke'ng
Ka muan man zong lautuan ke'ng
Upna hang ka ngah khamuanna
Leitung tawh zong kheeknuam ke'ng
chorus:
Vanglian khut ten'n lam hong pi
Vanlian khut te'n lam hong pi
Hih leitung ka hinlai in
Kei kia hilo ka thei hi
A vanglian khut te'n lam hong pi

verse1:
Leitung ah dahna tam
Lungsim sung launa tam
Mun tengah galgim nam
Bang cih khong ding?
Pasian kiang zuan lecin
Ama hehna pan in
Taang mi siangte bangin, na suakta ding
verse2:
Itna hong kiam ding aa
Inn leh lo bei ding aa
Siatna hong tam ding aa
Thu bu'n genzo
Hih teng hong tuntak teh
Beina nai ding hi veh
Peengkul mutpak ve'n teh, mitphiat kal lo
verse3:
Gimna hong bei pah ding
Tawntung lungdam den ding
Dahna om nawnlo ding
Hong pai ciangin
Vantungah leengto ning
Leitung mangpha khak ning
Amah tawh maangkhawm ding, tua hun ciangin
chorus:
Zeisu hong pai baih ding
Sun lai maw, zan maw zing
Mi tampi'n gim thuak ding
Peengkul mut ciang
Misite thokik ding
Midik te'n van zuan ding
Sikik ngei nawnlo ding, vantung tun ciang

verse1:
Pasian in ah, A Tapa hong sawl
Hong it ding leh, hong damsak ding
Ka mawhnate maisak ding hong pai
Nungta ahih manin a hanguak bek om hi
verse2:
Naungekte zong, Ama'n hong kepsak
Bangzah takin, lungdam huai hiam
Tua sang in zong lungdam huai zawlai
Nungta ai'h ma'n lau na'ng omlo, cih thu mahmah!
verse3:
Ni khat ni ciang, sihna gul gaal ah
Haksa pi in, ka kah ding hi
Tua hun ciangin, sihna zozo in
Amah Kumpi a hih lam ka muthei ding hi
chorus:
Nungta a hih ma'n
Bangbang piang ta se leh
Phamawh sa ke'ng, zong laubeek ke'ng
Mailam hunte, A khutsung om cihthei ing
Amah nungta ahih ma'n ka nunna'n ma'n nei

verse1:
Sihna mualkuam gal ah khuapi khat a om hi
A hoihna kua man gen zolo hi
Zan kim lai in tuuno in khuavaak bang taang aa
Tua a etlawm kham khuapi sungah
verse2:
Tua lai ah dahna, natna, sihna, om nawnlo
Mi siang khempeuh zong teekthei nawnlo
Tua khua ah ut zen si'ng zan khuamial lah bei ta
Tua a etlawm kham khuapi sungah
chorus:
Tua lai ah, ni tumlo
Singteh zong vul ngeilo
Midikte a tawntung aksi bangin taang aa
Tua a etlawm kham khuapi sungah

zoTitle: Tua Ni Ciang Bangzah In A Nop Zen Tam!
engTitle: What A Day That Will Be!
verse1:
Khatvei ciang gen theihna
Om loh hun hong tung ding
Van ah meiite theng in
Khitui luanna omlo ding
Tua a nuam kham khuapi ah a tawntung lungdam den ding
Tua ni ciang bangzah in a nopzen tam!
verse2:
Dahna om nawnlo ding
Van puak ding omlo ding
Natna om nawnlo ding
Kikhenna zong omlo ding
Kei taang ding a sipa tawh
A tawntung teengkhawm den ding
Tua ni ciang bangzah in a nopzen tam!
chorus:
Zeisu ka muh ciangin bangzah in a nuamzen tam!
Hehpihna tawh hong Tanpa a maitang ka et ciangin ah
Ka khut in hong leen ding aa
Khapsa gamah hong paipih ding
Tua ni ciang bangzah in a nopzen tam!

zoTitle: Topa, Nang Ka Vision Hi In
verse1:
O Topa aw, Nang ka vision hi in
Nang lo kua in kei hong hon ding om kei
Sun leh zan in Nang bek kong ngaihsun
Ihmut sung khanlawh ciang zong Nong ompih
verse2:
O Topa aw, Nang ka pilna hi in
Kei tawh Nang Na hong omkhawm tawntung ding
Nang ka Pa tatak kei Nangma ta
Kei sungah Nong teeng aa pumkhat i hi
verse3:
Hauh leh miphat ding ka vision hi kei
A tawntung in Nang ka neihgil na hi
Ka lungsim tawngah Nang bek na om
Vantung Kumpipa ka neihgil na hi
verse4:
Vantung Kumpipa ka gual zawhna hi
Vantung nopnate kei hong bansak in!
Bangbang piang ta leh ka lung sungah
Na khempeuh a uk, ka vision na hi

verse1:
Vantung thusim khat zakha ngei ing
Tua in ka lunggulh luatna
Lai Siangtho in Tua mun hoihna hong gen
Ka Topa bawl kholh kei aa ding mun
verse2:
Vantung pai na'ng leithei lo hi teh
Pai theih na'ng lampi khat om
Calvary ah, Topa'n a man piakhin
Hong paiziau lel in, tua sisan ah
verse3:
A lamdang tua khuapi ih tun ciang
Ih Topa maitang mu ding
A tawntung in a kha nuai ah teeng ding
Aw kei tawh hong paikhawm lo ding maw
chorus:
Vantung na geelkhol thei hiam?
Lungnopna khempeuh kicinna
Lungkhamna om nawnlo
Vangik khempeuh zang ta
Tua in a tawntung nopna hi

verse1:
Tan bang tehpih ding omlo
Pianna ka zuapa aw
Na vontawite lo bang nong khualna lianlua
Sim leitung tomkaal gua bang
Hingin ka damlai teng
Zuapa itna lung lai ah, ngil ngeikei ning
verse2:
Thei bang ka senlai pan in
Zeh zum ding nong khual ma'n
Gentheih haksat gimna tawlna nong thuak maw
Ka pil ding nong deih manin
Sinthu an bang nong muam
Tu in sian min phatin hong pahtawi ung ee
verse3:
Sim lei mi zatam lai ah
Zuapa zatam lai ah
Pianna ka zua bang tawh ka tehthei ding hiam
Leitung hauhna sum leh paai
Kham leh ngun sangin zong
Manpha zawlai leitung ka Pasian na hi
chorus:
Tung Sianmang in liimbang hong sungin
Kumsawt taangbang dam khawm leeng
Tun leh zua angliim pan in
Na vontawi momno te'n Sian min phatin
Na min thei bang lolo nung

verse1:
Ka nu, ka tuun bang tuunnu
Koi mun koi kuam zong mah leng
Amah bang omlo hih lei ah
Ka nu, hong it ka tuunnu
verse2:
Ka nu, hong deihsak tuunnu
A ma nek taangin hong pia
Ka sapna khempeuh hong guan hi
Ka nu, hong deihsak tuunnu
verse3:
Ka nu, hong lainat tuunnu
Ka thuak taangin amah'n thuak
Ka haksak thuak ding hong phal lo
Ka nu, hong lainat ka nu
verse4:
Ka nu, pianna ka tuunnu
A khankum khua sawt hen la
A sep gimnate thukkik leng
Ka nu, pianna ka tuunnu
chorus:
Tuunnu bang tawh kong tehthei diam
Kham leh ngun sang zong na manpha zaw
Nong itna loh ding ka hinna'n cinkei
Ka leitung Pasian, hong it ka tuunnu

verse1:
Ka theih ngeiloh lungnopna ke'n ngahkhin zo ta'ng
Leitung in hong piak theihloh nopna
Topa tung pum leh kha ka kipiak khit nungsang
Lamdang a lamdang ka Topa
verse2:
Ka nuntaakna khempeuh uk dingin kong deih hi
Tua hi leh kicing ding Na deihna
Na thu neihna bek in Na deihna kimsak hi
Lamdang a lamdang ka Topa
verse3:
Ka siamna khempeuh Na khe phungah kong nga hi
Nong saan bangbang kei thaman hi pah
Ka neihsate khempeuh Nang tungah kong pia hi
Lamdang a lamdang ka Topa
verse4:
:Leitung aa a hoih pen sangin, Na hoihzaw hi
Nuntakna hong pia vanglian Topa
Tangtawng aa ka Pasian phatding Na kilawm hi
Lamdang a lamdang ka Topa
chorus:
Lamdang ka Topa, lamdang ka Topa
Vantung misiang te'n phat in bia hi, van ah
Vanglian ka Honpa, kei aa na hita
Lamdang a lamdang ka Topa

zoTitle: A Ni A Ni In Ngaih Semsem
engTitle: Sweeter as the Days Go By
crossrefs: S.S. 510, John R. Sweney (1837-1899), Mrs. Elisa Edmunds Hewitt (1851 -)
verse1:
A deihhuai tangthu Honpa itna thu
A ni a ni in ngaih semsem
Hong khapsa van inn hang lungmuanna thu
A ni a ni in ngaih semsem
verse2:
Nuntaakna khuavaak pan a vaang taangpi
A ni a ni in taang semsem
Dahna hong hehnem kamciamna aksi
A ni a ni in tang semsem
verse3:
Huihpi nun ciang a hong lensik kippi
A ni a ni in kip semsem
Nuntaak tawntungna thu i theita hi
A ni a ni in thei semsem
verse4:
Zeisu in eite hong piak lungnopna
A ni a ni in nuam semsem
Christian te aa ding kihong lametna
A ni a ni in lian semsem
chorus:
A nisim in, Amah phatna la sasa ni
Hun zong nuam semsem
Van aa Pasian i phatna la
A ni a ni in ngaih semsem

engTitle: May They be United Forever, Wedding Band
crossrefs: Word: ZCLS la committee (1999), Tune: R.S. 11, William Howard Doane (1832-1915)
verse1:
Pasian geelsa hong tungta
Lia leh taang kigawmna
Itna tawh pumkhat suak ding
Khukdin uh, Na mai ah
Kamciamna kip la uh aa
Amau khutte kilen
Pasian gawmsa amaute
Mite in khenkei hen
verse2:
Nangma thupha namkim tawh
Lungnopna guanta in
Gentheih hun leh nopsak hun
Ki it hun suaksak in
Inn sung, phung sung kilemna
Kipatna suak uh hen
Christian innkuan hoihsuak in
Limpha lakden uh hen
verse3:
Topa aw, hih nupate
Thupha tampi pia in
Tu leh ta tawi uh henla
Neih leh lamh cingsak in
Upna, lawpna kip nei in
Nang sung lungkim uh hen
A khankum uh sawt henla
Tawntung kha kihual hen

zoTitle: Lia Leh Tang Mu Bang Kingai
crossrefs: Neng Khan Cin (1957-), Tune: R.S. 790, George D. Moore 19th century
verse1:
Lia leh taang mu bang kingai, thei bang kilo
Kumsawt taang bang damkhawm uh hen
Seino gual te'n paak bang tawi, nunnop i zo
Sian' lungdeih tuang tunna hi hen
verse2:
Inn leh lo suangzo dingin, Na siam inla
Khawhma, ehma daupai sak in
Zin leh leeng dosiam, innkuan suaksak inla
Van daingo tawh Na tuamden in
verse3:
Sesum minthang leh sung neek, mim leh taang tawh
Nunnop liibang Na cingsak in
Zaitha saan uh hen, thunget lasakna tawh
Christian innkuan pha suak dingin
verse4:
Van Lau Kha Siangtho va bang hong leng inla
Nangmah'n zingvai Na hawmpih in
Simlei nun sungin, mi lun vontawi henla
Thangvaan tuang tundong Na huai in
chorus:
Sihna'n sam gibang khen mateng, mateng in
Sian tawh maciang suan uh hen
Itna leh tongciam na'n khaubang hualkhawm in
Gual lai ah nii bang tang uh hen

zoTitle: Zingni Suak Sangin A Tang Zaw
verse1:
Zingni suak sangin a tangzaw
Ka Honpa leh Kumpi hi
Na hoihna leh na thupitna
La in ka sasa nuam hi
verse2:
Vangliatna puan tawh kizem in
Minthanna lukhu khu hi
Thupha vangliatna leh hatna
A tawntung in na nei hi
verse3:
Na migitna lian mahmah aa
Na hehpihna kicing hi
Na ukna itna tawh dim aa
Kei aa ding hong bawlsak hi
verse4:
Ngun meivaak khaute kitat in
Ka nuntaakna bei ciangin
Kumtul kumthen Topa mai ah
Phatna la ka sa ding hi
chorus:
Zingni suak sangin a tangzaw
Sun nitaang sang taangzaw Nang na hi
Vangliatna tawh dim na mai ah
Khuamial leh meiilum theng hi

verse1:
Upna bek tawh i ngah theih thupha lamdang lua hi
Zanni, tuni, a tawntung Zeisu kikhel lo hi
Mawhneite gum nuam
Cinate zong damsak nuam den
A dah mite lung nuamsak hi
A minthang ta hen!
verse2:
Mawhneite lawm bawlin gumnuam aa, a hong zong Pa
Tu’n zuanin, kisikna tawh kuun in, a khe phungah
Thu hong khenkei ning
Na mawh nawnken a ci Pa in
Na mawhna hong maisak nuam hi
Tanglai mah bangin
verse3:
Leitung a om lai, Zeisu'n cinate damsak hi
I natnate a thupiakna tawh dam theilai hi
Numei khat in a puanmong
A lawn ciang dam pah hi
Tua bang upna mah tawh nang zong
Hong damsak thei hi
chorus:
Zanni tuni leh a tawntung Zeisu kikhel lo
Na dang khempeuh a kikhel hang Zeisu kikhel lo!
A minthang ta hen! A minthang ta hen!
Na dang khempeuh a kikhel hang
Zeisu kikhel lo!

zoTitle: Topa Kiang Lo Koi Ka Pai Diam?
verse1:
Mawhna dim hih lei ah ka nuntaakna
Ka kha buk na’ng mun zong dingin
Ze-etna lianpi ke’n ka sunsiah hi
Topa kianglo, koi’h ka pai diam?
verse2:
I it lawmte khempeuhte ke’n it ing
I lung sungah kingil theilo
Ka kha aa ding in Kha an kisam ing
Topa kianglo, koi’h ka pai diam?
verse3:
Nun in nuam e hiah i it lawmte tawh
Pasian hong piak hehnepna hi
Sihna daitui ka tal ah hong kaai ciang
Topa kianglo, koi’h ka pai diam?
chorus:
Koi’h ka pai diam? Oh! koi ah ka pai diam?
Ka kha buk na’ng mun zong dingin
Ni tawpni ciang hong gum ding kisam ing
Topa kianglo, koi’h ka pai diam?

verse1:
Khatvei lai in mawhnei ka hi aa
Mawhmai na’ng Topa ka zuat leh
Hong kipia khong hilhial na hi aa
A kammal kip den hi veh
verse2:
Pasian’ hehna thuak ding launa tawh
Singlamteh phung ka khukdin aa
Vantungte kihong in ka mit tawh
Ka min kigelh ka muta!
verse3:
Hehpihna hang gupna kingah ta
Thu bu sung ka mu nuammah si'ng!
Telzo ing, ka mawhna mai zota!
Sisan hang damsiang zo ing
chorus:
Van gam sungah minthak khat kigelh hi
Kei’ min hi, keima min hi!
Puanpaak silh vantung mi te'n la sa hi
Mimawh khat hong tung ci
Vantung gam sungah minthak khat kigelh hi
Kei min hi, keima min hi!
Ka mawhna maizo aa, vantung lam ka zuan ta!
Nuam hithiat zen si!

verse1:
Nitaang sung' lampai, nuntaak khualzinna
Mualtung leh kuamthuuk, lamdung teng ah
Hong nusia lo ding, Zeisu’n hong ciamzo
Pasian’ kamciam hi, ciampeel ngeilo
verse2:
Ka kiim ka paam ah khuamial a tam hang
Hong liahzo ngeilo, ka Honpa vaang
Amah khuavaak hi, khuamial in zolo
Mundang pai thei ke'ng, Ama’ kianglo
verse3:
Nitaang khuavaak sung ka paisuak ding hi
Lungdamna tawh inn ka tung ding hi
Amah phatna la sa in ka pai hi
Itna khuavaak sung’ lam ka pai hi
chorus:
Vantung khuavaak aw, Pasian' khuavaak aw
Na minthanna tawh Nong tuamta maw!
Halleluijah! Lungdam, kipaak in
Zeisu kei aa ci’n la sasa ning

verse1:
Leitung nopna sung, bualkik nawnlo ding, khentat khinzo ta ing
A sangzaw nate’n a phazaw nate'n
Ka mit hong lazaw hi
Manlang', zuan ning Amah, kipaak leh suakta in
Kipaak, suakta takin
Zeisu lianpen, sangpen, Nang kong zui ding hi
verse2:
Mawhnate nusia’n Honpa' kiang pai ding, khentat khinzo ta ing
Amah thumaan pen, Amah thutang pen
Nunna kammal zong hi
Manlang', zuan ning Amah, kipaak leh suakta in
Kipaak, suakta takin
Zeisu lian pen, sangpen, Nang kong zui ding hi
verse3:
Citak in nisim Honpa' nung zui ding, khentat khinzo ta ing
A genbang mang ding, A deihbang sem ding
Nuntaakna lampi hi
Manlang', manlang’ zuan ning Amah, kipaak leh suakta in
Kipaak, suakta takin
Zeisu, Zeisu lian pen, sangpen, Nang kong zui ding hi
verse4:
Mawhna zawi nusia’n, Kumpi gam lut ding, khentat khinzo ta ing
Lawmte’n langdo zong, galte’n hong neh zong
Ka lut veve ding hi
Manlang', Manlang’ zuan ning Amah, kipaak leh suakta in
Kipaak, suakta takin
Zeisu, Zeisu lian pen, sangpen, Nang kong zui ding hi

crossrefs: Eliza E. Hewitt, William J. Kirkpatric
verse1:
Hahkatin zui ding Honpa khekhapte ah
Hahkatin zui ni hong hon Kumpipa
Amah etteh in i nunna siampha ni
Lungdam, kipaak in, langaihte sak ni
verse2:
Lampial ding ze-etna i tuak ciangin ah
Hong makaih Pa naihzawk ding hanciam ni
Hong dalzo ding a thahat khut i muang hi
Lungdam, kipaak in, nisim in phat ni
verse3:
Cihtakna, hehpihna leh itna zui in
Thuak zawhna tawh dam takin mainawt ni
Man ngenlo hehpihna kamciam mitsuan ni
Lungdam, kipaak in, tunglam zinna ah
verse4:
Hahkatin zui ding Honpa khekhapte ah
A suk a to ah zui ni hongpii pa
A hoihna tawh Kumpipa mai i mu ding
Lungdam, kipaak in, Ama' kiang om ding
chorus:
Aw, bangzah in etlawm
Honpa kalsuanna zuihna
Khuavaak sung paina, khuavaak sung tunna
Aw, bangzah in etlawm
Honpa' nung zui aa paina
Khuavaak sung tunna

verse1:
Lamdang Zeisu hehpihna
Ka mawhna sang lianzaw
Ka leii in bangci’n phat ding
Koipan pan ding ka hiam?
Ka vangik teng hong paihsak
Ka kha hong suakta sak
Lamdang Zeisu’ hehpihna in kei hong gum hi
verse2:
Lamdang Zeisu hehpihna
Mangthangte kiang hong tung
Mawhmaina ka ngahzo hi
A tawntung hotkhiatna
Kol khempeuh kisut khinta
Suahtaakna kei hong pia
Lamdang Zeisu’ hehpihna in kei hong gum hi
verse3:
Lamdang Zeisu hehpihna
Mawhnei pen kiang zong tung
Hong kheel vangliatna pi tawh
Pasian ta-it suaksak
Nopna leh vangam luah ding
Tawntung beihun neilo
Lamdang Zeisu’ hehpihna in kei hong gum hi
chorus:
Lamdang Zeisu’ hong hehpihna
Teh theih ding omlo hi
Tuipi lian sangin zong thuukzaw hi
Zong thuukzaw hi
A lamdang hi mawhnei
Kei aa ding hehpihna kicing
Ka mawh huamna sangin zong zaizaw hi
Mawhna zumna sangin lianzaw hi
O liansak ni a manpha pen Zeisu min, phatciat ni!

verse1:
Pasian in a geelna kheel ngeilo hi
Ama aa nasem mite hong telsit aa
Topa tung lungdam ko in hong ze-et ciang
Khuamial sung la hong sasak ding
verse2:
Kamai niliimte hang khua muthei ke'ng
Tuama ka Honpa singlamteh ka en aa
Topa deihna ah ka ki ap khit ciangin
Khitui kangin nopna ngah ingh
verse3:
Van pan hong pai ze-etna thu thei tangh
Pasian in a tate hong thakhauh sak hi
Ka pa theisiam in Amah ka muangta hi
Ka gah hong tamsak semsem hi
chorus:
Topa sung lungdam un
Leitung bei ni ciang Aman
Hong thei in hong telkhial lo ding hi
Gimna ka thuak ciang hong siangsak den
Khambang hong siangsak hi

verse1:
Innkuan nuam in hauhna liatna hi kei
Kitawng kawmkawm aa sameh limpen neksang
Zawng thilthial hang ki it diamdiam aa
Anteh mehnek hoih zawtham lai hi
verse2:
Nu leh pa te'n tate a neulai in
Pasian' thu mah tawh pantah in thuhilh un
Tate'n zong nu leh pa zahtak in thu mang un
Na nahlawh pekin na daupai ding.
verse3:
Mo te'n teekte pianna nu leh pa bang
Ngaihsun in itna kam tawh ho tawntung un
Teek te'n zong na mote, na sung aa piang bangin
It unla simmawh bawlsia kei un
chorus:
Zeisu tawh innkuan teengleng
Bangkim itna tawh dimin
Kitawt kisel kiphunsan nate omlo in
Lungzinna meiipi thengin
Nopna ni taang silsial ding aa
Bangkua hoih pen
Innkuan nuam pen nasuak ding hi

verse1:
Ka nuntaak tawntung tuivot cim
Khat lunggulh in zongden ingh
Ka lung sung aa ka dangtaakna
A phasak ding lamen ingh
verse2:
Ka thaneih teng a beiphial dong
Ka kiim ka pam teng mai ingh
A hoih zawkhat lunggulh den in
Nop tuamna ngahthei tuan keng
verse3:
Ka zawnluat ma'n hauhna zong ingh
Hong lungkim sakthei dingin
Ka lawhsate leivui bang hi
Lungkimna hong piazo kei
verse4:
Tawntung phuulden nuntaak tuinaak
Hinna anlum khawnkhong cing
A bei ngeilo hauhna kicing
Hong Tanpa in kei aa hi
chorus:
Hallejah! Ke'n mukhin ingh
Ka zonden ka lunggulh pen
Zeisu’n ka lunggulhna cingsak
A sisan hang suakta ingh

zoTitle: Zeisu Hong Pai Kik Ding Hi
verse1:
A lamdang thu kong puak hi
Minthanna la kong sa hi
A lamdang kumpi thu hi
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
verse2:
Singkung lopate kiko
Mual leh guamte zong kiko
Vantung leh leitung zong so
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
verse3:
Ama mai ah ih ding ding
Haksatna teng beisiang ding
Amai ah lukhu nga ding
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi
chorus:
Hong paikik ding, hong paikik ding
Zingsang hi thei, sun hi thei
Nitaak hi thei, nai mahmah ding
Hong paikik ding, hong paikik ding
Oh! Tuani ding lawphuai zen si'n cia maw!
Zeisu hong paikik ding hi

zoTitle: Na Khempeuh Pasian Hehpihna Hang In
engTitle: All Because of God’s Amazing Grace
verse1:
Hong hehpihna lamdang zen si
Hehpih huai mawhnei hong honkhia!
Ka manthan hangin tu'n hong kimu zo
Mittaw tu in khua ka mu theita!
verse2:
Lungkiatna lauhuai nate panin
Haksat dahna pan ka suakta!
Pasian hehpihna in bittak hong kem
Hong hehpihna’n inn hong tun dingta!
verse3:
Tatkhiat sate tawh tokhom kiim ah
Honpa Kumpipa i phat ding!
Hong hehpihna mah i suutsuut lai ding
Khang tawntung hih mah la’n i sa ding!
chorus:
Tua in lamdang Pasian hehpihna hang hi!
Calvary mual tungah kei taangding si hi
Minthan ni zingsang khat ciangin
A maitang ken ka mu ding
Lamdang Pasian hehpihna hang hi

verse1:
Thunget ding hong hilhin Topa aw
Hih in nisim ka lunggulh pen hi
Na zia Na tong ken ka theinuam hi
Thunget ding hong hilhin Topa aw
verse2:
Thungetna vaanglian hong pia’n Topa
Mawhna gentheihna hih simlei ah
Mihing tampi mangthang den in si
Hong pia in kei thunget vaangliatna
verse3:
Ka lungsim zawngkhal tha hong guan in
Kamawh zong siatna hong paihsak in
Vaangliatna thak tawh kei hong tuam in
Thunget vaanglian leh sepna vaanglian
verse4:
Thunget ding hong hilhin Topa aw
Nisim ka et teh Nangmah bek mah
Tawntung ka kha muanna in Nangmah
Thunget ding hong hilh in Topa aw
chorus:
Ka sungah nungta kei Nang' sungah
Tawntung omkhawm dingin kong thuum hi
Kiteh lo na vaanglian hong pia in
Nang tung pan mi tungah vaangliatna

zoTitle: Zan Cih Om Ngei Lo Hi
crossrefs: John R. Clements (1868-), S.S. 1012, H.P. Danles (1903)
verse1:
Kiu li nei khuapi om aa
Nitum ngei lohna hi
Cikmah ciang sialo ding aa
Zan cih om ngeilo hi
verse2:
Kiu li nei khuapi om aa
A kongpi kep a hi
A kong zingte kham hi aa
Zan cih om ngeilo hi
verse3:
Tua kiu li nei khuapi ah
Kong kikhak ngeilo hi
Nuntaakna tui luanna ah
Zan cih om ngeilo hi
verse4:
Tua kiu li nei khua sungah
Nitaang kisam lo hi
Tuuno ni bang taanna ah
Zan cih om ngeilo hi
chorus:
Pasian in khitui nuul aa
Sihna natna omlo hi
Hun leh kum cih omlo aa
Zan cih om ngeilo hi

engTitle: The Coming King Is at the Door
verse1:
Kumpipa kong kiangah om hi
Mawhneite’ ta'ng sihna thuak mi
Mi siangthote bek mah tu in
Kaikhawm ding hong pai hi
verse2:
Hong pai ding naina lak limte
Kum simin kicing mengmeng hi
Vantung zingsang khuavaak tawntung
Sawtlo i mu ding hi
verse3:
Kidona, gimna venglo ding
Leitung ah nopna zong kei in
Honpa hong paikik ni ciangin
Mawhna, sihna bei ding
verse4:
Van leh lei thak i tun ciangin
A tawntungin i teeng ding hi
Sihna om nawnlo nuntaakna
A tawntung hun zang ding
chorus:
Kong biangah, kong biangah
Kong biangah hi, kong biang hong tungzo
Hong paita hi, hong paita hi
Kong biang nangawn hong tungzo

zoTitle: En A Hun Lian Thei Lo
verse1:
Topa hong pai ding a hun lian kua mah’n theilo
Tua hun hong nai hi, ci in lim te'n hong lakzo
Hong paikik ding hi cih kamciamna thupha kho
En a hun lian theilo
verse2:
Hotkhiatna a zong mipil tading khuavaak hi
Topa thuhilhna Lai Siangtho sungah om hi
Hong hilhna thu in hunbei nading honglak hi
En a hun lian theilo
verse3:
Meivaak taang sakin thungen kawmin i ngak ding
Topa hong pai dong, ngak kawm in na i sem ding
Na lamdang pian sim hong naina thu phawkseem ding
En a hun lian theilo
chorus:
Hong pai ding kiging sa in omciat ni
Hong pai ding Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Pasian vangliatna tawh
Meii tung tuangin hong pai ding
En a hun lian theilo

crossrefs: Fanny Jane Crosby (1820-1915), Translated by Rev. Hau Go Ham (1954-), R.H. 369, William J. Kirkpatrick (1838-1921)
verse1:
Tatkhiatna thu ka tangko nuam hi
Tuuno si tawh hong tatkhiatna
A bei theilo hong hehpihna hi
Pasian ta cihna ka ngahna
verse2:
Zeisu in keimah hong tatkhiatna
Kam aa genzawh ding hilo hi
Ama khuavaak sungah ka omta
Amah tawh ka tengkhawm den ding
verse3:
Ka lungsung om hong Tanpa itna
Sun niloh in hong phawngden hi
Ke’n sasa nuam ing, Amah phatna
Tua la mah ka sasa nuam hi
verse4:
Ka thei hi a hoihna ka mu ding
Amah ka Kumpi hong hita
Amah in kei hong kem tawntung ding
Hong pia den, Amah phatna la
verse5:
Ka thei hi kham lukhu ka ngah ding
Hong bawlkholh sak mun ka tun ciang
Ama meel bangin ka kicing ding
Amah tawh ka tenkhop hun ciang
chorus:
Tatkhiat, tatkhiat
Tuuno sisan tawh tatkhiat sa
Tatkhiat, tatkhiat
Pasian' ta cihna ka ngahta

verse1:
Tuan aa pupa lamtual saina
Khawhlo phungpha tonkhuang saina
Lungdeih sinthu khaubang suutna
Phuhbang kho hen, pianna Zogam
verse2:
Tuan pupa’ ma bang i zopna
Siamsil minlian tuang i tutna
Tongdam siktui zu bang khumna
Kilbang khanghen, pianna Zogam
verse3:
Aw Zogam nuam huihdam seemna
Milun zata laitual lenna
Lungtuak momno ngabang lenna
lawibang thanghen, pianna Zogam
chorus:
Sianmang lumsun, lungtuak vontawi
Sian sinthu tawh mawngbang kikawi
Nunnuam kisung, lungtuak zai awi
Sian in siam hen, pianna Zogam
composers: Word Arr: Rev. Tuan Khan Mung (1960-); Tune: G. Biak Nawl

verse1:
Beh leh phung, pawlpi, ngeina
Pau kilamdang zong
Tuun sung khatpan piang
Laizom sanggamte hi hang
Zogam kicinna, Zomite zawhna
Zeisu in Topa ci’n phat un
Zogam aa ding Pasian, Zomi aa ding Pasian
verse2:
Thungen in nasem hanciam
Zogam tate aw
Zomite i belh i suan in Pasian bek hi
Zogam kicinna, Zomite zawhna
Zeisu in Topa ci'n phat un
Zogam aa ding Pasian, Zomi aa ding Pasian
chorus:
Zogam, Zomi, Zogam ei hong pia
Pa Pasian thanghen!
Zogam, Zomi, Zogam ei hong pia
Pa Pasian thang hen!
(Zogam aa ding Pasian, Zomi aa ding Pasian
Lungsim khutte lamto in Pasian liansak un) x2

verse1:
It baanglo kei Nong it aa
Teel cinglo kei Nong teel hi
Ka phawkkhak loh hun nangawn in
Kei Nong itna kicing hi
Continue to Verse (2) ...
verse2:
Nisim ka nuntakna ah
Topa Nang bek kong muang hi
Itna damtui Nong luan aa
Lam tawntung Nong tonpih hi
chorus:
Nong itna thu thei semsem nuam ingh
Nong itna thu tel semsem nuam ingh
Nong itna thu thei semsem leng
Topa Nang sung nuamsa ingh
Nong itna thu tel semsem leng
Topa Nang sung khamuang ingh

verse1:
Taanglai kamsangte genkholh bang
Hehpihna thupha hong bawl nading
A ma sila David suan lakpan
Mesiah hong suakzo hi
verse2:
Tuucingte gamlak ah tuu vilin
Zankim gamdai kim laitak in
Topa vantungmi hong kilangh aa
Khrist Gumpa hong suakzo ci
verse3:
Mipilte'n lamhilh aksi zui in
Hong suakthak Kumpi vabia uh hi
Eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm ci'n
Emanual Amin thang hen...
chorus:
Minthang hen, Amin thang hen!
Van sang belna ah Amin thang hen
Nopna om hen, nopna om hen!
A deih mitung nopna omta hen

verse1:
Itna kip tawh hong it hi
Mivom, mikang deidan tuanlo
A siam a hat, a zawng a hau khen tuanlo in
A ki bang'n hong it in
A nuntakna hong pia hi
verse2:
Khua-ul si bang luang lunggim in
Bawl siatna namkim hong thuak
Leitung mi khwnpeuh hong it luat manin
Singlamteh tung ah thahna hong thuak zen hi
verse3:
A lutung linglukhu kikhusak
A khut leh khe sikpim tawh kikilh
A pangpi teipi tawh kidawt lailai
Aw ka Topa Nong itna, aw lamdang lua sii ee..
verse4:
Ni leh kha aksite'n en ngamlo
Van vasa, ganhingte'n zong ham ngam lo
"Pa aw, Pa aw, bang ding hong taisan Na hiam?"
Ci-in ka Topa lu kunin, hong itna in zo hi
chorus:
Kei Nong itna, Aw lian zen si, lian zen si
Singlamteh tung thahna Nong thuak maw
Kei Nong itna, Aw lamdang si lamdang si
Nong itna lianlua ee ka Topa aw

verse1:
Pasian in a mangthang mite
Zong ding leh gumkhia dingin
A tapa neihsun ei aa ding'n
Leitung mi bang'n piansak hi
verse2:
Hamciam thu tawh kingah zolo
Upna bek tawh kingah hi
Thalawh zawh thu tawh kingah lo
Upna bek tawh ngah (ci hi) ding ci...
verse3:
Leitung mite hong it luat ma'n
Singlamteh tung thahna thuak
Ih mawhna hong maisak nading
A Pa kiang hong thumsak lai hi...
verse4:
Hong gupna thu a um mite'n
Kisia lo nuntak ngah ding
Zua sau nuam, van mite lenna
Tuamun ah ih kimu diam?
chorus:
Hong gupkhiatna thu hangin
Tawntung nunna ih ngah (ding) hi
Van innpi sung mi siangthote leh
Topa tawh ii mangkhawm ding

verse1:
Sabath ni khit nipi ni zingsang tung in
Thakhat in, ziin nakpi takin liing aa
Topa vantungmi khat vantung pan hong paisuk in
Han hukna suang tumpi liikkhia hi
verse2:
Magdalene khua mi Mari James nu Mari
Samale te daihawh ding paknamtui tawi in
Han ah hong pai uh aa, Zeisu thawhkikna thu
Vantungmi in tua numeite kiang gen
verse3:
Nungzui nihte lampi ah Zeisu kilangh
Tiberia tuilii gei ah zong kilangh
Zeisu'n Simon, Peter leh a um zolo te kiang
A khut leh khe liamma pawn lak hi
chorus:
Zeisu thokik zo, thokik zo hi
Eite nuntak tawntungna ih ngah nading in
A vanglian hong gumpa, Zeisu sihna pan
Gualzo in thokik khinzo hi

verse1:
Ka nuntakna hong kem, hong makaih tawntung
Ka paina khempeuh ah, hong tonpih den hi
verse2:
Simlei haksatnate'n, Meipi bang'n hong tuam
Kei hong honkhia thei ding, Topa Nangbek hi
chorus:
Lam tawntung ah hong tonpih in
Na khanuai ah kei hong seel in
Lungnopna kicinna, Topa Nangbek hi
Lam tawntung ah hong tonpih den
A khanuai ah kei hong seel den hi
Lungnopna kicinna, Topa Nangbek hi

verse1:
Sen momno cil pan in, ham bangin hong huaito aa
Ka ciin leh tuai nih thum tawh, pak bangin a hong tawi
Nuntak zia ding hong hilh, Sian Mang thu tawh hong makaih
Nong itna lianlua sang, ka Zuapa aw
verse2:
Lungkham haksatnate, hong thuakin zong thumlo maw
Pilna, siamna hong sinsak, lam a hong lak tawntung
Silh leh ten hong guan in, neek ding dawn ding hong zonsak
Gual lai nunnuam kim ding'n sinthu nong muam
verse3:
Ka Tuunnem tawh kopin, lungtuak tongdam kumkhawm in
Na von deih zatam teng tawh, nunnuam tuibang luangkhawm
Zuasau Mang liimnuai ah, Sian hawm sunni hong taang ee
Zua aw Nong itna lian, lianlua sang ee
chorus:
Mimbang pianna Zuapa, tehkim omlo Nong itna
Ken bang tawh hong thukzo ding ka hiam
Sian in hong siamhen la, khan kumsawt taangbang damin
Lam hong pi lai-in aw, ka Zuapa aw

verse1:
Tung Pasian siam sen aa Tuunnu aw
Theibang ka senlai na ang ah
Na nun khumno tawh nunno nong pia
An bang hong it ka sen Tuunnu
verse2:
Sinthu nong muam, Vanmang thu nong muam
Laitual nga bang ka lengthei ta
Silhpuan nong guan aa, guallai ka hei
Tu-in seisang tang ta ing ee
verse3:
An bang nong itna lianlua sang ee
Nong it bang'n hong it theisak aw
Na von nit thum te, na banzal tawh
Lumbang hong sung in, Tuunnu aw
chorus:
Hong it ka sen Tuunnu nong itna lianlua sang
Bang tawh tansing bang kong tehthei diam
Sian in hong siam in, lumbang hong sung hen la
Khan kumsawt hong nuntak pih in Tuunnu

verse1:
Lia leh taang mubang kingai, ho lungtuak vabang lengkhawm
Nihgel Sian tawh tongciam, itna tawh ma suankhawm ding
Kaal sinthu in khenkei hen, Tun leh Zua in khenkei hen
Zua SianMang hawm sinthu hi, kuamah in khenkei hen
verse2:
Etlawm siangtho itna tawh, lungtuak nupa suakzo hi
Sihna longal kuaman' hemlam tong tawh khenkei hen
Gentheih haksat dahnate, nopsakna sum leh paai te'n
Lungtuak nihgel ki itna khensakzo kei hen aw
verse3:
Simleitung tomkaal nunsung, Sianthu masuan tawntung in
Sehsum tawh leitheiloh, khan kumsawt lobang tul ding
SianMang in banzal ziatsuan hong len in vondeih zatam
Suan leh khak tu tampi nei in, lumbang hong sung hen
chorus:
Sim leitung khankum sawt guabang hingin
Mubang kingaihna phuhbang khoden hen
Itna pumkhat in, tui bang luangkhawm ding
Sian in hong siam in, lumbang hong sung hen

verse1:
Mim bang pian na, Tun leh Zua ang liim pan kil bang khang
Gual tawh tan bang kim ding, Sian in siam
Sian sinthu tawh hong ma kaih, Tun leh Zua hong itna
Innkuan sung, itna damtui hong luang
verse2:
Sian hawm sun ni hong tang ee, kong it ngaihno aw
Lungtuak in, va bang lengkhawm ni
Sian in lumbang hong sung ee, vondeihno teng tawh
Zaideih awi in Sian Mang phatve ni
chorus:
Sian aw Na thupha ko aa ding kicing hi
Innkuan sung, Nang Nong om ciang nuam semsem
Sian aw na vaang in, innkuan sung hong nuamsak ee
Innkuan sung, itna damtui hong luang

verse1:
Topa in kei hong cing tuucing lianpa hi
Ka nun' sung bang mah ka kisam kei ding hi
Lo nona mun tuikiang ah kei hong kha hi
Ka nuntakna tha hong dimsak tawntung hi
verse2:
Sihna lim guam sung nangawn ka nawk hangin
Hong cing ahih man siatna ka laukei hi
A molhtum leh a ciangkhut in kei aa hi
A tawntung in ka lung muanna a hihi
verse3:
Ka galte omna mai ah kei aa dingin
Sabuai phah in an hong lui in hong vak hi
Keima lu zong sathau hong nilhsak den aa
Ama kiang ah bang ka ngen lai khong ding hiam?
chorus:
Hoihna leh hehpihna in ka khansung
A tawntung in hong zui taktak ding aa
A nuam a taang Topa innpha sung ah
A mah tawh ka om den ding

verse1:
Toupa Pathian aw na hoihna ka mu
Vualzawlna lampite ah na hon pi
Lametna khen gam ah na hon pi lai
Manpha in thupi lua
verse2:
Ahun ahun in Na hoihna ka mu
Koi a kipan a hong pai ahi hiam
Zion apan in aw Na panpihna
Hong tung ahi zaw hi
verse3:
Na simthuphate Na hon musak a
Manpha hi na e, thupi hi na e
Mimawl a ding in pilna ahi a
Hon tawisangtu ahi
verse4:
Na hon khotuahdan thupi hi na e
Loubang na khualna kan in a sang ngei
Gamkeu leh haksatna ah hilou in
Vualzawlna ah N’on pi
chorus:
Non vualzawlna simseng ahi lou
Na hon pidan suut seng ahi lou;
Kei leh ka innkuan bang hiam ka hih uh
Hiai tantan a Na hon pi

verse1:
I Toupa hon itna lian hi na lawmlawm
Hoihna khat zong neilou i hih lai in
Itna sisan hong luang in A hon tanta
A ta’n hon bawl lamdang e A hon itna
verse2:
Eimah utdan a om in i leeng zel a
Amah i heisan lai a hon it pa
Lam pialsan a i om zong hon it lailai
Toupa it bang’ itna dang a omlou e
verse3:
Mihingte it vang in aw a hong thuak a
I mawhna liam mate a damsakta
Aw miteng dia hinna lui a hong luanna
A dawnte di’n damna lui a hong hita
chorus:
Tua sisan hi, ka lungnop a kimna
Tua sisan ahi ka kisaktheihna pen
Kalvary kros a sisan hong luang khia
Kei a di’n aw ka damna tua sisan hi

verse1:
Ke’n hoihna khat zong ka neilou
Jesu Khrist hoihna koppih in
Amah vang a dik a sim in ka om lel hi
Aw tu in zong hoihna ka neilou
Ka hihna zaw mikhial lel ka hi
Khrist vang a siangthou/nKhrist vang a hoih ka hi lel hi
verse2:
Kei mahmah ka ki-et chiang in
Sianthouna hoihna ka neilou
Hizong Aman siangthou in a hon pomta hi
Amah nnate ka sem theita an
A paina ah ka pai theita hi
Khrist vak a nungta’n
Amah bang in a hon bawlta
chorus:
Khrist hoihna kei a ahita
A sianthouna kei a ahita
A hihna a hon neisak a, A hon pomta
Tu’n ah lau ding ka nei nawnlou
A huang ah muang in ka om
Khrist hoihna leh sianthouna kei a ahita

verse1:
Khovel a ka leen sung in
Ka hin dan ding hong hilh in
Hiai khovel ka inn a hihlouh dan
Ka mun ding Na kiang hizaw
Ka inn ding Na kiang hizaw
Kipak a kong tun theihna di’n
verse2:
Khovel a ka leen sung in
Toupa aw kei hong hilh in
Ka deihtelnate Na deih hi di’n
Na paina ka pai theih a
Na khawlna a khawl thei di’n
Ka lutang Nanglam hei in aw
verse3:
Khovel a ka leen sung in
Kei tunga a hong tungte
Nang a pan Na sawl hi zeel hen aw
Nopnate ka tuah ni in
Dahnate ka tuah ni in
Ka khitui Nang hon sawl hi hen
chorus:
Hon theisak in aw Toupa
Khovel ka leen sung in
Na deih leh Na lunggelna
Nisim in kei hong hilh in
Ka nunna leh kalsuante
Toupa aw kei hong pi in aw

verse1:
Toupa na tate lai ah kawlni suak sim in
Huhamna leh siatna in ka gam uh a luah zou
Ki-itte kilaizomte dougal a suak zouta
Ki-itna’n mun a nei nawnta lou
verse2:
Khelh vang in aw sen momnou sanggah a tam ngei
A it huai a naupangte nangawn in zong a thuak
A poi in a mulkim huai tulai i nuntakna
I Toupa a melsiatna ahi
verse3:
Zuang hong thou un tun leh zua, chin leh tuaite aw
Kisathei in om kei ni kingaihniam a hunta
Kisik a i sulhei leh ngaihdamna i tang ding
A liam ma’n i zuan meng ding uhi
chorus:
I thou ding aw i zuan ding
Toupa i zuan ding uh
I gam zong Toupa’n a hon it lai
Bang hang a i Toupa mel liahtu i hih lailai
Kisik in Toupa i zuan ding uh

verse1:
Toupa a omte ding in bangkim a hauhna hi
Itna ah zong itna lian semsem
Zawnna ah zong hauhna thupipen
Toupa a neite a di’n
verse2:
Lemna leh muanna gam zaw Toupa a neite hi
Huatna leh kidanna om ngeilou
Ei a di’n i gam a di’n damna
Toupa a hong om chiang in
verse3:
Sum leh pai hauhna, pilna, siamna leh sannate
Manna ding omlou Na omlouh leh
Hinna khempeuh sang Na manpha zaw
Toupa Na om leh nuam hi
chorus:
Nang Na omna nuam
Nang Na omna a nuam hi
Toupa aw ka siang uah hong om in
Nang toh tonin pai leng
Bangkim a muanna
Toupa Na omna nuam hi

verse1:
Nunlui liamsa ka gel zel a
Ka phawkkik zel tualniam ka hinkhua
Ka phu lel in hon pi le cin
Ka tang zou diam ka tu din mun
verse2:
Van daitui in Na hon luan a
Ka nna ah lei vualzawlna n’on pia
Ka neih haichi tangkhat lel zong
A leh za in Na pung sakta
verse3:
Na hon pidan a lamdang ngei
Ka hihna bangmah ahi lou zong
Mi a simtaak hilou mah leng
Na hon pilut mihing lai ah
verse4:
Leivui pan in Na hon pikhia
Na pal zou in a sangzaw sem ah
Sim zohlouh vualzawlna mu dia
Na hon pi zaw a lamdang lua.
chorus:
Kipahna genseng louh ka nei Toupa
Na vualzawlna ka tan vang in aw
A omlai ding ka kipahnaKa tan lai ding vualzawlna omte ah

verse1:
Toupa aw kei hon len in
Simlei a ka zin lai in
Kei kia in ka pai siam lou
Ka zinna a haksa in
Lamhaih in gammang zel ing
Na lam vak hon musak in hon zui ning maw
verse2:
Buaina tui kihawt kal a
Lauhna te’n kei hon tuam a
Lung muanna hon neisak aw
Muanhuaipa a kip tawntung
Nang na hi Nang kia na hi
Toupa aw Na ban in hon lenden in aw
verse3:
Galkhat lam ka hong kai ma’n
Tua mual siangthou kong tun ma’n
Lampiallou di’n hon len in
Nisim in ka nuntakna
Hong siamthak hong hatsak in
Na angsung ka tun ma teng hon pi in aw
chorus:
Na lam vak ah ka pai theihna di’n
Ka lampi ah Na vak hong taan in
Mittaw bang khua mulou a
Zanmial bang ka pai lai in
Hon len in ka puklouhna’n hon len in aw

verse1:
Toupa Na kiang ah ka muangta ding
Dahna lungkhamna kilel lou ding
Na siang nuam a ka len chiang’
Damsung khosak buaina haksatna
Leigim haksatna ka thuakte uh
Tua mun nuam ah om nawn lou
verse2:
Hun in lenmual khum a liamzel in
Ka lei nunnate a liampih a
Theihlouh kal in a bei zel
Simlei nunnopna ka zonte uh
Tangtawn lungnopna a ching zou lou
Na siang kia ah bukim hi
verse3:
Vang nei kisa’ng e ka ngaihsut chiang’n
Nunnuam kisa’ng e ka lunggel chiang’n
Hon neisakta ka Toupa’n
Leitung buainate’n a sukkhak louh
Tawntung lungnopna’n a luahna gam
Ka Toupa vang ka neita
chorus:
Tul ngeilou ding kipahna
Tul ngeilou ding nunnopna
Sisan a Na gam chiam
Tua mun ah ka len hun chiang’n
Tul ngeilou in ka leng ding

verse1:
Tou Jesu ka neih man in
Bang dang thupi omta lou
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
Siamna saanna hauhnate
Bangmah neilou ka hi zong
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
verse2:
Taaksap hunte hong tung a
Lametna a bei zong in
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
Theipi kung pallun lou in
Huang ah ganta bei zong in
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
verse3:
Zaitha hatna hong bei in
Pallaini hong vul zong in
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
Teek leh vuai hun hong tung a
Tung sunni a kaaita zong
Tou Jesu neih, kei a di’n a hun hi
chorus:
Tou Jesu neih
Kei a di’n bang teng sang in a manpha
Tou Jesu neih ka hauhna pen ahi
Hiai khovel in
Mihai banglel in hon simta leh zong
Tou Jesu neih kei a di’n a hun hi

verse1:
Lungkhamna te’n a hon tuam chiang’n
Kipahnate a hong bei chiang’n
Ka zuih siam hilou tuanglam ka zuih lai in
Ka Toupa in a hon sinsak hi zaw
verse2:
Kaan zohlouh a ka ngaihsutte
Pal zohlouh a ka ngaihsutte
A muanhuainate ka muhna ding hi zaw
Amah a di’n a haksa omlou e
verse3:
Vuui takmai a ka om in zaw
Aw a pialpak a lang theilou
Tua in aw ka lametna a bahsak a
Hizong Aman a pialpak hon musak
verse4:
Koi munpeuh ah ka om zong in
Hon pina khut a muanhuai hi
Keimah hatna zaw muan ding a omlou e
Amah hatna a muanhuaipen hi zaw
chorus:
Hon pinate ka gel chiang in
Keimah lemgel in theihsiam a haksa ngei
Hizong kei a di’n A vualzawlna leh
Amah muan ding hon sinsak ahi zaw

verse1:
Van aksi leh thilsiamte khempeuh
Tuipite leh taangte kilawm
A hoihnate suiseng hilou
Tuate sang in Tou Jesu hoihzaw
verse2:
Hauhna hoih in, siamna zong hoih hi
Nuntakna ding i geelte zong
Inn leh lou leh neih leh lam zong
Tuate sang in Tou Jesu hoihzaw
verse3:
Kisaktheihna Jesu ah ka nei
Manphatnate neita kei leng
Ka bangkim hi ka Tou Jesu
Khovel sang in Tou Jesu hoih zaw
chorus:
Aw kilawm na e, ka Tou Jesu
Aw a manphatdan, suiseng hilou
Aw a thilsiam khempeuhte sang
Jesu hoihzaw hi aw tua te sang in

verse1:
Aw hon ngai ung khuva bang nem
Van Laukha Siangthou hon ngai ung
Nang tellou in kal suandan ka theisiam kei uh
Hon phel inla, hon velchian in
Ka sung ua mawhna om khempeuh
Hong halsiang in hon bawlpha in
Laukha Siang aw
verse2:
Toupa Na Laukha vang in aw
Kipahna lui hong luanglet in
Hon dimsak in hon tuisak in Laukha Siang aw
Si napi a lungmuang laite
Hing minpu a lungmuang laite
Na hotdamna Na lungmuanna; Ka ngai uh e
verse3:
Huan Tu bang in hon ching inla
Lamhaih lammangte pikik in
Khelhna zanmial nuai a omte hon tanvak in
Lungsik simthu lel nuamlou a
Lungtang khauh a zatam omte
A neemsak thei Laukha Siangthou; Nang kia Na hi
chorus:
Aw hon ngai ung Laukha Siangthou
Koute sung ah hon sem inla
Vualzawlna vuah koute a di’n hon zu sak aw
Aw! khatvei beek hon veh lai in
Bah leh nguite hon phawnghalh di’n
Halhna meikuang Laukha Siangthou
Hon ngai ung e

verse1:
Hatlou mi ka hi zong, hat theihna thugukte
Toupa in kei a ding in a nei
Khovel in a teel louh, khovel in a deih louh
Toupa in Amah ding in a teel
verse2:
Lelliangte na it a, gentheite na huai a
Leitung mi’n a phawk zohlouhte zong
Toupa aw na thei a, Itna in na pi zel
Gentheihna pan in nunnopna ah
verse3:
Lamet bei a lungngai, mipoite na thei a
Piangsualte bukimloute na ngawn
Khovel hoihna mulou, mitdelte na thei a
Nang a di’n na teelta lamdang e
verse4:
A chinglou a om lou, a siamlou a omlou
Mi khempeuh i Toupa mai ah zaw
Leitung mi a ding a simmoh huai a neute
Silpak bang a lun Toupa a di’n
chorus:
Aw a lamdang e, Aw a thupi e
Na itna aw na hehpihna
Mimawlte nangawn zong aw na teel lawmlawm
Lamdang in aw a thupi e
(Aw a lamdang e, Aw a hon teelna)
(Kipak in nuamna la sa ni)
(Khovel in a phawklouh mi i hi zong in)
(A hon teelna a lamdang e)

verse1:
Nang toh lou in hiai nuai simlei
Thawmhauna lungngaihna hi
Kei kia in machiang suan in ka pai zou lou
Tua bang hi zong Toupa ngaih aw
Na khut in kei hon len den a
No'ng ompih chiang'n nuamna bukim a om zel
verse2:
Nang toh lou in ka machiang ah
Lummei bang a zing den a
Nang toh lou in lametnate a bei zel a
Nang toh lou in lei pallun zong
Bangmahlou bang lel ahi a
Lungngaihna leh mangbatna lel ahi zaw
verse3:
Nang toh lou in simlei lungkham
Thuakzoh ding ahilou hi
Nang toh lou in simlei nunna a mial na e
Liamsa ngai ung, lungzuan sial ung
Duangvul in ka om zel uh a
Nang toh lou in ngaihtam sialna lel ahi
chorus:
Nang toh lou in Toupa aw
Nuamna kiching a om thei lou
Nang toh lou in lungmuanna a om lou e
Hon tonpih in hon len in
Simlei ka zin sung in ah
Nang toh lou in nuamna bukim a om lou

verse1:
Hinna hong pia ka Toupa hong it ing
Mangthang lungngai ka vaihlai in
Lunglai gil a khamuanna N'ong pia a
Muanna tuibang Na hong luanna
verse2:
Suan ding om lou ka hoihna zong om lou
Nang toh om di'n ka ching zou lou
Hizong Toupa Na itna aw neem toh
Kong it chi in Na hong samlai
verse3:
Keimah lampi ka zuih khempeuhte leh
Ka lunggel leh ka ngaihtuahna
Toupa nang di'n a ching zou ding om lou
Hizong kong it ka ta N'ong chi
chorus:
Hinna hong pia ka Toupa aw
Nanglou muanna ding ka nei ngei diam?
Lungngai huibang ka mauna simlei ah
Nang toh om le'ng ka lung nuam hi

verse1:
Toupa Na siamsa lei mihingte
Nopna zong in nisim in buai ung
Simlei thupinate'n a hon pi zel
Nang hon ngilh ung Toupa na tate'n
Huaihamna sung a kibualta in
Duhamnate'n aw a hon zouta
verse2:
Itna a kiam nisim a kiam zel
Lainatna zong tuibang in kiam a
Hehpihna luipite a kang zouta
Nang toh nunnuam kholhkhawmna munte
Gitlouhnate'n aw! a luah zouta
Hon pikik nawn in Na huangsung ah
verse3:
Toupa aw tuni in ka hon ngen
Koute a di'n aw! Na zahngaihna
Hon pia aw Toupa ka hon ngen hi
Nang hehpih thei Pathian Na hi a
Itna aw neem in ka lungsung uah
Hon sam lai inla, Nang a ding in
chorus:
Aw Na mite Nanglam a hei di'n
Toupa Na tate hon huai nawn in
Lambang haih ung Toupa Na huangsung pan
Aw ka Pathian hon nuselou aw
Hehpihna in aw! Hon enlai in
Na Kha Siang in Toupa hon huai nawn in

verse1:
Tuan a simthu sut le'ng maw
Tual i niam simthu
Theihphak louh selungmawlte i hi
Tung Pathian itna vang in
Ei di'n khua a hong vak
Tu'n A tate hi hang e
verse2:
Itna thu sang kei le'ng maw
Bang i suak ding hiam?
Toupa itna lian in sang na e
Zu leh va bang gammual a vakvai a i om lai
Itna in hon zongkheta
verse3:
Itna vang siamnate leh sannate nei hang
Tua khempeuh i Toupa vang ahi
Lamdang in thupi na e
Loubang A hon khualna
Toupa ei di'n hoihna e
chorus:
Phatna zaila lawm ging
A kilawm semgua toh
Vanglian Toupa minphat in
Tuan a selungmawlte tu'n A hon domsangta
Toupa ei di'n hoih na e

verse1:
Lunglai ah aw ka gel chiang in
Aw a na i gam simthu
Toupa mel loubang a tul zouta
Aw lung in i gel ngam hiam?
verse2:
Simlei muanna ka zong zel ua
Muanna ding a omlou e
Taikhua val dong a ka sial lai un
Sial zatam tuibang kang zel
verse3:
Aw! Na mite na hon vel chia'n
Lung na awi na hiam Toupa
Itna leh lainatna bei zouta
Toupa aw hon ngaidam in
verse4:
U leh naute kingaihsun ni
Lung i gel a hunta hi
Ngaihdamna ei a ahih lai in
Toupa kiang i zuan ding uh
chorus:
Toupa aw hong leng in
Ka gam uah Nang vaihawm in
