Toupa aw hon ngai ung
Nang lou in zaw muanna
Aw! A om ngeilou

verse1:
Sakmin ngaih a hawmsiampen vanglian tung Pathian
Simleitung leh thangvan ah min ngaihpen Na hi
Kouta dia a hoih tawntung limbelh tung Pathian
Min ngaihpen a Vanglian Nang Na hi
verse2:
Damloute, misite zong damsak thei Na hi
Guhkeute a dia hinna pia thei Pa Na hi
Thil bangkim Na bawlthei a, bangkim Nang Na hi
Thupipen a Vanglian hong phat ung
verse3:
Na hoihna a hong lang zel na mite a di'n
Nisim a ka taksap uh hong pia zel Pathian
Khattang hon nusia ngei lou hon ompih Na hi
Nang it bang a hon it om lou e
chorus:
Min ngaihpen a vanglianpen Toupa hong phat ung
Koute dia ka Pathian uh, thupipen Na hi
Khang suangpi a bei ngei lou Toupa Nang na hi
Sutseng louh Na min ngaih hi na e

verse1:
Simlei ah zaw khualtaam lel ka hi a
Kisapna ngen hi bukimna omlou
Lungsiknate leh lungngaihnate in
Ka lampi a ding in ling bang a hon sun
verse2:
Simlei ah gou manphate neilou in
Vualleltak in simlei ah leng zong leng
Thangvan ka tun chiang'n ka gou manpha leh
Vualzohna in tua ah kei hon na ngak hi
verse3:
Khatvei leh lungkiatnate'n a hon tuam
Ka hinna zong bah in a ngui sak zel
Tuni'n ka nuam zong zingchiang ka dahna
Lungnop kisinna kia'n sunni ka tum zel
chorus:
Inn ka tun chiang'n van inn nuam ka tun chiang'n
Leitung lungkhamnate a beita ding
Gimtak leh bahtak a ka puak van gikte
Ka pa inn ka tun chiang in a beita ding

verse1:
Aw i gam gingtu hinkhua
Siatnate'n zing daibang in a nawk
Tangthupha in a luahna gam
Sualnate in aw a dim zouta
verse2:
Tuun leh zua a mangthang uh
Chiin leh tuaite zong a mangthang uh
Mualkimnhuai siatnate sung ah
Aw setan sal in a taang uh e
verse3:
Lungmuang in i omlai maw?
Don lou in hun sawt i omta ngei
Kua a hiam itna khitui toh
Aw amaute ding a thu ngen ding?
chorus:
Thou inla na Pathian sam in
Aw i gam mangthang ding hilou maw?
I khelhnate thupha tawi in
Aman hon ngaidam lai ding ahi

verse1:
Toupa Pathian ka Lalpen aw malai pan hon pipa
Bangmahlou pan nong laamtou a
Hiai tan dong a n'on pi
Khatvei leh aw Na hon pidan
Theisiamlou hizong leng
Na hoihnate kei a ding in puanbang Na hon kop lai
verse2:
Khat veivei leh haksatnate'n hon buaisak thei zel a
Khat veivei leh lam haksa ah bah in ka pai zong a
Na khut hat in Na hon pi a taamsawl lou in non pi
Hiai tan melmu a ka om zaw Na hoihna vang hi e
verse3:
Bangmahlou hi'ng na hon thei a leivui banglel ka hi
Hizong Toupa na hon phawk a
Tua kia zong hunlua e
Hizong vualzawhna non pia lai kei di'n a thupi ngei
Na hon khotuahna lianlua e simthu'n a lel zoulou
chorus:
Na hon pidan ka ngaihtuah in
Thupi hi na tel e
Na hoihnate ka gelgel chia'n
Gel in a chian zoulou
Bang ka hi hiam a lamdang ngei
Hiai tan dong a n'on pi
Ka kipak e ka Pathian aw Na hon pina vang in

verse1:
Simlei mite'n a theihlou
Na Kros mitsua'n ka len ding
Thuakna leh gensiatna kal ah hizong leh
Na Kros tawpsan thei hi ke'ng
Na Kros taisan thei hi ke'ng
Ka zui ding ka zui zel ding kha pham dong in
verse2:
Ka mawhna teng Na pua a
Ka khelhna teng Na pua a
Kei a ding in Kros tung ah Na hong thuakta
A hatloupen ka hizong
A chingloupen ka hizong
Ka hatna ka chitna thusim na Kros hi
verse3:
Tu in aw ken theichian ta'ng
Simlei a ding hinawn keng
Toupa a ding in ka bangkim ka piata
Ka hatna zong kilhbelh ing
Ka utna zong kilhbelh ing
Ka Toupa Kros tung ah bangkim ka ngata
chorus:
Na Kros kia ka len ding a
Na Kros kia ka zui ding hi
Kei a di'n Kros tung ah simlei kizouta
Simlei a ka hi nawnlou
Kei aw Kros di'n ka nungta
Ka lampi ka zuihpen zaw tua Kros ahi

verse1:
Hun hiai tan hon pi Toupa Na hoih hi
Ka sapna teng a hon huhpha Na hi
Nong kem nong huai a, lam nong pi den a
Na hoihna kei di'n thupi na e
verse2:
Nisim hunsim in Na hoihna ka mu
Kei hoihna in a loh zou ding a hiam?
Na hoihna kiamlou, Na itna kiamlou
Tuni dong in kanglou lai ahi
verse3:
Khatvei leh hun haksa kal ah leng in
Lungkia in lungkham in ka om zong a
Na khut muanhuai in hon nusia lou a
Tua hang hi e bahlou a ka pai
chorus:
Tuchiang dong hon pi, tuchiang dong hon kem
Na honpi dante lamdang hi na e
Lam suk lam tou ah hun haksa kal ah
Toupa hoih aw hon pipa Na hi

verse1:
Nuntakna lampi lummei hong zing maw?
Hon taisan hilou i Toupa in
Huihpi hong nung in khua a hong mial zong
Toupa khut muanhuai na kiang om hi
verse2:
Mailam nuntakna lau in na om maw?
Na nuntakna zong na chimtak maw?
En in Toupa khut nang tung ah om hi
Hong huh di'n mansa'n a om gige
verse3:
Na lametna in hon beisan zong in
Bangkim bawltheipa a omlai hi
Lungkhamna guamkhuk mial ah na pai maw?
Tua ah zong Toupa na kiang om hi
verse4:
Na vai khempeuh zong Toupa tung nga in
Aman hon pi ding na muan peuh leh
Nuntak na haksa bangteng hong tung zong
Toupa nang ding in a muanhuai hi
chorus:
Lung lau ke'n Toupa'n na kiang hon ompih hi
Khattang kisa ke'n Aman hon thei gige
Thawmhau ke'n Toupa'n nang hon ompih hi
Aman na lampi a hon pi ding

verse1:
Lei leh van bawl pa vanglian tung Pathian
Na kilawm hi pahtawina tang di'n
Na pilna sang e, Na lunggel sang e
Na siamsate'n sut zoulou
verse2:
Koute hon it pa, koute hon huai pa
Nong itna lian hi, kan in sang e
Bangmahloute zong nong kem nong huai a
Nong lamtou eklei pan in
verse3:
Ka dahna uh thei, ka lungkham uh thei
Ka mangbatna uh thei pa Na hi
China damsak chia, misi hingsak chia
Thuneihna teng Nang a hi
chorus:
Minthannate leh, vangletna khempeuh
Tangtawn tangtawn Nang a hi
Nang bang vanglian pen
Nang bang thupipen
Lei leh thangvan ah omlou

verse1:
Tangthupha vang in i semgim in i tawl hiam aw
Aw A gam vang in i genthei maw?
Tua i thuaknate i tunung a i tan ding toh
Phulou in simtham a hilou hi
verse2:
Aw! I ginnate a bah in tawl in a om maw?
Lunglel a om in a nguigawp maw?
Muhtheih enlou in i pai ding hi i ginna toh
Van a thil omte i mitsuan ding
verse3:
Gimna tampite i thuak in vangam i lut ding
Tun ah gimthuak huibang i mau lel
Aw i ngaklah ngei Pathian tate thupi hun ding
Van a aksi bang i zem hun ding
chorus:
Simlei ah gentheihnate thuak in i mau zong a
Aw A gam vang in i lelliang in bnangteng i taan zong
Thupi a vanglian i Toupa bang a i om chiang'n
Gimna i thuakte tung ah zohna la sa in
Denchiang i leng ding

verse1:
Innkuan kituaklou, innkuan kilemlou'n
Innsung gawtmun a tang sak
Innkuan zatamte siat vang a vul in
Lungngaihna in a dimta
verse2:
Nute kingaihtuah'n innkuan a ding in
Vontawite dia kipia di'n
Pate kingaihtuah'n Pathian thu bang a
Innkuan pitu hi ding in
verse3:
Toupa na Lalgam innkuan ah tung in
Nang thuneihna hita hen
Setan thuneihna vang a kisiate
Nang in hon bawlpha kik in
chorus:
Innkuan a dam na'n, innsung a dam na'n
Van Laukha kia i ngai uh
Innkuan ah Pathian in vai a hawm leh
Tua kia i damna ding hi

verse1:
Toupa hoihna ngaihsun ni
Hehpihna a thawn in pia
A hon teel a Amah di'n hon bawlta
Zahngaihna a hon pia zou
verse2:
A hauhna thupi na e
A pihna a thuklua hi
A lunggelna a theizou omlou a
Tangtawn in a thupi hi
verse3:
Lei nunziate taisan hi
A deihlam i theihna di'n
I lungsim uh kibawlthakna om in
Lamdanna i nei ding uh
verse4:
Sianthouna toh nungta ni
Toupa di'n i kipia ding
I pumpi zong Amah tenna hi a
Bawlsia in susia kei ni
chorus:
A hing biakna i pia ding uh
A zahngaihna ngaihsun in
A lungtaina'n i pumpi i piak chiang
Khalam biakna ahi ding

verse1:
I mawhnate’n eite hon dou gige a
Aman eilam hon en nuamlou hi
Toupa a di’n kihhuaipen i hi zong a
Aman eite a hon it lailai hi
verse2:
Amah a di’n mawhna lianlua omlou hi
I mawhnate bangzah in lian zong
Ngaihdam zohlouh a nei lou, A sisan in
A saang khempeuh a di’n damna ahi
verse3:
Khrist a-nei mi’n siamlouh tanna nei nawnlou
Aman mawhna khempeuh ngilh zouta
A siangthou in hon sim a, siangthou hi hang
Aman mawhna khempeuh a paaimang zou
chorus:
Aw! itna thuukpen, Aw! itna sangpen
Kalvari a itna hong luang khia
I mawhna khempeuhte dikna toh hon kheek in
A siangthou in eite a hon bawl zou

verse1:
Ngabang ka bual hiai simlei ah
Luankhi ka nul huibang ka mau
Thangvan khopi aw ka tun hun in
Lei gimnate a beita ding
verse2:
Tua gam khopi suangmanpha gam
Lei a pan in ngai in ka mau
Ginna’n ka don aw ngaihlai a na
Belamnou in a taanna mun
verse3:
Ka Toupa mel ka muh hun in
A khut a pawn ka lenta ding
Lei a ka tuahte ka hilhta dia
Ka mit khitui a beita ding
chorus:
Aw ngai na’ng e Thangvan khopi
Lungngaihnate omlouhna mun
Nunnuam tak a ka lenna ding
Ka pa gamnuam ka ngai na e

verse1:
Toupa Na hon itna lamdang ka gen zoulou
Kei bang leltak na hon itna a thupi e
Na mai ah suan ding ka neilou
Belpuan bang lel ka na hi e
Hizong Toupa na hon itna hong luang
verse2:
Na thupina nusia in lei ah nong tualkum
Lei ah vai in mikhialte di’n Na hong thuak a
Simmawhna leh bawlsiatnate
Gentheihna teng Na hong thuak maw
Aw ka Toupa na itna vang hi e
verse3:
Na hon it bang itna lamdang a om ngeilou
Man ngen lou in itna nong pia a thupi lua
Lei sang tampi nei hileng zong
Nang phatna di’n a tam lou lai
Aw a gen in genseng ding hilou hi
chorus:
Na hon itna a thupi ngei
Kei mikhial di’n tulsing lel a Na hong thuakna
Hiai bang lawmlawm itna lamdang
Ka gen zoulou ka sut zoulou
Aw kei a di’n damna bukim ahi

verse1:
Zaitha hatna bangmah ka neilou a
Theihna leh kichinna bangmah nei keng
Selung pilna masuan ding neilou pi
Na nasem ding in bang ka hi hiam Toupa
verse2:
Sianmang sung ah a piang theilou omlou
Zaitha hatna neiloute’n hatna nei
Khattang muan ding omlou ahih lai in
Tung Sianmang zaitha ka hatna hong hita
verse3:
Keimah hatna suang a ka pai in zaw
Lunglauna ding lungngaihna ding a tam
Tunglam en a Sianmang ka mitsuan chiang
Tung muvanlai bang zaitha hatna ka nei
chorus:
K’on ompih ding banzal ka hon len ding
Lunglau lou aw nang di’n Toupa ka hi
Nangmah hatna hilou Kei hatna in
Hon nusia kei ning nang toh ka omkhawm ding

verse1:
Pakpalh zu bang ka khumlou zong
Khuai bang in ka paal hong veh in
Ka nunna thelnah bang keu zong leh
Toupa aw hong paampaih kei in
verse2:
Lengthe bang zai ka siamlou zong’n
Ka sak zailate hong ngai aw
Pilna siamna ka neihlouh hang in
Ka nunna sennau bang pom in
verse3:
Tantawk ah hong lungkim pih in
Toupa nang di’n kizang nuam ing
Septheih bang ka sep ding hon nial ken
Nang di’n liimsing bang hi nuam ing
chorus:
Aw ka nunna tualniam zong leh
Toupa nang ding in hon zang in
Etlawm pak bang ka hihlouh hang’n
Ka nunna Nang di’n zang in aw

verse1:
Toupa ka hong kipia Nang a ding in
Na khut sung ah ka om hon zang in aw
Ka siamna omlou zong ka pilna om lou zong
Ka nunna tualniam zong hong sang in aw
verse2:
Kimanna ding om lou ka hizong in
Hoih ding na chihna peuh ah hong koih in
Bellei a seekpa in a deihbang a bawl bang
Kei zong hong bawl in aw Na deih bang in
verse3:
Mihing in a et bang hon en lou aw
Mihing in a teel bang hon teel lou aw
Nang in a hat loute nangawn Na teel zaw a
A hatlou keimah zong hong sang in aw
chorus:
Hong sang in ka nunna Toupa aw
Na min thupina di’n hon zang in
Ka hihna bangbang in nang in hon pom inla
Na deihna mun peuh ah hon zang in aw

verse1:
Nang bang kua dang omlou hi
Simlei leh thangvan ah zong
Thupina Vaihawmna khempeuh
Tangtawn in Nang a ahi
verse2:
Nang bang kua dang omlou hi
Sangpen, lianpen, thupipen
Nang bang minngaih dang omlou hi
Minthanna teng Nang a hi
chorus:
Hong bia ung, Hong pahtawi ung
A siangthou Vanglian Toupa aw
Sangpen Pa aw! Hong liansak ung
Aw! Nang bang kua dang omlou hi
Aw! Nang bang kua dang omlou hi
bridge:
Na thilbawlzia lamdang hi
Na pilna sui vual hilou
Na Thupina a phuang uh
Na khutsuakte’n
Toupa aw, Nang bang kua dang omlou

verse1:
Toupa ka Pathian uh vualzawlna bukim aw
Nang a kipan hong luangkhia
Thupi hina tel e, manpha hina tel e
Dimlet in a hong luangkhia
verse2:
Nite leh kumte ah Na hoihna hong thak zel
Vualzawlna thak hon puak zel
Simthu’n kigenseng lou, lei in kilel zoulou
Sim zoh louh Na hoihna hi
verse3:
Lou nouna munte ah, tuidam a luanna ah
Koute Na hon pi zel ah
Taksapna hunte leh thawmhauna munte ah
Khamuanna Na hon pia zel
chorus:
Vualzawltu Toupa aw
Sangpen Pathian hoih aw
Na min ka hon pahtawi uh
Vualzawlna tuinak aw
Kou di’n Na hong luangkhia
Thupi hinatel e aw

verse1:
Pasian Kumpigam zaw nek leh dawn hilou
Silh leh ten leh neih leh lam hilou
Hauhna thu hilou, zawnna thu hilou
Khasiangthou-a diktatna hizaw
verse2:
Pasian in a hon sam, aw ei gingtute
Lemna leh lainatna nei ding in
Tua pen i Pasian, lungtaina ahi
Leimi di’n a lungdamhuai hiveh
verse3:
A simthu i thei in, A zaila thei hang
A khekhap zui ding i tawm ngei e
Sianthouna nei in, diktatna nei in
Amah bang i khangtou ding uhi
chorus:
Aw! Na Kumpigam ka lak uah hong tung hen
Michih ah Na Kumpigam tung hen
Innkuan khempeuh ah, gamsung khempeuh ah
Aw! Na gam ka lak uah hong tung hen

verse1:
Huihkhi hong lang simlei tung ah bang huihkhi hiam aw
Na gim nam e buaina lungngaihna
Hizong Toupa’n kei hong ompih bang di’n ka lau dia
Buaina lel in khapham leng zong Toupa’n hong pi ding
verse2:
Na gam tulsing a hiang zau e luankhi a tuang lou
Gahthei bang nun vabang tuang nuam ing
Muikhua zin a lung zuan zaikhia maimit sing omlou
Zaideih khia in zamluang tum in zaila’n hong phat ning
verse3:
Zilza Na gam pakbang etlawm bahkhi bang vel ning
Zingzin simlei nunna ka zoh chiang’n
Nunna siktui damdiai in luang vaibang ka tham ding
Khensa zatam umbang kholh di’n mel kimukik ding
chorus:
Hong zoulou ding hong mulou ding simlei huihkhi in
Simlei gimnamte hong bei hun chiang’n
Sian anglai ah lungmuang den in naubang kahnate
Melmu lou ding kei hong it Pa kiang
Simlei ngilh in buaina ngilh in sawlbang hei den ding
Ka ngaih belh ding Toupa Na gam nuam lou dang omlou

verse1:
Aw ka Bible ka lampi ahi
Kei a dia ka ki-etna
Nisim in ka vak ahi
Tung Pathian aw ka zakna mun
Khuaizu bang mai a a khum pen zaw
Aw! ka Bible, Aw! ka Bible ahi
verse2:
Leitung mite’n a simmoh zong in
Lei mite’n a do zong in
Kei a di’n ka Bible hi
Liansem ding aw a liansem ding
Bei ngeilou in aw a liansem ding
Aw! ka Bible, Aw! ka Bible ahi
verse3:
Hinna laibu a Siangthou pen hi
Nuntakna bukim ahi
Sa leh kha a din damna
Mi zata dia kicing nunna
A umte ding a kicing damna
Aw! ka Bible, Aw! ka Bible ahi
chorus:
Aw ka Bible ka hinna leh
Ka sianthona lampi hi
Bangkim a ka bangkim leh ka kingakna
Tung Pathian kilakna bukim
Kidang ngeilou, kikhel ngeilou
Aw! ka Bible, Aw! ka Bible ahi

verse1:
Bangmahlou pi ka hi zong in
Ka phulou dong a hon pi Toupa aw
Nang vang in maw ka tansate
Thupi in aw a lamdang hi na e
Ka tan ding a kilawmlou pi
Kei a ding in ka mai ah nong lui a
A hong lamsang ka Toupa nang na hi
verse2:
Ankam tang chia ka hi lel hi
Ka theihna leh ka pilna omlou e
Tangtel bang lel ka nuntakna
Hizah dong a Na tonpihna ka tan
Na hoihna lian na lawmlawm e
Ka sim in zong ka sim zohlouh ahi
Ka Toupa aw na min ka hong phat hi
verse3:
Nong tonpihna kichiangtan lou
Kei a ding in a kiching hi na e
A hoihzawte a sangzawte
A nei lailai ka Toupa Nang Na hi
Nong piak lai ding ka san lai ding
Na Thuphate ka lungdamna hi lai
Aw tuate zong kei a hisak lai aw
chorus:
Na hon pina kei din a thupi e
Na hon pidan kei din a lamdang e
Bang ka hi hiam hizahta a
Ka nuntakna Na hon pi Toupa aw
Aw lamdang e! aw lungdam hi na’ng e

verse1:
Ka Kumpipa, ka Tou Jesu na min alian pen e
Phat ding kilawm Biak ding kilawm na hi
Vangletnate, ukzohnate tangtawn Nang a ahi
Phat ding kilawm phattak Pathian na hi
verse2:
Nang hong bia ung, Na mai kun ung
Thupina hong pia ung
Khua vannuai ah na min ngaih hi Na e
Na itna sang, na itna lian, ahoih Pathian na hi
Atawntung in Na min ka hong phat uh
verse3:
Ka kilawmna ka sianthouna, Na sisan pha ahi
Ka siamtanna, ka mohmaina Na hi
Nang hong zuan ung
Na khebul ah zahtakna sang pen toh
Nang kia bia in Na min ngaih hong phat ung
chorus:
Aw Jesu na min hong liansak ung
Aw Jesu na min hong tawisang ung
Kumpite’ Kumpi na hi
Lei khempeuh phat ding kilawm
Aw Jesu na min lian hi

verse1:
Tang nisa vang nuntakna vulsa
Hong thou kiksak nawn ding in
Van daitui aw nunna hong thou kik sak aw
Nunna palhsak kik ding in kou tung hong kia aw
Van a daitui aw hon ngai ung e
verse2:
Sehnel gamkeu tawn a ka paina
Ka nuntakna vul zouta
Na van daitui doh in khut hong lamtou ing
Muvanlai tha hong guan in tha hong dimkik in
Toupa aw ka lu sathau nilh aw
verse3:
Zandaih hun in daitui akia a
Louhing nunna halhsak zel
Daidide a Nang ngai a kha kuunkuun hing
Van a daitui aw kei tung ah hong kia inla
Aw Ka nunna tha hong dim kik aw
chorus:
Bah leh hatloute dia hatna hi din
Nuntakna kisiate din
Van daitui limchi aw kou a ding in
Hatna pia din hong kia lai ve maw

verse1:
Toupa’n hon pidan aw a thupi lua
A hoihna in ka lampi hon pi zel
Lamsuk lamtou ah ka pai hun om zong leh
A khut muanhuai in kei a hon len hi
verse2:
Ka nat hun chiang in damna hon pia a
Lungkiak hun in Aman hon neem zel hi
Taksap hun in zong Aman hon huh zel a
Amah kei din Jehova Jire hi
verse3:
Toupa’n hon khotuah in a hon thei a
Kei a dia a kilawm mun ah hon pi
Ka chinlouhna leh ka hatlouhna thei a
Ka ban tang ah hon len in hon kai hi
chorus:
Toupa’n a hon pidan a thupi lua
Aman muanhuai khut in kei a hon pi
Aw A hoihna in a hon zuizel ding a
Ka nuntak sung hon nusia lou ding

verse1:
Eite lam hong pi hong keem hong huai a
Neuchik pan hong khang liansak Toupa
Mialna pan khuavak hong musak Toupa
Tuni dong hong pi Toupa a hi
verse2:
Muh ngeilouhte zong hong musak Pathian
Neih ngeilouhte hong neisak Pathian
Pilna siamnate hong guan hong neisak
Vanglian tung Pathian Nang vang hi e
verse3:
Gamdai gamkeu a khut toh hong len a
Lamsuk lamtou a hong nusia lou
Vualzawlna kim toh hiai tan hong pipa
Nong kep nong huaina lian in sang e
chorus:
Hong pahtawi ung e, hong tawisang ung e
Koute hong huai vanglian Toupa aw
Nang vang nungta ung
Nang vang khangtou ung
Pahtawina sang pen Nang hong pia ung

verse1:
Huang vulh ganta sisan ah hilou in
Jesu in ka mawhnate a hong tanta
Singlamteh tung a kikhai duang vul in
A phamna kei di’n nunna a hong hita
verse2:
A lutung ah linglukhu kikhu sak
A khut a khe ah sisan a hong luangkhia
Tui duh dangtak a kikou ka Toupa
Kei mawhna vang in hong thuak ana hi zaw
chorus:
Moh maina Na hong peta
Aw Na sisan hong luang in
Singlamteh tung ah ka moh
Na maisak zou
Mawhna pan ka suakta zou
Sihna pan ka suakta zou
Nang vang in kei in aw damna ka nei

verse1:
Hiai simlei in nopna bukim
Pahna bukim pe theilou
Jesu kia in nopna kiching a nei hi
Leitung hauhna sum leh pai leh
Kham leh ngun sang manpha zaw
Nunna manpha Tou Jesu kei ahita
verse2:
Kros thu zaw mangthangte a di’n
Haina lel ana hi a
Hotdamte din thilhihtheihna ahi zaw
Leimi din haina hi zong leh
Kei a din ka damna leh
Aw ka pahna la ngaih pen ana hi zaw
verse3:
Jesu vang in suakta zou ing
Suahtakna la ka sa ding
Sian na lui tua A sisan ah ka siangta
Launa bangmah ka nei nawnlou
Dahna bangmah ka neilou
Aw ka nopna Tou Jesu ka neita hi
chorus:
Jesu ka nei nopna kim
Jesu ka nei hauhna kim
Simlei miten a tel zohlouh simthupha
Jesu vang in ka neita
Jesu vang in ka tangta
Halleluiah! hinna nuam kei ahita

verse1:
Toupa kong pai na vualzawlna tang sam ding in
Ka utna leh deihna khempeuhte paisan in
Na gamchiam lam zuan in kong pai
Vualzawlna ka tanna ding leh
Midangte dia vualzawlna ka hihtheihna di’n
verse2:
Ka nuntakna ka ngaihsutna khempeuhte zong
Ka omdan leh ka aw suakte khempeuh hi zong
Ka innsung leh midangte dia vualzawlna ka hihna ding in
Ka nuntakna midangte di’n zangta ning e
verse3:
Gingtute aw itna vaak ah i taang ding uh
Kigensiatna leh kibawlsiatna paisan in
I Pathian in a hon it bang, veng leh pam lainatna nei in
Midangte dia vualzawlna di’n kizangta ning
chorus:
Aw ka Toupa hon pi in aw
Hiai lei tomkal ka damlai ni
Abraham bang midangte dia
Vualzawlna ka hih theihna di’n
Aw ka Toupa hon thuam in aw
bridge:
Aw Khasiangthou hon ngai ung e
Na thilhihtheihna meikuang in
Aw Na mite hong phawnghalh in
Midangte dia vualzawlna di’n
Aw Khasiangthou hon ngai ung e

verse1:
Kha Siangthou Nang hong ngai ung
Koute tung hong tung in aw
Hong lawng in, hong dim sak in
Nang mah bek hong lunggulh ung
Nong ompihna, nong tonpihna
Nong sinsakna, nong hanthawnna
Khuva bang nem Pasian Kha Siangthou aw
Nang hong ngai ung hong leng nawn in
verse2:
Liangvaite dia hehnem pa
Lungkhamte dia lungnopna
Nong huhna nong ompihna
Lam nong pina kong ngen uh
Sakmel in kong muthei lou zong
Banzal in kong let theih louh hang
Lungsung thukpen Nang toh kikholh khawmna
Nuam pen lim pen Kha Siangthou aw
verse3:
Kha Siangthou kong ngai uhi
Lohchinna hong pia in aw
Na hoihna hong musak aw
Na hehpihna kong ngen uh
Lam hoih lampha hong tawnsak aw
Na thuphate hong pia in aw
Daitui limchi bang in ka nuntakna
Hong thousak aw Kha Siangthou aw
chorus:
Kha Siangthou aw hong tonpih aw
Hong luahdim in, hong nou sak aw
Nang toh om leng nuamna kiching om hi
Hong luahdim in Kha Siangthou aw

verse1:
Hiai khovel ah hi sualgal a hong lian a
Van Jerusalem zuan a ka pai lai in
Ka sung a muan na kha hong kiliin chiang in
Toupa aw nang hong makaih
Na kha’n hong ompih in
verse2:
Ziing ninou leh ziingsang daitui bang kia a
Silpak leh louhingte’ nunna bawl thak zel
Aw na mite’ nunna pahna om nawn lou
Pahna daitui in na kha toh hong om pih in
verse3:
Aw ka Zogam lei uh mawhna’n dim zouta
Khelhnate hong lian a nisim in hon tuam
Leitung nopsakna sung ah kibual ta ung
Toupa aw nang hong ngilh ung
Ngaihdamna hong pia in

verse1:
Simleitung zaw tul zouta e
Ngabang bualte huibang mau uh
Chikleh tuangnung ka siah ding hiam
Simlei tung zaw sawt nawnlou ding
verse2:
Tung si-al leh vandum khen ah
Tung sunni leh lummei khen ah
A tang silsial khuapi nuam om
Lungzuan khitui daibang theng ding
verse3:
Simlei ah luankhi nul zong leng
Thangvan ah luankhi nul kei ning
Sian in naubang in hon pom dia
A tulsa simlei ngilhta ning
verse4:
Suut siam hileng sutchim kei ning
Gen siam hileng kua’n ngailou ding?
A ngailoute a zuan theih na’n
Sutsiam hileng aw ka nuam ngei e
chorus:
Aw gam ngaihhuai, damtui luanna
Na sung ngabang ka bual nuam hi
Nun chimlou a ka lenna ding
Ka gelchiang in aw, gelchim kei ing

verse1:
Na nuntak dante velkik in
Simlei in hong zou khin hi
Na gamtat dante velkik in
Toupan hong phal na ding maw?
Amah a na hihkhit leh
Amah ah muanna koih in
Toupa lam na et peuh leh
Khovel in hon zoulou dingSakmel hoihnate na deih leh
Toupa kiang kiching om hi
Minthannate na deih a leh
Toupan nang hon pe nuam hi
Hauhsaknate na deih leh
Toupa kiang kiching om hi
Na angsung na khual man in
Na ut bang gamta kei in
verse2:
Toupa mai a na chiamsate
Koi lam tung zouta uhiam?
Na lungdamna leh kipahna
Meibang in theng zouta maw?
Toupan nang lam hon en hi
Amah nial kik ding na hiam?
Aw nem a hon saplai in
Hon sapna dawnglou ding maw?
chorus:
Aw hong kik in Toupa kiang
Amah lam hong hei nawn in
Aw hong kik in Toupa kiang
Lung nopna hong pia ding hi

verse1:
Toupa aw lungsim thak hon guan in
Ka sung ah lunggel dik hon pia in aw
Aw! Nang in hon luah in ka lungsung
Aw! ka lungtang Nang nei in
verse2:
Kei nusia di’n Na Kha phal ken aw
Kei ah teng in la, kei hon nei gige’n
Nang mah ngai in ka dang a tak hi
Aw! ka lunggulh Nang na hi
verse3:
Zaitha nem a ka lungkham hun in
Aw! Na panpihna kei ah hon sawl in
Lam-et bei lungkham a ka om chiang’n
Aw! Na thu’n hon nem in aw
chorus:
Aw! Na simthu’n hon luan in ka lung sung
Na kha ngai in mimva bang ka thum hi
Aw! Na sihkhuk ka kha in a lunggulh
Tua in hon taisak in aw

verse1:
Ka sung a om sual ngaihtuahna te’n
Ka utlouh lam a hon pi zel
Hoih ka ut a ka sualzel ahi
Na mai ah mikhial ka na hita
verse2:
Kei mikhial lel Na hon it man in
Na sisan kei a di’n hong luang
Hoihna neilou kei bang leltak in
Na itna ka mu lamdang na e!
verse3:
Hoih ka hilou, dik zong ka hilou
Na itna’h dikna ka mu zaw
Kei ziak hilou, Khrist ziak lel ahi
Ka phulouh A ngaihdamna ka tan
chorus:
Hon ngaidam in, hon ngaidam in
Toupa aw kei mikhial ka hi
Hon ngaidam in, hon ngaidam in
Toupa aw kei mikhial ka hi

verse1:
Mang vontawi Immanuel
Hondampa a hong piangta
Mawhna pan i sianna di’n a hong piangta
Lei mite a dia Kumpi
Lemna Lal a hong hi dia
A gam zaw a bei ngeilou a hong hi ding
verse2:
Van mun nuam ahon nusia
Lei mun niam ah hong tualkum
Gan an piakna kuang sung ah a hong zaalta
Nang leh kei a hon it vang
Lei mun niam a hon teelta
Ei di’n Kumpi hong piangta, i sang ding uh
verse3:
Na Lalgam ka lung sung uah
Tuihing lui in hong luang hen
Hong piang hen kilemna leh ki-itnate
Aw Jesu ka hon ngai uh
Lemna Kumpi hi ding in
Michih dia kilemna Lal Nang hong hi in
chorus:
Hondampa a hong piangta
Judia gam Bethlehem ah
Amah Khrist i Toupa ngei a hong piangta
Tung Pathian thupi henla
Leitung ah kilemna leh
Deihsakna mihingte kiang om hen
artists: Lamhoihching Mangte, Donthiansiam Tonsing, T Pumkhothang

verse1:
Buainate’n sunchin hong bawm zong leh
Toupa na ang hong bel ning
Haksatna namkimte hong tung zong leh
Toupa hong bel den ning
verse2:
Khemna haksate’n hong man zong leh
Toupa na ang hong bel ning
Kei vuak in lam haksa zui hizong leng
Toupa hong bel den ning
verse3:
Sihnate’n hong man ding hizong leh
Toupa na ang hong bel ning
Zatam in nang hong nial ding hizong leh
Toupa hong bel den ning
chorus:
Hong bel ning hong bel den ning
Toupa aw nang hong bel ning
Ka damna leh ka lung nopna
Toupa hong bel den ning

zoTitle: Hong Damsak In Ka Dam Ding Uh
verse1:
Koute nunna kisia zouta
Ka gam sung uh kisia zouta
Siatna’n tuilian bang in hon tum
Toupa aw hong damsak in aw
verse2:
Ka khutte uh a liam zouta
Ka khete uh a liam zouta
Hong tuam dam in ka dam ding uh
Hong lawng in na damna khut in
verse3:
I nuntak zia ki ngaihsunni
Manthatna khuk sung i kiak ma’n
Toupa ang ah kipia ve ni
Jesu lou damna a om kei
chorus:
Hong damsak in ka dam ding uh
Hong honkhia in ka hing ding uh
Bang dang hi kei a damna ding
Toupa aw Nang kia na hi zaw
bridge:
Kumpi Jesu ka hon ngai uh
Lemna Kumpi in hong ding in
Koute zingvai hong hawm inla
Damna kawlni hong suaksak aw

verse1:
Toupa aw na mite’n Nang hong ngilh zouta ung
Na nasemtute mang hiaihiai uh
Zinmang in hon zol e, khovel in hon zouta
Ka vak uh mial khin zouta e
verse2:
Laukha Siangthou nunnem hong hatsaktu ahi
Ka siang uah na laukha’n hong leng in
Lungkham huibang maute hong nem in Toupa aw
Na mite zaitha hong pia in
verse3:
Ka khe uh liam zouta, ka khut uh hat zoulou
Kha Siang in hong damsak nawn in aw
A mangthang mite dia ka nunna uh phal di’n
Na kha in hong hatsak nawn in
chorus:
Hong leng in Toupa aw, hong leng in Toupa aw
Na Laukha Siang in hong phawnghalh in
Na mite ngui zouta, lunglel sulkik lellou
Ka siang uah hong leng nawn in aw

verse1:
Kamsang ten a genkholh sa bang mah in
En in na Kumpi kingainiam tak in
Sabiltung tal nou tung ah hong tuang in
Na kiang ah a hong pai hi
verse2:
Kumpi Jesu pahtawina i pia ding
Amah i kiang ah hong pai hi
Amah phat in i aw i suah ding uh
Hossana! Hossana! chi’n
chorus:
David Tapa a ding in, Hossana!
Toupa min a hong pai a nunnuam hi
Tungnungpen ah thupi hen, Hossana!
Hossana! Chi in awng ni

verse1:
Ka hinna kisel, a muan huai Toupa sung ah
Bang lau ding ka hiam, bang hang ka lung dong diam?
Muan huai Na khut in keimah hong len den hi a
Tua hang lung ka nuam ka Ginpa muan huai
verse2:
Ka ginna a neu, ka hatna zong neu hi a
Hizong kei hi lou, Amah hatna vang in
Kei ginna lel in hotdam in om zou hi keng
Ka Ginpa a hatna in hondam hi
verse3:
Khovel ka et in, launa in ka dim sek a
Lunglau in ka om lungkia in ka om zel
Toupa ka et in A muanhuaina ka mu a
Lung launa pan in nopna lui hong luang
chorus:
Kei muanhuai hilou
Ka ginpa a muanhuai hi zaw
Bang kim ah Amah, kei a di’n a muan huai
Hondam di’n a hat, panpih di’n a muan huai
Kei muanhuai hilou, ka Ginpa muan huai

verse1:
Hiai lei gentheihna lungngaihna gam ah
Tu in lungngai in leng mah zong leng
Thianmang saunuam ah Belamnou vak ah
Ka len hun chiang in nunnuamta ding
verse2:
Lei ah gim thuak in huibang mau zong leng
Dahna, lungngaihna’n hon tuam zong leh
Lungdeih paisate’n hon ngakna mun ah
Gim gentheih om lou inn ka nei hi
verse3:
Simlei kikhenna khitui luanna gam
Lungzuang a naubang kahna gam hi
Van inn nuam sung a i leen hun chiang in
Gibang kikhenna om nawnlou ding
chorus:
Simlei ngai lou in tua ah ka leng ding
Lei gimhuai pel in thangvan sang ah
Tatsa te mel mu’n lungngaih omnawn lou
Tangtawn in nunnuam in ka leng ding

verse1:
Hun mualliamsate sapkik theih hilou
Loubang tul in a liam zouta
Ka mailam hun Nang mah ah kong nga
Ka lametna na hi Toupa
verse2:
Kei hong tonpih in aw ka lampi ah
Ka mailam hun a thei pa aw
Kei sung ah hatna bangmah om kei
Toupa nang hatna ka muang hi
verse3:
Galkhua dak leng aw mailam ka hun ding
A piang ding bangmah ka thei kei
Liamsa hun leh mailam hun thei pa
Toupa na sung ah ka om hi
chorus:
Ka mailam hun Nang toh ton in
Pai nuam ing e
A piang bangbang lungnopna toh
Ka san theih na’n
Nang hon len in aw kei hong tonpih in
Ka mailam hun thei pa na hi

zoTitle: Ka Nunna Lam Hong Pi In
verse1:
Kei kia’n lampai nawn kei ning
Simlei tung ka nun sung in
Toupa toh ton le’ng ka paina
Thawmhau in lungmang kei ning
verse2:
Ka muh leh zaak khempeuhte
Lung ka gel khempeuhte zong
A siangthou lampi zui thei di’n
Ka nuntakna hong pi in
verse3:
Simlei luummei kai zong leh
Nang hon ompih den in aw
Sunkhua zankhua ka geel khempeuh
Na deihbang lam hong pi in
verse4:
Ka nuntak ding dan geel na’n
Lunggim in ka om zong a
Toupa aw Nang nong ompih leh
Bang di’n huibang ka mau dia
chorus:
Ka nunna lam hong pi in
Nang lou in simlei gam ah
Lungmuanna omlou Toupa
Na khanuai hon sel in aw

verse1:
Ka nunna dangtak in aw a bah zel
Ka lunggulh Jesu a ngai hi
Lei thupina hon neem thei a om lou
Amah kia hi aw ka lunggulh
verse2:
Kei a ding a damna leh ka taina
Ka Jesu lou dang a omlou
Amah kei a di’n ka hatna hi a
Ka sihkhuk Jesu ka hinna
verse3:
Bah leh nguite dia hatna a neipa
A dawn mite ding a damna
Kang ngeilou sihkhuk a zuan mite zaw
A dangtak kik nawn lou ding uh
chorus:
Aw Jesu kei di’n ka sihkhuk ahi
Bangteng sang ka lunggulhpen
Simlei pallun leh ahoihna sang in
Jesu kei di’n na manpha

verse1:
Aw ka Suangpi Toupa aw kei hong liah in
Kei a dia ka bitna Nang na hi
Khemna a hong lian dou a ka zoh theih na’n
Tam Suangpi aw kei hong liah in
verse2:
Lau leh ling a ka om in Nang no’n thei a
Lungngai in ka om zong Nang na thei
Aw Nang ka Suangpi launa a ka bitna
Hong liah in aw Nang kong bel hi
verse3:
Ka tung ah bangteng a hong tung zong in ah
Lau kei ning ka Suangpi Nang na hi
Pipa ka Pathian Na khut sung a pan in
Launa ka nuaisiah ngei ding hi
chorus:
Nang ka Suangpi aw kei hong liah in
Nang lou ka bitna omlou e
Ka Honpa na hi ka Pathian na hi
Kei din ka lum leh phaw Na hi
Aw ka Suangpi kei hong liah in aw
artists: Joshua Tonsing, Zoulian Tangpua, S. Pausianlian, T. Pumkhothang

verse1:
Khangnou lai hun a manphatna
Theilou’n na om hiam?
Zu leh sa in na hinkhua hon zou in
Manna neilou, na hun khempeuh
Na mawk beisak a
Khangnou lai hun in tua bangte tawpsanta in
verse2:
Khangnou lai in na hun khempeuh
Mawk beisak nawn ken
Na zohsa hun na mai hong kiklou ding
Na ut bang in na deih bang in
Niang leh tai’n om in
Toupa mai ah nang tuate’n hon pilut ding hi
chorus:
Na khangnou lai hun
Suangmanpha sang manpha zaw
Na vai dingte kichian tak a na gel leh
Na kha leh nuntakna khempeuh a bei dong in
Na hauhsakna na lungnopna hong hi ding hi
bridge:
Thatang hatna hong kipia
Lungsim hatna hong kipia
Tua khempeuh mawkna in na beisak ding maw?
Lung in na gelpha thak in khangnou lai tomkal sung in
Khangnou lai hun suangmanpha sang manphazaw

verse1:
Simlei tung lungkhamna leh buaina
Sunchin ngabang in ka lenlai
Omlai vei lungkham haksatnate’n
Nisim khawllou in kei hon zui
verse2:
Tung sunni tum in muikhua hong zing
Zalna laikhun sam bang zal in
Tang bang dam in lenkawl ni hong suak
Bang chi’n sunni tum ding ka hiam?
verse3:
Tulsing lel a len heisa pal bang
Nunnuam simlei ah ka lenglou
Kei di’n lungnopna Toupa nang lou
Omlou Toupa simlei tung ah
chorus:
Toupa aw Toupa
Leitung ka nunsung bang chilel hiam?
Genthei lunglen haksatnate
Chikchiang lam bang kheng ding ka hiam?

verse1:
Haksatna mun a pangngam in Toupa na i sem ding
In leh lou paisan akul Toupa nasem di’n zaw
Gimna ah zong lung kelou thuakna mun a tai lou
I Kros mah i puak a kul ahi
verse2:
Toupa’n ei a dia a thuak natdante lung a gel in
A nasepna tawl kisa’n lunglel in om kei ni
Koi mun ah hizong Aman hon deihna munpeuh ah
Amah di’n i sem kei ding ua hiam?
verse3:
Toupa gam nasemlou namte mangthang ding ahi uh
A nasemlou nam i hih in zaw i mangthang ding
A gam a di’n kipe le’ng ei di’n i damna hi
A nasem minam i hi ding uh
chorus:
Khawl theih hilou Toupa gam a di’n
A nuamlou a haksa bang teng ah zong
Thuakna leh supna lou in
Toupa na kisem theilou
I Toupa a di’n isem ding uh

verse1:
Khrist sung a nungta gingtute
Thutak in i dingkip hiam?
Nun zia kilawm leh hoihna toh
Toupa di'n i muanhuai ding uh hi
verse2:
Toupa vaak ah i pai ding uh
Nun siate i taisan ding
Khrist zohna puanlap khai sang in
Setan tung i vualzou ding uh hi
verse3:
Toupa'n eite hon lainat bang
Lainatna nei in om ni
Itna sung ah i omkhop chiang'n
Khrist meel i gam ah a taangta ding
chorus:
Khrist a nung ta'n, Khrist dung suun in
Sianthouna toh nungta ni
Sianmang deih bang lampi zui in
Khrist thu toh kituak in nungta ni

verse1:
Kei hon Tanpa'n a hong thuakna
Tua Kros lampi zaw
Gimna leh haksatna zumhuaina a hi
Hiai simlei in theisiamlou
Tua Kros lampi pen
Simlei a di'n haina lel a hi zaw
verse2:
Kiletsakna, ki otsakna
Na kilhlumta maw
Kros lampi kiniamkhiatnate a hi zaw
Hiai simlei pahtaknate
Na paisanta maw
Kros lampi zaw simlei paisan ahi
verse3:
Tua Kros lampi ka zuih chiang in
Simlei a ding in
Kilhbelh in ka om a, simlei a hi keng
Tua Kros vang in ka bangkim
Ka nusiata a
Tua Kros lampi ka lampi ahita
chorus:
Kros lampi zaw thupina a hilou
Kros lampi zaw gimna leh thuakna ahi
A laitak a ka Toupa'n a thuakna Kros zaw
Gimna leh zumhuaina Kros ahi

verse1:
Hiai khualzinna gam, nuai simlei ah
Gimthuak a i mau lai in
Pathian tate dia ni thupipen
Haibang i ngaklah ngei e
verse2:
Hiai khualzinna gam, nuai simlei ah
Lungmuanna ding a omlou
Vangam nuam ah zaw, lungkim tak in
Nuam in i khawl denta ding
verse3:
Hiai khualzinna gam, nuai simlei ah
Thupina ngeiloute'n zong
Vangam nuam ah zaw Belamnou in
Thupitak in a thuam ding
chorus:
Hiai khualzinna gam, simlei ahi
Eite inn van ahi zaw
Tu'n ah gimthuak in, i mau zong a
Denchiang zoh la i sa ding

verse1:
La ngaih i sa ding
Galkhat ah i tun chiang in
Tua lai ah i Toupa leh van mipite'n
Zohna dial khai in hong dawn ding
verse2:
Toupa gam vang a
Genthei leh liangvai thuakte'n
Pahna hang khitui luang in nuamna la sa'n
Honpa toh chibai kibuk ding
chorus:
La ngaihpen i sa ding hi tua ah
Lei ah liangvai leh gentheite'n zong
Zohna puan lapte khaisang khawm in
La ngaihpen i sa khawm ding
bridge:
Van mite'n a sak theih louh uh la ngaih
Eite'n tua ah i sa ding
Sisan a hong tan, vualzohna hong pia
Tuate ka la ngaih hi ding

verse1:
Khualzin lam pai lai Samari mi'n panpih ding mu in
Lainatna khut toh len in liamma tuamsak hi
Lawm hoih itna kansang a a nunna a piak leh
Tuabang val itna omlou
verse2:
Tou Jesu itna bulpi ahi mabang a panta
Loubang hon khualna lian in naubang hon kem hi
Veng leh pam khat leh khat ki it in kilainat leng
Tua bang val itna omlou
verse3:
Sum leh pai hauhna tampi nei in itna man suak leng
Mual kisuan theih nang ginna tampi neita leng
Itna neilou in hauhnate leh ginnate zaw
Dak ging bang lel hi ding hi
chorus:
Ki itna a om seem a, lainatna a om seem leh
Toupa deih bang hi zaw
Lungtuak a ngabang lenkhawm hoih in
Vualzawlna ahi
Itna leh lainatna omta hen

verse1:
Lia leh taang aw bang chi'n pallaini na zang hiam?
Pawn a pakbang vul ding lung in na gel ngam diam?
Na pilna leh siamna zaitha hatlai nite
Sakmel lawmlou kulsin sam bang a zaal ding maw?
Tun leh zua lung awilou
Tung Thianmang lung awi lou
Pallaini vullou a mual a liam mai ding zaw
Lung in hon gelkik in pallun lai etlawmnou
Toupa dia zang lou a mualliam mai ding maw?
verse2:
Pallut lai etlawmnou mizata mitsuanna
Tun leh sua lunggelna nun a nuamsaktu hi
Sianmang it leh deipen pallutlai nite hi
Maimit hon suan chimlou
Hong it tung Thianmang in
Na lunggel a ngilhlou, na heina a ngilhlou
Simlei hoihna teng toh nun in na nuam zong in
Simlei pallun hoihna nang hon doute hi uh
Sul hong heikik mai in na heina pan in

verse1:
Khelhna zanmial ah, lungkham in ka om
Ka van gikte ka puak lai in
Ka thumna za in A aw nem ka za
Na mawhna ka ngaidamta chi in
verse2:
Kei hoihna nei lou, kei a moh mi in
Na ngaihdamna ka za Toupa
Nang a pan hinna ken ke neita hi
Lungnopna ka gen zou ngei ding maw?
verse3:
Aw lamdang lua hi, kei na hon itna
Tangtawn tangtawn a tul ngeilou
Aw kei dia damna'n ka sung ah hong luang
Tangtawn in a kang ngei nawn lou ding
chorus:
Ka nuamta, ka lung nuamta
Lui siangthou ah ka khelhna siangta
Khrist sisan luisiang a ka bual lai in
Dai ngeilou ka lungnopna hong luang

verse1:
Hun leh ni tuibang luang in
Kum leh khate kidang zel
Liamsa hunte ngaih lai thelbang thou
It leh ngaih lenmual khumsate
Simlei a gibang khente
Vaibang tungkik theileh ngai mah sing maw
verse2:
Khawllai di'n khou thei hi leng
Toupa di'n zang kik nuam ing
Mualliam sa hunte khoukik thei leng
Hun tampi neilai kisa a
Simlei a ka lenlai in
Theihlouh kal hunte hong bei ding hi maw!
chorus:
Mualliam sa hunte ngai ing
Mualliam sa hunte ngai ing
Samkik in khawlkik thei hileh maw!
Ngaih lai ni lah lian semsem
Mualliam sa hunte ngaimah sing maw!

verse1:
Lawm it, tun leh zua, chin leh tuai te aw
Sianmang siang ah tuang i tung thei ding hiam?
Tuangtung theilou ding maw chin leh tuai aw?
Lawm it nang zong tuangtung thei ding na hiam?
Hun bei ma in gel in
verse2:
Pak bang lutlai nite hong vul ding a
Zaitha hatna leh sakmel hoihna te
Loubang tul in tui bang hong kang ding a
Sihna'n salbang hong mat hun hong tung ding
Hun bei ma in gel in
verse3:
Simlei nun nopnate hong bei ding a
Lungzuan dahna in tui bang hong tum dia
Na laukha tun na'ng tu in gel di vaw
Hung hong bei leh kua siang ah bel ding hiam?
Hun bei ma in gel in
chorus:
Aw thangvan tual ah mun na muang ta hiam?
Aw na kha'n koi lam zuam ding hiam?
Hotdamna ni leh hun kipahhuai ah
I din lai in gel ni

verse1:
Ka bukna leh ka bitna Toupa aw
Na liim nuai ah kei hong seel in aw
Na muanhuaina ka lum leh phaw hi a
Bangmah in kei a hong zou kei ding
verse2:
Na kha zak nuai ah kei hon sel in aw
Ka bukna leh ka suangpi Na hi
Na khut khuak sung ah kei hong koih in la
Hii leng lauhuai pan hon hum bit aw
verse3:
Ka kiimkot ah zatam a puuk zong in
Sihna in kei a hong naih lou ding
Kei tung ah hoih lou hong tung lou ding a
Natnate'n zong kei hon naih lou ding
chorus:
Na liim nuai ah kei hong sel in Toupa
Ka bitna ka suangpi Toupa aw
Na kha liim nuai ah tawntung ka bit ding
Hong kem in Toupa kei hong kem in

verse1:
Simlei thupina leh hauhsakna
Deihtaakna in lungsung a luahzou
Nang sang a zong in ka buai den ua
Ka lungsung uah Nang di'n mun a omlou
verse2:
Lei hauhsakna teng kei a hi a
Nang theilou a ka om sang in zaw
Genthei pen hih a Nang toh kinai
Ka telzaw lai a hi ka Pathian aw
verse3:
Toupa na vualzawlna ka tante
Na deihsakna thupi ka tante
Nang hon gamlattu a hih in zaw
Hon ngaidam in Toupa ka hon ngen hi
chorus:
Toupa aw nang kia ka hon tel hi
Nang sang in bang dang ka tel theilou
Simlei thupina tengteng sang in
Ka Pathian aw Nang mah ka hon telzaw

verse1:
Ngabang lenna simlei tual ah
Dah luankhi daibnag theng moh e
Lungkham omlouh thangvan gam mun ahi
Nun nuam in laitual leng nuam ing
verse2:
Ka ngaih baang theilou thangvan gam
Tuailou tul singlim gam nuam ah
Thianmang toh lai tual ka len khawm hun ding
Lungsung ah ngaih baang thei lou e
verse3:
Ka luankhi puanbang hong nul ding
Toupa Nang lou ka dang omlou
Na gam leh Na sau nunnuam ka gel in
Kei luankhi puanbang hong nul hi
chorus:
Leng nuam ing, leng nuam ing
Angel leh Serafte lenna gam ah
Nunnuam a laitual len hun ding
Chikchiang ngaih baang ding na hiam?

verse1:
Simlei pian ma nangawn in maw
Kou hong it Toupa
Kua ta'n mel in hong theilou zong
Toupa na hon it hi
verse2:
Tuan a pu pa'n mel in theilou
Zinmang henkol bun
Luai nambang in Nong suut zouta
Nang a di'n n'on bawlta
verse3:
Selung mawl a kumvei dingte
Loubang Non khual na'n
Na simthupha'n lambang n'on zong
Namte hong hita ung
verse4:
Nang a pan a melma mite
Lawm hong hita ung
Khuamial nuai a vakvaite di'n
Suahtakna khua vakta
chorus:
Ka damna uh ka bitna uh
Tou pa nang na hi
Nam liangvaite Nong laam touta
Halleluiah! Amen

verse1:
Hounem Thianmang gelsa bang in
Lia leh tang simthu paibang kipom
Thianmang in chibang a tel bang in
Zatamte'n pakbang hong tawi ung e
verse2:
Zang phualva bang a lengkhawm in
Manpha vondeih zatam hon tawi un
Simlei ah kumsawt guabang hing in
Vualzawlna'n tuibang hon tum hen aw
verse3:
Paibang pom simthu ngilh lou in
Itna'n lemnaang bang hong hekkhawm hen
Lentualkhiakna simthu ngilhlou in
Simlei ah tangbang hong dam un aw
verse4:
Lunmang in tuibang a gawmsa
Kuata'n khenna simthu lel kei hen
Zatam in lampang ahon paksa
Nuai zinmang in zong hong khen kei hen
chorus:
Pakbang hong tawi ung
Pakbang hong tawi ung
Mubang kingai a laitawi lia leh tang
Lambang hong pak ung
Lambang hong pak ung
Simthu paibang pom lambang hong pak ung

verse1:
Omsa Pathian omlel leh om gige ding
Piandang Na vangletna lian hi
Lei siam a van leh tuipite a Siampa
Tangtawn a tangtawn Nang a hi
verse2:
Lei leh a sung a thilsiamte a bawlpa
Vantung Angel sangsawm lak zong
Na thupina gen zou suut zou a omlou
Piandang Na vangletna lian hi
verse3:
Nite kumte hong bei in hong kidang zel
Hizong Na vanglian dang ngeilou
Thilsiam a bei sate lak zong Pathian nang
Thilsiam thak ah zong hi lai ding
chorus:
Piandang Na vangletna lian hi Toupa
Piandang Na vangletna lian hi Toupa
Tang a Pathian nang tangtawn a hi lai ding
Piandang Na vangletna lian hi

verse1:
Simlei tung lungngaihna silpaklun a vul e
Nunnuam a ngabang leng a om diam?
Lungmuan om nawnlou naubang kahna ahi
Nunnuam a sambang zal om lou
verse2:
Lia leh tang lungmuang lou
Tun leh zua lungmuang lou
Nagaihtamsial in zal uh laikhun ah
Vabang lunglau in heina ah nunnuam lou
Zalna sau nunnuam liim om lou
verse3:
Zaitha tawl ngaihtam sial meibang thenni om lou
Tullim nuam muanna ding a om lou
Zal nuam leng zuangthou
Kop nuam leng gibang khen
Muanna gam tullim hon ngai veng
chorus:
Sunkhua lungzuan sialna
Zankhua ngaihtam sialna
Lung guuk a lungngai a tam ngei
Lungmuan om nawnlou naubang kahna lel
Nunnuam a ngabang leng om diam?

verse1:
Lei ah gou manpha nei lou in
Lei hauhna ka nei lou zong
Van ah gou manpha ka neih man in
Aw tua hi ka lung nopna
verse2:
Ka gou omna vantung gam hi
Lei goute a mangthang ding
Ken zaw van hauhna ka delh zel a
Tunglam ah ka buai zaw hi
verse3:
Laukha maimit in gal don leng
Van hauhna thupi na e
Simlei a tang bang ka dam sung in
Van ah gou  ka khol zel ding
verse4:
Phat chim kei ning awi chim kei ning
Van gam nuam ka tun chiang in
Ka gou manpha Toupa mel mu in
Tawplou in ka phat ding hi
chorus:
Van hauhna gou manpha nei ing
Leikha leh tui ek te in a nek phaklouh
A vul theilou a mang thei lou
Van hauhna ka nei ta hi

verse1:
Taang in na omna peuh ah
Na vak taang sak in
Mial lak a mite kiang ah
Na vak taang sak in
verse2:
Khristian vak nei na hih leh
Mial lak ah taang in
Na kim leh pam mite kiang ah
Na vak taang sak in
verse3:
Na omdante'n thu gen hen
Leitung mun peuh ah
Na gamtatdante pan in
Na vak taang sak in
chorus:
Taangsak in na vak taang khesal zel in
Taangsak in simlei tung mun khempeuh ah
Taangsak in na vak taang khesal zel in
Taangsak zel in na vak mite kiang

verse1:
Gumpa Jesu hankhuk sung pan thou kik zou hi
Kulsin leh suangpi'n nang zou lou in
Vualzou in hankhuk sung pan
Ni thumni in thou kik zou hi
verse2:
Zingsang tung in Mari han lam zuan in pai a
Han ah silhpuan duang kia va mu hi
Angel in thou kik zou chin
A gen bangg Jesu hong kilak
verse3:
Lametna neiloute bang in dah kei ni e
Han a pan Jesu a thohkik bang
Sihna pan hong phong hi
Amah toh tawntung teng den ding
chorus:
Thou kik zou hi, sihna pan in
Gumpa Jesu han a pan in a thou kik zou hi
Phamna doh ai in zou zou lou
Kulsin suangpi'n a lenden zou lou
Sihna pan in vualzou in aw a thoukik zou

verse1:
Na thupina gen in gen vual hilou
Aw a vanglian Toupa nang na min lian hi
Van Angel sangsawmte'n
Phat la ngaihtak in Na kim ah leng uh
verse2:
Nang phatna la tangtawn in sa nuam ing
Nang phatna ka kha ah dim leh ka nuam hi
Na mai a hong kun in
Pahtawina leh Thupina ka hon pia
verse3:
A hoih khempeuh kei a nong hisak a
Na kilawmna khempeuh kei ah nong koih hi
Na hoihna a lian lua
Halleuiah! Halleluiah! Amen
chorus:
Vangletna leh minthanna
Thupina leh pahtawina
Zahtakna teng vaihawmna teng Nang a
Na siangthou, Na siangthou hi Toupa
Tangtawn in thupina Nang ahi

verse1:
Belh ding nei lou lungkham a ka om lai’n
Ka kha zan mial sung ah om in
Suahtakna lampi lungngai ka om lai’n
Lam hong hilh Toupa Nang na hi
Lungmuanna kim kei ahita
verse2:
Melma ten hong tuam kei kian ka om zong
Kei hong huh Toupa nang na hi
Khatvei leh natna ten kei hong tuam in
Taksap lungkham hunte hileh
Kei hong huh Toupa Nang na hi
chorus:
Toupa kei din na manpha
Bangmah lau ding ka nei lou
Bangkim a hong huh ka Toupa Nang na hi
Ka paina zan khomial in
Gen theihna mun ka om zong
Toupa kei ding in na manpha

verse1:
Toupa na sep ding tampi semlou a i om chiang
Hong liah hi Toupa mel muh ding
Leitung hoihna hauhna leh Kumpite i et chiang
Toupa i muh ding hong liah
Toupa mel a lang lou
verse2:
Hoih i kisaknate leh thupi kisaknate
Ei ah a sih vek ma in zaw
Toupa mel kilawmnate i mu thei ngei lou ding
Thupi leh hoih kisakna
Toupa mel liahtu hi
chorus:
Toupa mel hong liah zou hi
Toupa mel hong liah zou hi
Thupina hoih kisak nate'n
Ei leh ei ki enchian in A na sem leng
Toupa hoihna ei a hi'n, A mel i mu ding hi

verse1:
Toupa anbang a nong itna
Lailung ka gel chiang lamdang sa'ng
Gitlouhna dim nong tatkhiak
Lunglai ah gelseng zou keng maw
Kei a dia na itna kiching
Chik leh lung in ka ngilh zou diam?
verse2:
Nisim lam ka pai na peuh ah
Khelhna'n ka mai nuihchiam hong lel
Hui kha zel ing Toupa aw
Hizong kei hon taisan kei in
Na khut in hon lenden in aw
A tawp dong khut in hon len in
verse3:
Kei di'n khua ul sibang luang a
Khapham dong in nong thuaksak lai
Sihna kei di'n nong zohsak
Mimohte sianna nong peta
Nang vang in siangthou hitang maw?
Toupa aw kou di'n na hoih hi
chorus:
Aw, Toupa nong itna
Lamdang lua sang e ka lunglai ah
Ih, chikchiang nong itna
Lailung in ka gel zou ding hiam?
Kei dia nong itna lunglai ah naubang in sang ing

verse1:
Muanhuai in Toupa i zui ding
Leitung mite'n a theilou zong
Toupa lou muan ding a om lou
Lei leh vantung ah zong
Hauhna leh nopsaknate sang'n
Muhsitna engbawlna tengte
Toupa nungzuitute in zaw
I tan ding mah a na hi e
verse2:
Pilat vaihawmtu kumpi in
Mipite mai a et man in
I Tou Jesu Kros a kilh di'n
Aw a pekheta hi
Ei mah angma i sial na'n leh
Khovel maipha muhna ding in
I zuih Toupa pai khe kei ni
Khovel paisan in i zui ding
verse3:
Khovel in Khrist taisan ding in
Khovel hauhna'n a hon huau thei
Hauhna thupi Khrist neih a hi
Nunghei nawnta kei ni
Gimna ah, lunglenna mun ah
Haksatna munte a thuak in
Nuamna mun a phatna la sa'n
Toupa nung i zuita ding uh
chorus:
Toupa nung i zui ding
Dam lai ni a bei mateng
Simlei albang a hong man a
I tangtawn gam i tun mateng
Toupa nung i zui ding

verse1:
Gam tengteng aw, Toupa phat in lasa un
A na sem lungdam lasa in
Tumging kilawm khempeuh toh Amah phat un
Toupa mai ah kun in phat ni
verse2:
Khukdin in A mai ah i kun ding uh hi
Itna toh honkem tawntung hi
I heina peuh ah belam bang hon ching hi
A mai ah kun in phat ni e
verse3:
Lungdam lasa'n A Biakinn tual ah lut ni
Phat la sa'n A huang ah lut ni
Lungdang lasa'n A Biakinn tual ah lut ni
Toupa mai ah kun in phat ni
chorus:
Toupa phat ni, Toupa phat ni
I aw neih tengteng in phat ni
Lei khempeuh aw, Amah phat un
Toupa phat in late sa ni

verse1:
Eite i vualzohna
Eite i thahatna
Aman hong vualzoh pih vang hi
Dahnate zouzouta
Thuaknate zou khinta
Amah in leitung teng
Ei a di'n hong zohsakta
verse2:
Dahna mualte sang in
Lauhna tuipi lian zong
Amah in hong gal kai pih ding
Toupa hatna khut sung
Bangmah in zou thei lou
Bangteng in hong nawk zong
Toupa sung ah i bit hi
chorus:
Toupa vualzou pa hi
Toupa vualtungtuang hi
Amah hong vualzoh pih zou
Amah a din haksa
Bangmah a om ngei lou
Toupa a lianpen hi
Toupa zaw a hatpen hi

verse1:
Lei leh van siamtu Toupa
Na min lian in thupi lua
Ka nuntak sung teng
Nang mah hong phat ning
Thuneihna teng Nang a hi
Lamdang in lian lua Toupa hong phat ing
verse2:
Zingsang teng in na siamsate'n
Nang mah hong phat uh a
Na muanhuaina dang ngeilou Toupa aw
Khua hun hong ki hei zel leh
Thilsiamte hong thakzelte'n
Na muanhuaina thupina hong gen uh
chorus:
Vanglian Toupa aw a muanhuai Toupa
Na thupina lamdang in lian lua
Lei leh van vaihawm Nang mah
Tang tawn a dang ngeilou ding
Halleluiah! Toupa aw hong phat ing

verse1:
Lungkhamna kigen zoulou khelhna kol sung ah
Suahtakna mu theilou a ka om lai'n
Lungkham a ka thum hon za suahtakna hon pia
Chiantak in A aw nem ken ka thei hi
verse2:
Nisim nek leh tak hon pia silh leh ten hon pia
Taksap ni a zong hon nuse ngeilou
Omlai vei ka thuakte pan damna hon pia a
Ka poimah ka bangkim hon pepa hi
verse3:
Dangtakte a dia damna hinna tuihing lui
Gentheite a dia lungnopna lianpen
Lamet bei a lungkhamte tha thak hon guanpa
Hatloute a ding in hatna Na hi
chorus:
Vanglian tung Pathian Toupa hong phat ing
Nang bang hoih Pathian
Phat tak Pathian a omlou
Lungkhamte nempa gentheite huhpa
Pahtawina Nang a ding in kilawm hi
Tangtawn in Na minthang den ta hen
bridge:
Ah... Ah... Ah... Ah... Ah... Ah...
Aw nang ka Pathian pahtawina chiteng leh
Zahtaknate Nang a ahi

verse1:
Leitung omma nangawn a vaihawmpa
Na vaihawmdante hoih in siangthou hi
A paisate leh omlelte, hong omlai dingte
Theikholpa in zingvai hong hawmsak aw
verse2:
Toupa aw kou dia vai nong hawmsak leh
Ki-itna, kituahna lian semsem ding
Kiniamkhiatna toh vaihawmpa Toupa nang na hi
Koute a din zing vai hong hawmsak aw
verse3:
Ka gam uh, ka lei uh liangvai lua e
Toupa aw nong huh ding kong ngen uh hi
Koute a ding in na zahngaihna hong ngen lai ung
Hong huh in aw Toupa kong ngen uh hi
chorus:
Gam a ding in leh, nam a ding in vai hong hawm in
Toupa na vaihawmdante hoih in siangthou hi
Lemna Pathian in kou ding a vai nong hawm leh
Vualzawlnate kou a hong hi ding

verse1:
Mimbnag ka pianna ka zuapa aw
Simlei thianmang hi
Na vontawite din
Na vang zubang a khum
Na liimnuai nuam sang
Na khazak nuai hi ka nun nopna
verse2:
Na saulim kei din a nuam pen e
Na tongdam kei din
Ka tha hatna ahi
Duh leh ngaih zong ne lou
Von tawite khual man
A thupi lua e ka zuapa aw
verse3:
Theisen pan hong kem ka zuapa hi
Ka kah chiang hong nem
Ka nat chiang hong kem
Sunkhua zan khua chi lou
Vontawite khual a
Hong ching hong kem zua na manpha hi
chorus:
Zuapa hong itna
Zuapa hong ngaihna lian
Ka khankhua dingte hong gel saktu
Gimna tawlna te kei vang a pal in
Loubang nong khual maw ka zuapa aw

verse1:
A minthupi hi, A lian hi, A lamdang hi
A vangliansa a om khinpa
Leite, vante pianma in zong thupi khin hi
Tangtawn Pathian thupi hi
A ngelten sun leh zan awi in
A mang tut phah kim vel in leng uh
A siangthou hi, siangthou hi chi in awi uh
A thupisa A mah hi
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang hilou in
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang zong hilou
verse2:
A thupina leh vangletna kithei lou in
Khovel in A mah theilou zong
A thupina kimvel a leng Angel ten zong
Phatnate daita leh zong
A thupina kiamlou lai ding
A vangletnate beilou lai ding
Tangtawn tangtawn a thupi, Amah a hi
A thupisa Amah hi
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang hilou in
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang zong hilou
verse3:
Bei ni neilou hi A thupina vangletna
Tangtawn in bei ngeilou ding hi
Van thupinate, lei thupinate bei zong
A vangletna beilou ding
Tangtawn tangtawn a liansa hi
Tangtawn tangtawn a thupisa hi
Leitung khempeuh in Amah phat chiatta hen
I Pathian a thupi hi
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang hilou
A thupisa ahi, thilsiamte hang zong hilou
chorus:
A thupi......... A thupi.........
A thupi simleitung leh vangtung ah (2x)

verse1:
Ka launa pan hong vualzoh pih
Ka mang Jesu ahi
Natna khempeuh damsak pa hi
Dahna khempeuh thei pa
Amah in lung nopna nei a
Amah a ka om chiang
Ka puakgik te hong zangsak in
Lungnopna hong pia
verse2:
Ka paina teng ah hong mu a
Aman lam hong tonpih
Akhut in kei hong len zel a
Ka dahna te hong nem
Amah toh houlim khawm nuam sang
Ka haksatna gen leng
Ka vangikte hong dawn zang hi
Ka Tou Jesu in
chorus:
Jesu ah ka nuamta
Jesu ah ka khawlta
Amah in ka buainate leh
Ka van gikte hong dawn
Ka bangkim Amah ah nga in
Amah ah ka lung nuam ta hi
Amah kei ding lawm hoih pen leh
Ka muanna ahi

verse1:
There is no one else like you
None on the Earth and Heaven
All glory, Sovereignty
Forever belongs to you
verse2:
There is no one else like you
Highest, Mighty, Glorious
There’s no name sweeter than yours
Every fame belongs to you
chorus:
We praise you, we worship you
Holy and all Powerful God
God in Highest, we exalt Thee
Oh!! There’s none, no other like you
Oh!! There’s none, no other like you
bridge:
Amazing is your Creation
Your wisdom we can’t fathom
All your creations declare
Your Majesty
Oh! Dear Lord! There’s no one like you
artists: Rosy Nembiakhoih, Nancy Niangmuankim, Lamhoihching Mangte, Mercy Chingngaihsang, Donthiansiam Tonsing
composers: T. Pumkhothang, Translation: C. Niangboi Khuptong

verse1:
Leitung mite na it man in
Na nuntak na’n na hon lei zou
Na itna chibang ka tel a
Kei din ka Hondampa na hi
verse2:
Ka bat teng uh hong dit sak zou
Sihna pan in hong honkhia zou
Tangtawn nuntakna hong piapa
Hong suakta sak Jesu na hi
verse3:
Ka natna teng hong puak sak zou
Ka dahna teng hong puak sak zou
Sing Khros tung ah a hinna pia
Tua in ka sianna hong peta
chorus:
Kou ding a hong sipa Jesu
Na sakmin ngaih ka tawisang uh
Kumpi Jesu hong pahtawi ung

bridge:

I sapna khem peuh Aman a thei
Bangkim ah Jesu’n hong huh thei a

verse1:
Lei leh van ah a lianpen
Jehovah Pathian aw
Alpha leh Omega hi
Beini nei ngeilou
Thuneihna nang a ahi
Khuambang kip Pathian
Athupi in a lamdang hi
Hong pahtawi ung e
verse2:
Upna ah ding kip den di’n
Na tate kipden ung
Setan in a zoulou ding
Phuk zou ngeilou ding
Leitung in a dou zong in
A dou zou ngei lou ding
A kip tawntung ka Pathian uh

chorus:
Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian
Jakob Pathian aw
Koute Pathian biak di’n kilawm
Phat ding in kilawm
Pahtawina te thupinate

Sangpen Pathian nang a ahi
Hong liansak ung

verse1:
Toupa aw na siamna a thuk lua e
Na thupi nate sut zoh ding hilou
Na pilna a thuk aw Na siamna sang
Mihing pilna in a sut zoh ding hilou
verse2:
Bangkim Nang a hi vaihawmpa na hi
ung si-alte leh vandum khen lam ah
A lamdang penpen a thupi penpen
Piandang lawmlawm e Toupa na thupina
verse3:
Pahtawinate leh vangletna khempeuh
Beini neilou ding aw na thupina
Tawntung in Nang a phat ding in kilawm
Minthanna khempeuh Nang a di’n hong pia ung
chorus:
Thupinate Pahtawinate
A tawntung Nang ahi
Pilna siamna sanna khempeuh Toupa nang a hi

verse1:
Nisim nuntakna ah lung lau kei in
Mailam nuntakna zong
Silh leh ten nek leh dawn hongpia ding hi
Tuate Toupa’n thei hi
verse2:
Lungbuai lungmang a i om hang in maw
Bang mah hihthei omlou
Bangkim Toupa in ei hong pia ding hi

verse3:
Tomkal sung a vul ding Lilipakte
Tung leng vasa en un
Semlou bawl lou in a om zong un maw
Toupa’n amau vak hi
chorus:
Toupa gam leh dikna zong masa un
Tua khempeuh kong piak behlap ding achi

verse1:
Bang dang khem peuh sang
Jesu deih pen ing
Amah kei di’n gou man pha ahi
Amah muan huai pen
Belh ding muanhuai pen
Suangpi bang kip tawntung Jesu hi
verse2:
Lei goute bei the
Lei siamna mangthei
Jesu zaw tangtawn in a om
Mihing muanna zaw
Bangmah lou hi a
Sehnel tung a inn kiplou bang hi
verse3:
Mihing muan sang in
Toupa muan hoih zaw
Sum leh pai hauhnate sang in
Jesu a muanna
Amuan huai penpen
A mangthei lou tangtawn gou ahi
chorus:
Jesu deihpen ing
Bangdang teng sang in
Amah bang deihhuai dang omlou
Jesu deih pen ing
Muanhuai penpen hi

verse1:
Thupi leh Vang lian
Kumpite Kumpi
Leitung vantung ah lianpen
Na min ngaih penpen
Nang hong pahtawi ung
Hong tawisang ung Toupa aw
A Thupipen Nang kia na hi
verse2:
Van te na nang ahi
Leitung nang a hi
Toupa aw na khutsuak hi
Na thupina in
Lei leh van khup zou
Nangbang thupi dang omlou
Hong pahtawi ung, hong liansak ung
verse3:
Sui seng zoh hilou
Genseng zoh hilou
Nong itna lamdang in lian
Hu sang khempeuh in
Nang hong pahtawi hen
Lianpen sangpen Toupa aw

verse1:
Na vualzawlna ka ngaihsut in Toupa
Athupi in a lamdang hi na e

Silhpuan bang in a hong thak zel ahi
verse2:
Nisim a ding ka sapnate hong pia
Tasam lou in na hoihna ka muzel
Ka nget phak louh na vualzawlna katan
Avekpi in  na hoihna vang ahi
verse3:
A hunhun in na vualzawlna ka tang
A nini in na vualzawlna ka mu
Na deihsakna  a lian ngei e Toupa
Na hoih vang in na min ka hong phat hi
chorus:
Ka lungdamna gen zoh hilou
Na hoihna leh na vualzawlna thupi
Ka inkuan ah  na hoihna hong lang zel

verse1:
Khrist vang in Amah a um mite
Pathian tate suak zou hang
Khrist eite silhpuan a hong hita
Amah vang gou luah hi hang
verse2:
Khrist vang in kikhenthei ihi kei
Mi zawng mi hau chih omlou
Chi leh nam unau laizom i hi
Khrist ah tuibang luangkhawm ta
verse3:
Pheiphung suankhawm anbang ki-it in
Heina dang tongsuah dang zong
Khrist vang in tun leh zua khat i hi
Kikhen thei hi kei hang e
chorus:
Khrist vang in deidanna om nawn lo
Mikhempeuh Laizomkhat hi
Noute koute chih om nawnlou in
Khrist vang pumkhat i hi ta

verse1:
Tuan a pupa selung mawl dawi leh kau bia
Singbul suangbul bia a kun in
Leimong khat pan Tangthupha hong pai zel ten
Damna khuavak hong pe ta
verse2:
Pilna hong guan Tangthupha khuavak a hi
Siamnate leh sannate zong
Tangthupha ei di'n manpha hina tel e
Hon tawisang tu a na hi
verse3:
Thupina leh pahtawina Amah pia ni
Hinna lampi hong bawlsak ta
Hon suakta sak, sihna pan hong honkhia ta
Tangtawn Topa minthang hen
chorus:
Suahtakna la ngaih takin i sa ding uh
Halleluiah! Halleluiah!
Vangletna vualzawhna Aman hong pia
(Halleluiah! minthang hen) x2
bridge:
Tangthupha khovak in eite hon taangvak ta aa
Mialna aa kipan in suahtakna khuavak hong puak
Hong lamtou a san'na munte a hong tungsak in
Leivui panin hong lamtou Tangthupha hi

verse1:
Siktui luan a ka omlai pan
Ka tung a hoih Toupa ahi
Bangmah theilou vuaktang lel in
Ka hong piang a
Silhpuan hoih tawh a hon tuam a
Kilbang khang in ahon kem a
Sungnek hong pia Saunuam hong pia
Toupa hoih hi
verse2:
Ka bah chiang in hatna honpia
Lamtou ah khawlna ding tul lim
Khua ul kai a ka om hun chiang
Huihkhi siang tawh
Lametbei a ka om hun chiang
Lametna thak a hon guan zel
Hon nusia lou
Hon taisan lou Toupa ahi
verse3:
Ka nget vanga nei ding hi leng
Ka neih zawh ding bangmah om kei
Hizong Aman a hunhun in a hon pezel
Ka kalsuante a hon veng a
Hoihna bukim tawh hon zui in
Bang kim ahoihnate vang a
Ka tan hi zaw
chorus:
Ka tunga hoih Toupa ahi
Ka phatzel ding ka damsung in
Genseng hi lou sutseng hi lou
Toupa hoihna
A kang ngeilou tuinak bang in
A hoihna in hon zuizel ding
Ka tung a hoih Toupa ahi
Ka phat zel ding

verse1:
Lei ah muan ding khat zong omlou
Leitung nate bei ding
Lei a i muanpen te sia in
Pak bang in vul pah thei
Toupa a muanna koih te in zaw
Beini nei ngei lou ding
oupa kulhpi a neite in zaw
A tawntung in beini nei ngeilou ding
verse2:
Mihing a muanna koih te leh
Leitung hauhna muangte
Nikhat tei buai in lungkham ding
A muanna uh bei ding
Leitung nate setheilou om kei
Pak bang in vul pah thei
Toupa bang muanhuai dang omlou hi
Suangpi bang kip
Tangtawn in ling ngeilou
verse3:
Lei ah muan ding bangmah omlou
Tangtawn daih ding omlou
Lei ah belh ding bangmah omlou
A kip bangmah omlou
Leitung a thupina toh mang ding
Etlawmna khempeuh toh
Toupa aw nang mah kong muang zaw hi
Nang a muanna
Bang teng sang muanhuai zaw
chorus:
Lei ah muan ding khat zong omlou hi
Toupa nang kong muang hi
Muan ding ka neihlouhman hi kei e
Na muanhuaina ka muh man
A bei theilou a mang thei ngeilou
Toupa nang kia na hi
Na muanhuaina thuk in sang na e
Nang kong muang hi
Toupa nang kong muang hi

verse1:
Bang mah lou pi ka hi zong in
Ka phulo dong a honpi  Toupa aw
Nang vang in maw ka tan sate
Thupi in aw a lamdang hi na e
Ka tan ding a kilawm lou pi
Kei a ding in ka mai ah nong lui a
A hong lamsang ka Topa nang na hi
verse2:
Ankamtang chia ka  hi lel hi
Ka theihna leh ka  pilna omlou e
Tangtel bang lel ka nuntakna
Hizah dong a Na tonpihna ka tan
Na hoih na lian na lawmlawm e
Ka sim in zong ka sim zohlouh ahi
Ka Topa aw na min ka hong phat hi
verse3:
Nong tonpihna  ki chiangtan lou
Kei a ding in a kiching hi na e
A hoih zawte a sang zawte
A nei lailai Ka Toupa nang na hi
Nong piak lai ding ka san lai ding
Na Thuphate ka lungdam na hi lai
Aw tuate zong kei a hisak lai aw
chorus:
Na honpi na kei di’n a thupi e
Na honpi dan kei di’n a lamdang e
Bang ka hi hiam hizahta a
Ka nuntakna Na hon pi Toupa aw
Aw lamdang e! aw lungdam  hi na'ng e

verse1:
Tutan honpi limbelh Toupa
Nang mah na hi
Hiai chiang ka tun zohna
Toupa nang vang ahi
Lauhuaina tampi kal lak ah
Tutan honpi hnhuai Toupa
Na hoihna leh Na deihsakna a thupi lua
verse2:
Mualkim mual sang ah hon len in
Na ho n kai a
Gulsia tangsia lak hon kem pa, Nangmah na hi
Sih lauhuaina tampi lak a
Bitna honpia  ka Toupa aw
Na honpina a lamdang in a thupi e
verse3:
Kei hatna in ka tun zoh ding
Bangmah omlou
Ka hoihna vang ka tan zoh ding, bangmah omlou
Bang hi ka hiam ka Toupa aw
Ka innkuan te bang hilel hiam
Hiai tantan a Na hon tunpih a thupi lua
chorus:
EBenezer tutan honpi ka Toupa hi
Thupi ka sa lamdang ka sa
Na honpina ka ngaihsut in
Hiai tan ka tun zohna Toupa nang vang ahi

verse1:
Toupa'n hon vualzawl hen
Na paina  hon pi hen
Tawlngakna nuam Toupa'n hon pia hen
Sang tampi dia hoih pen
Nang apan khang hong piang hen la
A kang ngeilou vualzawlna nak hong hin
verse2:
Toupa na ma pai hen
Na kalsuan hon veng hen
Sun leh zan in aman hon pi hen
Na taksap hon pia in
Na gim hong namtui semsem hen
Tusuan dong in gim namtui hong hi in
verse3:
Nang a pan suan hoih pen
Khangsawn khang za dong in
Vualzawlna pha nang a hong hi hen
Na suante gahpha in
Melma ten a zoh ngeilouh ding
A hoih penpen Toupan hong pia hen aw
chorus:
Toupan hon vualzawl hen
Toupan hon tonpih hen
A hoih penpen vualzawlna honpia hen
Na lutung a sathau nilh in
Na khe mawng dong hong nel sak in
A vualzawl nan hon zui zel hen

verse1:
Hong huh hong makaih Toupa ahi e
Amah vang hiai chiang melmu thei hang
Lamsuk lamtou ah hon tonpih Amah
Tu dong in Toupa  hoihna mu lai hang
verse2:
Khatvei leh huihpi huih sia kal ah zong
Khatvei leh tuipi tuihual kal ah
Toupa bitna khut muan huai in hon len
Hatsatna te pan hong vualzoh pih zel
verse3:
Nang hong pahtawi ung Toupa vanglian pen
Koute hon huai honpi pa na hi
Tang a tuan a koute lam hong pi zel
Tu dong hongpi lai Toupa nang na hi
chorus:
Ebenezer Toupan honpi
Tuni dong Toupa hoihna i mu lailai
A honpina lamdang in thupi lua
Ebenezer Toupa hoihna'n a  honpi zel

verse1:
Lung launa ding omlou
I Toupan hong kem ding
Na kalsuannate Aman a hon kem ding 
Na mailam hun peuh ah
 Na paina mun peuh a
Aman hong pi in a tawntung hong kem ding
verse2:
Aman a hong kem ding
A lauhuai mun ah zong
Na khete ching in a hon nusia lou ding
A sun a zan hizong
Hun haksa hong tung zong
A khut muanhuai ah Aman nang hong kem ding
verse3:
Lampi a lauhuai zong
Aman nang hong  kem ding
Gamdai gamkeu mun na tawn ahi zong in
Sihna luiguam ah zong
Nat leh sat hun ah zong
A damna khut in Aman a hon lawng ding
chorus:
Aman  nang hong kem ding
Mun peuh ah
Aman nang hong ching ding
Na paina peuh
A khut  sung hong koih dia
A ang sung hong pom ding
Lung nuam in om in
I Toupan hong kem ding

verse1:
A siamloute a pil loute
A zang thei Pathian in
Bangmah hilou kei bang leltak
Nong zang  maw Toupa aw
A hatloute a zang thei pa
Pathian na hih vang in
Aw Keibang  lel na hon zang hi zaw e
verse2:
Na zatnopte ka ngaih sut in
Thupi in a lamdang
A pil zatam a siam zatam
Lai ah  kei nong zang maw
Mihing mai a simmoh huaite
Nang in na nial ngei lou
Aniam a sang a zang thei nang na hi
verse3:
Leitung miten kei hong tai san
Kei hong pampaih zong leh
Hong nusia lou hong tai san lou
Toupa nang na om hi
Nang deih bang in hong zang lai in
Ka hih theih bang bang in
Aniamte zong a zang thei Pathian aw
chorus:
Na zatnopte a hoihpente hi lou
Na tonpihte a siampente hi lou
Ahatlou leh, tualniam pen te
A zang thei Pathian in
 Aw kei bang lel na hon zang hi zaw e

verse1:
Van tung a omToupa aw
Na zahngaihna kon ngen
Nong huhna nong panpihna
Toupa aw kon ngen hi
Giakmoh vabang lung lau in
Zata muang theilou
Na khazaknuai hong kem in
Lumbang hong sung aw
Gam a din damna kon ngen
Toupa aw nang in hong damsak in
verse2:
Ka mauna uh  za in la
Ka kahna uh  za in
A lai ah Nang  hong ding in
Lemna tuangtung sak aw
Siatna huihpin hong nuai zong
Daibang theng sak aw
Nanglou damna dang omlou
Na banzal ngak ung
Gam a din damna kon ngen
Toupa aw nang in hong damsak in
verse3:
Van tung a om Toupa aw
Kou lam hong mitsuan in
Ka gam uh hon en inla
Damna hong pia lai aw
Huihpite na daihsak bang
Dam sakna ngai ung
Hihtheih bang mah nei kei ung
Na  khut hong ngak ung
Zahngaihna hong pia lai aw
Toupa aw nang in hong damsak in

verse1:
Toupa toh ton inla
Amah ah kinga in
Na tuanglam a tang sak ding hi
Amah lam en inla
A thute um in
Na kalsuan kisui lou ding hi
verse2:
A khut sung ki kemsak
A kha nuai kikem sak
A bitna nang a hong hi ding
A vaak ah pai in la
Amah ah ki nga'n
A lampi a pan pial kei in
verse3:
I Toupa ki pi sak
Amai ah ma khelh ken
A khekhap na zui ding ahi
Toupa ah  kizeem in
Amah mel zong in
A mel vaak ah pai tawn tung in
chorus:
Toupa toh ton inla
Athu in om in
Na vaite amah pian
Amah taisan kei in
Akiang ah thum in la
A thu muang zou in
Toupa toh nisim in ton in

verse1:
I mawhna hang a hong thuak in
Kalvary ah ahinna pia
A zalna hankhuk sung apan in
Ni thumni in a thounawnta
verse2:
A thohni ding ahong tun in
Van pan Angel te hong pai in
A sitna suang a hong lakhia uh
I hondampa a hong thouta
verse3:
I lau kei ding i dah kei ding
Jesu han pan a thounawn bang
Nitawpni chiang ei zong ithou ding
Amah toh nuam a lengkhawm ding
chorus:
A Thounawn ta hankhuk a pan in
I Hondampa a thounawnta
I mawhna ah dikna i ngah na'ng
A thounawnta sihna pan in

verse1:
Lungkham leh lungngai a ka omchiang
Hong huh ding nai gige ka Toupa om
Amah kei ding in hong kem hong chingpa hi
Lusu in bah in aw a om ngeilou
verse2:
Ni hong tum zankhua a hong mial in
Hong ompih ka Toupan a hong ompih
Ka mangbatnate Aman a ngilh lou ding
Kei a din huhpa nai gige ahi
verse3:
Ka nung leh ma ah a hon veng a
Ka kisapna khempeuh a hon pia hi
Hong huh ding ngai in tunglam ka mitsuan in
Zion pan hong huhna a hong tung zel
chorus:
Kei hong huh hong ching ka Toupa hi
Amah bangkim a ka bangkim hi
Sun in ni in zan in kha in
Hong hai lou ding kei hong ompih hi

verse1:
Jesu aw nang kong muang hi
Ka Tanpa na hi
Na ang sung ka hon bel hi
Nang ah om nuam sang
Launa huih in hong nawk in
Dah leh natna hong tung zong
Jesu aw kei hong len in
Nang ah ka bit ding
verse2:
Jesu aw Nang kong bia hi
Ka Kumpi na hi
Pahtawina Lalna khempeuh
Tangtawn nang a hi
Na min ngaih phat nuam sang e
Nang toh om khawm nuam sang e
Aw Jesu hong tawi sang ing
Na min kong phat hi
verse3:
Jesu aw ka lamet pen
Ka laukha tuang lam
Tangtawn sau nuam hong bawl sak
Topa nang na hi
Tua mun khuam bang ka luah ding
Ngoumei lai na hong kum chiang
Gimna dahna beita ding
Tangtawn inn nuam ah

verse1:
Jawlneite gen kholhsa bang in
Jesu Bethlehem ah hong piang
Mipilte in aksi zui in
Hondampa va bia uh
verse2:
A min ding in Immanuel
Sianmang toh i omkhawmta hi
Lemna Kumpi a hong hih bang
Lei ah lemna leng hen
verse3:
Amanpha e athupi e
Mary sung ah naungek hong piang
Mikhempeuh in nuamna lasan
Amah phatna pia hen
chorus:
Ei din Kumpi a hong piang ta
Eidin Naungek a hong piang ta
Amah phat in i bia ding uh
Nuamna zaila awi ni

zoTitle: Nang To Ka Um Jing Ding
verse1:
Zaitha hatna keima’n ima neilou
Het’na le ninglhinna ima neilou
Lungthim chihna mason ding neilou kei
Na natong ding in Ipi kahi’m Pakai
verse2:
Pathen a kon himo khat zong umlou
Zaitha hatna neilou hon hatna nei
Changa monna umlou ahi lai in
Chung Pathen zaitha ka hatna hung sohtai
verse3:
Keima hatna song a ka che paile
Kichatna ding Tijatna ding atam
Pakai galdot pum a ka ma’son teng
Chung Muvanlai bang zaitha hatna kanei
chorus:
Na umpi’ng e! Banzal kahin tuh ding
Ginglel hih in Nang dia Pakai kahi
Nangma hatna hilou kei hatna in
Na dalha pong e,Nang to ka um jing ding

verse1:
Vabang kalenna setlei a
Lonlhi thih in huibang ka mau
Chung van khopi nom ka lhun tengle
Lei gimna ho beisoh tading
verse2:
Chung Gam khopi song mantam Gam
Hei lei a Kon ngai in ka mau
Tahsan in ka galdot ngai anai
Kelngoi nou vin a salvah gam
verse3:
Ka Pakai mel kamu tengle
A khut Maha ken tuh ing ting
Sei tange o kalei gimna ho
Ka mitlhi cheng beisoh tading
chorus:
Aw ka ngai e Chung van khopi
Lunghelna ho umlou na gam
Nunnom tah a kalenna ding
Kapa gam nom ka ngai ngei e!

verse1:
Innsung pa aw na innsung ngaihsun pha kik in
Toupa thu a machiang huai in loubang khual in
Innsung nuam bawl ding in kisa’n
A Khanna ding ahoihna ding
Na liang kou ah Toupa’n hong nga lunggel kik in
verse2:
Innsung pa aw pa hoih hidi’n kibawlpha in
Nangmah khekhap zui ding na vontawite ahi
Siatna in zingvai hong hawm man
A kikhel hun a hong tun man
Na innsung ah Pa hoih hi di’n kibawlpha in
verse3:
A taimang sa innsung pa aw kaw om na hiam?
Na innsung in nang hong ngak hi aw hong kik in
Innsung a di’n na hoihna pak
Gimnamtui bang hong zaam ta hen
Tua in na innsung hong palhsak kik ding ahi
chorus:
Innsung pa aw na innsung gelpha kik dih vaw
Toupa thu ah kem hoih inla
Hoihlou te pan abitna ding
Leitung a din gou manpha hi

verse1:
Na Jotna lampi meibang hung jing ham?
I Pathen in ei dalha hilou
Huipi nung henlang, thim hung zing jongle
Pakai ban thahat in na umpi
verse2:
Malam hinkho ding kicha’n na um ham?
Na hinkho man na ning kitel em?
Ve’n Pakai khut na chunga a um e
Panpi dia mansa um jing ahi
verse3:
Na kinepna jouse beijieng jongle
Ikim bolthei Pathen a um e
Lungkhamna guomkhuh sunga na lhah ham?
Lai jong chun Pakai in na umpi
verse4:
Na tohgon jouse Pakai pedoh in
Na tahsan poule napui jieng ding
Gentheina tincheng ijat um jongle
Pakai nang dia monna ahi e
chorus:
Lunglha hih in Pakai in na umpi e
Kichang gel hih in ama’n na hejing e
Thomhau da’n Pakai in nang na umpi
Ama’n na lampi hin pui nante

verse1:
Ka hinkhou pumpi sejouta
Ka gamsung'u ase joutai
Setna'n tuilen bangin eichup
Aw pakai nei damsah uvin
verse2:
Kakhut hou amachang gamtai
Kakeng hou amachang joutai
Eitomdam un dam tauvinge
Nei chul'in nadamna khutin
verse3:
Ichondan hou kigelphau te
Manthahna khuhsung ilhun ma'n
Pakai ang'a kipeu hite
Jesu lou damna ding umlou
preChorus:
Leng Jesu nang kahin ngai'ui
Chamna lengpa nang hungding'in
Keiho tohvai hunghom'in lang
Damna nikho hinisosah in
chorus:
Nei damsah un dam tauvinge
Nei huhdoh un hingding kahiu
I dang hilou adamna ding
Aw pakai nangma bou nahi

verse1:
Toupa na thu manpha pen sa'ng
Na zai la mah ngaih pen sa ing
Ka nuntakna tha hong dim sak
Ka kha a din khuaizu bang khum hi
verse2:
A neupente  hong lian sak a
A hatloute hatna hong pia
Simmoh huaite hong lam sang in
A niamte din sanna hong pia hi
verse3:
Kilawmloute hong kilawm sak
Pilna neilou pilna hong guan
Hong lian sak in hong lam toutou
Na simthu mah manpha pen sa ing
verse4:
Gilou pente naang bang nem sak
Hoihlou pente hoihna hong pia
Kilemloute lemna hong pia
Damloute din damna hong pia hi
chorus:
Na sim thu hi a manpha penpen
Na simthu hi nuntakna hong pia
Leitung hauhna sum leh pai sang in
Manpha pen Na simthu hi

verse1:
I lei nuntakna nikhat ni chiang hong bei ding a
I lei taksa zaw buanlei a suak lel ding hi
A bei thei ngeilou, mangthei ngeilou i laukha
I Hondampa tuak ding in thangvan ah i leng tou ding
verse2:
I tenna lei ah i lutpih bangmah omlou a
I nutsiat ding hi neihsa i lamsa khempeuh
I lei thupi na'n vantung ah mun a neilou
Khut a bawl louh kham khopi Toupa'n a bawlsa om hi
verse3:
Kipak in nuam un i Toupa mun hon bawlsak zou
Nikhat ni chiang in eite a hong la ding hi
Lei a mun neilou vakvaite leh tasam te'n
I Honpa sau nuam sung ah nuam in a leng den ding uh
chorus:
I van in nuam ah tuang i tun hun chiang in
Tawntung in nuam i sa ding
Agape itna toh hong it i Toupa mel mu'n
Zohna la ngaih i sa ding
Tawp lou in i sa ding uh

verse1:
Liamsa nunlui gel kik leng
Toupa hoihna phawk sem ing
Bangmah lou leh gen thei hinkhua pan
Phulou dong in na non lamsang
verse2:
Aw Toupa na honpina
Kei leh ka innkuante din
Thupi in lamdang sa ung Toupa
Tudong mel in na hon musak
verse3:
Genthei hin khua a hing lai
Liangvai nunkhua a luai lai
Tuate pen nong pi khia maw Toupa
Lungdam lou thei hi kei ung e
verse4:
Mit nauta bang nong kem a
Vualzawlna simseng louh toh
Hun haksa zanmial nuai a pan in
Itna Khut toh na hon len hi
chorus:
Kei leh ka innkuan ah vualzawlna
Honpia hon neisak Toupa
Kei leh ka innkuante lam nong pinate
Thu leh la in a genseng lou

verse1:
Theihsiam haksa leitung nunna
Ka ngaihsut chiang lamdang kasa
Bangchi a hiam chi in ka ngaihsun zel
Hizong Toupa nong piak bangbang
Lungdam tak a kasan theih na'n
Hong hilh inla, kei hong theisiam sak aw
verse2:
Khat veivei leh ki ngaisia in
Na lemgel ah ka vui kha zel
Lamet bei in lungkiatna te'n hong tuam
Nong hehnepna ka ngai zel hi
Lungmang lungkia ka om louh na'n
Kei hong hilh in kei hong khamuan in aw
verse3:
Ka maimitte hong siang sak in
Ka muhnate hong siang sak in
Na mel apan ka gamman'louh na di'n
Khattang tuanglam ka zuih khekhap
Hong liah lummei hong thengsak aw
Zingsol aksi kei di'n hong tang den aw
chorus:
Toupa lemgel a lamdang e
Selung pilna'n a gel zoulou
Hizong kei ding a vualzawlna ahi
Lunggimna leh lohsapnate
Khat veivei leh hong tung zong in
Na mel muhna ka hoihna ding hi zaw

verse1:
It leh ngaih tampi lenmual khum nung in
Tuni dong mel in muthei lai ung
Kou hoih vang hilou kou siam vang hilou
Toupa aw nang hoih na vang hi zaw
verse2:
Liamsa nun luite  gel kik kik le ung
Nongpina lam dang mu semsem ung
Tang a Israelte na pi bang in
Koute hong pipa nang mah na hi
verse3:
An leh tui hong muam hong khanglian sakpa
Kua hi lou nang mah na hi Toupa
Kal khat khit kal khat nong suanpih lai maw
Nun nuam in na min hong phat ung e
verse4:
Na gelna pian in dang sa'ng e Toupa
Kou din hoih lua hi na zing vaihawm
Na tate leem naang bang nong diah duai a
Tuni dong nang di'n  kip lai ung e
chorus:
Hong phat ung Toupa
Laambang hong pak ung
Kabitna uh  leh ka innsang uh
Hong kem Hong huai pa
Lam bang hong pipa
Na hoihna kou din a thupi lua

verse1:
Toupa mah ka phat chiang
Nuam ka sa semsem
Phat ding in kilawm pen e
Zaila in ka phat nuam
Sasa leng ka nuam
Zaila in ka awi chimlou
verse2:
Kumpite a ding in
Kumpipa ahi
Toupate' a din Toupa
Kumpipa ahih na'n
Tawpni a nei lou
Bei lou in a lian tawntung
verse3:
Ei  ding a a hoihna
Sut seng ding hi lou
Zingsang in a hong thak zel
A itna  thupi dan
Tangtawn in a om
Phat ding ka thupi pen hi
chorus:
Phat lou thei ka hi kei
Lam lou thei ka hi kei
Toupa mah ka phat chiang nuam
Lamlam in ka phat ding
Tumging toh ka phat ding
Tawp lou in ka phat ding
Phatlou thei ka hi kei hi

verse1:
Ziingsang ka khanlawh theih nuam siing ee
Ka khut te lamto in Topa ka phat
Ka khete lampai thei in ka mit ten khua muthei
Ka aw ten Topa thupi’na tangko
verse2:
Ziingdam huihvot hiauhiau ka diik theihna
Simlei nunnopnate ka zo theihna
Nuntakna anlim nono ka neek theih ka dawn theihna
Nang hang hi Topa nangmah hang bek hi
verse3:
Haksatna ka tuah khak khempeuh zong
Nangma muhna ah asia khat beek om kei
Topa aw nangma muh bang hong musak hong telsak in
Na zia, na tong hong tel semsem nuam ing
chorus:
Nuam siing Topa nuntakna nong kop lai
Vangliatna tawh na kidim hi
Hong phatphat ning ukzawhna nei Topa
Phat ding na kilawm bel hi

verse1:
(Zingsang nisuah pelmawh bang
Topa hoihna kip den hi, kikhel ngeilo
A itna kip in kho tawntung hi)x2
verse2:
(Theigahte a hut khin aa
Gan khempeuh a si khin zong, Topa hoihna
Lungdam in pahtawi veve ni)x2
verse3:
(Khuahunte hong kikhel in
Vantung leitung a beizong in, kikhel ngeilou
Topa itna thuk in zai semsem)x2
chorus:
Na mai ah hong kun ung
Na min hong pahtawi ung
Vanglian Pasian
Zahtakna tawh hong bia ung
Ukzawhna a nei Topa
Na Minsiangtho…Thanghen!
